atk-s0505a:37_0: “Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
atk-s0505a:37_1: Tena kho pana samayena āḷavakā bhikkhū navakammaṃ karontā rukkhaṃ chindantipi chedāpentipi.

atk-s0505a:37_6: Tassā ca devatāya dārakassa bāhuṃ ākoṭesi.
atk-s0505a:37_11: yāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ idheva jīvitā voropeyyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:37_13: Atha kho sā devatā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0505a:38_0: Evañca pana vatvā puna bhagavā tassā devatāya uppannakodhavinayanatthaṃ –
atk-s0505a:39_0: “Yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃva vāraye”ti. –

atk-s0505a:48_20: Tathā kāmāvacarakkhandhesu appahīnānusayitānaṃ kilesānaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhā eva vatthu, na itare.

atk-s0505a:49_16: Yathā pana tasseva rukkhassa pupphaphalādīsu nibbinno koci puriso catūsu disāsu maṇḍūkakaṇṭakaṃ nāma rukkhe visaṃ payojeyya,
atk-s0505a:49_17: atha so rukkho tena visasamphassena phuṭṭho pathavīrasaāporasapariyādinnena appasavanadhammataṃ āgamma

atk-s0505a:49_19: evamevaṃ khandhappavattiyaṃ nibbinno kulaputto tassa purisassa catūsu disāsu rukkhe visappayojanaṃ viya attano santāne catumaggabhāvanaṃ ārabhati.
atk-s0505a:49_20: Athassa so khandhasantāno tena catumaggavisasamphassena sabbaso vaṭṭamūlakilesānaṃ pariyādinnattā kiriyabhāvamattamupagatakāyakammādi
atk-s0505a:49_21: sabbakammappabhedo āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattadhammatamāgamma bhavantarasantānaṃ nibbattetuṃ samattho na hoti.

atk-s0505a:50_4: Kalyāṇigāme piṇḍāya carato mahātissattherassa visabhāgarūpadassanena uppannakilesajātañcettha nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:50_6: Samathavipassanānaṃ aññataravasena avikkhambhitakilesajātaṃ cittasantatimanārūḷhaṃ uppattinivārakassa hetuno abhāvā avikkhambhituppannaṃ nāma.

atk-s0505a:50_11: Samathavipassanāvasena vikkhambhitampi kilesajātaṃ ariyamaggena asamūhatattā uppattidhammataṃ anatītanti katvā asamūhatuppannanti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:50_12: Ākāsena gacchantassa aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino therassa kusumitarukkhe upavane pupphāni ocinantassa madhurassarena
atk-s0505a:50_13: gāyato mātugāmassa gītassaraṃ sutavato uppannakilesajātañcettha nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:50_14: Tassa “ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bahulīkaronto uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme antarāyeva antaradhāpetī”tiādīsu payogo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0505a:50_15: Tividhampi cetaṃ ārammaṇādhiggahitāvikkhambhitāsamūhatuppannaṃ bhūmiladdheneva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti veditabbaṃ.

atk-s0505a:51_2: Evaṃvidhameva hi uppannaṃ yena kenaci vinayena vinetuṃ sakkā hoti.

atk-s0505a:63_0: Tesu paṭippassaddhivinayaṃ nissaraṇavinayañca ṭhapetvā avasesena aṭṭhavidhena vinayenesa tena tena pariyāyena vinetīti pavuccati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0505a:63_1: Sīlasaṃvarena kāyavacīduccaritāni vinentopi hi taṃsampayuttaṃ kodhaṃ vineti,
atk-s0505a:63_2: satipaññāsaṃvarehi abhijjhādomanassādīni vinentopi domanassasampayuttaṃ kodhaṃ vineti,

atk-s0505a:63_4: vīriyasaṃvarena byāpādavitakkaṃ vinentopi taṃsampayuttaṃ kodhaṃ vineti.
atk-s0505a:63_6: tesaṃ dhammānaṃ attani nibbattanena te te dhamme pajahantopi tadaṅgappahātabbaṃ vikkhambhetabbaṃ samucchinditabbañca kodhaṃ vineti.
atk-s0505a:63_10: Paṭippassaddhippahānakāle pana vinetabbābhāvato nissaraṇappahānassa ca anuppādetabbato na tehi kiñci vinetīti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:63_11: Evaṃ tesu paṭippassaddhivinayaṃ nissaraṇavinayañca ṭhapetvā avasesena aṭṭhavidhena vinayenesa tena tena pariyāyena vinetīti pavuccatīti. Ye vā –

atk-s0505a:82_0: Evamādinā nayena kodhe ādīnavañca paccavekkhatopi kodho vinayaṃ upeti.
atk-s0505a:82_1: Tasmā evaṃ paccavekkhitvā kodhaṃ vinentopi esa vinetīti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:83_0: Kodhanti “anatthaṃ me acarīti āghāto jāyatī”tiādinā nayena sutte vuttānaṃ navannaṃ,
atk-s0505a:83_1: “atthaṃ me na carī”ti ādīnañca tappaṭipakkhato siddhānaṃ navannamevāti aṭṭhārasannaṃ,
atk-s0505a:83_2: khāṇukaṇṭakādinā aṭṭhānena saddhiṃ ekūnavīsatiyā āghātavatthūnaṃ aññatarāghātavatthusambhavaṃ āghātaṃ.
atk-s0505a:83_10: yathā visatikicchako vejjo sappena daṭṭhaṃ sabbaṃ kāyaṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃ mūlakhandhatacapattapupphādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:83_11: aññatarehi nānābhesajjehi payojetvā katehi vā osadhehi khippameva vineyya,
atk-s0505a:83_12: evamevaṃ yo yathāvuttenatthena uppatitaṃ cittasantānaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ kodhaṃ yathāvuttesu vinayanūpāyesu
atk-s0505a:83_13: yena kenaci upāyena vineti nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkarotīti.
atk-s0505a:84_0: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāranti so evaṃ kodhaṃ vinento bhikkhu yasmā kodho tatiyamaggena sabbaso pahīyati,
atk-s0505a:84_3: tasmā orāni ca tāni saṃsārasāgarassa pārabhūtāni cāti katvā “orapāra”nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:84_4: Atha vā “yo uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehi”,
atk-s0505a:84_5: so tatiyamaggena sabbaso kodhaṃ vinetvā anāgāmiphale ṭhito bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ.
atk-s0505a:84_18: Evametasmiṃ orapāre catutthamaggena chandarāgaṃ pajahanto “jahāti orapāra”nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:84_19: Ettha ca kiñcāpi anāgāmino kāmarāgassa pahīnattā idhattabhāvādīsu chandarāgo eva natthi;
atk-s0505a:84_20: apica kho panassa tatiyamaggādīnaṃ viya vaṇṇappakāsanatthaṃ sabbametaṃ orapārabhedaṃ saṅgahetvā tattha chandarāgappahānena “jahāti orapāra”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:85_0: Idāni tassatthassa vibhāvanatthāya upamaṃ āha “urago jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ purāṇa”nti.
atk-s0505a:85_7: Jalajo jale eva kāmarūpaṃ labhati, na thale,
atk-s0505a:85_17: Uragā hi pañcasu ṭhānesu sajātiṃ nātivattanti –
atk-s0505a:85_25: Jigucchanto nāma yadā upaḍḍhaṭṭhāne mutto hoti,
atk-s0505a:85_28: Evaṃ jigucchantopi ca daṇḍantaraṃ vā mūlantaraṃ vā pāsāṇantaraṃ vā nissāya jahāti.
atk-s0505a:85_34: Evamevaṃ ayampi bhikkhu orapāraṃ jahitukāmo catubbidhena jahāti –
atk-s0505a:85_38: Sajāti nāma bhikkhuno “ariyāya jātiyā jāto”ti vacanato sīlaṃ.
atk-s0505a:85_40: Evametissaṃ sajātiyaṃ ṭhito bhikkhu taṃ sakattabhāvādibhedaṃ orapāraṃ jiṇṇapurāṇatacamiva dukkhaṃ janentaṃ
atk-s0505a:85_41: tattha tattha ādīnavadassanena jigucchanto kalyāṇamitte nissāya adhimattavāyāmasaṅkhātaṃ thāmaṃ janetvā
atk-s0505a:85_42: “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti vuttanayena rattindivaṃ chadhā
atk-s0505a:85_44: vaṅkaṃ naṅguṭṭhaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā urago viya passasanto,
atk-s0505a:85_45: ayampi asithilaparakkamatāya vāyamanto urago viya phaṇaṃ karitvā,
atk-s0505a:85_46: ayampi ñāṇavipphāraṃ janetvā uragova tacaṃ orapāraṃ jahāti.
atk-s0505a:85_47: Jahitvā ca urago viya ohitataco yenakāmaṃ ayampi ohitabhāro anupādisesanibbānadhātudisaṃ pakkamatīti.
atk-s0505a:86_0: “Yo uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ, visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehi;
atk-s0505a:87_0: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ purāṇa”nti.
atk-s0505a:90_0: “Yena yattha yadā yasmā, vuttā gāthā ayaṃ imaṃ;
atk-s0505a:92_2: Ativitthārabhayena pana ito pabhuti mātikaṃ anikkhipitvā uppattidassananayeneva tassā tassā atthaṃ dassento atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0505a:92_3: Seyyathidaṃ yo rāgamudacchidā asesanti ayaṃ dutiyagāthā.
atk-s0505a:93_1: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
atk-s0505a:93_2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtattherassa upaṭṭhāko aññataro suvaṇṇakāraputto therassa santike pabbajito.
atk-s0505a:93_3: Thero tassa “daharānaṃ asubhaṃ sappāya”nti mantvā rāgavighātatthaṃ asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0505a:93_4: Tassa tasmiṃ āsevanamattampi cittaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0505a:93_9: Tato naṃ thero bhagavato santikaṃ nesi.
atk-s0505a:93_13: buddhaveneyyo eso”ti vatvā pabhassaravaṇṇaṃ padumaṃ iddhiyā nimminitvā tassa hatthe pādāsi – “handa, bhikkhu,
atk-s0505a:93_14: imaṃ vihārapacchāyāyaṃ vālikātale nāḷena vijjhitvā ṭhapehi,
atk-s0505a:93_16: Ayaṃ kira pañca jātisatāni suvaṇṇakārova ahosi.
atk-s0505a:93_17: Tenassa “lohitakanimittaṃ sappāya”nti ñatvā bhagavā lohitakakammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0505a:93_18: So tathā katvā muhutteneva yathākkamaṃ tattha cattāripi jhānāni adhigantvā anulomapaṭilomādinā nayena jhānakīḷaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0505a:93_20: So jhānā vuṭṭhito taṃ milātaṃ kāḷavaṇṇaṃ disvā “pabhassararūpaṃ jarāya parimaddita”nti aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0505a:93_23: yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti tayopi bhave āditte viya passi.
atk-s0505a:93_25: Tattha dārakā orohitvā padumāni bhañjitvā bhañjitvā rāsiṃ karonti.
atk-s0505a:93_26: Tassa tāni udake padumāni naḷavane aggijālā viya khāyiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:93_27: pattāni patantāni papātaṃ pavisantāni viya khāyiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:93_28: thale nikkhittapadumānaṃ aggāni milātāni aggiḍaḍḍhāni viya khāyiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:93_29: Athassa tadanusārena sabbadhamme upanijjhāyato bhiyyosomattāya tayo bhavā ādittamiva agāraṃ appaṭisaraṇā hutvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:93_30: Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tassa bhikkhuno upari sarīrābhaṃ muñci.
atk-s0505a:93_32: Tato so “kimeta”nti āvajjento bhagavantaṃ āgantvā samīpe ṭhitamiva disvā uṭṭhāyāsanā añjaliṃ paṇāmesi.
atk-s0505a:93_33: Athassa bhagavā sappāyaṃ viditvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ abhāsi “yo rāgamudacchidā asesa”nti.
atk-s0505a:94_3: Atītakālikānampi hi chandasi vattamānavacanaṃ akkharacintakā icchanti.
atk-s0505a:94_5: Bhisapupphaṃva saroruhanti sare virūḷhaṃ padumapupphaṃ viya.
atk-s0505a:94_10: Yathā nāma ete dārakā saraṃ oruyha bhisapupphaṃ saroruhaṃ chindanti,
atk-s0505a:94_11: evamevaṃ yo bhikkhu imaṃ tedhātukalokasannivāsaṃ ogayha –
atk-s0505a:97_0: “Ye rāgarattānupatanti sotaṃ, sayaṃ kataṃ makkaṭakova jālaṃ”. ;
atk-s0505a:98_0: “Ratto kho, āvuso, rāgena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto pāṇampi hanatī”ti –
atk-s0505a:99_0: Evamādinayamanugantvā rāgādīnavapaccavekkhaṇena yathāvuttappakārehi sīlasaṃvarādīhi saṃvarehi saviññāṇakāviññāṇakesu
atk-s0505a:99_1: vatthūsu asubhasaññāya ca thokaṃ thokaṃ rāgaṃ samucchindanto anāgāmimaggena avasesaṃ arahattamaggena
atk-s0505a:99_2: ca tato anavasesampi ucchindati pubbe vuttappakāreneva so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ urago jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ
atk-s0505a:99_5: Desanāpariyosāne ca so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhitoti.
atk-s0505a:100_3: Aññataro bhikkhu gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre viharanto taṇhāvasena akusalavitakkaṃ vitakketi.
atk-s0505a:101_4: yāva bhavaggā ajjhottharitvā ṭhitanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:101_6: sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikaṃ ādīnavaṃ agaṇetvā muhutteneva paracakkavāḷampi bhavaggampi sampāpuṇituṃ samatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:103_0: Ye ca taṃ anugijjhanti, te honti cakkadhārino”ti.
atk-s0505a:106_0: “Ūno loko atitto taṇhādāsoti kho, mahārājā”ti ca –
atk-s0505a:107_0: Evamādīnavapaccavekkhaṇena vuttappakārehi sīlasaṃvarādīhi ca yo thokaṃ thokaṃ visosayitvā arahattamaggena asesaṃ ucchijjati,
atk-s0505a:107_1: so bhikkhu tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sabbappakārampi jahāti orapāranti.
atk-s0505a:108_3: Aññataro bhikkhu gaṅgāya tīre viharanto gimhakāle appodake sote kataṃ naḷasetuṃ pacchā āgatena mahoghena
atk-s0505a:108_5: Tassajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavā imaṃ obhāsagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:109_12: hīnassa hīnohamasmī”ti mānoti evaṃ navavidho hoti.
atk-s0505a:111_0: Ādinā nayena tattha ādīnavapaccavekkhaṇena vuttappakārehi sīlasaṃvarādīhi ca yo thokaṃ thokaṃ vadhento
atk-s0505a:111_1: kilesānaṃ abaladubbalattā naḷasetusadisaṃ lokuttaradhammānaṃ atibalattā mahoghasadisena arahattamaggena
atk-s0505a:111_4: So bhikkhu tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sabbappakārampi jahāti orapāranti.
atk-s0505a:112_2: Imissā gāthāya ito parānañca dvādasannaṃ ekāyeva uppatti.
atk-s0505a:112_4: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro brāhmaṇo attano dhītuyā vāreyye paccupaṭṭhite cintesi –
atk-s0505a:112_5: “kenaci vasalena aparibhuttapubbehi pupphehi dārikaṃ alaṅkaritvā patikulaṃ pesessāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:112_6: So santarabāhiraṃ sāvatthiṃ vicinanto kiñci tiṇapupphampi aparibhuttapubbaṃ nāddasa.
atk-s0505a:112_7: Atha sambahule dhuttakajātike brāhmaṇadārake sannipatite disvā “ete pucchissāmi,
atk-s0505a:112_8: avassaṃ sambahulesu koci jānissatī”ti upasaṅkamitvā pucchi.
atk-s0505a:112_13: So dutiyadivase kālasseva vuṭṭhāya bhattavissaggaṃ katvā aciravatiyā nadiyā tīre udumbaravanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0505a:112_14: ekamekaṃ rukkhaṃ vicinanto pupphassa vaṇṭamattampi nāddasa.
atk-s0505a:112_16: Tattha ca aññataro bhikkhu aññatarasmiṃ manuññe rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisinno kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0505a:112_30: Atha bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā obhāsaṃ muñcitvā samuppannasamannāhārabahumānassa imā
atk-s0505a:112_31: obhāsagāthāyo abhāsi “yo nājjhagamā bhavesu sāra”nti sabbā vattabbā.
atk-s0505a:113_5: Pupphamiva udumbaresūti yathā udumbararukkhesu pupphaṃ vicinanto esa brāhmaṇo nājjhagamā,
atk-s0505a:113_6: evaṃ yo yogāvacaropi paññāya vicinanto sabbabhavesu kiñci sāraṃ nājjhagamā.
atk-s0505a:113_7: So asārakaṭṭhena te dhamme aniccato anattato ca vipassanto anupubbena lokuttaradhamme adhigacchanto jahāti
atk-s0505a:113_8: orapāraṃ urago jiṇṇamiva tacaṃ purāṇanti ayamattho yojanā ca.
atk-s0505a:113_9: Avasesagāthāsu panassa yojanaṃ avatvā visesatthamattameva vakkhāma.
atk-s0505a:119_0: Janā saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tañca kimantara”nti. ;
atk-s0505a:123_2: Tato yassantarato na santi kopāti tatiyamaggena samūhatattā yassa citte na santi kopāti attho.
atk-s0505a:123_12: Tasmā itibhavābhavatañca vītivattoti ettha yā esā sampattivipattivuḍḍhihānisassatucchedapuññapāpavasena iti anekappakārā bhavābhavatā vuccati.
atk-s0505a:123_13: Catūhipi maggehi yathāsambhavaṃ tena tena nayena taṃ itibhavābhavatañca vītivattoti evamattho ñātabbo.
atk-s0505a:124_1: Yassa vitakkāti ettha pana yassa bhikkhuno tayo kāmabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakkā,
atk-s0505a:124_4: vuttanayena tattha tattha ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā paṭipakkhavavatthānena tassa tassa pahānasamatthehi
atk-s0505a:124_5: tīhi heṭṭhimamaggehi ca vidhūpitā bhusaṃ dhūpitā santāpitā daḍḍhāti attho.
atk-s0505a:124_6: Evaṃ vidhūpetvā ca ajjhattaṃ suvikappitā asesā,
atk-s0505a:124_7: niyakajjhattabhūte attano khandhasantāne ajjhattajjhattabhūte citte ca yathā na puna sambhavanti,
atk-s0505a:125_1: Idāni yo nāccasārīti ettha yo nāccasārīti yo nātidhāvi.
atk-s0505a:125_14: Tasmā yo ete ubho ante vajjetvā majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjanto nāccasārī na paccasārīti evaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:125_15: Sabbaṃ accagamā imaṃ papañcanti tāya ca pana arahattamaggavosānāya majjhimāya paṭipadāya sabbaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0505a:125_16: vedanāsaññāvitakkappabhavaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ tividhaṃ papañcaṃ accagamā atikkanto,
atk-s0505a:126_1: Tadanantaragāthāya pana sabbaṃ vitathamidanti ñatvā loketi ayameva viseso.
atk-s0505a:126_5: Evaṃ santepi pana vipassanupagaṃ lokiyakhandhāyatanadhātuppabhedaṃ saṅkhatameva idhādhippetaṃ.
atk-s0505a:126_7: Niccanti vā sukhanti vā subhanti vā attāti vā yathā yathā kilesavasena bālajanehi gayhati,
atk-s0505a:126_9: Idanti tameva sabbaṃ paccakkhabhāvena dassento āha.
atk-s0505a:126_13: Loketi okāsaloke sabbaṃ khandhādibhedaṃ dhammajātaṃ “vitathamida”nti ñatvāti sambandho.
atk-s0505a:127_1: Idāni ito parāsu catūsu gāthāsu vītalobho vītarāgo vītadoso vītamohoti ete visesā.
atk-s0505a:127_14: Tattha yasmā ayaṃ bhikkhu lobhaṃ jigucchanto vipassanaṃ ārabhi “kudāssu nāmāhaṃ lobhaṃ vinetvā vigatalobho vihareyya”nti,
atk-s0505a:127_15: tasmā tassa lobhappahānūpāyaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ vitathabhāvadassanaṃ lobhappahānānisaṃsañca orapārappahānaṃ dassento imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:127_18: “yathāvutteneva nayena ete dhamme jigucchitvā vipassanamāraddhassa tassa tassa bhikkhuno ekamekāva ettha gāthā vuttā”ti.
atk-s0505a:127_21: Esa nayo ito parāsu catūsu gāthāsu.
atk-s0505a:128_2: appahīnaṭṭhena santāne sayantīti anusayā kāmarāgapaṭighamānadiṭṭhivicikicchābhavarāgāvijjānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:128_11: Evamete anusayā tena tena maggena pahīnattā yassa keci na santi,
atk-s0505a:128_19: Ettha pana “kiñcāpi so evaṃvidho bhikkhu khīṇāsavo hoti,
atk-s0505a:128_24: Atha vā anupādisesāya ca nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanto attano ajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ jahāti orapāranti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:129_0: Tattha kilesapaṭipāṭiyā maggapaṭipāṭiyā cāti dvidhā anusayānaṃ abhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:129_1: Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā hi kāmarāgānusayapaṭighānusayānaṃ tatiyamaggena abhāvo hoti,
atk-s0505a:129_5: Maggapaṭipāṭiyā pana paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhānusayavicikicchānusayānaṃ abhāvo hoti.
atk-s0505a:129_9: Tattha yasmā na sabbe anusayā akusalamūlā;
atk-s0505a:129_10: kāmarāgabhavarāgānusayā eva hi lobhākusalamūlena saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0505a:129_13: diṭṭhimānavicikicchānusayā pana na kiñci akusalamūlaṃ honti,
atk-s0505a:129_14: yasmā vā anusayābhāvavasena ca akusalamūlasamugghātavasena ca kilesappahānaṃ paṭṭhapesi, tasmā –
atk-s0505a:130_0: “Yassānusayā na santi keci, mūlā ca akusalā samūhatāse”. –
atk-s0505a:132_1: Yassa darathajāti ettha pana paṭhamuppannā kilesā pariḷāhaṭṭhena darathā nāma,
atk-s0505a:132_2: aparāparuppannā pana tehi darathehi jātattā darathajā nāma.
atk-s0505a:132_9: Yassa pana upādānakkhandhaggahaṇāya paccayabhūtā ariyamaggena pahīnattā,
atk-s0505a:132_11: pubbe vuttanayeneva so bhikkhu jahāti orapāranti.
atk-s0505a:133_1: Yassa vanathajāti etthapi darathajā viya vanathajā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:133_3: vanotīti vā vanaṃ yācati sevati bhajatīti attho.
atk-s0505a:133_5: Sā hi visayānaṃ patthanato sevanato ca “vana”nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:133_6: Taṃ pariyuṭṭhānavasena vanaṃ tharati tanotīti vanatho,
atk-s0505a:133_9: Keci panāhu “sabbepi kilesā gahanaṭṭhena vanathoti vuccanti,
atk-s0505a:133_14: Atha vā cittassa visayesu vinibandhāya āyatiṃ uppattiyā cāti attho.
atk-s0505a:134_10: Yo bhikkhu kāmacchandādīni pañca nīvaraṇāni samantabhaddake vuttanayena sāmaññato visesato ca nīvaraṇesu
atk-s0505a:134_11: ādīnavaṃ disvā tena tena maggena pahāya tesañca pahīnattā eva kilesadukkhasaṅkhātassa īghassābhāvena anīgho,
atk-s0505a:134_12: “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinā nayena pavattāya kathaṃkathāya tiṇṇattā tiṇṇakathaṃkatho,
atk-s0505a:134_18: diṭṭhisallo”ti vuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ sallānaṃ vigatattā visallo.
atk-s0505a:134_19: So bhikkhu pubbe vuttanayeneva jahāti orapāranti.
atk-s0505a:135_0: Atrāpi ca kilesapaṭipāṭiyā maggapaṭipāṭiyā cāti dvidhā eva nīvaraṇappahānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:135_1: Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā hi kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa byāpādanīvaraṇassa ca tatiyamaggena pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:135_3: “Akataṃ vata me kusala”ntiādinā nayena pavattassa vippaṭisārasaṅkhātassa kukkuccanīvaraṇassa vicikicchānīvaraṇassa ca paṭhamamaggena.
atk-s0505a:135_4: Maggapaṭipāṭiyā pana kukkuccanīvaraṇassa vicikicchānīvaraṇassa ca paṭhamamaggena pahānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:135_5: kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa byāpādanīvaraṇassa ca dutiyamaggena tanubhāvo hoti,
atk-s0505a:135_7: Thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa uddhaccanīvaraṇassa ca catutthamaggena pahānaṃ hotīti. Evaṃ –
atk-s0505a:136_0: “Yo nīvaraṇe pahāya pañca, anīgho tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo;
atk-s0505a:137_0: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇa”nti. –
atk-s0505a:138_2: “Ekacce yena yena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yā yā gāthā desitā,
atk-s0505a:138_3: tena tena tassā tassā gāthāya pariyosāne so so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhito”ti vadanti.
atk-s0505a:142_4: Tena samayena dhaniyo gopo mahītīre paṭivasati.
atk-s0505a:142_6: kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane dibbamāne vīsati vassasahassāni divase divase saṅghassa vīsati salākabhattāni adāsi.
atk-s0505a:142_8: Evaṃ devaloke ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ khepetvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle videharaṭṭhamajjhe pabbataraṭṭhaṃ nāma atthi tattha dhammakoraṇḍaṃ nāma nagaraṃ,
atk-s0505a:142_15: avasese aṭṭhamāse yattha tiṇodakaṃ sukhaṃ labbhati,
atk-s0505a:142_17: Tañca nadītīraṃ vā jātassaratīraṃ vā hoti.
atk-s0505a:142_18: Athāyampi vassakāle attano vasitagāmato nikkhamitvā gunnaṃ phāsuvihāratthāya okāsaṃ gavesanto mahāmahī
atk-s0505a:142_19: bhijjitvā ekato kālamahī ekato mahāmahicceva saṅkhaṃ gantvā sandamānā puna samuddasamīpe samāgantvā pavattā.
atk-s0505a:142_21: taṃ pavisitvā vacchānaṃ sālaṃ attano ca nivesanaṃ māpetvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0505a:142_28: kakkaṭakā udakasamīpe dvāraṃ pidahitvā thalasamīpadvārena vaḷañjenti,
atk-s0505a:142_30: Yadā pana sakuṇikā kulāvakāni nīcaṭṭhāne udakapiṭṭhe karonti,
atk-s0505a:142_31: kakkaṭakā thalasamīpe dvāraṃ pidahitvā udakasamīpadvārena vaḷañjenti,
atk-s0505a:143_0: Atha so dhaniyo suvuṭṭhikanimittāni upasallakkhetvā upakaṭṭhe vassakāle antaradīpā nikkhamitvā mahāmahiyā
atk-s0505a:143_1: paratīre sattasattāhampi deve vassante udakena anajjhottharaṇokāse attano vasanokāsaṃ katvā samantā parikkhipitvā,
atk-s0505a:143_4: Athassa dārutiṇādisaṅgahe kate sabbesu puttadārakammakaraporisesu samāniyesu jātesu nānappakāre khajjabhojje
atk-s0505a:143_10: sabbakiccāni kārāpetvā tattha tattha dīpe ujjālāpetvā,
atk-s0505a:143_14: aparadisāya meghatthanitasaddaṃ sutvā nipanno imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi “pakkodano duddhakhīrohamasmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:144_5: Pakkodano duddhakhīro ca ahamasmi bhavāmīti attho.
atk-s0505a:144_10: akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāmeta”nti evamassa attho vaṇṇito.
atk-s0505a:144_12: Yaṃ yaṃ hi padaṃ pubbapadena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:144_13: tassa tassa evamāhāti etamatthaṃ pakāsentoyeva itisaddo pacchimena padena metteyyo iti vā bhagavā iti vā evamādinā padasandhi hoti, nāññathā.
atk-s0505a:145_1: So hi yānimāni thāvarādīni pañca dhanāni,
atk-s0505a:145_6: sippāyatanādito aṅgasamadhanatopi yaṃ taṃ lokassa pañcagorasānuppadānena bahūpakāraṃ taṃ sandhāya “natthi
atk-s0505a:146_2: Samānena anukūlavattinā parijanena saddhiṃ vāso yassa so samānavāso,
atk-s0505a:146_11: Atha ce patthayasīti idāni yadi icchasīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:147_1: evamayaṃ dhaniyo gopo attano sayanaghare mahāsayane nipanno meghatthanitaṃ sutvā “pakkodanohamasmī”ti
atk-s0505a:147_2: bhaṇanto kāyadukkhavūpasamūpāyaṃ kāyasukhahetuñca attano sannihitaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:147_7: “Āhito ginī”ti yasmā gopālakā parikkhepadhūmadāruaggivasena tayo aggī karonti.
atk-s0505a:147_8: Te ca tassa gehe sabbe katā,
atk-s0505a:147_9: tasmā sabbadisāsu parikkhepaggiṃ sandhāya “āhito ginī”ti bhaṇanto vāḷamigāgamananivāraṇaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0505a:147_10: gunnaṃ majjhe gomayādīhi dhūmaggiṃ sandhāya ḍaṃsamakasādīhi gunnaṃ anābādhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:147_11: gopālakānaṃ sayanaṭṭhāne dāruaggiṃ sandhāya gopālakānaṃ sītābādhapaṭighātaṃ.
atk-s0505a:147_12: So evaṃ dīpento attano vā gunnaṃ vā parijanassa vā vuṭṭhipaccayassa kassaci ābādhassa abhāvato pītisomanassajāto āha –
atk-s0505a:148_1: Evaṃ dhaniyassa imaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsamānassa assosi bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya jetavanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ viharanto.
atk-s0505a:148_2: Sutvā ca pana buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento addasa dhaniyañca pajāpatiñcassa “ime ubhopi hetusampannā.
atk-s0505a:148_6: sve udakoghena vinassissantī”ti taṃ khaṇeyeva sāvatthito satta yojanasatāni dhaniyassa nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ ākāsena gantvā tassa kuṭiyā upari aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:148_10: Bhagavā ca taṃ sutvā “na ettakena santuṭṭhā vā vissatthā vā honti,
atk-s0505a:150_0: Vivaṭā kuṭi nibbuto gini, atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:151_0: Imaṃ paṭigāthaṃ abhāsi byañjanasabhāgaṃ no atthasabhāgaṃ.
atk-s0505a:151_2: “akkodhano”ti ca ādīni padāni atthato samenti mahāsamuddassa orimapārimatīrāni viya,
atk-s0505a:151_3: byañjanaṃ panettha kiñci kiñci sametīti byañjanasabhāgāni honti.
atk-s0505a:151_4: Tattha purimagāthāya sadisapadānaṃ vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:152_0: Visesapadānaṃ panāyaṃ padato atthato ca vaṇṇanā –
atk-s0505a:152_2: Yo hi so pubbe vuttappakāraāghātavatthusambhavo kodho ekaccassa suparittopi uppajjamāno hadayaṃ santāpetvā vūpasammati,
atk-s0505a:152_3: yena ca tato balavataruppannena ekacco mukhavikuṇanamattaṃ karoti,
atk-s0505a:152_4: tato balavatarena ekacco pharusaṃ vattukāmo hanusañcalanamattaṃ karoti,
atk-s0505a:152_6: aparo tato balavatarena daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā gavesanto disā viloketi,
atk-s0505a:152_7: aparo tato balavatarena daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā āmasati,
atk-s0505a:152_8: aparo tato balavatarena daṇḍādīni gahetvā upadhāvati,
atk-s0505a:152_9: aparo tato balavatarena ekaṃ vā dve vā pahāre deti,
atk-s0505a:152_10: aparo tato balavatarena api ñātisālohitaṃ jīvitā voropeti,
atk-s0505a:152_11: ekacco tato balavatarena pacchā vippaṭisārī attānampi jīvitā voropeti sīhaḷadīpe kālagāmavāsī amacco viya.
atk-s0505a:152_13: So bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍeyeva sabbaso pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato,
atk-s0505a:153_1: Ye hi te cittabandhabhāvena pañca cetokhilā vuttā,
atk-s0505a:153_2: ye hi ca khilabhūte citte seyyathāpi nāma khile bhūmibhāge cattāro māse vassantepi deve sassāni na ruhanti,
atk-s0505a:153_3: evamevaṃ saddhammassavanādikusalahetuvasse vassantepi kusalaṃ na ruhati te ca bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍeyeva sabbaso pahīnā,
atk-s0505a:154_1: Yathā hi dhaniyo tattha cattāro vassike māse nibaddhavāsaṃ upagato,
atk-s0505a:154_3: Bhagavā hi taṃyeva rattiṃ tassa atthakāmatāya tattha vāsaṃ upagato.
atk-s0505a:154_7: Attabhāvo hi taṃ taṃ atthavasaṃ paṭicca kāyotipi guhātipi dehotipi sandehotipi nāvātipi rathotipi vaṇotipi
atk-s0505a:154_9: Idha pana kaṭṭhādīni paṭicca gehanāmikā kuṭi viya aṭṭhiādīni paṭicca saṅkhyaṃ gatattā “kuṭī”ti vutto. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:160_0: Sā kuṭi yena taṇhāmānadiṭṭhichadanena sattānaṃ channattā punappunaṃ rāgādikilesavassaṃ ativassati. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:162_0: Tasmā channaṃ vivaretha, evaṃ taṃ nātivassatī”ti. ;
atk-s0505a:163_0: Ayaṃ gāthā dvīsu ṭhānesu vuttā khandhake theragāthāyañca.
atk-s0505a:163_2: tassa kilesā ca punappunaṃ āpattiyo ca ativassanti,
atk-s0505a:163_4: tassa nātivassantī”ti imaṃ atthaṃ paṭicca vuttā.
atk-s0505a:163_8: tasseva adhivāsitakilesacchadanacchannā attabhāvakuṭi punappunaṃ kilesavassaṃ ativassati.
atk-s0505a:163_9: Yassa pana arahattamaggañāṇavātena kilesacchadanassa viddhaṃsitattā vivaṭā,
atk-s0505a:163_12: Bhagavatā hi yathāvuttaṃ chadanaṃ yathāvutteneva nayena viddhaṃsitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:163_16: Yena hi ekādasavidhena agginā sabbamidaṃ ādittaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:163_18: So aggi bhagavato bodhimūleyeva ariyamaggasalilasekena nibbuto,
atk-s0505a:164_0: Evaṃ vadanto ca dhaniyaṃ atuṭṭhabbena tussamānaṃ aññāpadeseneva paribhāsati, ovadati,
atk-s0505a:164_7: Ahaṃ pana “akkodhanohamasmī”ti tussanto sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikadukkhābhāvena tuṭṭho homīti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:164_8: “Vigatakhilo”ti vadamāno tvaṃ “duddhakhīrohamasmī”ti tussanto akatakiccova “katakiccohamasmī”ti mantvā tuṭṭho,
atk-s0505a:164_9: ahaṃ pana “vigatakhilohamasmī”ti tussanto katakiccova tuṭṭho homīti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:164_10: “Anutīre mahiyekarattivāso”ti vadamāno tvaṃ anutīre mahiyā samānavāsoti tussanto catumāsanibaddhavāsena tuṭṭho.
atk-s0505a:164_14: Ahaṃ pana ekarattivāsoti tussanto anibaddhavāsena tuṭṭho,
atk-s0505a:164_16: āvāsasaṅgābhāvo ca sukhoti sukheneva tuṭṭho homīti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:165_0: “Vivaṭā kuṭī”ti vadamāno tvaṃ channā kuṭīti tussanto channagehatāya tuṭṭho,
atk-s0505a:165_1: gehe ca te channepi attabhāvakuṭikaṃ kilesavassaṃ ativassati,
atk-s0505a:165_2: yena sañjanitehi catūhi mahoghehi vuyhamāno anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇeyyāsi,
atk-s0505a:165_4: Ahaṃ pana “vivaṭā kuṭī”ti tussanto attabhāvakuṭiyā kilesacchadanābhāvena tuṭṭho.
atk-s0505a:165_5: Evañca me vivaṭāya kuṭiyā na taṃ kilesavassaṃ ativassati,
atk-s0505a:165_6: yena sañjanitehi catūhi mahoghehi vuyhamāno anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇeyyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:165_7: evaṃ sante tuṭṭhabbeneva tuṭṭho homīti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:165_8: “Nibbuto ginī”ti vadamāno tvaṃ āhito ginīti tussanto akatūpaddavanivāraṇova katūpaddavanivāraṇosmīti mantvā tuṭṭho.
atk-s0505a:165_9: Ahaṃ pana nibbuto ginīti tussanto ekādasaggipariḷāhābhāvato katūpaddavanivāraṇatāyeva tuṭṭhoti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:165_10: “Atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti vadamāno evaṃ vigatadukkhānaṃ anuppattasukhānaṃ katasabbakiccānaṃ amhādisānaṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ sobhati,
atk-s0505a:165_13: na no tayi vassante vā avassante vā vuḍḍhi vā hāni vā atthi,
atk-s0505a:165_14: tvaṃ pana kasmā evaṃ vadasīti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:165_15: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ “evaṃ vadanto ca dhaniya atuṭṭhabbeneva tussamānaṃ aññāpadeseneva paribhāsati ovadati,
atk-s0505a:166_1: Evamimaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ gāthaṃ sutvāpi dhaniyo gopo “ko ayaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsatī”ti avatvā tena subhāsitena
atk-s0505a:166_2: parituṭṭho punapi tathārūpaṃ sotukāmo aparampi gāthamāha “andhakamakasā”ti.
atk-s0505a:166_17: Ettha dhaniyo ye andhakamakasā sannipatitvā rudhire pivantā muhutteneva gāvo anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti,
atk-s0505a:166_18: tasmā vuṭṭhitamatteyeva te gopālakā paṃsunā ca sākhāhi ca mārenti,
atk-s0505a:166_20: kacche ruḷhatiṇacaraṇena addhānagamanaparissamābhāvaṃ vatvā khudākilamathābhāvañca dīpento “yathā aññesaṃ
atk-s0505a:166_21: gāvo andhakamakasasamphassehi dissamānā addhānagamanena kilantā khudāya milāyamānā ekavuṭṭhinipātampi
atk-s0505a:166_24: mayhaṃ pana gāvo vuttappakārābhāvā dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhatuṃ vā vuṭṭhimpi saheyyu”nti dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:167_1: Tato bhagavā yasmā dhaniyo antaradīpe vasanto bhayaṃ disvā,
atk-s0505a:167_6: sabhaye eva ca so ṭhāne ṭhito,
atk-s0505a:167_7: tasmā tassa āgamanaṭṭhānā attano āgamanaṭṭhānaṃ uttaritarañca paṇītatarañca vaṇṇento “baddhāsi bhisī”ti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi,
atk-s0505a:168_0: Tattha bhisīti pattharitvā puthulaṃ katvā baddhakullo vuccati loke.
atk-s0505a:170_0: Nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”. ;
atk-s0505a:172_0: Imāyapi gāthāya bhagavā purimanayeneva taṃ ovadanto imaṃ atthaṃ āhāti veditabbo – dhaniya,
atk-s0505a:172_4: punapi ca te kullo bandhitabbo eva bhavissati,
atk-s0505a:172_7: Mayā pana ekacitte maggaṅgāni samodhānetvā ñāṇabandhanena baddhā ahosi bhisi.
atk-s0505a:172_8: Sā ca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammaparipuṇṇatāya ekarasabhāvūpagatattā aññamaññaṃ anativattanena puna
atk-s0505a:172_9: bandhitabbappayojanābhāvena devamanussesu kenaci mocetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ca susaṅkhatā.
atk-s0505a:172_12: Gacchantopi ca na sotāpannādayo viya kañcideva padesaṃ gato.
atk-s0505a:172_13: Atha kho pāragato sabbāsavakkhayaṃ sabbadhammapāraṃ paramaṃ khemaṃ nibbānaṃ gato,
atk-s0505a:172_18: kāmoghādicatubbidhaṃ oghaṃ taritvā atikkamma taṃ pāraṃ gatoti.
atk-s0505a:172_19: Idāni ca pana me puna taritabbābhāvato attho bhisiyā na vijjati,
atk-s0505a:172_20: tasmā mameva yuttaṃ vattuṃ “atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti.
atk-s0505a:173_1: Tampi sutvā dhaniyo purimanayeneva “gopī mama assavā”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:173_4: Alolāti mātugāmo hi pañcahi lolatāhi lolo hoti –
atk-s0505a:173_10: Tathā hi mātugāmo bhattapūvasurādibhede āhāre lolatāya antamaso pārivāsikabhattampi bhuñjati,
atk-s0505a:173_13: Alaṅkāralolatāya aññaṃ alaṅkāraṃ alabhamāno antamaso udakatelakenapi kese osaṇḍetvā mukhaṃ parimajjati.
atk-s0505a:173_14: Parapurisalolatāya antamaso puttenapi tādise padese pakkosiyamāno paṭhamaṃ asaddhammavasena cinteti.
atk-s0505a:173_16: Pādalolatāya ārāmādigamanasīlo hutvā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ vināseti.
atk-s0505a:173_17: Tattha dhaniyo “ekāpi lolatā mayhaṃ gopiyā natthī”ti dassento alolāti āha.
atk-s0505a:174_0: Dīgharattaṃ saṃvāsiyāti dīghakālaṃ saddhiṃ vasamānā komārabhāvato pabhuti ekato vaḍḍhitā.
atk-s0505a:174_2: Manāpāti evaṃ parapurise ajānantī mameva manaṃ allīyatīti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:174_3: Tassā na suṇāmi kiñci pāpanti “itthannāmena nāma saddhiṃ imāya hasitaṃ vā lapitaṃ vā”ti evaṃ tassā na suṇāmi,
atk-s0505a:175_1: Atha bhagavā etehi guṇehi gopiyā tuṭṭhaṃ dhaniyaṃ ovadanto purimanayeneva “cittaṃ mama assava”nti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi,
atk-s0505a:175_7: sā pana te assavā bhaveyya vā na vā;
atk-s0505a:175_10: Mātugāmañhi kucchiyā pariharantāpi rakkhituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0505a:175_11: evaṃ durakkhacittattā eva na sakkā tumhādisehi itthī alolāti vā saṃvāsiyāti vā manāpāti vā nippāpāti vā jānituṃ.
atk-s0505a:175_12: Mayhaṃ pana cittaṃ assavaṃ ovādapaṭikaraṃ mama vase vattati,
atk-s0505a:175_14: So cassa assavabhāvo yamakapāṭihāriye channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ aggidhārāsu ca udakadhārāsu ca pavattamānāsu sabbajanassa pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0505a:175_15: Agginimmāne hi tejokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ udakanimmāne āpokasiṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:175_17: Buddhānampi hi dve cittāni ekato nappavattanti,
atk-s0505a:175_18: ekameva pana assavabhāvena evaṃ vasavatti ahosi.
atk-s0505a:175_22: Dīpaṅkarabuddhakālato ca pabhuti dānasīlādīhi dīgharattaṃ paribhāvitattā saṃvāsiyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:175_25: sudantattā attano vasena chadvāravisevanaṃ pahāya mameva adhippāyamanassa vasenānuvattanato manāpaṃ,
atk-s0505a:176_0: Pāpaṃ pana me na vijjatīti iminā pana bhagavā tassa attano cittassa pāpābhāvaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0505a:176_2: So cassa pāpābhāvo na kevalaṃ sammāsambuddhakāleyeva,
atk-s0505a:176_3: ekūnatiṃsa vassāni sarāgādikāle agāramajjhe vasantassāpi veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:176_4: Tadāpi hissa agāriyabhāvānurūpaṃ viññupaṭikuṭṭhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ vā vacīduccaritaṃ vā manoduccaritaṃ vā na uppannapubbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:176_6: ekaṃ vassaṃ abhisambuddhanti satta vassāni tathāgataṃ anubandhi “appeva nāma vālagganitudanamattampissa pāpasamācāraṃ passeyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:176_7: So adisvāva nibbinno imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:179_0: Buddhakālepi naṃ uttaramāṇavo satta māsāni anubandhi ābhisamācārikaṃ daṭṭhukāmo.
atk-s0505a:179_1: So kiñci vajjaṃ adisvāva parisuddhasamācāro bhagavāti gato.
atk-s0505a:180_8: yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya ‘mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī’ti,
atk-s0505a:180_15: yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya ‘mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī”’ti.
atk-s0505a:181_0: Evaṃ yasmā tathāgatassa cittassa na kevalaṃ sammāsambuddhakāle,
atk-s0505a:181_5: mameva cittassa pāpaṃ na sakkā suṇituṃ,
atk-s0505a:181_7: Tasmā yadi etehi guṇehi tuṭṭhena “atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:182_1: Tampi sutvā dhaniyo tatuttaripi subhāsitarasāyanaṃ pivitukāmo attano bhujissabhāvaṃ dassento āha “attavetanabhatohamasmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:182_4: na parassa vetanaṃ gahetvā parassa kammaṃ karomīti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:182_10: Tesaṃ na suṇāmi kiñci pāpanti tesaṃ corāti vā paradārikāti vā dussīlāti vā kiñci pāpaṃ na suṇāmīti.
atk-s0505a:183_1: Evaṃ vutte bhagavā purimanayeneva dhaniyaṃ ovadanto imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:183_6: paramatthato ca attano kammaṃ karitvā jīvantopi dāso evāsi taṇhādāsattā,
atk-s0505a:183_10: Ahañhi kassaci parassa vā attano vā bhatako na homi.
atk-s0505a:183_15: Sabbaññutaṃ patto pana nibbiṭṭho nibbiso rājabhato viya.
atk-s0505a:183_16: Teneva nibbiṭṭhena sabbaññubhāvena lokuttarasamādhisukhena ca jīvāmi.
atk-s0505a:183_17: Tassa me idāni uttarikaraṇīyassa kataparicayassa vā abhāvato appahīnapaṭisandhikānaṃ tādisānaṃ viya pattabbo koci attho bhatiyā na vijjati.
atk-s0505a:183_19: Tasmā yadi bhujissatāya tuṭṭhena “atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:184_1: Tampi sutvā dhaniyo atittova subhāsitāmatena attano pañcappakāragomaṇḍalaparipuṇṇabhāvaṃ dassento āha “atthi vasā”ti.
atk-s0505a:184_7: Usabhopi gavampatīti yo gopālakehi pāto eva nhāpetvā, bhojetvā,
atk-s0505a:184_10: gāvo gocaraṃ pāpetvā rakkhitvā ānehī”ti pesīyati,
atk-s0505a:184_11: evaṃ pesito ca tā gāvo agocaraṃ pariharitvā,
atk-s0505a:184_14: tathārūpo usabhopi gavampati idha mayhaṃ gomaṇḍale atthīti dassesi.
atk-s0505a:185_1: Evaṃ vutte bhagavā tatheva dhaniyaṃ ovadanto imaṃ paccanīkagāthaṃ āha “natthi vasā”ti.
atk-s0505a:185_3: idha amhākaṃ sāsane adamitaṭṭhena vuḍḍhaṭṭhena ca vasāsaṅkhātā pariyuṭṭhānā vā,
atk-s0505a:185_4: taruṇavacchake sandhāya vasānaṃ mūlaṭṭhena khīradāyiniyo sandhāya paggharaṇaṭṭhena dhenupāsaṅkhātā anusayā vā,
atk-s0505a:185_7: ādhipaccaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena seṭṭhaṭṭhena ca gavampatiusabhasaṅkhātaṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0505a:185_10: Tasmā sabbayogakkhematāya tuṭṭhassa mamevetaṃ yuttaṃ vattuṃ “atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā”ti.
atk-s0505a:186_1: Tampi sutvā dhaniyo tatuttaripi subhāsitaṃ amatarasaṃ adhigantukāmo attano gogaṇassa khilabandhanasampattiṃ dassento āha “khilā nikhātā”ti.
atk-s0505a:186_3: Nikhātāti ākoṭetvā bhūmiyaṃ pavesitā khuddakā mahantā khaṇitvā ṭhapitā.
atk-s0505a:186_5: Dāmāti vacchakānaṃ bandhanatthāya katā ganthitapāsayuttā rajjubandhanavisesā.
atk-s0505a:187_2: paripākakālaṃ ñatvā purimanayeneva taṃ ovadanto imaṃ catusaccadīpikaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “usabhoriva chetvā”ti.
atk-s0505a:187_3: Tattha usabhoti gopitā gopariṇāyako goyūthapati balībaddo.
atk-s0505a:187_11: apica kho pana usabhoti vā vasabhoti vā nisabhoti vā sabbepete appaṭisamaṭṭhena veditabbā. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:187_25: Gabbhaseyyamukhena vā sabbāpi tā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:188_2: ahaṃ pana bandhanena aṭṭīyanto thāmavīriyūpeto mahāusabhoriva bandhanāni pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni catutthaariyamaggathāmavīriyena chetvā,
atk-s0505a:188_4: atha vā usabhoriva bandhanāni anusaye nāgo pūtilataṃva pariyuṭṭhānāni chetvā dālayitvāva ṭhito.
atk-s0505a:188_8: Tasmā sace tvampi ahaṃ viya vattumicchasi,
atk-s0505a:188_13: “chetvā dālayitvā”ti ettha chedo padālanañca saupādisesavasena nirodhasaccaṃ,
atk-s0505a:189_0: Evametaṃ catusaccadīpikaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā gāthāpariyosāne dhaniyo ca pajāpati cassa dve ca dhītaroti cattāro janā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:189_1: Atha dhaniyo aveccappasādayogena tathāgate mūlajātāya patiṭṭhitāya saddhāya paññācakkhunā bhagavato dhammakāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:189_4: gabbhaseyyo ca me natthī”ti avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā yāva bhavaggā ko añño evaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadissati aññatra bhagavatā,
atk-s0505a:189_6: Tato bhagavā chabbaṇṇarasmijālavicitraṃ suvaṇṇarasasekapiñjaraṃ viya sarīrābhaṃ dhaniyassa nivesane muñci “passa dāni yathāsukha”nti.
atk-s0505a:190_1: Atha dhaniyo anto paviṭṭhacandimasūriyaṃ viya samantā pajjalitapadīpasahassasamujjalitamiva ca nivesanaṃ disvā “āgato bhagavā”ti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0505a:190_6: Evametaṃ ukkūlavikūlaṃ sabbampi samaṃ katvā pūrayanto mahāmegho pāvassi,
atk-s0505a:190_8: Tāvadevāti yaṃ khaṇaṃ bhagavā sarīrābhaṃ muñci,
atk-s0505a:190_9: dhaniyo ca “satthā me āgato”ti saddhāmayaṃ cittābhaṃ muñci,
atk-s0505a:191_1: Evaṃ tasmiṃ dhaniyassa saddhuppādatathāgatobhāsapharaṇasūriyuggamanakkhaṇe vassato devassa saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0505a:191_2: dhaniyo pītisomanassajāto imamatthaṃ abhāsatha “lābhā vata no anappakā”ti dve gāthā vattabbā.
atk-s0505a:192_0: Tattha yasmā dhaniyo saputtadāro bhagavato ariyamaggapaṭivedhena dhammakāyaṃ disvā,
atk-s0505a:192_10: Saraṇaṃ taṃ upemāti ettha pana kiñcāpi maggapaṭivedhenevassa siddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:192_14: taṃ paresaṃ vācāya pākaṭaṃ karonto paṇipātasaraṇagamanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0505a:192_15: Cakkhumāti bhagavā pakatidibbapaññāsamantabuddhacakkhūhi pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā.
atk-s0505a:192_18: “Satthā no hohi tuvaṃ mahāmunī”ti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ sissabhāvūpagamanenāpi saraṇagamanaṃ pūretuṃ bhaṇati,
atk-s0505a:194_0: “Mayañca bhariyā nātikkamāma, amhe ca bhariyā nātikkamanti;
atk-s0505a:195_0: Aññatra tāhi brahmacariyaṃ carāma, tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. –
atk-s0505a:196_5: sundarañca nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā sugatoti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:196_12: Teneva cettha āyācanatthaṃ sandhāya “carema se”tipi pāṭhaṃ vikappenti.
atk-s0505a:197_0: Evaṃ dhaniyo brahmacariyacaraṇāpadesena bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajjapayojanaṃ dīpento āha “jātīmaraṇassa pāragū,
atk-s0505a:197_7: atha vā aho vata mayaṃ bhaveyyāmāti.
atk-s0505a:197_9: Evaṃ vatvāpi ca puna ubhopi kira bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “pabbājetha no bhagavā”ti evaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsūti.
atk-s0505a:198_1: Atha māro pāpimā evaṃ te ubhopi vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yācante disvā –
atk-s0505a:198_3: handa nesaṃ antarāyaṃ karomī”ti āgantvā gharāvāse guṇaṃ dassento imaṃ gāthamāha “nandati puttehi puttimā”ti.
atk-s0505a:198_13: So hi saṭṭhānātikkamitukāmaṃ janaṃ yaṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0505a:198_27: gohi vā karaṇabhūtehi tatheva nandatīti attho.
atk-s0505a:199_0: Evaṃ vatvā idāni tassatthassa sādhakakāraṇaṃ niddisati,
atk-s0505a:199_7: Kāmā hi “yaṃ pañcakāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
atk-s0505a:199_8: ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato upadhīyati ettha sukhanti iminā vacanatthena upadhīti vuccanti.
atk-s0505a:199_25: Pabbajitassa hi ete upadhayo na santi,
atk-s0505a:199_26: evaṃ sante tvaṃ dukkhassantaṃ patthentopi dukkhitova bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0505a:200_0: Idāni tassapi atthassa sādhakakāraṇaṃ niddisati “na hi so nandati,
atk-s0505a:200_4: so piyehi ñātīhi vippayutto nibbhogūpakaraṇo na nandati,
atk-s0505a:200_5: tasmā tvaṃ ime upadhayo vajjetvā pabbajito dukkhitova bhavissasīti.
atk-s0505a:201_1: Atha bhagavā “māro ayaṃ pāpimā imesaṃ antarāyāya āgato”ti viditvā phalena phalaṃ pātento viya tāyeva
atk-s0505a:201_2: mārenābhatāya upamāya māravādaṃ bhindanto tameva gāthaṃ parivattetvā “upadhi sokavatthū”ti dassento āha
atk-s0505a:201_10: tesañca piyamanāpānaṃ puttadārānaṃ gavāssavaḷavahiraññasuvaṇṇādīnaṃ vinābhāvena adhimattasokasallasamappitahadayā
atk-s0505a:201_19: Yasmā ca upadhī hi narassa socanā,
atk-s0505a:201_39: Desanāpariyosāne dhaniyo ca gopī ca ubhopi pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:201_42: Vasanaṭṭhāne ca nesaṃ gopālakā vihāraṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0505a:205_12: Visesena pana yasmā ettha kāci gāthā tena tena paccekasambuddhena puṭṭhena vuttā,
atk-s0505a:205_13: kāci apuṭṭhena attanā adhigatamagganayānurūpaṃ udānaṃyeva udānentena,
atk-s0505a:206_0: Tattha yā ayaṃ avisesena pucchāvasito uppatti,
atk-s0505a:206_3: Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi –
atk-s0505a:206_8: So paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yathākkamena etamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:207_1: ānisaṃsā pubbayogāvacare diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacceva aññaṃ ārādheti.
atk-s0505a:207_2: No ce diṭṭheva dhamme paṭikacceva aññaṃ ārādheti,
atk-s0505a:209_2: Tasmā buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ sabbesaṃ patthanā ca abhinīhāro ca icchitabbo”ti.
atk-s0505a:210_14: Appatvā pana cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ dānaṃ dentopi
atk-s0505a:210_15: tadanurūpasīlādisabbapāramidhamme ācinantopi antarā buddho bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:210_19: Yathā nāma timāsacatumāsapañcamāsaccayena nipphajjanakaṃ sassaṃ taṃ taṃ kālaṃ appatvā divase divase sahassakkhattuṃ
atk-s0505a:210_20: keḷāyantopi udakena siñcantopi antarā pakkhena vā māsena vā nipphādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:210_26: Tasmā yathāvuttameva kālaṃ pāramipūraṇaṃ kātabbaṃ ñāṇaparipākatthāya.
atk-s0505a:210_27: Ettakenapi ca kālena buddhattaṃ patthayato abhinīhārakaraṇe aṭṭha sampattiyo icchitabbā. Ayañhi –
atk-s0505a:214_2: Aññatra hi manussajātiyā avasesajātīsu devajātiyampi ṭhitassa paṇidhi na ijjhati.
atk-s0505a:214_3: Ettha ṭhitena pana buddhattaṃ patthentena dānādīni puññakammāni katvā manussattaṃyeva patthetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:214_7: Mātugāmanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānañhi manussajātiyaṃ ṭhitānampi paṇidhi na samijjhati.
atk-s0505a:214_8: Tattha ṭhitena pana buddhattaṃ patthentena dānādīni puññakammāni katvā purisabhāvoyeva patthetabbo.
atk-s0505a:214_12: Yo hi tasmiṃ attabhāve vāyamanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho,
atk-s0505a:214_16: So hi dīpaṅkarapādamūle pabbajitvā tenattabhāvena arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho ahosi.
atk-s0505a:214_21: So hi dīpaṅkaraṃ sammukhā disvā paṇidhesi.
atk-s0505a:214_23: So ca kho sāsane vā kammavādikiriyavāditāpasaparibbājakanikāye vā vaṭṭati yathā sumedhapaṇḍitassa.
atk-s0505a:214_24: So hi sumedho nāma tāpaso hutvā paṇidhesi.
atk-s0505a:214_29: So hi pañcābhiñño aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ca hutvā paṇidhesi.
atk-s0505a:216_0: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissatī”ti. –
atk-s0505a:217_4: sace koci vadeyya “ko cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca kappe niraye paccitvā buddhattaṃ icchatī”ti,
atk-s0505a:217_7: Tathā yadi koci vadeyya “ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ vītaccikānaṃ aṅgārānaṃ pūraṃ akkamanto atikkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchati,
atk-s0505a:217_8: ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ sattisūlehi ākiṇṇaṃ akkamanto atikkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchati,
atk-s0505a:217_9: ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ samatittikaṃ udakapuṇṇaṃ uttaritvā buddhattaṃ icchati,
atk-s0505a:217_10: ko sakalacakkavāḷaṃ nirantaraṃ veḷugumbasañchannaṃ maddanto atikkamitvā buddhattaṃ icchatī”ti taṃ sutvā yo “aha”nti vattuṃ ussahati,
atk-s0505a:217_12: Evarūpena ca kattukamyatāchandena samannāgato sumedhapaṇḍito paṇidhesīti.
atk-s0505a:218_0: Evaṃ samiddhābhinīhāro ca bodhisatto imāni aṭṭhārasa abhabbaṭṭhānāni na upeti.
atk-s0505a:218_1: So hi tato pabhuti na jaccandho hoti,
atk-s0505a:219_0: Yā cimā ussāho ummaṅgo avatthānaṃ hitacariyā cāti catasso buddhabhūmiyo,
atk-s0505a:222_7: yehi samannāgatattā nekkhammajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā kāme dosadassāvino,
atk-s0505a:222_12: nissaraṇajjhāsayā ca bodhisattā sabbabhavesu dosadassāvinoti vuccanti,
atk-s0505a:223_0: Paccekabuddhānaṃ pana kīva ciraṃ patthanā vaṭṭatīti?
atk-s0505a:223_4: Ettakenāpi ca kālena paccekabuddhattaṃ patthayato abhinīhārakaraṇe pañca sampattiyo icchitabbā. Tesañhi –
atk-s0505a:226_0: Tattha vigatāsavadassananti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ yassa kassaci dassananti attho.
atk-s0505a:227_3: tathā buddhassa mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhākassa puttassa cāti.
atk-s0505a:227_6: Imesaṃ pana sabbesampi adhikāro chandatāti dvaṅgasampannoyeva abhinīhāro hoti.
atk-s0505a:228_0: Evaṃ imāya patthanāya iminā ca abhinīhārena yathāvuttappabhedaṃ kālaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā buddhā loke uppajjantā
atk-s0505a:228_3: aggasāvakā pana khattiyabrāhmaṇakulesveva buddhā iva sabbabuddhā saṃvaṭṭamāne kappe na uppajjanti,
atk-s0505a:228_5: Paccekabuddhā buddhe appatvā buddhānaṃ uppajjanakāleyeva uppajjanti.
atk-s0505a:228_12: Na hi te lokuttaradhammaṃ paññattiṃ āropetvā desetuṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0505a:228_13: mūgena diṭṭhasupino viya vanacarakena nagare sāyitabyañjanaraso viya ca nesaṃ dhammābhisamayo hoti.
atk-s0505a:228_15: guṇavisiṭṭhatāya buddhānaṃ heṭṭhā sāvakānaṃ upari honti,
atk-s0505a:228_18: vosānaṃ nāpajjitabba”nti iminā uddesena uposathaṃ karonti,
atk-s0505a:228_20: Uposathaṃ karontā ca gandhamādane mañjūsakarukkhamūle ratanamāḷe sannipatitvā karontīti.
atk-s0505a:228_21: Evaṃ bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa paccekabuddhānaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ patthanañca abhinīhārañca kathetvā,
atk-s0505a:228_22: idāni imāya patthanāya iminā ca abhinīhārena samudāgate te te paccekabuddhe kathetuṃ “sabbesu bhūtesu
atk-s0505a:228_23: nidhāya daṇḍa”ntiādinā nayena imaṃ khaggavisāṇasuttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:228_24: Ayaṃ tāva avisesena pucchāvasito khaggavisāṇasuttassa uppatti.
atk-s0505a:229_2: Tattha imissā tāva gāthāya evaṃ uppatti veditabbā –
atk-s0505a:229_3: ayaṃ kira paccekabuddho paccekabodhisattabhūmiṃ ogāhanto dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo
atk-s0505a:229_4: pūretvā kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā āraññiko hutvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūrento samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0505a:229_5: Etaṃ kira vattaṃ aparipūretvā paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇantā nāma natthi.
atk-s0505a:230_7: Tattha yo bhikkhu pageva vuṭṭhāya cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:230_11: dveasīti khuddakavattāni cuddasa mahāvattāni ca samādāya vattati,
atk-s0505a:230_25: evaṃ paviṭṭho ca lābhī bhikkhu puññavā upāsakehi sakkatagarukato upaṭṭhākakule vā paṭikkamanasālāyaṃ
atk-s0505a:230_26: vā paṭikkamitvā upāsakehi taṃ taṃ pañhaṃ pucchiyamāno tesaṃ pañhavissajjanena dhammadesanāvikkhepena
atk-s0505a:230_28: vihāraṃ āgatopi bhikkhūnaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti,
atk-s0505a:230_31: pacchābhattampi purimayāmampi majjhimayāmampi evaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ papañcitvā kāyaduṭṭhullābhibhūto pacchimayāmepi sayati,
atk-s0505a:231_2: pageva vuṭṭhāya yathāvuttaṃ vattaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasi kātuṃ,
atk-s0505a:231_3: aññadatthu yāguṃ vā bhesajjaṃ vā patthayamāno kālasseva pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0505a:231_4: Tattha yāguṃ vā bhesajjaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā laddhā bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā,
atk-s0505a:231_13: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāya na taṃ āsanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0505a:231_14: yattha yāguṃ pivitvā arahattaṃ patto bhikkhu natthīti.
atk-s0505a:232_2: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā gihipapañcena papañcito tucchako nikkhamati,
atk-s0505a:232_3: ayaṃ vuccati neva harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0505a:233_0: Yo pana pageva vuṭṭhāya purimanayeneva sabbavattāni paripūretvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0505a:233_1: tāva pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0505a:233_5: Sabbatthakaṃ nāma mettā ca maraṇassati ca.
atk-s0505a:233_8: Āvāsesu hi mettāvihārī bhikkhu sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti,
atk-s0505a:233_10: Devatāsu mettāvihārī devatāhi rakkhitagopito sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0505a:233_13: Gāmanigamādīsu mettāvihārī sabbattha bhikkhācariyādīsu manussehi sakkatagarukato sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0505a:234_0: Yaṃ pana sadā pariharitabbaṃ caritānukūlena gahitattā dasāsubhakasiṇānussatīsu aññataraṃ,
atk-s0505a:234_6: Tattha yaṃ paṭhamaṃ sabbatthakakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karitvā pacchā pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karoti,
atk-s0505a:235_0: Ayañhi yathāṭhitaṃ yathāpaṇihitaṃ kāyaṃ dhātuso paccavekkhati –
atk-s0505a:235_1: yaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre vīsatikoṭṭhāsesu kakkhaḷaṃ kharagataṃ,
atk-s0505a:235_9: Yaṃ panettha catūhi mahābhūtehi asamphuṭṭhaṃ chiddaṃ vivaraṃ,
atk-s0505a:235_12: Tato uttari añño satto vā puggalo vā natthi.
atk-s0505a:236_4: Gacchanto ca yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu “attā abhikkamati,
atk-s0505a:236_8: tathā asammuyhanto “abhikkamāmīti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā sandhāraṇavāyodhātu uppajjati.
atk-s0505a:236_9: Sā imaṃ pathavīdhātvādisannivesabhūtaṃ kāyasammataṃ aṭṭhikasaṅghāṭaṃ vippharati,
atk-s0505a:236_10: tato cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhikasaṅghāṭo abhikkamati.
atk-s0505a:236_11: Tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddhāraṇe catūsu dhātūsu vāyodhātuanugatā tejodhātu adhikā uppajjati,
atk-s0505a:236_13: Atiharaṇavītiharaṇāpaharaṇesu pana tejodhātuanugatā vāyodhātu adhikā uppajjati,
atk-s0505a:236_15: Orohaṇe pana pathavīdhātuanugatā āpodhātu adhikā uppajjati,
atk-s0505a:236_19: Iccetā dhātuyo tena tena attano uppādakacittena saddhiṃ tattha tattheva bhijjanti.

atk-s0505a:262_28: Etenupāyena aññatra maddaraṭṭhā sabbe janapade āhiṇḍitvā taṃ “khuddakaraṭṭha”nti avamaññamānā tattha paṭhamaṃ agantvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:263_1: mā no bārāṇasiṃ paviṭṭhepi rājā puna pāhesī”ti maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:263_5: Tattha amaccehi ṭhapitaṃ taṃ suvaṇṇarūpaṃ dūratova disvā “amhe udakatthāya pesetvā rājaputtī sayameva
atk-s0505a:263_8: Amaccā taṃ sutvā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā anurūpena nayena dārikaṃ yāciṃsu,
atk-s0505a:264_0: Amaccā dārikaṃ gahetvā nagarā nikkhamitvā kumārassa pāhesuṃ –
atk-s0505a:264_2: Kumāro sutvāva rāgena abhibhūto paṭhamajjhānā parihāyi.
atk-s0505a:264_5: Te sabbattha ekarattivāseneva bārāṇasiṃ patvā bahinagare ṭhitā rañño pāhesuṃ –
atk-s0505a:264_11: Sā accantasukhumālā yānugghātena ubbāḷhā addhānaparissamena uppannavātarogā milātamālā viya hutvā rattiṃyeva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0505a:264_13: Rājā ca nāgarā ca “kulavaṃso vinaṭṭho”ti parideviṃsu.
atk-s0505a:264_22: Tato “bhavaṃ paṭicca jātī”ti evaṃ pubbabhāvanānubhāvena yoniso manasikaronto anulomapaṭilomapaṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0505a:264_23: disvā saṅkhāre sammasanto tattheva nisinno paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:264_24: Taṃ maggaphalasukhena sukhitaṃ santindriyaṃ santamānasaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā,
atk-s0505a:264_28: aññaṃ tato sundarataraṃ ānessāmā”ti. So āha –
atk-s0505a:264_31: Ito paraṃ sabbaṃ purimagāthāsadisameva ṭhapetvā gāthāvaṇṇanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:265_4: Tattha aññamaññaṃ disvā cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppannarāgo dassanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0505a:265_5: Tattha sīhaḷadīpe kāḷadīghavāpīgāme piṇḍāya carantaṃ kalyāṇavihāravāsīdīghabhāṇakadaharabhikkhuṃ disvā paṭibaddhacittā kenaci upāyena taṃ alabhitvā,
atk-s0505a:265_7: tassā nivāsanacoḷakhaṇḍaṃ disvā “evarūpavatthadhāriniyā nāma saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nālattha”nti hadayaṃ phāletvā kālakato.
atk-s0505a:266_0: Parehi pana kathiyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ attanā vā hasitalapitagītasaddaṃ sutvā sotaviññāṇavīthivasena uppanno rāgo savanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0505a:266_1: Tatrāpi girigāmavāsīkammāradhītāya pañcahi kumārīhi saddhiṃ padumassaraṃ gantvā,
atk-s0505a:266_3: uccāsaddena gāyantiyā ākāsena gacchanto saddaṃ sutvā kāmarāgena visesā parihāyitvā anayabyasanaṃ patto pañcaggaḷaleṇavāsī tissadaharo nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:267_3: Tattha mahājane āgate rājāpi agamāsi saddhiṃ antepurena.
atk-s0505a:267_4: Tato rājadhītāya tassa rūpañca saddañca āgamma balavarāgo uppanno,
atk-s0505a:267_6: Taṃ disvā rājā sallakkhetvā sāṇipākārena parikkhipāpesi.
atk-s0505a:267_8: Puna sāṇipākāraṃ apanetvā passantā dvepi kālakateyeva addasaṃsūti.
atk-s0505a:268_0: Aññamaññaṃ ālapanasamullapane uppanno rāgo pana samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0505a:268_1: Bhikkhubhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ paribhogakaraṇe uppannarāgo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0505a:268_2: Dvīsupi cetesu pārājikappatto bhikkhu ca bhikkhunī ca nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:268_3: Maricivaṭṭināmamahāvihāramahe kira duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayamahārājā mahādānaṃ paṭiyādetvā ubhatosaṅghaṃ parivisati.
atk-s0505a:268_4: Tattha uṇhayāguyā dinnāya saṅghanavakasāmaṇerī anādhārakassa saṅghanavakasāmaṇerassa dantavalayaṃ datvā samullāpaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0505a:268_5: Te ubhopi upasampajjitvā saṭṭhivassā hutvā paratīraṃ gatā aññamaññaṃ samullāpena pubbasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0505a:268_6: tāvadeva jātasinehā sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamitvā pārājikā ahesunti.
atk-s0505a:269_0: Evaṃ pañcavidhe saṃsagge yena kenaci saṃsaggena jātasaṃsaggassa bhavati sneho,
atk-s0505a:269_2: Tato snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti tameva snehaṃ anugacchantaṃ sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikasokaparidevādinānappakārakaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti,
atk-s0505a:269_4: Apare pana “ārammaṇe cittassa vossaggo saṃsaggo”ti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0505a:270_0: Evamatthappabhedaṃ imaṃ aḍḍhagāthaṃ vatvā so paccekabuddho āha –
atk-s0505a:270_7: “tumhe vā aññe vā yo imamhā dukkhā muccitukāmo,
atk-s0505a:270_10: Ettha ca yaṃ “snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahotī”ti vuttaṃ “tadeva sandhāya ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:270_11: Atha vā yathāvuttena saṃsaggena saṃsaggajātassa bhavati sneho,
atk-s0505a:270_13: etaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno ahaṃ adhigatoti.
atk-s0505a:270_14: Evaṃ abhisambandhitvā catutthapādo pubbe vuttanayeneva udānavasena vuttopi veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:272_2: Ayaṃ paccekabodhisatto purimagāthāya vuttanayeneva uppajjitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kārento paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā “kiṃ samaṇadhammo varo,
atk-s0505a:272_3: rajjaṃ vara”nti vīmaṃsitvā catunnaṃ amaccānaṃ hatthe rajjaṃ niyyātetvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:272_4: Amaccā “dhammena samena karothā”ti vuttāpi lañjaṃ gahetvā adhammena karonti.
atk-s0505a:272_5: Te lañjaṃ gahetvā sāmike parājentā ekadā aññataraṃ rājavallabhaṃ parājesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:272_6: So rañño bhattahārakena saddhiṃ pavisitvā sabbaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0505a:272_9: “amaccā sāmike asāmike karontī”ti mahāsaddaṃ karontā mahāyuddhaṃ viya akaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:272_10: Atha rājā vinicchayaṭṭhānā vuṭṭhāya pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā samāpattiṃ appetuṃ nisinno tena saddena vikkhittacitto na sakkoti appetuṃ.
atk-s0505a:272_12: samaṇadhammo varo”ti rajjasukhaṃ pahāya puna samāpattiṃ nibbattetvā pubbe vuttanayeneva vipassanto paccekasambodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:274_0: Etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:275_4: Keci gamanāgamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsamullāpādīsu hadayasukhajananena suhajjāva honti, na mittā.
atk-s0505a:275_5: Keci tadubhayavasena suhajjā ceva mittā ca.
atk-s0505a:275_12: Te catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:283_4: Tesaṃ sukhaṃ upasaṃharitukāmo dukkhaṃ apaharitukāmo ca.
atk-s0505a:284_2: Atthaṃ laddhavināsanena aladdhānuppādanenāti dvidhāpi hāpeti vināseti.
atk-s0505a:284_5: esa me parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ nīce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
atk-s0505a:284_8: tesaṃ parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
atk-s0505a:286_2: Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane tayo paccekabodhisattā pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā devaloke uppannā.
atk-s0505a:286_3: Tato cavitvā tesaṃ jeṭṭhako bārāṇasirājakule nibbatto,
atk-s0505a:286_8: nandamūlakapabbhāre vasantā ekadivasaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “mayaṃ kiṃ kammaṃ katvā imaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:286_9: anuppattā”ti āvajjetvā paccavekkhamānā kassapabuddhakāle attano cariyaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:286_10: Tato “tatiyo kuhi”nti āvajjentā bārāṇasiyaṃ rajjaṃ kārentaṃ disvā tassa guṇe saritvā “so pakatiyāva appicchatādiguṇasamannāgato ahosi,
atk-s0505a:286_11: amhākaññeva ovādako vattā vacanakkhamo pāpagarahī, handa,
atk-s0505a:286_12: naṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassetvā mocessāmā”ti okāsaṃ gavesantā taṃ ekadivasaṃ sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0505a:286_15: Tato rājā “atthi nu kho koci mama dassane abyāvaṭo”ti olokento paccekabuddhe addakkhi.
atk-s0505a:286_16: Saha dassaneneva cassa tesu sineho uppajji.
atk-s0505a:287_0: So hatthikkhandhā oruyha santena upacārena te upasaṅkamitvā “bhante,
atk-s0505a:287_9: imaṃ veḷugumbaṃ sabbaso mūlakhandhasākhānusākhāhi saṃsibbitvā ṭhitaṃ asihattho puriso mūle chetvā āviñchanto na sakkuṇeyya uddharituṃ,
atk-s0505a:287_10: evameva tvaṃ anto ca bahi ca jaṭāya jaṭito āsattavisatto tattha laggo.
atk-s0505a:287_11: Seyyathāpi vā panassa vemajjhagatopi ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīro asañjātasākhattā kenaci alaggo ṭhito,
atk-s0505a:287_12: sakkā ca pana agge vā mūle vā chetvā uddharituṃ,
atk-s0505a:287_13: evameva mayaṃ katthaci asajjamānā sabbadisā gacchāmā”ti tāvadeva catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā passato eva rañño ākāsena nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:287_15: “kadā nu kho ahampi evaṃ asajjamāno bhaveyya”nti tattheva nisīditvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:287_16: Purimanayeneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:288_0: “Vaṃso visālova yathā visatto, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā;
atk-s0505a:290_11: Yā apekkhāti yā taṇhā yo sneho.
atk-s0505a:290_14: Yathā vaṃso visālo visatto eva hoti,
atk-s0505a:290_16: sāpi evaṃ tāni vatthūni saṃsibbitvā ṭhitattā visattā eva.
atk-s0505a:290_17: Svāhaṃ tāya apekkhāya apekkhavā visālo vaṃso viya visattoti evaṃ apekkhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ apekkhaṃ
atk-s0505a:290_18: maggañāṇena chindanto ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrova rūpādīsu vā lobhādīsu vā kāmabhavādīsu vā diṭṭhādīsu vā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0505a:292_2: Eko kira bhikkhu kassapassa bhagavato sāsane yogāvacaro kālaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:292_3: bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhikule uppanno aḍḍhe mahaddhane mahābhoge,
atk-s0505a:292_5: Tato paradāriko hutvā tattha kālakato niraye nibbatto tattha paccitvā vipākāvasesena seṭṭhibhariyāya kucchimhi itthipaṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0505a:292_7: Tena seṭṭhibhariyā ḍayhamānena udarena kicchena kasirena taṃ gabbhaṃ dhāretvā kālena dārikaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0505a:292_8: Sā jātadivasato pabhuti mātāpitūnaṃ sesabandhuparijanānañca dessā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:292_10: tatthāpi sāmikasassusasurānaṃ dessāva ahosi appiyā amanāpā.
atk-s0505a:292_11: Atha nakkhatte ghosite seṭṭhiputto tāya saddhiṃ kīḷituṃ anicchanto vesiṃ ānetvā kīḷati.
atk-s0505a:292_12: Sā taṃ dāsīnaṃ santikā sutvā seṭṭhiputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nānappakārehi anunayitvā āha –
atk-s0505a:292_14: itthī nāma sacepi dasannaṃ rājūnaṃ kaniṭṭhā hoti,
atk-s0505a:292_17: Sāmike anālapante sūle āropitā viya dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
atk-s0505a:292_25: Seṭṭhidhītā tāvatakenapi sallāpamattena ussāhajātā “sve nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti bahuṃ khajjabhojjaṃ paṭiyādeti.
atk-s0505a:292_28: idāni pesessatī”ti maggaṃ olokentī nisinnā ussūraṃ disvā manusse pesesi.
atk-s0505a:292_30: Sā sabbaṃ taṃ paṭiyāditaṃ ādāya yānaṃ abhiruhitvā uyyānaṃ gantuṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0505a:293_0: Atha nandamūlakapabbhāre paccekasambuddho sattame divase nirodhā vuṭṭhāya anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā nāgalatādantapoṇaṃ
atk-s0505a:293_1: khāditvā “kattha ajja bhikkhaṃ carissāmī”ti āvajjento taṃ seṭṭhidhītaraṃ disvā “imissā mayi sakkāraṃ
atk-s0505a:293_2: karitvā taṃ kammaṃ parikkhayaṃ gamissatī”ti ñatvā pabbhārasamīpe saṭṭhiyojanaṃ manosilātalaṃ,
atk-s0505a:293_3: tattha ṭhatvā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā ākāsenāgantvā tassā paṭipathe oruyha bārāṇasībhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:293_15: tattha tattha mahājanassa piyā bhaveyyaṃ manāpā”ti.
atk-s0505a:293_18: taṃ anupagamma padumapupphe evaṃ paṭisandhi bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:293_22: tasmā ahaṃ itthibhāvaṃ anupagamma puriso bhaveyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:293_24: imaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ atikkamma pariyosāne tumhehi pattaṃ amataṃ pāpuṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:294_2: paccekabuddhassa pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā “pupphasadiso eva me gandho ceva vaṇṇo ca hotū”ti imaṃ pañcamaṃ paṇidhiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0505a:294_3: Tato paccekabuddho pattaṃ pupphakalāpañca gahetvā ākāse ṭhatvā –
atk-s0505a:296_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:297_0: Imāya gāthāya seṭṭhidhītāya anumodanaṃ katvā “seṭṭhidhītā maṃ gacchantaṃ passatū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:297_1: Seṭṭhidhītāya taṃ disvā mahatī pīti uppannā.
atk-s0505a:297_4: Tāvadeva cassā patikule ñātikule ca sabbo jano tuṭṭho “kiṃ karomā”ti piyavacanāni paṇṇākārāni ca pesesi.
atk-s0505a:297_5: Seṭṭhiputto manusse pesesi “sīghaṃ sīghaṃ ānetha seṭṭhidhītaraṃ,
atk-s0505a:297_7: Tato pabhuti ca naṃ ure vilittacandanaṃ viya āmuttamuttāhāraṃ viya pupphamālaṃ viya ca piyāyanto parihari.
atk-s0505a:298_0: Sā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ issariyabhogasukhaṃ anubhavitvā kālaṃ katvā purisabhāvena devaloke padumapupphe uppajji.
atk-s0505a:298_6: Evaṃ so tena iddhānubhāvena anulomapaṭilomaṃ chadevaloke eva saṃsarati.
atk-s0505a:299_0: Tena ca samayena bārāṇasirañño vīsati itthisahassāni honti.
atk-s0505a:299_1: Rājā ekissāpi kucchiyaṃ puttaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0505a:299_5: Rājā “ṭhapetvā mahesiṃ avasesā nāṭakitthiyo sattāhaṃ dhammanāṭakaṃ karothā”ti yathākāmaṃ bahi carāpesi,
atk-s0505a:299_9: mahesī nāma puññena ca paññāya ca sabbitthīnaṃ aggā,
atk-s0505a:299_10: appeva nāma devo mahesiyāpi kucchismiṃ puttaṃ labheyyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:299_11: Rājā mahesiyā etamatthaṃ ārocesi. Sā āha –
atk-s0505a:299_15: hirottapparahitāya kuto putto”ti pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā pañca sīlāni samādiyitvā punappunaṃ anumajjati.
atk-s0505a:299_16: Sīlavatiyā rājadhītāya pañca sīlāni anumajjantiyā puttapatthanācitte uppannamatte sakkassa āsanaṃ santappi.
atk-s0505a:300_0: Atha sakko āsanatāpakāraṇaṃ āvajjento etamatthaṃ viditvā “sīlavatiyā rājadhītāya puttavaraṃ demī”ti ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0505a:300_1: deviyā sammukhe ṭhatvā “kiṃ patthesi devī”ti pucchi. “Puttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:300_4: mā cintayī”ti vatvā devalokaṃ gantvā “atthi nu kho ettha khīṇāyuko”ti āvajjento “ayaṃ mahāpadumo uparidevaloke
atk-s0505a:300_5: uppajjituṃ ito cavatī”ti ñatvā tassa vimānaṃ gantvā “tāta mahāpaduma,
atk-s0505a:300_11: tattheva ṭhatvā pāramiyo pūretabbā, gaccha, tātā”ti. “Dukkho, mahārāja,
atk-s0505a:300_13: na sakkomi tattha vasitu”nti. “Kiṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0505a:301_0: Tato mahāpadumo devalokā cavitvā bārāṇasirañño uyyāne silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ padumagabbhe nibbatto.
atk-s0505a:301_1: Tañca rattiṃ mahesī paccūsasamaye supinantena vīsatiitthisahassaparivutā uyyānaṃ gantvā silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ padumassare puttaṃ laddhā viya ahosi.
atk-s0505a:301_2: Sā pabhātāya rattiyā sīlāni rakkhamānā tatheva tattha gantvā ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ addasa.
atk-s0505a:301_3: Taṃ neva tīre hoti na gambhīre.
atk-s0505a:301_4: Saha dassaneneva cassā tattha puttasineho uppajji.
atk-s0505a:301_5: Sā sāmaṃyeva pavisitvā taṃ pupphaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0505a:301_7: Tattha taṭṭake āsittasuvaṇṇapaṭimaṃ viya dārakaṃ addasa.
atk-s0505a:301_11: Rājā sutvā “kattha laddho”ti pucchitvā laddhokāsañca sutvā “uyyānañca pokkharaṇiyaṃ padumañca amhākaññeva khettaṃ,
atk-s0505a:301_12: tasmā amhākaṃ khette jātattā khetrajo nāmāyaṃ putto”ti vatvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā vīsatisahassaitthiyo dhātikiccaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0505a:301_13: Yā yā kumārassa ruciṃ ñatvā patthitapatthitaṃ khādanīyaṃ khādāpeti,
atk-s0505a:301_18: imaṃ bhuñjā”ti vuccamāno bhojanena ubbāḷho ukkaṇṭhito hutvā,
atk-s0505a:302_0: Tadā aññataro paccekabuddho bārāṇasiṃ nissāya isipatane vasati.
atk-s0505a:302_2: paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito “ajja kattha bhikkhaṃ gahessāmī”ti āvajjento kumārassa sampattiṃ disvā “esa pubbe
