atk-s0505a:395_4: Paṭhamakabaḷe pana mukhe pakkhittamatte sattarasaharaṇisahassāni amateneva phuṭṭhāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:395_8: “rasaṃ sāyitvā pana sakkarontaṃ maṃ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggaccheyya –
atk-s0505a:395_9: ‘lolo ayaṃ rājā rasagaruko”’ti na kiñci abhaṇi.
atk-s0505a:395_14: Tato sūdo “natthi imassa rañño jivhāviññāṇa”nti dutiyadivase arasabhattaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0505a:395_15: Rājā bhuñjanto “niggahāraho ajja sūdo”ti jānantopi pubbe viya paccavekkhitvā avaṇṇabhayena na kiñci abhaṇi.
atk-s0505a:395_16: Tato sūdo “rājā neva sundaraṃ nāsundaraṃ jānātī”ti cintetvā sabbaṃ paribbayaṃ attanā gahetvā yaṃkiñcideva pacitvā rañño deti.
atk-s0505a:395_18: ahaṃ nāma vīsati nagarasahassāni bhuñjanto imassa lobhena bhattamattampi na labhāmī”ti nibbijjitvā,
atk-s0505a:397_0: Nirāsayo sabbaloke bhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:398_5: Nikkuhoti ettha kiñcāpi yassa tividhaṃ kuhanavatthu natthi,
atk-s0505a:398_7: Imissā pana gāthāya manuññabhojanādīsu vimhayamanāpajjanato nikkuhoti ayamadhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:398_15: kāyaduccaritādīni ca tīṇīti cha dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ appasannaṭṭhena sakabhāvaṃ vijahāpetvā parabhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:398_16: gaṇhāpanaṭṭhena kasaṭaṭṭhena ca kasāvāti veditabbā. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:400_0: Tesu mohaṃ ṭhapetvā pañcannaṃ kasāvānaṃ tesañca sabbesaṃ mūlabhūtassa mohassa niddhantattā niddhantakasāvamoho,
atk-s0505a:400_1: tiṇṇaṃ eva vā kāyavacīmanokasāvānaṃ mohassa ca niddhantattā niddhantakasāvamoho.
atk-s0505a:400_6: tīsu bhavesu dvādasasu vā āyatanesu bhavavibhavataṇhāvirahito hutvāti attho.
atk-s0505a:400_8: Atha vā tayopi pāde vatvā eko careti eko carituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti evampi ettha sambandho kātabboti.
atk-s0505a:402_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā mahaccarājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto manusse koṭṭhāgārato purāṇadhaññāni bahiddhā nīharante disvā “kiṃ, bhaṇe,
atk-s0505a:402_5: tesaṃ okāsaṃ kātuṃ ime manussā purāṇadhaññādīni chaḍḍentī”ti. Rājā – “kiṃ, bhaṇe,
atk-s0505a:402_12: natthi dinna”nti ārabbha yāva “bālā ca paṇḍitā ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti vatvā nivāresi.
atk-s0505a:402_13: So dutiyampi tatiyampi koṭṭhāgāre vilumpante disvā tatheva āṇāpesi.
atk-s0505a:402_15: dattupaññattaṃ yadidaṃ dāna”ntiādīni vatvā nivāresi. So “are,
atk-s0505a:402_16: ahaṃ attano santakampi na labhāmi dātuṃ,
atk-s0505a:402_17: kiṃ me imehi pāpasahāyehī”ti nibbinno rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:402_18: Tañca pāpaṃ sahāyaṃ garahanto imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:404_0: Sayaṃ na seve pasutaṃ pamattaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:405_4: taṃ atthakāmo kulaputto pāpaṃ sahāyaṃ parivajjayetha anatthadassiṃ visame niviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:405_5: Sayaṃ na seveti attano vasena na seve.
atk-s0505a:405_12: Taṃ evarūpaṃ na seve, na bhaje,
atk-s0505a:407_2: Pubbe kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane aṭṭha paccekabodhisattā pabbajitvā gatapaccāgatavattaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0505a:407_10: nesaṃ santike vicitranayaṃ saddhammadesanaṃ sossāmī”ti attamano dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā,
atk-s0505a:407_19: sve dāni vicitradhammadesanaṃ sossāmī”ti svātanāya nimantesi.
atk-s0505a:407_27: taṇhakkhayo hotū”ti evaṃ ekekaṃ padaṃ visesetvā sesaṃ paṭhamasadisameva vatvā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:408_3: Atha “rāgakkhayo hotū”ti upaparikkhanto “rāge khīṇe dosopi mohopi aññataraññatarepi kilesā khīṇā hontī”ti ñatvā attamano ahosi –
atk-s0505a:408_5: Yathā hi purisena mahāpathaviṃ vā ākāsaṃ vā aṅguliyā niddisantena na aṅgulimattova padeso niddiṭṭho hoti, apica, kho,
atk-s0505a:408_7: evaṃ imehi ekamekaṃ atthaṃ niddisantehi aparimāṇā atthā niddiṭṭhā hontī”ti.
atk-s0505a:408_8: Tato so “kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ bahussuto bhavissāmī”ti tathārūpaṃ bahussutabhāvaṃ patthento rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā,
atk-s0505a:410_0: Aññāya atthāni vineyya kaṅkhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:411_1: bahussutanti duvidho bahussuto tīsu piṭakesu atthato nikhilo pariyattibahussuto ca,
atk-s0505a:411_5: Yuttapaṭibhāno ca muttapaṭibhāno ca yuttamuttapaṭibhāno ca paṭibhānavā.
atk-s0505a:411_9: Yassa atthañca ñāṇañca lakkhaṇañca ṭhānāṭṭhānañca paripucchantassa paripucchā paṭibhāti,
atk-s0505a:411_13: Taṃ evarūpaṃ bahussutaṃ dhammadharaṃ bhajetha mittaṃ uḷāraṃ paṭibhānavantaṃ.
atk-s0505a:411_14: Tato tassānubhāvena attatthaparatthaubhayatthabhedato vā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthabhedato vā anekappakārāni aññāya atthāni. Tato –
atk-s0505a:411_15: “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādīsu kaṅkhaṭṭhānesu vineyya kaṅkhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:411_16: vicikicchaṃ vinetvā vināsetvā evaṃ katasabbakicco eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
atk-s0505a:413_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ vibhūsakabrahmadatto nāma rājā pātova yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā bhuñjitvā nānāvidhavibhūsanehi
atk-s0505a:413_3: attānaṃ vibhūsāpetvā mahāādāse sakalasarīraṃ disvā yaṃ na icchati taṃ apanetvā aññena vibhūsanena vibhūsāpeti.
atk-s0505a:413_4: Tassa ekadivasaṃ evaṃ karoto bhattavelā majjhanhikasamayo patto.
atk-s0505a:413_8: Punapi uṭṭhahitvā tatheva karoto sūriyo atthaṅgato.
atk-s0505a:413_12: ahaṃ sabbathāmena vibhūsantopi imasmiṃ kappake vibhūsane asantuṭṭho lobhaṃ uppādesiṃ.
atk-s0505a:413_13: Lobho ca nāmesa apāyagamanīyo dhammo, handāhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:413_14: lobhaṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:415_0: Vibhūsanaṭṭhānā virato saccavādī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:416_0: Tattha khiḍḍā ca rati ca pubbe vuttāva.
atk-s0505a:416_2: Vatthukāmāpi hi sukhassa visayādibhāvena sukhanti vuccanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:416_4: Evametaṃ khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ kāmasukhañca imasmiṃ okāsaloke analaṅkaritvā alanti akatvā,
atk-s0505a:416_5: etaṃ tappakanti vā sārabhūtanti vā evaṃ aggahetvā.
atk-s0505a:418_2: Bārāṇasirañño kira putto daharakāle eva abhisitto rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0505a:418_3: So paṭhamagāthāya vuttapaccekabodhisatto viya rajjasirimanubhavanto ekadivasaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0505a:418_6: handa sukhamuppādemī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:419_0: “Puttañca dāraṃ pitarañca mātaraṃ, dhanāni dhaññāni ca bandhavāni;
atk-s0505a:420_0: Hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:423_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira pādalolabrahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:423_3: So pātova yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā bhuñjitvā tīsu pāsādesu tividhanāṭakāni passati.
atk-s0505a:423_8: Tā nāṭakitthiyo “rājānaṃ ramāpessāmā”ti sakkassa devānamindassa accharāyo viya atimanoharaṃ naccagītavāditaṃ payojesuṃ. Rājā –
atk-s0505a:423_11: So tatthāpi tatheva asantuṭṭho hutvā mahānāṭakapāsādaṃ gato.
atk-s0505a:423_13: Rājā dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe atītānaṃ tāsaṃ mahallakabhāvena aṭṭhikīḷanasadisaṃ naccaṃ disvā gītañca amadhuraṃ sutvā punadeva daharanāṭakapāsādaṃ,
atk-s0505a:423_14: puna majjhimanāṭakapāsādanti evaṃ vicaritvā katthaci asantuṭṭho cintesi –
atk-s0505a:423_15: “imā nāṭakitthiyo sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ accharāyo viya maṃ ramāpetukāmā sabbathāmena naccagītavāditaṃ payojesuṃ,
atk-s0505a:423_18: handāhaṃ lobhaṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:424_0: “Saṅgo eso parittamettha sokhyaṃ, appassādo dukkhamettha bhiyyo;
atk-s0505a:425_0: Gaḷo eso iti ñatvā matimā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:426_2: So hi sajjanti tattha pāṇino kaddame paviṭṭho hatthī viyāti saṅgo.
atk-s0505a:426_3: Parittamettha sokhyanti ettha pañcakāmaguṇūpabhogakāle viparītasaññāya uppādetabbato kāmāvacaradhammapariyāpannato vā lāmakaṭṭhena sokhyaṃ parittaṃ,
atk-s0505a:426_6: Appassādo dukkhamettha bhiyyoti ettha ca yvāyaṃ “yaṃ kho,
atk-s0505a:426_8: ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
atk-s0505a:426_16: yadi gaṇanāyā”ti evamādinā nayenettha dukkhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:426_21: Gaḷo esoti assādaṃ dassetvā ākaḍḍhanavasena baḷiso viya eso yadidaṃ pañca kāmaguṇā.
atk-s0505a:426_22: Iti ñatvā matimāti evaṃ ñatvā buddhimā paṇḍito puriso sabbampetaṃ pahāya eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
atk-s0505a:428_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira anivattabrahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:428_3: So saṅgāmaṃ otiṇṇo ajinitvā aññaṃ vā kiccaṃ āraddho aniṭṭhapetvā na nivattati,
atk-s0505a:428_7: So aggi sukkhāni ca haritāni ca tiṇādīni dahanto anivattamāno eva gacchati.
atk-s0505a:428_10: evameva ekādasavidho aggi sabbasatte dahanto anivattamānova gacchati mahādukkhaṃ uppādento,
atk-s0505a:428_11: kudāssu nāmāhampi imassa dukkhassa nivattanatthaṃ ayaṃ aggi viya ariyamaggañāṇagginā kilese dahanto anivattamāno gaccheyya”nti?
atk-s0505a:428_12: Tato muhuttaṃ gantvā kevaṭṭe addasa nadiyaṃ macche gaṇhante.
atk-s0505a:428_13: Tesaṃ jālantaraṃ paviṭṭho eko mahāmaccho jālaṃ bhetvā palāyi.
atk-s0505a:428_15: Rājā tampi vacanaṃ sutvā tappaṭibhāganimittaṃ uppādesi –
atk-s0505a:428_16: “kudāssu nāmāhampi ariyamaggañāṇena taṇhādiṭṭhijālaṃ bhetvā asajjamāno gaccheyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:428_17: So rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ sacchākāsi,
atk-s0505a:430_0: Aggīva daḍḍhaṃ anivattamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:431_5: tasmiṃ nadīsalile jālaṃ bhetvā ambucārīvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:431_7: Yathā aggi daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ puna na nivattati,
atk-s0505a:431_9: evaṃ maggañāṇagginā daḍḍhaṃ kāmaguṇaṭṭhānaṃ anivattamāno tattha bhiyyo anāgacchantoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:433_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira cakkhulolabrahmadatto nāma rājā pādalolabrahmadatto viya nāṭakadassanamanuyutto hoti.
atk-s0505a:433_5: ayaṃ taṃ taṃ nāṭakaṃ disvā ativiya abhinanditvā nāṭakaparivattadassanena taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhento vicarati.
atk-s0505a:433_6: So kira nāṭakadassanāya āgataṃ aññataraṃ kuṭumbiyabhariyaṃ disvā rāgaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0505a:433_7: Tato saṃvegamāpajjitvā puna “ahaṃ imaṃ taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhento apāyaparipūrako bhavissāmi,
atk-s0505a:433_8: handa naṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā attano purimapaṭipattiṃ garahanto
atk-s0505a:436_1: satta gīvaṭṭhīni paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā parivajjagahetabbadassanatthaṃ yugamattaṃ pekkhamānoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:436_5: dvinnaṃ tatiyoti evaṃ gaṇamajjhaṃ pavisitukāmatāya kaṇḍūyamānapādo viya abhavanto,
atk-s0505a:436_7: Guttindriyoti chasu indriyesu idha visuṃvuttāvasesavasena gopitindriyo.
atk-s0505a:436_12: Anavassutoti imāya paṭipattiyā tesu tesu ārammaṇesu kilesaanvāssavavirahito.
atk-s0505a:438_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira ayaṃ aññopi cātumāsikabrahmadatto nāma rājā catumāse catumāse uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0505a:438_3: So ekadivasaṃ gimhānaṃ majjhime māse uyyānaṃ pavisanto uyyānadvāre pattasañchannaṃ pupphālaṅkataviṭapaṃ
atk-s0505a:438_4: pāricchattakakoviḷāraṃ disvā ekaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0505a:438_5: Tato “raññā aggapupphaṃ gahita”nti aññataropi amacco hatthikkhandhe ṭhito eva ekaṃ pupphaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0505a:438_9: Taṃ rājā sāyanhasamaye uyyānā nikkhamanto disvā “kiṃ kato ayaṃ rukkho,
atk-s0505a:438_11: idāni nippattapuppho jāto”ti cintento tassevāvidūre apupphitaṃ rukkhaṃ sañchannapalāsaṃ addasa.
atk-s0505a:438_18: Tasmā yāva idampi ayaṃ rukkho viya na viluppati,
atk-s0505a:438_21: So rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:441_0: Tattha kāsāyavattho abhinikkhamitvāti imassa pādassa gehā abhinikkhamitvā kāsāyavattho hutvāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:441_1: Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritanti.
atk-s0505a:444_2: Aññataro kira bārāṇasirājā uyyāne amaccaputtehi parivuto silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇiyaṃ kīḷati.
atk-s0505a:444_3: Tassa sūdo sabbamaṃsānaṃ rasaṃ gahetvā atīva susaṅkhataṃ amatakappaṃ antarabhattaṃ pacitvā upanāmesi.
atk-s0505a:444_4: So tattha gedhamāpanno kassaci kiñci adatvā attanāva bhuñji.
atk-s0505a:444_5: Udakakīḷato ca ativikāle nikkhanto sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bhuñji.
atk-s0505a:444_10: yvāhaṃ rasataṇhāya abhibhūto sabbajanaṃ visaritvā ekakova bhuñjiṃ.
atk-s0505a:444_11: Handa rasataṇhaṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā attano purimapaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0505a:446_0: Kule kule appaṭibaddhacitto, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:447_7: Yathā vā pubbe uyyāne rasesu gedhakaraṇalolo hutvā aññaposī āsiṃ,
atk-s0505a:447_8: evaṃ ahutvā yāya taṇhāya lolo hutvā rasesu gedhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:447_9: Taṃ taṇhaṃ hitvā āyatiṃ taṇhāmūlakassa aññassa attabhāvassa anibbattanena anaññaposīti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:447_10: Atha vā atthabhañjanakaṭṭhena aññeti kilesā vuccanti.
atk-s0505a:447_13: gharapaṭipāṭiṃ achaḍḍetvā aḍḍhakulañca daliddakulañca nirantaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisamānoti attho.
atk-s0505a:447_14: Kule kule appaṭibaddhacittoti khattiyakulādīsu yattha katthaci kilesavasena alaggacitto,
atk-s0505a:449_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā paṭhamajjhānalābhī ahosi.
atk-s0505a:449_3: So jhānānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā attano paṭipattisampadaṃ dīpento imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:451_0: Anissito chetva sinehadosaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:452_2: Tāni pana yasmā abbhādayo viya candasūriye ceto āvaranti,
atk-s0505a:452_4: Tāni upacārena vā appanāya vā pahāya.
atk-s0505a:452_5: Upakkileseti upagamma cittaṃ vibādhente akusale dhamme,
atk-s0505a:452_10: Evaṃ samathavipassanāsampanno paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhinissayassa pahīnattā anissito.
atk-s0505a:452_13: Sineho eva hi guṇapaṭipakkhato sinehadosoti vutto.
atk-s0505a:454_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā catutthajjhānalābhī ahosi.
atk-s0505a:454_3: So jhānānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā attano paṭipattisampadaṃ dīpento imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:456_0: Laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:458_1: vipiṭṭhikatvāna sukhaṃ dukkhañca pubbeva paṭhamajjhānupacārabhūmiyaṃyeva dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:458_3: Puna ādito vuttaṃ cakāraṃ parato netvā “somanassaṃ domanassañca vipiṭṭhikatvāna pubbevā”ti adhikāro.
atk-s0505a:458_11: “paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharati etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:458_13: Yato pubbeva tīsu paṭhamajjhānādīsu dukkhadomanassasukhāni vipiṭṭhikatvā ettheva catutthajjhāne somanassaṃ
atk-s0505a:458_14: vipiṭṭhikatvā imāya paṭipadāya laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ eko careti.
atk-s0505a:460_2: Aññataro kira paccantarājā sahassayodhaparimāṇabalakāyo rajjena khuddako,
atk-s0505a:460_5: paññavatā ca pana sakkā sakalajambudīpaṃ gahetu”nti cintetvā sāmantarañño dūtaṃ pāhesi –
atk-s0505a:460_6: “sattadivasabbhantare me rajjaṃ vā detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0505a:460_7: Tato so attano amacce samodhānetvā āha –
atk-s0505a:460_16: tena hi dukkhaṃ aññassa satthena marituṃ. Handa,
atk-s0505a:460_22: Tato rājā – “kiṃ me, imehi, atthi, bhaṇe,
atk-s0505a:461_0: Rājā “ete upaparikkhissāmī”ti mantvā citakaṃ sajjetvā āha – “mayā, bhaṇe,
atk-s0505a:461_6: Evaṃ vutte pañcasatā yodhā uṭṭhahiṃsu – “mayaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0505a:461_8: Tato rājā apare pañcasate yodhe āha –
atk-s0505a:461_15: tena mayaṃ raññā saddhiṃ yujjhitvā marissāmā”ti.
atk-s0505a:461_16: Tato rājā “pariccattaṃ tumhehi mama jīvita”nti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā tena yodhasahassena parivuto gantvā rajjasīmāya nisīdi.
atk-s0505a:462_1: so khuddakarājā mama dāsassāpi nappahotī”ti kujjhitvā sabbaṃ balakāyaṃ ādāya yujjhituṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0505a:462_2: Khuddakarājā taṃ abbhuyyātaṃ disvā balakāyaṃ āha – “tātā,
atk-s0505a:462_6: sīghaṃ imassa rañño purato ujukaṃ eva gacchathā”ti.
atk-s0505a:462_8: Atha sā senā dvidhā bhijjitvā antaramadāsi.
atk-s0505a:462_19: So “ahaṃ ekayuddhampi na sahāmī”ti rajjaṃ niyyātesi.
atk-s0505a:462_20: Eteneva upāyena sabbarājāno gahetvā ante bārāṇasirājānampi aggahesi.
atk-s0505a:463_0: So ekasatarājaparivuto sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ anusāsanto cintesi –
atk-s0505a:463_2: somhi attano ñāṇasampattiyā sakalajambudīpassa issaro jāto.
atk-s0505a:463_3: Taṃ kho pana me ñāṇaṃ lokiyavīriyasampayuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:463_5: sādhu vatassa svāhaṃ iminā ñāṇena lokuttaradhammaṃ gaveseyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:463_9: paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā attano vīriyasampattiṃ dīpento imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:466_5: Alīnacittoti etena balavīriyūpatthambhānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ alīnataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0505a:466_7: Daḷhanikkamoti etena “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru cā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ padahanavīriyaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0505a:466_8: yaṃ taṃ anupubbasikkhādīsu padahanto “kāyena ceva paramasaccaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0505a:466_9: paññāya ca naṃ ativijjha passatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:466_13: tasmā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalopi daḷho nikkamo assāti “daḷhanikkamo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:466_14: Thāmabalūpapannoti maggakkhaṇe kāyathāmena ñāṇabalena ca upapanno,
atk-s0505a:466_15: atha vā thāmabhūtena balena upapannoti thāmabalūpapanno,
atk-s0505a:466_17: Etena tassa vīriyassa vipassanāñāṇasampayogaṃ dīpento yoniso padahanabhāvaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0505a:468_2: Imissā gāthāya āvaraṇagāthāya uppattisadisā eva uppatti,
atk-s0505a:468_4: Atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ panassā paṭisallānanti tehi tehi sattasaṅkhārehi paṭinivattitvā sallīnaṃ ekattasevitā ekībhāvo,
atk-s0505a:468_6: Jhānanti paccanīkajhāpanato ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānato ca cittaviveko vuccati.
atk-s0505a:468_7: Tattha aṭṭhasamāpattiyo nīvaraṇādipaccanīkajhāpanato ārammaṇūpanijjhānato ca jhānanti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:468_17: Anudhammacārīti te dhamme ārabbha pavattamānena anugataṃ vipassanādhammaṃ caramāno.
atk-s0505a:468_21: Tattha “dhammānaṃ niccaṃ anudhammacārī”ti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ vibhattibyattayena “dhammesū”ti vuttaṃ siyā.
atk-s0505a:468_22: Ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesūti tāya anudhammacaritāsaṅkhātāya vipassanāya aniccākārādidosaṃ tīsu bhavesu
atk-s0505a:468_23: samanupassanto evaṃ imaṃ kāyavivekacittavivekaṃ ariñcamāno sikhāppattavipassanāsaṅkhātāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0505a:468_24: adhigatoti vattabbo eko careti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:470_2: Aññataro kira bārāṇasirājā mahaccarājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:470_3: Tassa sarīrasobhāya āvaṭṭitahadayā sattā purato gacchantāpi nivattitvā tameva ullokenti,
atk-s0505a:470_6: Pakatiyā eva hi buddhadassane puṇṇacandasamuddarājadassane ca atitto loko.
atk-s0505a:470_7: Atha aññatarā kuṭumbiyabhariyāpi uparipāsādagatā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:470_8: Rājā taṃ disvāva paṭibaddhacitto hutvā amaccaṃ āṇāpesi –
atk-s0505a:470_10: ayaṃ itthī sasāmikā vā asāmikā vā”ti.
atk-s0505a:470_13: “imā vīsatisahassanāṭakitthiyo devaccharāyo viya maṃyeva ekaṃ abhiramenti,
atk-s0505a:470_14: so dānāhaṃ etāpi atusitvā parassa itthiyā taṇhaṃ uppādesiṃ,
atk-s0505a:470_15: sā uppannā apāyameva ākaḍḍhatī”ti taṇhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā “handa naṃ niggaṇhāmī”ti rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā
atk-s0505a:470_16: vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:472_0: Saṅkhātadhammo niyato padhānavā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:473_4: Atha vā aneḷo ca amūgo ca,
atk-s0505a:473_6: Hitasukhasampāpakaṃ sutamassa atthīti sutavā āgamasampannoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:473_12: Evametehi appamādādīhi samannāgato niyāmasampāpakena padhānena padhānavā,
atk-s0505a:475_2: Aññatarassa kira bārāṇasirañño dūre uyyānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:475_3: So pageva vuṭṭhāya uyyānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge yānā oruyha udakaṭṭhānaṃ upagato “mukhaṃ dhovissāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:475_4: Tasmiñca padese sīhī potakaṃ janetvā gocarāya gatā.
atk-s0505a:475_6: Rājā “sīho kira na kassaci bhāyatī”ti taṃ upaparikkhituṃ bheriādīni ākoṭāpesi.
atk-s0505a:475_7: Sīhapotako taṃ saddaṃ sutvāpi tatheva sayi.
atk-s0505a:475_9: so tatiyavāre sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā sabbaṃ parisaṃ oloketvā tatheva sayi.
atk-s0505a:475_12: “taṃ divasaṃ jātopi sīhapotako na santasati na bhāyati,
atk-s0505a:475_13: kudāssu nāmāhampi taṇhādiṭṭhiparitāsaṃ chetvā na santaseyyaṃ na bhāyeyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:475_15: gacchanto puna kevaṭṭehi macche gahetvā sākhāsu bandhitvā pasārite jāle vātaṃ alaggaṃyeva gacchamānaṃ disvā,
atk-s0505a:475_17: “kudāssu nāmāhampi taṇhādiṭṭhijālaṃ mohajālaṃ vā phāletvā evaṃ asajjamāno gaccheyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:476_0: Atha uyyānaṃ gantvā silāpaṭṭapokkharaṇitīre nisinno vātabbhāhatāni padumāni onamitvā udakaṃ phusitvā
atk-s0505a:476_1: vātavigame puna yathāṭhāne ṭhitāni udakena anupalittāni disvā tampi nimittaṃ aggahesi –
atk-s0505a:476_2: “kudāssu nāmāhampi yathā etāni udake jātāni udakena anupalittāni tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0505a:476_3: evamevaṃ loke jāto lokena anupalitto tiṭṭheyya”nti.
atk-s0505a:476_5: evaṃ asantasantena asajjamānena anupalittena bhavitabba”nti cintetvā,
atk-s0505a:476_7: vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:478_0: Padumaṃva toyena alippamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:479_7: Tesu yo koci vāto yaṃkiñci padumañca vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0505a:479_10: sopi diṭṭhisampayuttena vā diṭṭhivippayuttena vā lobhena hoti,
atk-s0505a:479_12: Sajjanaṃ pana tattha upaparikkhāvirahitassa mohena hoti,
atk-s0505a:479_16: Tasmā samathena attasinehaṃ pahāya sīhova saddesu aniccādīsu asantasanto,
atk-s0505a:479_17: vipassanāya mohaṃ pahāya vātova jālamhi khandhāyatanādīsu asajjamāno,
atk-s0505a:479_18: samatheneva lobhaṃ lobhasampayuttaṃ eva diṭṭhiñca pahāya,
atk-s0505a:479_23: Evaṃ tesu dvīsu dhammesu siddhesu tayopi khandhā siddhā honti.
atk-s0505a:479_25: So sīhova saddesu āghātavatthūsu kujjhitukāmatāya na santasati.
atk-s0505a:479_26: Paññākkhandhena paṭividdhasabhāvo vātova jālamhi khandhādidhammabhede na sajjati,
atk-s0505a:479_27: samādhikkhandhena vītarāgo padumaṃva toyena rāgena na lippati.
atk-s0505a:479_28: Evaṃ samathavipassanāhi sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhehi ca yathāsambhavaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ tiṇṇañca akusalamūlānaṃ
atk-s0505a:479_29: pahānavasena asantasanto asajjamāno alippamāno ca veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:481_2: Aññataro kira bārāṇasirājā paccantaṃ kuppitaṃ vūpasametuṃ gāmānugāmimaggaṃ chaḍḍetvā,
atk-s0505a:481_5: Tena ca samayena aññatarasmiṃ pabbatapāde sīho bālasūriyātapaṃ tappamāno nipanno hoti.
atk-s0505a:481_7: Rājā “sīho kira saddena na santasatī”ti bherisaṅkhapaṇavādīhi saddaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0505a:481_12: Sīho “mama paṭisattu atthī”ti catūhi pādehi suppatiṭṭhitaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0505a:481_13: Taṃ sutvāva hatthārohādayo hatthiādīhi orohitvā tiṇagahanāni paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0505a:481_15: Rañño hatthīpi rājānaṃ gahetvā vanagahanāni pothayamāno palāyi.
atk-s0505a:481_16: So taṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto rukkhasākhāya olambitvā,
atk-s0505a:481_18: ekapadikamaggena gacchanto paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇitvā tattha paccekabuddhe pucchi – “api, bhante,
atk-s0505a:481_34: Tato naṃ pabbājetvā pubbe vuttanayeneva ābhisamācārikaṃ sikkhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:481_35: Sopi pubbe vuttanayeneva vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:482_0: “Sīho yathā dāṭhabalī pasayha, rājā migānaṃ abhibhuyya cārī;
atk-s0505a:483_0: Sevetha pantāni senāsanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:484_0: Tattha sahanā ca hananā ca sīghajavattā ca sīho.
atk-s0505a:484_4: ubhayaṃ cārīsaddena saha yojetabbaṃ pasayhacārī abhibhuyyacārīti tattha pasayha niggahetvā caraṇena pasayhacārī,
atk-s0505a:484_13: tato migānanti sāmivacanaṃ upayogavacanaṃ katvā “mige pasayha abhibhuyya cārī”ti paṭivattabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:484_16: Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritanti.
atk-s0505a:486_3: So “jhānasukhantarāyakaraṃ rajja”nti jhānānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā,
atk-s0505a:487_0: Mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle;
atk-s0505a:488_0: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:489_0: Tattha “sabbe sattā sukhitā hontū”tiādinā nayena hitasukhupanayanakāmatā mettā.
atk-s0505a:489_1: “Aho vata imamhā dukkhā vimucceyyu”ntiādinā nayena ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā karuṇā.
atk-s0505a:489_2: “Modanti vata bhonto sattā modanti sādhu suṭṭhū”tiādinā nayena hitasukhāvippayogakāmatā muditā.
atk-s0505a:489_4: Gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ pana uppaṭipāṭiyā mettaṃ vatvā upekkhā vuttā,
atk-s0505a:489_6: Vimuttinti catassopi hi etā attano paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā vimuttiyo.
atk-s0505a:490_2: Kāleti mettaṃ āsevitvā tato vuṭṭhāya karuṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:490_4: tato itarato vā nippītikajhānato vuṭṭhāya upekkhaṃ āsevamāno “kāle āsevamāno”ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:490_6: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamānoti dasasu disāsu sabbena sattalokena avirujjhamāno.
atk-s0505a:490_12: vitthārena pana mettādikathā aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0505a:492_2: Rājagahaṃ kira upanissāya mātaṅgo nāma paccekabuddho viharati sabbapacchimo paccekabuddhānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:492_3: Atha amhākaṃ bodhisatte uppanne devatāyo bodhisattassa pūjanatthāya āgacchantiyo taṃ disvā “mārisā, mārisā,
atk-s0505a:492_5: So nirodhā vuṭṭhahanto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0505a:492_7: himavante mahāpapāto nāma pabbato paccekabuddhānaṃ parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:492_8: tattha ākāsena gantvā pubbe parinibbutapaccekabuddhassa aṭṭhisaṅghātaṃ papāte pakkhipitvā,
atk-s0505a:495_2: Tāni ca tena tena maggena sandālayitvā.
atk-s0505a:495_3: Asantasaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhīti jīvitasaṅkhayo vuccati cuticittassa paribhedo,
atk-s0505a:495_5: Ettāvatā sopādisesaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ attano dassetvā gāthāpariyosāne anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0505a:497_2: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira aññataro rājā ādigāthāya vuttappakārameva phītaṃ rajjaṃ samanusāsati.
atk-s0505a:497_7: handa mayaṃ attano saraṇaṃ gavesāmā”ti cintetvā aññassa rañño santikaṃ gantvā upaṭṭhānaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0505a:497_10: Rājāpi ābādhā vuṭṭhahitvā pucchi “itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca kuhi”nti?
atk-s0505a:497_11: Tato taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā sīsaṃ cāletvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0505a:497_12: Tepi amaccā “rājā vuṭṭhito”ti sutvā tattha kiñci alabhamānā paramena pārijuññena samannāgatā punadeva āgantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:497_15: “devaṃ dubbalaṃ disvā ājīvikabhayenamhā asukaṃ nāma janapadaṃ gatā”ti.
atk-s0505a:497_19: So pubbe ābādhikarogena phuṭṭho viya bāḷhavedanaṃ attānaṃ dassento gilānālayaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0505a:497_21: Tepi amaccā tatheva puna bahutaraṃ janaṃ gahetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:497_22: Evaṃ rājā yāvatatiyaṃ sabbaṃ pubbasadisaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0505a:497_24: Tato catutthampi te āgate disvā “aho ime dukkaraṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0505a:497_25: ye maṃ byādhitaṃ pahāya anapekkhā pakkamiṃsū”ti nibbinno rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanto paccekabodhiṃ sacchikatvā imaṃ udānagāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:498_0: “Bhajanti sevanti ca kāraṇatthā, nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittā;
atk-s0505a:499_0: Attaṭṭhapaññā asucī manussā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti.
atk-s0505a:500_1: Sevantīti añjalikammādīhi kiṃ kārapaṭissāvitāya ca paricaranti.
atk-s0505a:500_6: Nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittāti “ito kiñci lacchāmā”ti evaṃ attapaṭilābhakāraṇena nikkāraṇā, kevalaṃ –
atk-s0505a:505_0: Evaṃ vuttena ariyena mittabhāvena samannāgatā dullabhā ajja mittā.
atk-s0505a:508_0: Evametaṃ ekacattālīsagāthāparimāṇaṃ khaggavisāṇasuttaṃ katthacideva vuttena yojanānayena sabbattha yathānurūpaṃ
atk-s0505a:508_2: Ativitthārabhayena pana amhehi na sabbattha yojitanti.
atk-s0505a:512_2: Bhagavā magadhesu viharanto dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ ekanālāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme purebhattakiccaṃ pacchābhattakiccanti
atk-s0505a:512_3: imesu dvīsu buddhakiccesu purebhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā pacchābhattakiccāvasāne buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento
atk-s0505a:512_4: kasibhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ arahattassa upanissayasampannaṃ disvā “tattha mayi gate yathā pavattissati,
atk-s0505a:512_5: tato kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā esa brāhmaṇo pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti ca ñatvā,
atk-s0505a:513_2: buddho bhagavā pāto eva uṭṭhāya upaṭṭhākānuggahatthaṃ sarīraphāsukatthañca mukhadhovanādisarīraparikammaṃ katvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0505a:513_7: pattamādāya kadāci ekakova kadāci bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0505a:513_11: piṇḍāya pavisato lokanāthassa purato purato gantvā mudugatiyo vātā pathaviṃ sodhenti;
atk-s0505a:513_12: valāhakā udakaphusitāni muñcantā magge reṇuṃ vūpasametvā upari vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0505a:513_13: Apare vātā pupphāni upasaṃharitvā magge okiranti,
atk-s0505a:513_17: sukhasamphassāni rathacakkamattāni padumapupphāni vā pāde sampaṭicchanti,
atk-s0505a:513_18: indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde sarīrā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo niccharitvā suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāni
atk-s0505a:513_19: viya citrapaṭaparikkhittāni viya ca pāsādakūṭāgārādīni karontiyo ito cito ca vidhāvanti,
atk-s0505a:513_20: hatthiassavihaṅgādayo sakasakaṭṭhānesu ṭhitāyeva madhurenākārena saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0505a:513_21: tathā bherivīṇādīni tūriyāni manussānaṃ kāyūpagāni ca ābharaṇāni,
atk-s0505a:513_22: tena saññāṇena manussā jānanti “ajja bhagavā idha piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0505a:513_23: Te sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni ādāya gharā nikkhamitvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā bhagavantaṃ gandhapupphādīhi sakkaccaṃ pūjetvā vanditvā – “amhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0505a:513_26: amhākaṃ bhikkhusataṃ dethā”ti yācitvā bhagavatopi pattaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0505a:514_0: Bhagavā katabhattakicco tesaṃ santānāni oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0505a:514_5: Evaṃ tathā tathā janaṃ anuggahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0505a:514_6: Tattha maṇḍalamāḷe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdati bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosānaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0505a:514_7: Tato bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosāne upaṭṭhāko bhagavato nivedeti.
atk-s0505a:515_0: Atha bhagavā evaṃ katapurebhattakicco gandhakuṭiyā upaṭṭhāne nisīditvā,
atk-s0505a:515_11: Tato bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ vanditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0505a:515_12: Atha bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ cariyavasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ deti.
atk-s0505a:515_21: Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sace ākaṅkhati,
atk-s0505a:515_22: dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno muhuttaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0505a:515_23: Atha samassāsitakāyo uṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0505a:515_24: Tatiyabhāge yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati,
atk-s0505a:515_25: tattha jano purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sunivattho supāruto gandhapupphādīni ādāya vihāre sannipatati.
atk-s0505a:515_26: Tato bhagavā sampattaparisāya anurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisajja dhammaṃ deseti kālayuttaṃ pamāṇayuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:516_1: Atha buddhāsanā uṭṭhāya upaṭṭhākena udakapaṭiyāditokāsaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0505a:516_11: Atha bhikkhū tato tato āgamma bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0505a:516_15: Bhagavā tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ sampādento paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0505a:517_0: Majjhimayāme sakaladasasahassilokadhātudevatāyo okāsaṃ labhamānā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti
atk-s0505a:517_2: Bhagavā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento majjhimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0505a:517_3: Tato pacchimayāmaṃ cattāro bhāge katvā ekaṃ bhāgaṃ caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0505a:517_4: dutiyabhāgaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0505a:517_6: catutthabhāgaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ pavisitvā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketi apparajakkhamahārajakkhādisattadassanatthaṃ.
atk-s0505a:518_0: Evamimassa pacchābhattakiccassa lokavolokanasaṅkhāte catutthabhāgāvasāne buddhadhammasaṅghesu dānasīlauposathakammādīsu
atk-s0505a:518_1: ca akatādhikāre katādhikāre ca anupanissayasampanne upanissayasampanne ca satte passituṃ buddhacakkhunā
atk-s0505a:518_2: lokaṃ volokento kasibhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ arahattassa upanissayasampannaṃ disvā “tattha mayi gate kathā
atk-s0505a:518_4: tato kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā esa brāhmaṇo pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti ca ñatvā,
atk-s0505a:519_0: Tattha evaṃ me sutantiādi āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle dhammasaṅgītiṃ karontena āyasmatā
atk-s0505a:519_1: mahākassapattherena puṭṭhena pañcannaṃ arahantasatānaṃ vuttaṃ, “ahaṃ, kho,
atk-s0505a:519_2: samaṇa kasāmi ca vapāmi cā”ti kasibhāradvājena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:519_3: “ahampi kho brāhmaṇa kasāmi ca vapāmi cā”tiādi bhagavatā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:520_0: Tattha evanti ayaṃ ākāranidassanāvadhāraṇattho evaṃ- saddo.
atk-s0505a:520_4: taṃ sabbākārena ko samattho viññātuṃ; atha, kho,
atk-s0505a:520_8: na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento “evaṃ me sutaṃ,
atk-s0505a:520_9: mayā evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalasuttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0505a:520_12: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando,
atk-s0505a:520_16: upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti evaṃ bhagavatā pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ dassento sattānaṃ
atk-s0505a:520_17: sotukamyataṃ janeti “evaṃ me sutaṃ tañca atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva,
atk-s0505a:520_19: Me sutanti ettha mayāsaddattho me- saddo,
atk-s0505a:520_21: Tasmā evaṃ me sutanti evaṃ mayā sotaviññāṇapubbaṅgamāya viññāṇavīthiyā upadhāritanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:521_3: Magadhesu viharatīti magadhā nāma janapadino rājakumārā,
atk-s0505a:521_4: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīsaddena “magadhā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:521_6: Keci pana “yasmā cetiyarājā musāvādaṃ bhaṇitvā bhūmiṃ pavisanto ‘mā gadhaṃ pavisā’ti vutto,
atk-s0505a:521_7: yasmā vā taṃ rājānaṃ maggantā bhūmiṃ khanantā purisā ‘mā gadhaṃ karothā’ti vuttā,
atk-s0505a:521_8: tasmā magadhā”ti evamādīhi nayehi bahudhā papañcenti.
atk-s0505a:521_11: Viharatīti ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aparena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati,
atk-s0505a:521_13: Dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi vā sattānaṃ vividhaṃ hitaṃ haratīti viharati.
atk-s0505a:521_16: Tathā hi yadā sattā kāmesu vippaṭipajjanti,
atk-s0505a:521_17: tadā kira bhagavā dibbena vihārena viharati tesaṃ alobhakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ –
atk-s0505a:521_18: “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā ettha ruciṃ uppādetvā kāmesu virajjeyyu”nti.
atk-s0505a:521_21: “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā ettha ruciṃ uppādetvā adosena dosaṃ vūpasameyyu”nti.
atk-s0505a:521_24: “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā ettha ruciṃ uppādetvā amohena mohaṃ vūpasameyyu”nti.
atk-s0505a:521_25: Iriyāpathavihārena pana na kadāci na viharati taṃ vinā attabhāvapariharaṇābhāvatoti.
atk-s0505a:522_0: Dakkhiṇāgirisminti yo so rājagahaṃ parivāretvā ṭhito giri,
atk-s0505a:522_4: Ekanāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāmeti ekanāḷāti tassa gāmassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0505a:523_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā aparājitapallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā
atk-s0505a:523_1: pavattitavaradhammacakko magadharaṭṭhe ekanāḷaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ upanissāya dakkhiṇāgirimahāvihāre brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0505a:523_4: Kho panāti idaṃ panettha nipātadvayaṃ padapūraṇamattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:523_6: Kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassāti so brāhmaṇo kasiyā jīvati,
atk-s0505a:523_15: balibaddānaṃ khandhesu ṭhapetvā yuge yottehi yojitāni hontīti attho.
atk-s0505a:524_10: sabbe setamālāhi sabbagandhasugandhehi pañcaṅgulikehi ca alaṅkatā paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgā sabbalakkhaṇasampannā,
atk-s0505a:524_15: Pañcasatā kassakapurisā sabbe ahatasetavatthanivatthā mālālaṅkatā dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭesu ṭhapitapupphacumbaṭakā
atk-s0505a:524_16: haritālamanosilālañchanujjalitagattabhāgā dasa dasa naṅgalā ekekagumbā hutvā gacchanti.
atk-s0505a:524_17: Naṅgalānaṃ sīsañca yugañca patodā ca suvaṇṇavinaddhā.
atk-s0505a:525_0: Brāhmaṇo pana pageva massukammaṃ kārāpetvā nhatvā sugandhagandhehi vilitto pañcasatagghanakaṃ vatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:525_1: nivāsetvā sahassagghanakaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā ekamekissā aṅguliyā dve dve katvā vīsati aṅgulimuddikāyo,
atk-s0505a:525_3: sīse ca brahmaveṭhanaṃ paṭimuñcitvā suvaṇṇamālaṃ kaṇṭhe katvā brāhmaṇagaṇaparivuto kammantaṃ vosāsati.
atk-s0505a:525_4: Athassa brāhmaṇī anekasatabhājanesu pāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā mahāsakaṭesu āropetvā gandhodakena nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā
atk-s0505a:525_6: Gehampissa sabbattha gandhehi suvilittaṃ pupphehi sukatabalikammaṃ,
atk-s0505a:525_7: khettañca tesu tesu ṭhānesu samussitapaṭākaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0505a:525_8: Parijanakammakārehi saha kammantaṃ osaṭaparisā aḍḍhateyyasahassā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:526_1: taṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ dhovāpetvā pāyāsassa pūretvā sappimadhuphāṇitādīni abhisaṅkharitvā naṅgalabalikammaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0505a:526_2: Brāhmaṇī pañca kassakasatāni suvaṇṇarajatakaṃsatambamayāni bhājanāni gahetvā nisinnāni suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ gahetvā pāyāsena parivisantī gacchati.
atk-s0505a:526_3: Brāhmaṇo pana balikammaṃ kārāpetvā rattasuvaṇṇabandhūpāhanāyo ārohitvā rattasuvaṇṇadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā “idha pāyāsaṃ detha,
atk-s0505a:526_6: Atha bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova brāhmaṇassa parivesanaṃ vattamānaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ kālo brāhmaṇaṃ dametu”nti nivāsetvā,
atk-s0505a:526_10: gandhakuṭito nikkhami yathā taṃ anuttaro purisadammasārathi.
atk-s0505a:526_11: Tenāha āyasmā ānando “atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā”ti.
atk-s0505a:527_0: Tattha atha iti nipāto aññādhikāravacanārambhe khoti padapūraṇe.
atk-s0505a:527_9: Na hi bhagavā tato pubbe anivattho āsi.
atk-s0505a:527_13: Bhagavato kira piṇḍāya pavisitukāmassa bhamaro viya vikasitapadumadvayamajjhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:527_15: Tasmā evamāgataṃ pattaṃ hatthehi sampaṭicchitvā cīvarañca parimaṇḍalaṃ pārutaṃ kāyena dhāretvāti evamassa attho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:527_16: Yena vā tena vā hi pakārena gaṇhanto ādāya icceva vuccati yathā “samādāyeva pakkamatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:528_4: yena maggena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto gammati,
atk-s0505a:528_8: yadā bhagavā ekakova katthaci upasaṅkamitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0505a:529_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yena samayena bhagavā kammantaṃ upasaṅkami,
atk-s0505a:529_1: tena samayena tassa brāhmaṇassa parivesanā vattati,
atk-s0505a:529_4: “brāhmaṇī pañca kassakasatāni suvaṇṇarajatakaṃsatambamayāni bhājanāni gahetvā nisinnāni suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ gahetvā pāyāsena parivisantī gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:529_5: Atha kho bhagavā yena parivesanā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0505a:529_8: Na hi bhagavā kapaṇapuriso viya bhottukāmatāya parivesanaṃ upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0505a:529_9: Bhagavato hi dve asītisahassasaṅkhyā sakyakoliyarājāno ñātayo,
atk-s0505a:529_10: te attano sampattiyā nibaddhabhattaṃ dātuṃ ussahanti.
atk-s0505a:529_12: apica kho pana “anekāni asaṅkhyeyyāni pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajanto pāramiyo pūretvā mutto mocessāmi,
atk-s0505a:529_18: parinibbāpento ca loke vicaranto brāhmaṇassa anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ yena parivesanā tenupasaṅkamīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:530_0: Upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsīti evaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ca ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:530_7: Ṭhatvā ca suvaṇṇarasapiñjaraṃ sahassacandasūriyobhāsātibhāsayamānaṃ sarīrābhaṃ muñci samantato asītihatthaparimāṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:530_8: yāya ajjhottharitattā brāhmaṇassa kammantasālābhittirukkhakasitamattikāpiṇḍādayo suvaṇṇamayā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:530_12: ādittamiva ca kanakagirisikharaṃ siriyā jalamānaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā hatthapāde dhovitvā añjaliṃ paggayha samparivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:530_13: Evaṃ tehi samparivāritaṃ addasa kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0505a:531_1: Kiṃ samantapāsādike pasādanīye uttamadamathasamathamanuppattepi bhagavati appasādena,
atk-s0505a:531_2: udāhu aḍḍhateyyānaṃ janasahassānaṃ pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādetvāpi kaṭacchubhikkhāya maccherenāti?
atk-s0505a:531_4: apica khvāssa bhagavato dassanena atittaṃ nikkhittakammantaṃ janaṃ disvā “kammabhaṅgaṃ me kātuṃ āgato”ti anattamanatā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:531_6: Bhagavato ca lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “sacāyaṃ kammante payojayissa,
atk-s0505a:531_7: sakalajambudīpe manussānaṃ sīse cūḷāmaṇi viya abhavissa,
atk-s0505a:531_9: evamevaṃ alasatāya kammante appayojetvā vappamaṅgalādīsu piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjanto kāyadaḷhībahulo vicaratī”tipissa ahosi. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:531_14: na camhi yathā tvaṃ evaṃ lakkhaṇasampannoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:531_17: ko te attho na sampajjeyya evaṃ lakkhaṇasampannassāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:532_3: Tasmā “idāni ayaṃ so”ti ñatvā “cakkavattirajjaṃ kira pahāya kilantosī”ti upārambhaṃ karonto āha “ahaṃ kho samaṇā”ti.
atk-s0505a:532_6: bhagavato pana rūpasampattiṃ disvā paññāsampattiṃ sambhāvayamāno kathāpavattanatthampi evamāha –
atk-s0505a:532_8: Tato bhagavā veneyyavasena sadevake loke aggakassakavappakabhāvaṃ attano dassento āha “ahampi kho brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0505a:533_2: Na cassa oḷārikāni yuganaṅgalādīni kasibhaṇḍāni passāmi,
atk-s0505a:533_4: no”ti bhagavantaṃ pādatalā paṭṭhāya yāva upari kesantā sammālokayamāno aṅgavijjāya katādhikārattā dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇasampattimassa
atk-s0505a:533_6: yaṃ evarūpo musā bhaṇeyyā”ti tāvadeva sañjātabahumāno bhagavati samaṇavādaṃ pahāya gottena bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:533_7: samudācaramāno āha “na kho pana mayaṃ passāma bhoto gotamassā”ti.
atk-s0505a:534_0: Evañca pana vatvā tikkhapañño brāhmaṇo “gambhīratthaṃ sandhāya iminā etaṃ vutta”nti ñatvā pucchitvā tamatthaṃ ñātukāmo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:534_1: Tenāha āyasmā ānando “atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsī”ti.
atk-s0505a:535_2: Bhagavā pana yasmā pubbadhammasabhāgena ropetvā kathanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo,
atk-s0505a:535_3: tasmā buddhānubhāvaṃ dīpento pubbadhammasabhāgena ropento āha –
atk-s0505a:535_6: nanu brāhmaṇena bhagavā yuganaṅgalādikasisambhārasamāyogaṃ pucchito atha ca pana apucchitassa bījassa sabhāgena ropento āha –
atk-s0505a:535_8: evañca sati ananusandhikāva ayaṃ kathā hotīti? Vuccate –
atk-s0505a:535_9: na buddhānaṃ ananusandhikā nāma kathā atthi,
atk-s0505a:535_12: anena hi brāhmaṇena bhagavā yuganaṅgalādikasisambhāravasena kasiṃ pucchito.
atk-s0505a:535_13: So tassa anukampāya “idaṃ apucchita”nti aparihāpetvā samūlaṃ saupakāraṃ sasambhāraṃ saphalaṃ kasiṃ ñāpetuṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya kasiṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0505a:535_15: Bījañhi kasiyā mūlaṃ tasmiṃ sati kattabbato,
atk-s0505a:535_20: Bījappamāṇena ca kusalā kassakā khettaṃ kasanti,
atk-s0505a:535_22: na adhikaṃ “mā no mogho vāyāmo ahosī”ti.
atk-s0505a:535_24: tasmā bhagavā mūlato paṭṭhāya kasiṃ dassento tassa brāhmaṇassa kasiyā pubbadhammassa bījassa sabhāgena attano kasiyā pubbadhammaṃ ropento āha –
atk-s0505a:536_0: Pucchitaṃyeva vatvā apucchitaṃ pacchā kiṃ na vuttanti ce?
atk-s0505a:536_4: Saddhāvirahito ca paññavā paresaṃ saddhāya attano visaye apaṭipajjamāno visesaṃ nādhigacchati,
atk-s0505a:536_5: kilesakālussiyabhāvāpagamappasādamattalakkhaṇāpi cassa dubbalā saddhā balavatiyā paññāya saha vattamānā atthasiddhiṃ na karoti,
atk-s0505a:536_8: Evaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa saupakārabhāvato taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ saddhāya patiṭṭhāpentena pacchāpi vattabbo ayamattho
atk-s0505a:536_9: pubbe vutto desanākusalatāya yathā aññatrāpi “saddhā bandhati pātheyya”nti ca,
atk-s0505a:536_19: Evaṃ dhammasambandhasamatthabhāvato pacchāpi vattabbo ayamattho pubbe vutto,
atk-s0505a:537_16: Taṃ sabbampi viruhanaṭṭhena bījaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:538_0: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa kasiyā mūlabhūtaṃ bījaṃ dve kiccāni karoti,
atk-s0505a:538_3: evaṃ bhagavato kasiyā mūlabhūtā saddhā heṭṭhā sīlamūlena patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0505a:538_5: Yathā ca taṃ mūlena pathavirasaṃ āporasaṃ gahetvā nāḷena dhaññaparipākagahaṇatthaṃ vaḍḍhati;
atk-s0505a:538_6: evamayaṃ sīlamūlena samathavipassanārasaṃ gahetvā ariyamagganāḷena ariyaphaladhaññaparipākagahaṇatthaṃ vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0505a:538_7: Yathā ca taṃ subhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā mūlaṅkurapaṇṇanāḷakaṇḍappasavehi vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā,
atk-s0505a:538_11: vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā ñāṇadassanavisuddhikhīraṃ janetvā anekapaṭisambhidābhiññābharitaṃ arahattaphalaṃ
atk-s0505a:539_0: Tattha siyā “paropaññāsakusaladhammesu ekato uppajjamānesu kasmā saddhāva bījanti vuttā”ti? Vuccate –
atk-s0505a:539_2: Yathā hi tesu viññāṇaṃyeva vijānanakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0505a:540_11: pahitatto samāno kāyena ceva paramasaccaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0505a:541_5: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa vassavuṭṭhisamanuggahitaṃ bījaṃ bījamūlakañca sassaṃ viruhati na milāyati nipphattiṃ gacchati,
atk-s0505a:541_6: evaṃ bhagavato indriyasaṃvarasamanuggahitā saddhā saddhāmūlā ca sīlādayo dhammā viruhanti na milāyanti nipphattiṃ gacchanti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:541_9: saddo imesupi padesu yojetabbo “saddhā me bījaṃ,
