atk-s0505a:541_18: Ayaṃ pana me satataṃ samitaṃ tapo vuṭṭhīti.
atk-s0505a:542_3: Idha pana saha vipassanāya maggapaññā adhippetā.
atk-s0505a:542_7: Tattha yathā yugaṃ īsāya upanissayaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:542_12: evaṃ paññā hiripamukhānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayā hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:542_16: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena purato ca hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:542_20: manosaṅkhātassa samādhiyottassa nissayapaccayato yottānaṃ nissayo hoti,
atk-s0505a:542_22: Yathā ca naṅgalaṃ phālayuttaṃ kasanakāle pathavighanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0505a:542_24: evaṃ satiyuttā paññā vipassanākāle dhammānaṃ santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0505a:542_26: Sā ca kho lokuttarāva itarā pana lokiyāpi siyā. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:543_1: sayaṃ vā hirīyati akusalappavattiṃ jigucchatīti hirī.
atk-s0505a:543_4: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa īsā yuganaṅgalaṃ sandhāreti,
atk-s0505a:543_5: evaṃ bhagavatopi hirī lokiyalokuttarapaññāsaṅkhātaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ sandhāreti hiriyā asati paññāya abhāvato.
atk-s0505a:543_6: Yathā ca īsāpaṭibaddhaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ kiccakaraṃ hoti acalaṃ asithilaṃ,
atk-s0505a:543_7: evaṃ hiripaṭibaddhā ca paññā kiccakārī hoti acalā asithilā abbokiṇṇā ahirikena.
atk-s0505a:544_2: Idha pana manosīsena taṃsampayutto samādhi adhippeto.
atk-s0505a:544_4: Taṃ tividhaṃ īsāya saha yugassa bandhanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:544_7: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa yottaṃ īsāyugabalibadde ekābaddhe katvā sakakicce paṭipādeti,
atk-s0505a:544_8: evaṃ bhagavato samādhi sabbeva te hiripaññāvīriyadhamme ekārammaṇe avikkhepabhāvena bandhitvā sakakicce paṭipādeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:545_9: evaṃ bhagavato vipassanāyuttā maggayuttā ca sati.
atk-s0505a:545_12: evaṃ sati kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānā ārammaṇe vā upaṭṭhāpayamānā paññānaṅgalaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0505a:545_17: Yathā ca pācanaṃ balibaddānaṃ vijjhanabhayaṃ dassentaṃ saṃsīdanaṃ na deti,
atk-s0505a:545_19: evaṃ sati vīriyabalibaddānaṃ apāyabhayaṃ dassentī kosajjasaṃsīdanaṃ na deti,
atk-s0505a:545_20: kāmaguṇasaṅkhāte agocare cāraṃ nivāretvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojentī uppathagamanañca vāreti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:546_4: Āhāre udare yatoti ettha āhāramukhena sabbapaccayānaṃ saṅgahitattā catubbidhepi paccaye yato saṃyato nirupakkilesoti attho.
atk-s0505a:546_6: Udare yatoti udare yato saṃyato mitabhojī,
atk-s0505a:546_11: bījaṃ vapitvā sassaparipālanatthaṃ kaṇṭakavatiṃ vā rukkhavatiṃ vā pākāraparikkhepaṃ vā karosi,
atk-s0505a:546_12: tena te gomahiṃsamigagaṇā pavesaṃ alabhantā sassaṃ na vilumpanti,
atk-s0505a:546_13: evamahampi saddhābījaṃ vapitvā nānappakārakusalasassaparipālanatthaṃ kāyavacīāhāraguttimayaṃ tividhaparikkhepaṃ karomi.
atk-s0505a:546_14: Tena me rāgādiakusaladhammagomahiṃsamigagaṇā pavesaṃ alabhantā nānappakārakusalasassaṃ na vilumpantīti.
atk-s0505a:547_0: Saccaṃ karomi niddānanti ettha dvīhi dvārehi avisaṃvādanaṃ saccaṃ.
atk-s0505a:547_5: Yathā tvaṃ bāhiraṃ kasiṃ kasitvā sassadūsakānaṃ tiṇānaṃ hatthena vā asitena vā niddānaṃ karosi;
atk-s0505a:547_6: evamahampi ajjhattikaṃ kasiṃ kasitvā kusalasassadūsakānaṃ visaṃvādanatiṇānaṃ saccena niddānaṃ karomi.
atk-s0505a:547_9: Tena attasaññādīnaṃ tiṇānaṃ niddānaṃ karomīti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:547_12: Evaṃ sante yathā tvaṃ dāsaṃ vā kammakaraṃ vā niddānaṃ karosi,
atk-s0505a:547_13: “niddehi tiṇānī”ti tiṇānaṃ chedakaṃ lāvakaṃ uppāṭakaṃ karosi;
atk-s0505a:547_14: evamahaṃ saccaṃ karomīti upayogavacaneneva vattuṃ yujjati.
atk-s0505a:547_17: chinditabbaṃ lunitabbaṃ uppāṭetabbaṃ karomīti evampi upayogavacaneneva vattuṃ yujjati.
atk-s0505a:548_0: Soraccaṃ me pamocananti ettha yaṃ taṃ “kāyiko avītikkamo,
atk-s0505a:548_6: Tampi hi sundare nibbāne ratabhāvato “soracca”nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:548_9: Yathā tava pamocanaṃ punapi sāyanhe vā dutiyadivase vā anāgatasaṃvacchare vā yojetabbato appamocanameva hoti,
atk-s0505a:548_11: Na hi mama antarā mocanaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0505a:548_12: Ahañhi dīpaṅkaradasabalakālato pabhuti paññānaṅgale vīriyabalibadde yojetvā cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca
atk-s0505a:548_15: Yadā ca me sabbaṃ taṃ kālaṃ khepetvā bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinnassa sabbaguṇaparivāraṃ arahattaphalaṃ udapādi,
atk-s0505a:549_1: Vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayhanti ettha vīriyanti “kāyiko vā,
atk-s0505a:549_5: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa dhurāyaṃ dhorayhākaḍḍhitaṃ naṅgalaṃ bhūmighanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0505a:549_7: evaṃ bhagavato vīriyākaḍḍhitaṃ paññānaṅgalaṃ yathāvuttaṃ ghanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0505a:549_13: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa ekamekasmiṃ naṅgale catubalibaddappabhedaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ vahantaṃ uppannānuppannatiṇamūlaghātaṃ sassasampattiñca sādheti,
atk-s0505a:549_14: evaṃ bhagavato catusammappadhānavīriyappabhedaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ vahantaṃ uppannānuppannākusalamūlaghātaṃ kusalasampattiñca sādheti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:550_0: Yogakkhemādhivāhananti ettha yogehi khemattā “yogakkhema”nti nibbānaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0505a:550_5: Yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ puratthimaṃ disaṃ pacchimādīsu vā aññataraṃ abhimukhaṃ vāhīyati,
atk-s0505a:551_1: Yathā tava naṅgalaṃ vahantaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ khettakoṭiṃ patvā puna nivattati,
atk-s0505a:551_3: Yasmā vā tena tena maggena pahīnā kilesā punappunaṃ pahātabbā na honti,
atk-s0505a:551_4: yathā tava naṅgalena chinnāni tiṇāni punapi aparasmiṃ samaye chinditabbāni honti,
atk-s0505a:551_9: Atha vā gacchati anivattanti nivattanarahitaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0505a:551_12: Evaṃ gacchantañca yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ na taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0505a:551_13: yattha gantvā kassako asoko nissoko virajo hutvā na socati,
atk-s0505a:551_16: Yattha satipācanena etaṃ vīriyadhuradhorayhaṃ codento gantvā mādiso kassako asoko nissoko virajo hutvā na socati,
atk-s0505a:552_0: 80. Idāni nigamanaṃ karonto bhagavā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0505a:555_1: mayā brāhmaṇa esā saddhābījā tapovuṭṭhiyā anuggahitā kasi,
atk-s0505a:555_10: soraccaṃ pamocanaṃ vīriyaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ yogakkhemābhimukhaṃ anivattantaṃ vāhentena kaṭṭhā,
atk-s0505a:555_16: Sā kho panesā kasi na mamevekassa amatapphalā hoti, apica, kho,
atk-s0505a:555_17: pana yo koci khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā etaṃ kasiṃ kasati,
atk-s0505a:555_21: Evaṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassa arahattanikūṭena nibbānapariyosānaṃ katvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:556_0: Tato brāhmaṇo gambhīratthaṃ desanaṃ sutvā “mama kasiphalaṃ bhuñjitvā aparajju eva chāto hoti,
atk-s0505a:556_2: tassā phalaṃ bhuñjitvā sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti ca viditvā pasanno pasannākāraṃ kātuṃ pāyāsaṃ dātumāraddho.
atk-s0505a:557_8: Nesa dhammoti “gāthābhigītaṃ bhuñjitabba”nti esa dhammo etaṃ cārittaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0505a:557_9: tasmā gāthābhigītaṃ panudanti buddhā paṭikkhipanti na bhuñjantīti.
atk-s0505a:557_10: Kiṃ pana bhagavatā pāyāsatthaṃ gāthā abhigītā,
atk-s0505a:557_13: pana pāto paṭṭhāya khettasamīpe ṭhatvā kaṭacchubhikkhampi alabhitvā puna sakalabuddhaguṇe pakāsetvā laddhaṃ
atk-s0505a:557_14: tadetaṃ naṭanaccakādīhi naccitvā gāyitvā ca laddhasadisaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:557_19: tasmāpi pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamānena ca evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:557_20: Yatra ca nāma parappakāsitenāpi attano guṇena uppannaṃ lābhaṃ paṭikkhipanti seyyathāpi appiccho ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro,
atk-s0505a:557_21: tatra kathaṃ koṭippattāya appicchatāya samannāgato bhagavā attanāva attano guṇappakāsanena uppannaṃ lābhaṃ sādiyissati,
atk-s0505a:558_0: Ettāvatā “appasannaṃ adātukāmaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gāthāgāyanena dātukāmaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:558_2: āmisakāraṇā imassa desanā”ti imamhā lokāpavādā attānaṃ mocento desanāpārisuddhiṃ dīpetvā,
atk-s0505a:558_3: idāni ājīvapārisuddhiṃ dīpento āha “dhamme satī brāhmaṇa vuttiresā”ti tassattho –
atk-s0505a:558_4: ājīvapārisuddhidhamme vā dasavidhasucaritadhamme vā buddhānaṃ cārittadhamme vā sati saṃvijjamāne anupahate
atk-s0505a:558_5: vattamāne vuttiresā ekantavodātā ākāse pāṇippasāraṇakappā esanā pariyesanā jīvitavutti buddhānaṃ brāhmaṇāti.
atk-s0505a:559_4: dānaṃ dātuṃ na labhāmī”ti domanassaṃ uppādetvā “appeva nāma aññaṃ paṭiggaṇheyyā”ti ca cintesi.
atk-s0505a:559_5: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā “ahaṃ bhikkhācāravelaṃ paricchinditvā āgato –
atk-s0505a:559_8: Idāni tena domanassena mayi cittaṃ pakopetvā amatavaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkhissatī”ti brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0505a:559_9: pasādajananatthaṃ tena patthitamanorathaṃ pūrento āha “aññena ca kevalina”nti.
atk-s0505a:559_16: Evaṃ brāhmaṇena citte uppāditepi pariyāyameva bhaṇati,
atk-s0505a:560_0: Atha brāhmaṇo “ayaṃ pāyāso bhagavato ānīto nāhaṃ arahāmi taṃ attano chandena kassaci dātu”nti cintetvā āha “atha kassa cāha”nti.
atk-s0505a:560_1: Tato bhagavā “taṃ pāyāsaṃ ṭhapetvā tathāgataṃ tathāgatasāvakañca aññassa ajīraṇadhammo”ti ñatvā āha –
atk-s0505a:560_5: sabrahmakavacanena rūpāvacarabrahmaggahaṇaṃ arūpāvacarā pana bhuñjeyyunti asambhāvaneyyā.
atk-s0505a:561_0: Kasmā pana sadevakādīsu kassaci na sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyyāti?
atk-s0505a:561_2: Imasmiñhi pāyāse bhagavantaṃ uddissa gahitamatteyeva devatāhi ojā pakkhittā yathā sujātāya pāyāse,
atk-s0505a:561_6: So oḷārike sukhumojāpakkhipanato devānaṃ na pariṇamati.
atk-s0505a:561_8: tesaṃ oḷāriko manussāhāro na sammā pariṇamati.
atk-s0505a:561_11: tesaṃ sukhumā dibbojā na sammā pariṇamati.
atk-s0505a:561_14: Kāyabalañāṇabalappabhāvenāti eke tathāgatasāvakassa khīṇāsavassetaṃ samādhibalena mattaññutāya ca pariṇamati,
atk-s0505a:562_0: Tena hi tvanti yasmā aññaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0505a:562_2: mama akappantaṃ sāvakassāpi me na kappati,
atk-s0505a:562_8: Saha tiṇanissitehi pāṇehi tiṇānaṃ pāṇakānañca anurakkhaṇatthāya etaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:562_18: Bhagavā hi brāhmaṇassa dhammasaṃvegatthaṃ tathā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:562_23: Sarīre kirassa navanavutilomakūpasahassāni suvaṇṇabhittiyā āhatamaṇināgadantā viya uddhaggā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:563_0: Pādesu pana nipatitvā bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “abhikkantaṃ,
atk-s0505a:563_5: Vitthārato panassa maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0505a:563_7: tasmā sādhu sādhu bho gotamāti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:565_0: Hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho”ti. –
atk-s0505a:566_0: Iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:567_6: abhikkantaṃ yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti.
atk-s0505a:567_7: Bhagavato eva vā vacanaṃ dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi –
atk-s0505a:568_0: Tato parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi.
atk-s0505a:568_7: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0505a:569_2: evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhammapatitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0505a:569_4: evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena,
atk-s0505a:569_9: mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi desitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
atk-s0505a:570_0: Atha vā ekacciyena mattena yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dukkhadassanena asubhe “subha”nti vipallāsappahānena ca nikkujjitukkujjitasadiso,
atk-s0505a:570_2: nirodhadassanena anicce “nicca”nti vipallāsappahānena ca mūḷhassa maggācikkhaṇasadiso,
atk-s0505a:570_3: maggadassanena anattani “attā”ti vipallāsappahānena ca andhakāre pajjotasadiso,
atk-s0505a:570_4: tasmā seyyathāpi nāma nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya…pe…
atk-s0505a:571_0: Yasmā panettha saddhātapakāyaguttatādīhi sīlakkhandho pakāsito hoti,
atk-s0505a:571_3: yogakkhemena nirodhoti evaṃ tikkhandho ariyamaggo nirodho cāti sarūpeneva dve ariyasaccāni pakāsitāni.
atk-s0505a:571_6: Iti iminā pariyāyena cattāri saccāni pakāsitāni.
atk-s0505a:572_1: Saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti pādesu nipatitvā paṇipātena saraṇagamanena gatopi idāni vācāya samādiyanto āha.
atk-s0505a:572_2: Atha vā paṇipātena buddhaṃyeva saraṇaṃ gatoti idāni taṃ ādiṃ katvā sese dhammasaṅghepi gantuṃ āha.
atk-s0505a:572_10: anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu jānātūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:572_11: Ettāvatā anena sutānurūpā paṭipatti dassitā hoti.
atk-s0505a:572_12: Nikkujjitādīhi vā satthusampattiṃ dassetvā iminā “esāha”ntiādinā sissasampatti dassitā.
atk-s0505a:572_13: Tena vā paññāpaṭilābhaṃ dassetvā iminā saddhāpaṭilābho dassito.
atk-s0505a:572_14: Idāni evaṃ paṭiladdhasaddhena paññavatā yaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:572_16: Tattha bhagavato iddhiyādīhi abhippasāditacitto “bhagavāpi cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito,
atk-s0505a:573_4: pahitatto kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya viharanto aññatarairiyāpathavihārena.
atk-s0505a:573_19: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:573_21: Upasampajja vihāsīti pāpuṇitvā sampādetvā vā vihāsi.
atk-s0505a:574_2: na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā,
atk-s0505a:574_5: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti,
atk-s0505a:574_6: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā.
atk-s0505a:574_7: Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ apaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto jānāti.
atk-s0505a:575_3: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-s0505a:575_4: Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanā natthīti.
atk-s0505a:575_6: imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ natthi.
atk-s0505a:575_7: Ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlako rukkho viyāti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0505a:575_10: Mahāsāvakānaṃ abbhantaro āyasmā bhāradvājo ahosīti ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyoti.
atk-s0505a:579_3: Saṅkhepato tāva attajjhāsayaparajjhāsayaaṭṭhuppattipucchāvasikabhedato catūsu uppattīsu imassa suttassa pucchāvasikā uppatti.
atk-s0505a:579_4: Vitthārato pana ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā mallesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ yena pāvā tadavasari.
atk-s0505a:579_5: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pāvāyaṃ viharati cundassa kammāraputtassa ambavane.
atk-s0505a:579_6: Ito pabhuti yāva “atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0505a:580_0: Evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ nisinne bhagavati cundo kammāraputto buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisanto
atk-s0505a:580_2: Apaññatte sikkhāpade keci bhikkhū suvaṇṇabhājanāni paṭicchiṃsu keci na paṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:580_3: Bhagavato pana ekameva bhājanaṃ attano selamayaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:580_5: Tattha aññataro pāpabhikkhu sahassagghanakaṃ suvaṇṇabhājanaṃ attano bhojanatthāya sampattaṃ theyyacittena kuñcikatthavikāya pakkhipi.
atk-s0505a:580_6: Cundo parivisitvā hatthapādaṃ dhovitvā bhagavantaṃ namassamāno bhikkhusaṅghaṃ olokento taṃ bhikkhuṃ addasa,
atk-s0505a:580_7: disvā ca pana apassamāno viya hutvā na naṃ kiñci abhaṇi bhagavati theresu ca gāravena,
atk-s0505a:580_10: udāhu bhinnasaṃvarā īdisāpi samaṇā”ti ñātukāmo sāyanhasamaye bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha “pucchāmi muni”nti.
atk-s0505a:581_0: Tattha pucchāmīti idaṃ “tisso pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā”tiādinā nayena niddese vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:581_6: tīṇi moneyyāni kāyamoneyya”ntiādinā nayena tattheva vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:581_8: Pucchāmīti okāsaṃ kārento muninti munimuniṃ bhagavantaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0505a:581_13: Iti cundo kammāraputtoti idaṃ dvayaṃ dhaniyasutte vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:581_14: Ito paraṃ pana ettakampi avatvā sabbaṃ vuttanayaṃ chaḍḍetvā avuttanayameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0505a:582_1: Dhammassāminti maggadhammassa janakattā puttasseva pitaraṃ attanā uppāditasippāyatanādīnaṃ viya ca ācariyaṃ dhammassa sāmiṃ,
atk-s0505a:583_6: Maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā”ti.
atk-s0505a:584_2: Tattha kiñcāpi bhagavā na kevalaṃ dvipaduttamo eva,
atk-s0505a:584_3: atha kho yāvatā sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā…pe…
atk-s0505a:584_7: Dvipadā hi sabbasattānaṃ ukkaṭṭhā cakkavattimahāsāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ tattha uppattito,
atk-s0505a:584_8: tesañca uttamoti vutte sabbasattuttamoti vuttoyeva hoti.
atk-s0505a:584_11: Tesañca bhagavā pavaro anuttarena damanena purisadamme dametuṃ samatthabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:585_2: hatthidammo sārito ekaṃ eva disaṃ dhāvati puratthimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā.
atk-s0505a:585_12: arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisadammo sārito aṭṭha disā vidhāvati,
atk-s0505a:587_1: Evaṃ vutte bhagavā cundaṃ kammāraputtaṃ “kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ,
atk-s0505a:587_2: kiṃ akusala”ntiādinā nayena gihipañhaṃ apucchitvā samaṇapañhaṃ pucchantaṃ disvā āvajjento “taṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ
atk-s0505a:587_3: sandhāya ayaṃ pucchatī”ti ñatvā tassa aññatra vohāramattā assamaṇabhāvaṃ dīpento āha “caturo samaṇā”ti.
atk-s0505a:587_5: Samaṇāti kadāci bhagavā titthiye samaṇavādena vadati; yathāha –
atk-s0505a:587_20: Idha pana tīhi padehi sabbepi ariye sīlavantaṃ puthujjanañca,
atk-s0505a:587_21: catutthena itaraṃ assamaṇampi bhaṇḍuṃ kāsāvakaṇṭhaṃ kevalaṃ vohāramattakena samaṇoti saṅgaṇhitvā “caturo samaṇā”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:587_22: Na pañcamatthīti imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vohāramattakena paṭiññāmattakenāpi pañcamo samaṇo nāma natthi.
atk-s0505a:588_0: Te te āvikaromīti te caturo samaṇe tava pākaṭe karomi.
atk-s0505a:588_4: Magge jīvatīti sattasu sekkhesu yo koci sekkho apariyositamaggavāsattā lokuttare,
atk-s0505a:588_5: sīlavantaputhujjano ca lokiye magge jīvati nāma,
atk-s0505a:588_6: sīlavantaputhujjano vā lokuttaramagganimittaṃ jīvanatopi magge jīvatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:588_7: Yo ca maggadūsīti yo ca dussīlo micchādiṭṭhi maggapaṭilomāya paṭipattiyā maggadūsakoti attho.
atk-s0505a:589_1: “Ime te caturo samaṇā”ti evaṃ bhagavatā saṅkhepena uddiṭṭhe caturo samaṇe “ayaṃ nāmettha maggajino,
atk-s0505a:589_4: ayaṃ maggadūsī”ti evaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asakkonto puna pucchituṃ cundo āha “kaṃ maggajina”nti.
atk-s0505a:589_5: Tattha magge jīvati meti yo so magge jīvati,
atk-s0505a:590_1: Idānissa bhagavā caturopi samaṇe catūhi gāthāhi niddisanto āha “yo tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo”ti.
atk-s0505a:590_2: Tattha tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visalloti etaṃ uragasutte vuttanayameva.
atk-s0505a:590_4: Yasmā imāya gāthāya maggajinoti buddhasamaṇo adhippeto,
atk-s0505a:590_5: tasmā sabbaññutaññāṇena kathaṃkathāpatirūpakassa sabbadhammesu aññāṇassa tiṇṇattāpi “tiṇṇakathaṃkatho”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:590_6: Pubbe vuttanayena hi tiṇṇakathaṃkathāpi sotāpannādayo paccekabuddhapariyosānā sakadāgāmivisayādīsu buddhavisayapariyosānesu
atk-s0505a:591_3: tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi,
atk-s0505a:592_1: Lokassa sadevakassa netāti āsayānusayānulomena dhammaṃ desetvā pārāyanamahāsamayādīsu anekesu suttantesu
atk-s0505a:592_2: aparimāṇānaṃ devamanussānaṃ saccapaṭivedhasampādanena sadevakassa lokassa netā, gamayitā, tāretā,
atk-s0505a:593_1: Evaṃ bhagavā imāya gāthāya “maggajina”nti buddhasamaṇaṃ niddisitvā idāni khīṇāsavasamaṇaṃ niddisanto āha “paramaṃ paramantī”ti.
atk-s0505a:593_4: Paramanti yodha ñatvāti taṃ paramaṃ paramamicceva yo idha sāsane ñatvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena.
atk-s0505a:593_5: Akkhāti vibhajate idheva dhammanti nibbānadhammaṃ akkhāti,
atk-s0505a:593_6: attanā paṭividdhattā paresaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti “idaṃ nibbāna”nti,
atk-s0505a:593_11: Evaṃ ācikkhanto vibhajanto ca “idheva sāsane ayaṃ dhammo,
atk-s0505a:593_12: na ito bahiddhā”ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto akkhāti ca vibhajati ca.
atk-s0505a:593_14: Taṃ kaṅkhachidaṃ muniṃ anejanti taṃ evarūpaṃ catusaccapaṭivedhena attano,
atk-s0505a:593_17: ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya abhāvato anejaṃ dutiyaṃ bhikkhunamāhu maggadesinti.
atk-s0505a:594_1: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya sayaṃ anuttaraṃ maggaṃ uppādetvā desanāya anuttaro maggadesī samānopi dūtamiva lekhavācakamiva
atk-s0505a:594_2: ca rañño attano sāsanaharaṃ sāsanajotakañca “maggadesi”nti khīṇāsavasamaṇaṃ niddisitvā idāni sekkhasamaṇañca
atk-s0505a:594_7: ubho ante anupagamma desitattā āsayānurūpato vā satipaṭṭhānādinānappakārehi desitattā sudesite,
atk-s0505a:594_10: kāyādīsu sūpaṭṭhitāya cirakatādisaraṇāya vā satiyā satimā,
atk-s0505a:594_12: koṭṭhāsabhāvena ca padattā sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhātāni anavajjapadāni bhaṅgañāṇato pabhuti bhāvanāsevanāya sevamāno,
atk-s0505a:595_1: Evaṃ bhagavā imāya gāthāya “maggajīvi”nti sekkhasamaṇaṃ sīlavantaputhujjanasamaṇañca niddisitvā idāni
atk-s0505a:595_2: taṃ bhaṇḍuṃ kāsāvakaṇṭhaṃ kevalaṃ vohāramattasamaṇaṃ niddisanto āha “chadanaṃ katvānā”ti.
atk-s0505a:595_11: Dussīlo hi gūthapaṭicchādanatthaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādicchadanaṃ viya attano dussīlabhāvaṃ paṭicchādanatthaṃ subbatānaṃ
atk-s0505a:595_13: “ettakavassena bhikkhunā gahetabbaṃ eta”nti lābhe dīyamāne “ahaṃ ettakavasso”ti gaṇhituṃ pakkhandati,
atk-s0505a:595_15: Catunnampi khattiyādikulānaṃ uppannaṃ pasādaṃ ananurūpapaṭipattiyā dūsetīti kuladūsako.
atk-s0505a:596_3: Yathā hi palāpo anto taṇḍularahitopi bahi thusena vīhi viya dissati,
atk-s0505a:596_4: evamidhekacco anto sīlādiguṇasāravirahitopi bahi subbatacchadanena samaṇavesena samaṇo viya dissati.
atk-s0505a:596_10: suddhā sāre patiṭṭhitā”ti evaṃ puthujjanakalyāṇopi “palāpo”ti vutto.
atk-s0505a:596_11: Idha pana kapilasutte ca “tato palāpe vāhetha,
atk-s0505a:596_13: Patirūpena caraṃ samaggadūsīti taṃ subbatānaṃ chadanaṃ katvā yathā carantaṃ “āraññiko ayaṃ rukkhamūliko,
atk-s0505a:596_17: evaṃ patirūpena yuttarūpena bāhiramaṭṭhena ācārena caranto puggalo attano lokuttaramaggassa,
atk-s0505a:597_1: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya “maggadūsī”ti dussīlaṃ vohāramattakasamaṇaṃ niddisitvā idāni tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ abyāmissībhāvaṃ dīpento āha “ete ca paṭivijjhī”ti.
atk-s0505a:597_3: ete caturo samaṇe yathāvuttena lakkhaṇena paṭivijjhi aññāsi sacchākāsi yo gahaṭṭho khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā añño vā koci,
atk-s0505a:597_5: tasseva lakkhaṇassa ariyānaṃ santike sutattā ariyasāvako,
atk-s0505a:597_6: teyeva samaṇe “ayañca ayañca evaṃlakkhaṇo”ti pajānanamattena sappañño,
atk-s0505a:597_8: itarepi sabbe netādisāti ñatvā iti disvā evaṃ pāpaṃ karontampi etaṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ disvā.
atk-s0505a:597_10: ete ca paṭivijjhi yo gahaṭṭho sutavā ariyasāvako sappañño,
atk-s0505a:597_11: tassa tāya paññāya sabbe “netādisā”ti ñatvā viharato iti disvā na hāpeti saddhā,
atk-s0505a:597_12: evaṃ pāpakammaṃ karontaṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ disvāpi na hāpeti,
atk-s0505a:598_0: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya tesaṃ abyāmissībhāvaṃ dīpetvā idāni iti disvāpi “sabbe netādisā”ti jānantaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ pasaṃsanto āha “kathañhi duṭṭhenā”ti.
atk-s0505a:598_3: yadidaṃ ekaccaṃ pāpaṃ karontaṃ iti disvāpi sabbe “netādisā”ti jānanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:598_9: sīlavipattiyā duṭṭhena maggadūsinā aduṭṭhaṃ itaraṃ samaṇattayaṃ,
atk-s0505a:598_10: suddhaṃ samaṇattayamevaṃ aparisuddhakāyasamācāratādīhi asuddhena pacchimena vohāramattakasamaṇena samaṃ kareyya sadisanti jāneyyāti.
atk-s0505a:598_11: Suttapariyosāne upāsakassa maggo vā phalaṃ vā na kathitaṃ.
atk-s0505a:602_3: “bhagavatā maṅgalasutte sattānaṃ vuḍḍhiñca sotthiñca kathayamānena ekaṃsena bhavo eva kathito,
atk-s0505a:602_5: Handa dāni yena sattā parihāyanti vinassanti,
atk-s0505a:602_7: Atha maṅgalasuttaṃ kathitadivasato dutiyadivase dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatāyo parābhavasuttaṃ sotukāmā
atk-s0505a:602_8: imasmiṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā ekavālaggakoṭiokāsamatte dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi
atk-s0505a:602_9: saṭṭhipi sattatipi asītipi sukhumattabhāve nimminitvā sabbadevamārabrahmāno siriyā ca tejena ca adhigayha
atk-s0505a:602_10: virocamānaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:602_11: Tato sakkena devānamindena āṇatto aññataro devaputto bhagavantaṃ parābhavapañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:603_0: Tattha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādi āyasmatā ānandena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:603_1: “Parābhavantaṃ purisa”ntiādinā nayena ekantarikā gāthā devaputtena vuttā,
atk-s0505a:603_2: “suvijāno bhavaṃ hotī”tiādinā nayena ekantarikā eva avasānagāthā ca bhagavatā vuttā,
atk-s0505a:604_1: Parābhavantaṃ purisantiādīsu pana parābhavantanti parihāyantaṃ vinassantaṃ.
atk-s0505a:604_3: Mayaṃ pucchāma gotamāti sesadevehi saddhiṃ attānaṃ nidassetvā okāsaṃ kārento so devaputto gottena bhagavantaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0505a:604_4: Bhavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgammāti mayañhi bhavantaṃ pucchissāmāti tato tato cakkavāḷā āgatāti attho.
atk-s0505a:604_6: Kiṃ parābhavato mukhanti evaṃ āgatānaṃ amhākaṃ brūhi parābhavato purisassa kiṃ mukhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:604_9: yena mayaṃ parābhavantaṃ purisaṃ jāneyyāmāti attho.
atk-s0505a:604_10: Etena “parābhavantaṃ purisa”nti ettha vuttassa parābhavato purisassa parābhavakāraṇaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0505a:604_11: Parābhavakāraṇe hi ñāte tena kāraṇasāmaññena sakkā yo koci parābhavapuriso jānitunti.
atk-s0505a:605_1: Athassa bhagavā suṭṭhu pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ dassetvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya parābhavamukhaṃ dīpento āha “suvijāno bhava”nti.
atk-s0505a:605_8: yassa tumhe parābhavato purisassa mukhaṃ maṃ pucchatha,
atk-s0505a:605_10: Ayañhi dhammakāmo bhavaṃ hoti dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ kāmeti, piheti, pattheti, suṇāti,
atk-s0505a:605_12: so taṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā sutvā ca jānitabbato suvijāno hoti.
atk-s0505a:605_20: so taṃ vippaṭipattiṃ disvā sutvā ca jānitabbato suvijāno hotīti.
atk-s0505a:605_21: Evamettha bhagavā paṭipakkhaṃ dassento atthato dhammakāmataṃ bhavato mukhaṃ dassetvā dhammadessitaṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:606_1: Atha sā devatā bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandamānā āha “iti heta”nti.
atk-s0505a:606_5: paṭhamo so parābhavo so dhammadessitālakkhaṇo paṭhamo parābhavo.
atk-s0505a:606_7: tesu idaṃ tāva ekaṃ parābhavamukhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:606_13: atthato pana parābhavoti vā parābhavato mukhanti vā nānākaraṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0505a:606_14: Evamekaṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ vijānāmāti abhinanditvā tato paraṃ ñātukāmatāyāha “dutiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi,
atk-s0505a:606_16: Ito parañca tatiyaṃ catutthantiādīsupi imināva nayenattho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:607_1: Byākaraṇapakkhepi ca yasmā te te sattā tehi tehi parābhavamukhehi samannāgatā,
atk-s0505a:607_4: tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ tāni tāni parābhavamukhāni dassetuṃ “asantassa piyā hontī”tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0505a:607_5: eva desanāya nānāvidhāni parābhavamukhāni byākāsīti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:608_2: ye vā panaññepi avūpasantena kāyavacīmanokammena samannāgatā,
atk-s0505a:608_3: te asanto assapiyā honti sunakkhattādīnaṃ acelakakorakhattiyādayo viya.
atk-s0505a:608_5: Ye vā panaññepi vūpasantena kāyavacīmanokammena samannāgatā,
atk-s0505a:608_7: attano piye iṭṭhe kante manāpe na kuruteti attho.
atk-s0505a:608_9: Atha vā sante na kuruteti sante na sevatīti attho,
atk-s0505a:608_10: yathā “rājānaṃ sevatī”ti etasmiñhi atthe rājānaṃ piyaṃ kuruteti saddavidū mantenti.
atk-s0505a:608_16: Taṃ asataṃ dhammaṃ roceti, piheti, pattheti, sevati.
atk-s0505a:608_20: Etena hi samannāgato puriso parābhavati parihāyati,
atk-s0505a:608_21: neva idha na huraṃ vuḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0505a:609_8: aññehi codiyamāno gahaṭṭho vā samāno gahaṭṭhakammaṃ,
atk-s0505a:609_11: accantābhibhūto thinena ṭhitaṭṭhāne ṭhito eva hoti,
atk-s0505a:609_13: attano ussāhena aññaṃ iriyāpathaṃ na kappeti.
atk-s0505a:609_14: Atīte araññe aggimhi uṭṭhite apalāyanaalasā cettha nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:609_16: tato lāmakaparicchedenāpi pana alaso alasotveva veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:609_20: Dosacarito khippakopī arukūpamacitto puggalo evarūpo hoti.
atk-s0505a:609_25: Etena hi samannāgato neva gahaṭṭho gahaṭṭhavuḍḍhiṃ,
atk-s0505a:610_4: Gatayobbanaṃ yobbanātikkamena āsītikaṃ vā nāvutikaṃ vā sayaṃ kammāni kātumasamatthaṃ.
atk-s0505a:610_5: Pahu santoti samattho samāno sukhaṃ jīvamāno.
atk-s0505a:612_0: Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatī”ti. –
atk-s0505a:613_3: kaṃ aññaṃ bharissatī”ti nindañca vajjanīyatañca duggatiñca pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva,
atk-s0505a:614_7: paccayenā”ti pavāretvā yācito vā paṭijānitvā pacchā appadānena tassa taṃ āsaṃ visaṃvādeti.
atk-s0505a:614_8: Imāya gāthāya brāhmaṇādīnaṃ musāvādena vañcanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:617_2: dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
atk-s0505a:619_2: ekacco samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pavāreti, ‘vada, bhante,
atk-s0505a:619_6: So ce tato cuto itthattaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0505a:619_12: So ce tato cuto itthattaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0505a:620_0: Evamimāni nindādīni pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva, tasmā “parābhavato mukha”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:621_4: Eko bhuñjati sādūnīti sādūni bhojanāni attano puttānampi adatvā paṭicchannokāse bhuñjatīti eko bhuñjati sādūni.
atk-s0505a:621_5: Imāya gāthāya bhojanagiddhatāya bhojanamacchariyaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:621_6: Etena hi samannāgato nindaṃ vajjanīyaṃ duggatinti evamādīni pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva,
atk-s0505a:621_9: ativitthārabhayena pana idāni yojanānayaṃ adassetvā atthamattameva bhaṇāma.
atk-s0505a:622_1: Jātitthaddho nāma yo “ahaṃ jātisampanno”ti mānaṃ janetvā tena thaddho vātapūritabhastā viya uddhumāto hutvā na kassaci onamati.
atk-s0505a:622_3: Saññātiṃ atimaññetīti attano ñātimpi jātiyā atimaññati sakyā viya viṭaṭūbhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:623_3: taṃ sabbampi datvā aparāparaṃ itthiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
atk-s0505a:623_4: Tathā sabbampi attano santakaṃ nikkhipitvā surāpānapayutto surādhutto.
atk-s0505a:623_6: Etehi tīhi ṭhānehi yaṃkiñcipi laddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:623_7: tassa vināsanato laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vināsetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:623_9: tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya tividhaṃ parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:624_2: Yo attano dārehi asantuṭṭho hutvā vesiyāsu padussati,
atk-s0505a:624_4: so yasmā vesīnaṃ dhanappadānena paradārasevanena ca rājadaṇḍādīhi parābhavatiyeva,
atk-s0505a:624_5: tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya duvidhaṃ parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:625_1: Atītayobbanoti yobbanamaticca āsītiko vā nāvutiko vā hutvā āneti pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0505a:625_3: Tassā issā na supatīti “daharāya mahallakena saddhiṃ rati ca saṃvāso ca amanāpo,
atk-s0505a:625_4: mā heva kho taruṇaṃ pattheyyā”ti issāya taṃ rakkhanto na supati.
atk-s0505a:625_5: So yasmā kāmarāgena ca issāya ca ḍayhanto bahiddhā kammante ca appayojento parābhavatiyeva,
atk-s0505a:625_6: tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya imaṃ issāya asupanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:626_2: Vikiraṇinti tesaṃ atthāya dhanaṃ paṃsukaṃ viya vikiritvā nāsanasīlaṃ.
atk-s0505a:626_3: Purisaṃ vāpi tādisanti puriso vāpi yo evarūpo hoti,
atk-s0505a:626_5: lañchanamuddikādīni datvā gharāvāse kammante vā vaṇijjādivohāresu vā tadeva vāvaṭaṃ kāreti.
atk-s0505a:626_6: So yasmā tassa dosena dhanakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva,
atk-s0505a:626_7: tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya tathāvidhassa issariyasmiṃ ṭhapanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:627_1: Appabhogo nāma sannicitānañca bhogānaṃ āyamukhassa ca abhāvato.
atk-s0505a:627_5: Khattiye jāyate kuleti khattiyānaṃ kule jāyati.
atk-s0505a:627_6: So ca rajjaṃ patthayatīti so etāya mahātaṇhatāya anupāyena uppaṭipāṭiyā attano dāyajjabhūtaṃ alabbhaneyyaṃ vā parasantakaṃ rajjaṃ pattheti,
atk-s0505a:627_7: so evaṃ patthento yasmā tampi appakaṃ bhogaṃ yodhājīvādīnaṃ datvā rajjaṃ apāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva,
atk-s0505a:627_8: tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya rajjapatthanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:628_1: Ito paraṃ yadi sā devatā “terasamaṃ bhagavā brūhi…pe…
atk-s0505a:628_4: Yasmā pana sā devatā “kiṃ imehi pucchitehi,
atk-s0505a:628_5: ekamettha vuḍḍhikaraṃ natthī”ti tāni parābhavamukhāni asuyyamānā ettakampi pucchitvā vippaṭisārī hutvā tuṇhī ahosi,
atk-s0505a:628_6: tasmā bhagavā tassāsayaṃ viditvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpento imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “ete parābhave loke”ti.
atk-s0505a:629_5: pana etasmiṃ parābhavasaṅkhāte anaye na iriyatīti ariyo.
atk-s0505a:629_6: Yena dassanena yāya paññāya parābhave disvā vivajjeti,
atk-s0505a:629_8: Sa lokaṃ bhajate sivanti so evarūpo sivaṃ khemamuttamamanupaddavaṃ devalokaṃ bhajati, allīyati,
atk-s0505a:629_10: Desanāpariyosāne parābhavamukhāni sutvā uppannasaṃvegānurūpaṃ yoniso padahitvā sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiphalāni pattā devatā gaṇanaṃ vītivattā. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:637_3: Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
atk-s0505a:637_4: Kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayena pacchābhattakiccāvasāne buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento aggikabhāradvājaṃ
atk-s0505a:637_5: brāhmaṇaṃ saraṇasikkhāpadānaṃ upanissayasampannaṃ disvā “tattha mayi gate kathā pavattissati,
atk-s0505a:637_6: tato kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā esa brāhmaṇo saraṇaṃ gantvā sikkhāpadāni samādiyissatī”ti ñatvā,
atk-s0505a:637_8: pavattāya kathāya brāhmaṇena dhammadesanaṃ yācito imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:637_10: “atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamaya”ntiādi kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:638_0: Tena kho pana samayena aggikabhāradvājassāti yaṃ yaṃ avuttapubbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:638_3: so hi brāhmaṇo aggiṃ juhati paricaratīti katvā aggikoti nāmena pākaṭo ahosi,
atk-s0505a:638_7: Tassa kira brāhmaṇassa nivesanadvāre antaravīthiyaṃ aggihutasālā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:638_8: Tato “nivesanadvāre”ti vattabbe tassapi padesassa nivesaneyeva pariyāpannattā “nivesane”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:638_11: Aggi pajjalito hotīti aggiyādhāne ṭhito aggi katabbhuddharaṇo samidhāpakkhepaṃ bījanavātañca labhitvā jalito uddhaṃ samuggataccisamākulo hoti.
atk-s0505a:638_12: Āhuti paggahitāti sasīsaṃ nhāyitvā mahatā sakkārena pāyāsasappimadhuphāṇitādīni abhisaṅkhatāni hontīti attho.
atk-s0505a:638_16: Bhagavā hi sabbajanānuggahatthāya āhārasantuṭṭhiyā ca uccanīcakulaṃ avokkamma piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0505a:639_0: Atha kimatthaṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ samantapāsādikaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā brāhmaṇassa cittaṃ nappasīdati?
atk-s0505a:639_1: Kasmā ca evaṃ pharusena vacanena bhagavantaṃ samudācaratīti? Vuccate –
atk-s0505a:639_2: ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇo “maṅgalakiccesu samaṇadassanaṃ avamaṅgala”nti evaṃdiṭṭhiko,
atk-s0505a:639_3: tato “mahābrahmuno bhuñjanavelāya kāḷakaṇṇī muṇḍakasamaṇako mama nivesanaṃ upasaṅkamatī”ti mantvā cittaṃ nappasādesi,
atk-s0505a:639_5: Atha kuddho anattamano anattamanavācaṃ nicchāresi “tatreva muṇḍakā”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:639_6: Tatrāpi ca yasmā “muṇḍo asuddho hotī”ti brāhmaṇānaṃ diṭṭhi,
atk-s0505a:639_8: tena devabrāhmaṇapūjako na hotī”ti jigucchanto “muṇḍakā”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:639_10: na imaṃ padesaṃ arahati āgacchitunti samaṇo hutvāpi īdisaṃ kāyakilesaṃ na vaṇṇetīti ca samaṇabhāvaṃ jigucchanto “samaṇakā”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:639_12: vasale vā pabbājetvā tehi saddhiṃ ekato sambhogaparibhogakaraṇena patito ayaṃ vasalatopi pāpataroti jigucchanto “vasalakā”ti āha –
atk-s0505a:639_13: “vasalajātikānaṃ vā āhutidassanamattasavanena pāpaṃ hotī”ti maññamānopi evamāha.
atk-s0505a:640_0: Bhagavā tathā vuttopi vippasanneneva mukhavaṇṇena madhurena sarena brāhmaṇassa upari anukampāsītalena
atk-s0505a:640_1: cittena attano sabbasattehi asādhāraṇatādibhāvaṃ pakāsento āha “jānāsi pana,
atk-s0505a:640_3: Atha brāhmaṇo bhagavato mukhappasādasūcitaṃ tādibhāvaṃ ñatvā anukampāsītalena cittena nicchāritaṃ madhurassaraṃ
atk-s0505a:640_4: sutvā amateneva abhisittahadayo attamano vippasannindriyo nihatamāno hutvā taṃ jātisabhāvaṃ visauggirasadisaṃ
atk-s0505a:640_5: samudācāravacanaṃ pahāya “nūna yamahaṃ hīnajaccaṃ vasalanti paccemi,
atk-s0505a:640_7: na ca hīnajaccatā eva vasalakaraṇo dhammo”ti maññamāno “na khvāhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:640_10: yaṃ hetusampanno paccayālābhena pharusopi samāno laddhamatte paccaye muduko hotīti.
atk-s0505a:641_2: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu hi āyācane. “Sādhu,
atk-s0505a:641_3: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane. “Sādhu, sādhu,
atk-s0505a:644_0: Ādīsu sundare. “Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”tiādīsu daḷhīkamme. Idha pana āyācane.
atk-s0505a:645_3: tassa yasmā ñātukāmosi, tasmā, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi,
atk-s0505a:645_6: yathā tvaṃ jānissasīti evaṃ parapadehi saddhiṃ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:645_8: sādhukaṃ manasi karohīti manasikāre daḷhīkammaniyojanena manindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0505a:645_17: Sādhukapadaṃ vā ubhayapadehi yojetvā “yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dhammagambhīro ca desanāgambhīro ca,
atk-s0505a:645_20: tasmā sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”ti etamatthaṃ dīpento āha –
atk-s0505a:646_0: Tato “evaṃ gambhīre kathamahaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ labhissāmī”ti visīdantamiva taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ samussāhento āha –
atk-s0505a:646_3: tathā parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi uttānena nayena bhāsissāmī”ti evamadhippāyo veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:646_4: Tato ussāhajāto hutvā “evaṃ bho”ti kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi,
atk-s0505a:646_7: Athassa “bhagavā etadavocā”ti idāni vattabbaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “kodhano upanāhī”ti evamādikaṃ.
atk-s0505a:647_2: Upanāhīti tasseva kodhassa daḷhīkammena upanāhena samannāgato.
atk-s0505a:647_4: pāpo ca so makkhī cāti pāpamakkhī.
atk-s0505a:647_6: vipannāya vā virūpaṃ gatāya dasavatthukāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0505a:647_8: Taṃ jaññā vasalo itīti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ etesaṃ hīnadhammānaṃ vassanato siñcanato anvāssavanato “vasalo”ti jāneyyāti,
atk-s0505a:647_13: Evamettha bhagavā ādipadeneva tassa brāhmaṇassa kodhaniggahaṃ katvā “kodhādidhammo hīnapuggalo”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0505a:647_14: ca desanāya kodhādidhamme desento ekena tāva pariyāyena vasalañca vasalakaraṇe ca dhamme desesi.
atk-s0505a:647_15: Evaṃ desento ca “tvaṃ aha”nti paravambhanaṃ attukkaṃsanañca akatvā dhammeneva samena ñāyena taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vasalabhāve,
atk-s0505a:648_1: Idāni yāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ diṭṭhi “kadāci pāṇātipātaadinnādānādīni karontopi brāhmaṇo evā”ti.
atk-s0505a:648_3: ye ca sattavihiṃsādīsu akusaladhammesu tehi tehi samannāgatā ādīnavaṃ apassantā te dhamme uppādenti,
atk-s0505a:648_4: tesaṃ “hīnā ete dhammā vasalakaraṇā”ti tattha ādīnavañca dassento aparehipi pariyāyehi vasalañca vasalakaraṇe
atk-s0505a:648_5: ca dhamme desetuṃ “ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vā”ti evamādigāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:649_3: So hi mātukucchito aṇḍakosato cāti dvikkhattuṃ jāyati.
atk-s0505a:649_6: Vihiṃsatīti kāyadvārikacetanāsamuṭṭhitena vā vacīdvārikacetanāsamuṭṭhitena vā payogena jīvitā voropeti.
atk-s0505a:649_8: Tattha ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vāti evaṃpabhedāni yodha pāṇāni hiṃsatīti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:649_9: Yassa pāṇe dayā natthīti etena manasā anukampāya abhāvaṃ āha.
atk-s0505a:649_12: yato ettakampi avatvā ito paraṃ uttānatthāni padāni pariharantā avaṇṇitapadavaṇṇanāmattameva karissāma.
atk-s0505a:650_5: Niggāhako samaññātoti iminā hananaparirundhanena gāmanigamanagaraghātakoti loke vidito.
atk-s0505a:651_1: Gāme vā yadi vāraññeti gāmopi nigamopi nagarampi sabbova idha gāmo saddhiṃ upacārena,
atk-s0505a:651_3: Tasmiṃ gāme vā yadi vāraññe yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:651_4: yaṃ parasattānaṃ pariggahitamapariccattaṃ satto vā saṅkhāro vā.
atk-s0505a:651_5: Theyyā adinnamādetīti tehi adinnaṃ ananuññātaṃ theyyacittena ādiyati,
atk-s0505a:651_6: yena kenaci payogena yena kenaci avahārena attano gahaṇaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0505a:652_1: Iṇamādāyāti attano santakaṃ kiñci nikkhipitvā nikkhepaggahaṇena vā,
atk-s0505a:652_2: kiñci anikkhipitvā “ettakena kālena ettakaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ dassāmī”ti vaḍḍhiggahaṇena vā,
atk-s0505a:652_4: taṃ mayhaṃ mūlaṃ taveva bhavissatī”ti vā “udayaṃ ubhinnampi sādhāraṇa”nti vā evaṃ taṃtaṃāyogaggahaṇena vā iṇaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0505a:652_5: Cujjamāno palāyati na hi te iṇamatthīti tena iṇāyikena “dehi me iṇa”nti codiyamāno “na hi te iṇamatthi,
atk-s0505a:652_6: mayā gahitanti ko sakkhī”ti evaṃ bhaṇanena ghare vasantopi palāyati.
atk-s0505a:653_2: Panthasmiṃ vajantaṃ jananti magge gacchantaṃ yaṃkiñci itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā.
atk-s0505a:653_3: Hantvā kiñcikkhamādetīti māretvā koṭṭetvā taṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0505a:654_3: Dhanahetūti sakadhanassa vā paradhanassa vā kāraṇā. Ca-
atk-s0505a:654_7: Musā brūtīti jānanto vā “na jānāmī”ti ajānanto vā “jānāmī”ti bhaṇati,
atk-s0505a:655_6: Sampiyenāti tehi tesaṃ dārehi patthiyamāno sayañca patthayamāno,
atk-s0505a:656_1: Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vāti evaṃ mettāya padaṭṭhānabhūtampi,
atk-s0505a:656_3: Pahu santo na bharatīti atthasampanno upakaraṇasampanno hutvāpi na poseti.
atk-s0505a:657_2: Hantīti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā aññena vā kenaci paharati.
atk-s0505a:658_4: Paṭicchannena mantetīti atthaṃ ācikkhantopi yathā so na jānāti,
atk-s0505a:658_5: tathā apākaṭehi padabyañjanehi paṭicchannena vacanena manteti,
atk-s0505a:658_6: ācariyamuṭṭhiṃ vā katvā dīgharattaṃ vasāpetvā sāvasesameva manteti.
atk-s0505a:659_1: Yo katvāti ettha mayā pubbabhāge pāpicchatā vuttā.
atk-s0505a:659_6: mā maṃ jaññāti icchatī”ti evaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0505a:659_8: tathā karaṇena katānañca avivaraṇena paṭicchannā assa kammantāti paṭicchannakammanto.
atk-s0505a:662_4: Roseti vācā na ca detīti “atthakāmo me ayaṃ balakkārena maṃ puññaṃ kārāpetuṃ āgato”ti acintetvā appatirūpena pharusavacanena roseti,
atk-s0505a:663_1: Asataṃ yodha pabrūtīti yo idha yathā nimittāni dissanti “asukadivase idañcidañca te bhavissatī”ti evaṃ asajjanānaṃ vacanaṃ pabrūti.
atk-s0505a:663_4: Pabrūtīti bhaṇati “amukasmiṃ nāma gāme mayhaṃ īdiso gharavibhavo,

atk-s0505a:694_11: atha diṭṭheva dhamme gārayhā samparāye ca duggati te evamupadissamānā imasmiṃyeva attabhāve mātāpitūhipi “nayime amhākaṃ puttā,
atk-s0505a:694_19: na ete brāhmaṇā”ti evaṃ gārayhā honti.
atk-s0505a:694_26: duggatyā garahāya vāti sā tathā ukkaṭṭhāpi yaṃ tvaṃ sārato paccesi,
atk-s0505a:694_27: jāti ete pāpakammesu padissante brāhmaṇe “samparāye ca duggatī”ti ettha vuttappakārāya duggatiyā vā,
atk-s0505a:694_28: “diṭṭheva dhamme gārayhā”ti ettha vuttappakārāya garahāya vā na nivāreti.
atk-s0505a:695_1: Evaṃ bhagavā ajjhāyakakule jātānampi brāhmaṇānaṃ gārayhādikammavasena diṭṭheva dhamme patitabhāvaṃ dīpento
atk-s0505a:695_2: duggatigamanena ca samparāye brāhmaṇajātiyā abhāvaṃ dīpento “na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo,
atk-s0505a:695_3: kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo”ti etampi atthaṃ sādhetvā idāni duvidhampi atthaṃ nigamento āha,
atk-s0505a:696_0: “Na jaccā vasalo hoti, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0505a:697_0: Kammunā vasalo hoti, kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0505a:698_1: Visesato vā ettha nikkujjitaṃ vātiādīnaṃ evaṃ yojanā veditabbā –
atk-s0505a:698_3: evaṃ maṃ kammavimukhaṃ jātivāde patitaṃ “jātiyā brāhmaṇavasalabhāvo hotī”ti diṭṭhito vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0505a:698_9: evaṃ mātaṅgādinidassanapajjotadhāraṇena mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0505a:702_2: Himavantapassato kira devatāhi ubbāḷhā bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ sāvatthiṃ āgacchiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:702_3: Tesaṃ bhagavā parittatthāya kammaṭṭhānatthāya ca imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:703_1: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya.
atk-s0505a:703_2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā nānāverajjakā bhikkhū bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tattha
atk-s0505a:703_4: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā rāgacaritānaṃ saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavasena ekādasavidhaṃ asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:703_9: buddhicaritānaṃ catudhātuvavatthanādīnīti iminā nayena caturāsītisahassappabhedacaritānukūlāni kammaṭṭhānāni katheti.
atk-s0505a:704_0: Atha kho pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā sappāyasenāsanañca gocaragāmañca
atk-s0505a:704_1: pariyesamānāni anupubbena gantvā paccante himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ nīlakācamaṇisannibhasilātalaṃ
atk-s0505a:704_4: Atha kho te bhikkhū tatthekarattiṃ vasitvā pabhātāya rattiyā sarīraparikammaṃ katvā tassa avidūre aññataraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:704_7: te paccante pabbajitadassanassa dullabhatāya bhikkhū disvā eva pītisomanassajātā hutvā te bhikkhū bhojetvā “idheva, bhante,
atk-s0505a:704_8: temāsaṃ vasathā”ti yācitvā pañcapadhānakuṭisatāni kārāpetvā tattha mañcapīṭhapānīyaparibhojanīyaghaṭādīni sabbūpakaraṇāni paṭiyādesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:705_0: Bhikkhū dutiyadivase aññaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:705_1: Tatthāpi manussā tatheva upaṭṭhahitvā vassāvāsaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0505a:705_2: Bhikkhū “asati antarāye”ti adhivāsetvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā sabbarattindivaṃ āraddhavīriyā hutvā
atk-s0505a:705_3: yāmagaṇḍikaṃ koṭṭetvā yonisomanasikārabahulā viharantā rukkhamūlāni upagantvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:705_4: Sīlavantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tejena vihatatejā rukkhadevatā attano attano vimānā oruyha dārake gahetvā ito cito ca vicaranti.
atk-s0505a:705_5: Seyyathāpi nāma rājūhi vā rājamahāmattehi vā gāmakāvāsaṃ gatehi gāmavāsīnaṃ gharesu okāse gahite gharamānusakā
atk-s0505a:705_6: gharā nikkhamitvā aññatra vasantā “kadā nu kho gamissantī”ti dūrato olokenti;
atk-s0505a:705_7: evameva devatā attano attano vimānāni chaḍḍetvā ito cito ca vicarantiyo dūratova olokenti –
atk-s0505a:705_9: Tato evaṃ samacintesuṃ “paṭhamavassūpagatā bhikkhū avassaṃ temāsaṃ vasissanti.
atk-s0505a:705_10: Mayaṃ pana tāva ciraṃ dārake gahetvā okkamma vasituṃ na sakkhissāma.
atk-s0505a:705_11: Handa mayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhayānakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassemā”ti.
atk-s0505a:705_12: Tā rattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇavelāya bhiṃsanakāni yakkharūpāni nimminitvā purato purato tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0505a:705_14: Bhikkhūnaṃ tāni rūpāni passantānaṃ tañca saddaṃ suṇantānaṃ hadayaṃ phandi,
atk-s0505a:705_16: Tena te cittaṃ ekaggaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:705_17: Tesaṃ anekaggacittānaṃ bhayena ca punappunaṃ saṃviggānaṃ sati sammussi.
atk-s0505a:705_18: Tato nesaṃ muṭṭhassatīnaṃ duggandhāni ārammaṇāni payojesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:705_19: Tesaṃ tena duggandhena nimmathiyamānamiva matthaluṅgaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0505a:705_21: na ca taṃ pavattiṃ aññamaññassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:706_0: Athekadivasaṃ saṅghattherassa upaṭṭhānakāle sabbesu sannipatitesu saṅghatthero pucchi –
atk-s0505a:706_2: imaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ katipāhaṃ ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo ahosi pariyodāto,
atk-s0505a:706_3: vippasannāni ca indriyāni etarahi panattha kisā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍupaṇḍukajātā,
atk-s0505a:706_6: rattiṃ īdisañca īdisañca bheravārammaṇaṃ passāmi ca suṇāmi ca,
atk-s0505a:706_9: Eteneva upāyena sabbe taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:706_15: “Sādhu bhante”ti te bhikkhū therassa paṭissuṇitvā sabbe senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya anupalittattā
atk-s0505a:706_16: kulesu kañci anāmantetvā eva yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:706_17: Anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:707_2: antovassaṃ cārikā caritabbāti mayā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:707_5: Bhagavā āvajjento sakalajambudīpe antamaso catuppādapīṭhakaṭṭhānamattampi tesaṃ sappāyaṃ senāsanaṃ nāddasa.
atk-s0505a:707_15: etañhi vo parittañca kammaṭṭhānañca bhavissatī”ti imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:708_3: tameva senāsanaṃ upanissāya viharathā”ti idañca vatvā bhagavā āha –
atk-s0505a:708_10: Aṭṭha mahāsaṃvegavatthūni nāma jāti jarā byādhi maraṇaṃ cattāri apāyadukkhānīti.
atk-s0505a:708_16: Evaṃ bhagavā pariharaṇaṃ ācikkhitvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mettatthañca parittatthañca vipassanāpādakajhānatthañca imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsīti.
atk-s0505a:709_1: Tattha karaṇīyamatthakusalenāti imissā paṭhamagāthāya tāva ayaṃ padavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0505a:711_0: Tattha yo imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā na attānaṃ sammā payojeti,
atk-s0505a:711_27: Saṃsaṭṭho ca viharati rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena.
atk-s0505a:711_28: Yāni vā pana tāni kulāni asaddhāni appasannāni anopānabhūtāni akkosakaparibhāsakāni anatthakāmāni ahitaaphāsukaayogakkhemakāmāni bhikkhūnaṃ…pe…
atk-s0505a:712_0: Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ sammā payojeti,
atk-s0505a:712_1: anesanaṃ pahāya catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhātukāmo saddhāsīsena pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ,
atk-s0505a:714_0: Yo vā yathā ūsodakaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ pariyodāyati,
atk-s0505a:714_3: tathā ñāṇaṃ paṭicca sīlaṃ vodāyatīti ñatvā ñāṇodakena dhovanto sīlaṃ pariyodāpeti.
atk-s0505a:714_8: tathā ativiya appamatto attano sīlakkhandhaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0505a:714_9: sāyaṃpātaṃ paccavekkhamāno aṇumattampi vajjaṃ na passati,
atk-s0505a:715_0: Yo vā pana avippaṭisārakarasīle patiṭṭhāya kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadaṃ paggaṇhāti,
atk-s0505a:715_4: Yo vā pana samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0505a:716_0: Tattha ye ime yāva avippaṭisārakarasīle patiṭṭhānena,
atk-s0505a:716_1: yāva vā kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadāya paggahaṇena maggaphalena vaṇṇitā atthakusalā,
atk-s0505a:716_4: Tena bhagavā te bhikkhū sandhāya ekapuggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya “karaṇīyamatthakusalenā”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:717_0: Tato “kiṃ karaṇīya”nti tesaṃ sañjātakaṅkhānaṃ āha “yanta santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccā”ti.
atk-s0505a:717_2: taṃ buddhānubuddhehi vaṇṇitaṃ santaṃ nibbānapadaṃ paṭivedhavasena abhisamecca viharitukāmena yaṃ karaṇīyanti.
atk-s0505a:717_3: Ettha ca yanti imassa gāthāpādassa ādito vuttameva karaṇīyanti.
atk-s0505a:717_4: Adhikārato anuvattati taṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti.
atk-s0505a:718_0: Atha vā santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti anussavādivasena lokiyapaññāya nibbānapadaṃ santanti ñatvā taṃ adhigantukāmena
atk-s0505a:718_3: Atha vā “karaṇīyamatthakusalenā”ti vutte “ki”nti cintentānaṃ āha “yanta santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccā”ti.
atk-s0505a:718_5: lokiyapaññāya santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca yaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, tanti.
atk-s0505a:719_3: Tathā hi tassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ avocumhā “atthi karaṇīyaṃ atthi akaraṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0505a:719_5: Atisaṅkhepadesitattā pana tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kehici viññātaṃ,
atk-s0505a:719_8: tesaṃ viññāpanatthaṃ yaṃ visesato āraññakena bhikkhunā kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:719_9: taṃ vitthārento “sakko ujū ca suhujū ca,
atk-s0505a:719_10: suvaco cassa mudu anatimānī”ti imaṃ tāva upaḍḍhagāthaṃ āha.
atk-s0505a:720_1: Santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmo lokiyapaññāya vā taṃ abhisamecca tadadhigamāya paṭipajjamāno āraññako
atk-s0505a:720_2: bhikkhu dutiyacatutthapadhāniyaṅgasamannāgamena kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkho hutvā saccapaṭivedhāya paṭipajjituṃ
atk-s0505a:720_5: attano pattacīvarapaṭisaṅkharaṇādīsu ca yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni kiṃ karaṇīyāni,
atk-s0505a:720_6: tesu aññesu ca evarūpesu sakko assa dakkho analaso samattho.
atk-s0505a:720_7: Sakko hontopi ca tatiyapadhāniyaṅgasamannāgamena uju assa.
atk-s0505a:720_8: Uju hontopi ca sakiṃ ujubhāvena santosaṃ anāpajjitvā yāvajīvaṃ punappunaṃ asithilakaraṇena suṭṭhutaraṃ uju assa.
atk-s0505a:720_15: Evaṃ ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānehi purimadvayatatiyasikkhāhi payogāsayasuddhīhi ca uju ca suhuju ca assa.
atk-s0505a:721_0: Na kevalañca uju ca suhuju ca,
atk-s0505a:721_2: Yo hi puggalo “idaṃ na kātabba”nti vutto “kiṃ te diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:721_5: kiṃ upajjhāyo ācariyo sandiṭṭho sambhatto vā”ti vadati,
atk-s0505a:721_12: punapi maṃ evarūpaṃ disvā vadeyyātha anukampaṃ upādāya,
atk-s0505a:721_13: cirassaṃ me tumhākaṃ santikā ovādo laddho”ti vadati,
atk-s0505a:721_16: Tasmā evaṃ parassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā karonto subbaco ca assa.
atk-s0505a:722_2: Mudūti gahaṭṭhehi dūtagamanappahiṇagamanādīsu niyuñjiyamāno tattha mudubhāvaṃ akatvā thaddho hutvā vattapaṭipattiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:722_3: sakalabrahmacariye ca mudu assa suparikammakatasuvaṇṇaṃ viya tattha tattha viniyogakkhamo.
atk-s0505a:722_4: Atha vā mudūti abhākuṭiko uttānamukho sukhasambhāso paṭisanthāravutti sutitthaṃ viya sukhāvagāho assa.
atk-s0505a:723_1: Evaṃ bhagavā santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjamānassa visesato āraññakassa
atk-s0505a:723_2: bhikkhuno ekaccaṃ karaṇīyaṃ vatvā puna tatuttaripi vattukāmo “santussako cā”ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:724_0: Tattha “santuṭṭhī ca kataññutā”ti ettha vuttappabhedena dvādasavidhena santosena santussatīti santussako.
atk-s0505a:724_5: Tattha sakaṃ nāma “piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāyā”ti evaṃ upasampadamāḷake uddiṭṭhaṃ attanā ca sampaṭicchitaṃ catupaccayajātaṃ.
atk-s0505a:724_6: Tena sundarena vā asundarena vā sakkaccaṃ vā asakkaccaṃ vā dinnena paṭiggahaṇakāle paribhogakāle ca vikāramadassetvā
atk-s0505a:724_8: Santaṃ nāma yaṃ laddhaṃ hoti attano vijjamānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:724_9: tena santeneva tussanto tato paraṃ na patthento atricchataṃ pajahanto “santena tussako”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:724_11: Tena samena sabbārammaṇesu tussanto “samena tussako”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:725_2: Yo hi bhikkhu sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva ca dasseti,
atk-s0505a:725_3: tesaṃ vā sammukhāva taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ “kiṃ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnaṃ deti,
atk-s0505a:725_5: Etaṃ disvā manussā dūratova parivajjenti “dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā positu”nti.
atk-s0505a:725_6: Yo pana yaṃkiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā labhitvā attamano vippasannamukho hutvā yāpeti,
atk-s0505a:725_8: Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti –
atk-s0505a:725_10: mayameva naṃ posessāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti.
atk-s0505a:726_3: attano kesanakhacchedanapattacīvaraparikammādiṃ katvā samaṇadhammakiccaparo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:727_1: Yathā ekacco bahubhaṇḍo bhikkhu disāpakkamanakāle bahuṃ pattacīvarapaccattharaṇatelaguḷādiṃ mahājanena sīsabhārakaṭibhārādīhi uccārāpetvā pakkamati,
atk-s0505a:727_4: disāpakkamanakāle pakkhī sakuṇo viya samādāyeva pakkamati,
atk-s0505a:727_9: sīlānurakkhaṇapaññāya cīvarādivicāraṇapaññāya āvāsādisattasappāyaparijānanapaññāya ca samannāgatoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:729_7: Bhojanasālāyaṃ pana vuḍḍhānaṃ āsanaṃ na deti,
atk-s0505a:729_11: Nhānatitthe ca yadidaṃ “daharo vuḍḍhoti pamāṇaṃ akatvā āgatapaṭipāṭiyā nhāyitabba”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:729_12: tampi anādiyanto pacchā āgantvā udakaṃ otaritvā vuḍḍhe ca nave ca bādheti.
atk-s0505a:729_13: Bhikkhācāramagge pana aggāsanaaggodakaaggapiṇḍatthaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ purato purato yāti bāhāya bāhaṃ paharanto,
atk-s0505a:730_3: tathā pubbe vuttappakāre gaṇe vuḍḍhatare puggale ca.
atk-s0505a:730_4: Tattha manussehi pañhaṃ puṭṭho vuḍḍhataraṃ anāpucchā vissajjeti.
atk-s0505a:731_0: Anekaṭṭhānaṃ manopāgabbhiyaṃ nāma tesu tesu ṭhānesu kāyavācāhi ajjhācāraṃ anāpajjitvāpi manasā eva kāmavitakkādinānappakāraappatirūpavitakkanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:732_1: tesu paccayataṇhāya vā ananulomiyagihisaṃsaggavasena vā ananugiddho,
atk-s0505a:732_6: na uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā vā yogamāpajjitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:732_7: Imissā ca gāthāya yaṃ “suvaco cassā”ti ettha vuttaṃ “assā”ti vacanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:733_1: Evaṃ bhagavā santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjitukāmassa visesato āraññakassa
atk-s0505a:733_2: bhikkhuno tatuttaripi karaṇīyaṃ ācikkhitvā idāni akaraṇīyampi ācikkhitukāmo “na ca khuddamācare kiñci,
atk-s0505a:733_3: yena viññū pare upavadeyyu”nti imaṃ upaḍḍhagāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:733_5: evamimaṃ karaṇīyaṃ karonto yaṃ taṃ kāyavacīmanoduccaritaṃ khuddaṃ lāmakanti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:733_9: appamattakaṃ aṇumattampi na samācareti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:734_0: Tato tassa samācāre sandiṭṭhikamevādīnavaṃ dasseti “yena viññū pare upavadeyyu”nti.
atk-s0505a:734_1: Ettha ca yasmā aviññū pare appamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0505a:734_2: Te hi anavajjaṃ vā sāvajjaṃ karonti,
atk-s0505a:734_5: Te hi anuvicca pariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti,
atk-s0505a:735_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imāhi aḍḍhateyyāhi gāthāhi santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa,
atk-s0505a:735_1: tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjitukāmassa visesato āraññakassa āraññakasīsena ca sabbesampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0505a:735_2: viharitukāmānaṃ karaṇīyākaraṇīyabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhānūpacāraṃ vatvā idāni tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassa devatābhayassa
atk-s0505a:735_3: paṭighātāya parittatthaṃ vipassanāpādakajjhānavasena kammaṭṭhānatthañca “sukhino va khemino hontū”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:736_11: Evañhi mettā bhāvetabbā “sabbe sattā sukhino hontū”ti vā,
atk-s0505a:737_2: tāva saṅkhepena mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthāratopi taṃ dassetuṃ “ye kecī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:737_3: Atha vā yasmā puthuttārammaṇe paricitaṃ cittaṃ na ādikeneva ekatte saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0505a:737_5: tasmā tassa tasathāvarādidukatikappabhede ārammaṇe anugantvā anugantvā saṇṭhānatthampi “ye kecī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:737_6: Atha vā yasmā yassa yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vibhūtaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:737_8: Tasmā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yassa yaṃ vibhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:737_9: tassa tattha cittaṃ saṇṭhāpetukāmo tasathāvarādidukattikaārammaṇappabhedadīpakaṃ “ye kecī”ti imaṃ gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:738_0: Ettha hi tasathāvaradukaṃ diṭṭhādiṭṭhadukaṃ dūrasantikadukaṃ bhūtasambhavesidukanti cattāri dukāni,
atk-s0505a:738_1: dīghādīhi ca chahi padehi majjhimapadassa tīsu,
atk-s0505a:738_2: aṇukapadassa ca dvīsu tikesu atthasambhavato dīgharassamajjhimattikaṃ mahantāṇukamajjhimattikaṃ thūlāṇukamajjhimattikanti tayo tike dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:739_0: Evaṃ “ye keci pāṇabhūtatthī”ti iminā vacanena dukattikehi saṅgahetabbe sabbe satte ekajjhaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0505a:739_1: idāni sabbepi te tasā vā thāvarā vā anavasesāti iminā dukena saṅgahetvā dasseti.
atk-s0505a:740_8: ye keci pāṇabhūtatthi tasā vā thāvarā vā anavasesā,
atk-s0505a:740_10: Evaṃ yāva bhūtā vā sambhavesī vā imepi sabbe sattā bhavantu sukhitattāti.
atk-s0505a:741_0: Idāni dīgharassamajjhimāditikattayadīpakesu dīghā vātiādīsu chasu padesu dīghāti dīghattabhāvā nāgamacchagodhādayo.
atk-s0505a:741_1: Anekabyāmasatappamāṇāpi hi mahāsamudde nāgānaṃ attabhāvā anekayojanappamāṇāpi macchagodhādīnaṃ attabhāvā honti.
atk-s0505a:741_6: Tassa hi attabhāvo ubbedhena cattāri yojanasahassāni aṭṭha ca yojanasatāni,
atk-s0505a:741_12: Rassakāti tāsu tāsu jātīsu vāmanādayo dīghamajjhimehi omakappamāṇā sattā.
atk-s0505a:741_16: Apica ye tāsu tāsu jātīsu mahantamajjhimehi thūlamajjhimehi ca omakappamāṇā sattā,
atk-s0505a:742_1: Evaṃ tīhi tikehi anavasesato satte dassetvā idāni “diṭṭhā vā yeva adiṭṭhā”tiādīhi tīhi dukehipi te saṅgahetvā dasseti.
atk-s0505a:743_0: Tattha diṭṭhāti ye attano cakkhussa āpāthamāgatavasena diṭṭhapubbā.
atk-s0505a:743_2: “Yeva dūre vasanti avidūre”ti iminā pana dukena attano attabhāvassa dūre ca avidūre ca vasante satte dasseti.
atk-s0505a:743_4: Attano hi kāye vasantā sattā avidūre,
atk-s0505a:743_8: Attano vihāre gāme janapade dīpe cakkavāḷe vasantā avidūre,
atk-s0505a:744_6: Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:744_7: Atha vā catūsu yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti,
atk-s0505a:744_9: Aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
atk-s0505a:744_10: Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesī nāma.
atk-s0505a:745_1: Evaṃ bhagavā “sukhino vā”tiādīhi aḍḍhateyyāhi gāthāhi nānappakārato tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ hitasukhāgamapatthanāvasena
atk-s0505a:745_2: sattesu mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni ahitadukkhānāgamapatthanāvasenāpi taṃ dassento āha “na paro paraṃ
atk-s0505a:746_5: gāme vā nigame vā khette vā ñātimajjhe vā pūgamajjhe vātiādi.
atk-s0505a:746_7: Kañcīti yaṃ kañci khattiyaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā gahaṭṭhaṃ vā pabbajitaṃ vā sugataṃ vā duggataṃ vātiādi.
atk-s0505a:746_10: “Byārosanāya paṭighasaññāyā”ti hi vattabbe “byārosanā paṭighasaññā”ti vuccati yathā “samma daññāya vimuttā”ti vattabbe “samma daññā vimuttā”ti,
atk-s0505a:746_11: yathā ca “anupubbasikkhāya anupubbakiriyāya anupubbapaṭipadāyā”ti vattabbe “anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā”ti.
atk-s0505a:746_12: Nāññamaññassa dukkhamiccheyyāti aññamaññassa dukkhaṃ na iccheyya.
atk-s0505a:746_14: Na kevalaṃ “sukhino vā khemino vā hontū”tiādi manasikāravaseneva mettaṃ bhāveyya.
atk-s0505a:746_15: Kiṃ pana “aho vata yo koci parapuggalo yaṃ kañci parapuggalaṃ vañcanādīhi nikatīhi na nikubbetha,
atk-s0505a:746_16: jātiādīhi ca navahi mānavatthūhi katthaci padese yaṃ kañci parapuggalaṃ nātimaññeyya,
atk-s0505a:746_17: aññamaññassa ca byārosanāya vā paṭighasaññāya vā dukkhaṃ na iccheyyā”ti evampi manasi karonto bhāveyyāti.
atk-s0505a:747_1: Evaṃ ahitadukkhānāgamapatthanāvasena atthato mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva upamāya dassento āha “mātā yathā niyaṃ putta”nti.
atk-s0505a:748_1: yathā mātā niyaṃ puttaṃ attani jātaṃ orasaṃ puttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:748_3: tassa dukkhāgamapaṭibāhanatthaṃ attano āyumpi cajitvā taṃ anurakkhe,
atk-s0505a:748_6: tañca aparimāṇasattārammaṇavasena ekasmiṃ vā satte anavasesapharaṇavasena aparimāṇaṃ bhāvayeti.
atk-s0505a:749_1: Evaṃ sabbākārena mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni tasseva vaḍḍhanaṃ dassento āha “mettañca sabbalokasmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:750_24: Mettāvihārī hi puggalo manussānaṃ piyo hoti,
atk-s0505a:751_1: yadetaṃ “evampi sabbabhūtesu mānasaṃ bhāvaye aparimāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:751_2: Tañcetaṃ aparimāṇaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ sabbalokasmiṃ bhāvaye vaḍḍhaye, vuḍḍhiṃ, virūḷhiṃ,
atk-s0505a:751_11: Evaṃ bhāventopi ca taṃ yathā asambādhaṃ, averaṃ,
atk-s0505a:751_14: Yaṃ vā taṃ bhāvanāsampadaṃ pattaṃ sabbattha okāsalābhavasena asambādhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:751_16: attani ca paresaṃ āghātapaṭivinayena asapattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:751_17: taṃ asambādhaṃ averaṃ asapattaṃ aparimāṇaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāti tividhaparicchede sabbalokasmiṃ bhāvaye vaḍḍhayeti.
atk-s0505a:752_1: Evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vaḍḍhanaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa viharato iriyāpathaniyamābhāvaṃ dassento āha “tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ…pe…
atk-s0505a:753_1: evametaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ bhāvento so “nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā,
atk-s0505a:753_2: ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”tiādīsu viya iriyāpathaniyamaṃ akatvā yathāsukhaṃ aññataraññatarairiyāpathabādhanavinodanaṃ
atk-s0505a:753_3: karonto tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatā vigatamiddho assa,
atk-s0505a:754_0: Atha vā evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vaḍḍhanaṃ dassetvā idāni vasībhāvaṃ dassento āha “tiṭṭhaṃ cara”nti.
atk-s0505a:754_1: Vasippatto hi tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatā iriyāpathena etaṃ mettājhānassatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo hoti.
atk-s0505a:754_2: Atha vā tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vāti na tassa ṭhānādīni antarāyakarāni honti,
atk-s0505a:754_3: apica kho so yāvatā etaṃ mettājhānassatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo hoti,
atk-s0505a:755_5: ṭhānādīni vā anādiyitvā yāvatā etaṃ mettājhānassatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo assa,
atk-s0505a:755_6: tāvatā vitamiddho hutvā etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyāti.
atk-s0505a:756_0: Evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vasībhāvaṃ dassento “etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti tasmiṃ mettāvihāre niyojetvā idāni
atk-s0505a:757_1: yvāyaṃ “sukhinova khemino hontū”tiādiṃ katvā yāva “etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti saṃvaṇṇito mettāvihāro,
atk-s0505a:757_2: etaṃ catūsu dibbabrahmaariyairiyāpathavihāresu niddosattā attanopi paresampi atthakarattā ca idha ariyassa dhammavinaye brahmavihāramāhu,
atk-s0505a:757_4: Yato satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatāssa vitamiddho,
atk-s0505a:758_1: Evaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nānappakārato mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā mettā sattārammaṇattā
atk-s0505a:758_2: attadiṭṭhiyā āsannā hoti tasmā diṭṭhigahaṇanisedhanamukhena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tadeva mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ
atk-s0505a:759_2: tato vuṭṭhāya ye tattha vitakkavicārādayo dhammā, te,
atk-s0505a:759_3: tesañca vatthādianusārena rūpadhamme pariggahetvā iminā nāmarūpaparicchedena “suddhasaṅkhārapuñjoyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:759_4: na idha sattūpalabbhatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhiñca anupaggamma anupubbena lokuttarasīlena sīlavā hutvā lokuttarasīlasampayutteneva
atk-s0505a:759_6: Tato paraṃ yopāyaṃ vatthukāmesu gedho kilesakāmo appahīno hoti,
atk-s0505a:759_7: tampi sakadāgāmianāgāmimaggehi tanubhāvena anavasesappahānena ca kāmesu gedhaṃ vineyya vinayitvā vūpasametvā
atk-s0505a:759_8: na hi jātu gabbhaseyya puna reti ekaṃseneva puna gabbhaseyyaṃ na eti,
atk-s0505a:759_9: suddhāvāsesu nibbattitvā tattheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā parinibbātīti.
atk-s0505a:760_0: Evaṃ bhagavā desanaṃ samāpetvā te bhikkhū āha –
atk-s0505a:760_4: Imañca suttaṃ māsassa aṭṭhasu dhammassavanadivasesu gaṇḍiṃ ākoṭetvā ussāretha,
atk-s0505a:760_10: Tepi vo amanussā taṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ na dassessanti,
atk-s0505a:760_12: Te “sādhū”ti bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā,
atk-s0505a:760_16: Devatāyo ca “bhadantā amhākaṃ atthakāmā hitakāmā”ti pītisomanassajātā hutvā sayameva senāsanaṃ sammajjanti,
atk-s0505a:760_20: Te bhikkhū tatheva mettaṃ bhāvetvā tameva ca pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā sabbeva tasmiṃyeva antotemāse
atk-s0505a:760_21: aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresunti.
atk-s0505a:772_3: Hemavatena hi puṭṭho bhagavā “chasu loko samuppanno”tiādīni abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:773_2: imasmiṃyeva bhaddakappe vīsativassasahassāyukesu purisesu uppajjitvā soḷasavassasahassāyukāni ṭhatvā
atk-s0505a:773_3: parinibbutassa bhagavato kassapasammāsambuddhassa mahatiyā pūjāya sarīrakiccaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:773_4: Tassa dhātuyo avikiritvā suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:773_6: Appāyukabuddhā pana yasmā bahutarena janena adiṭṭhā eva parinibbāyanti,
atk-s0505a:773_7: tasmā dhātupūjampi katvā “tattha tattha janā puññaṃ pasavissantī”ti anukampāya “dhātuyo vikirantū”ti adhiṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0505a:773_8: Tena tesaṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇāni viya dhātuyo vikiranti,
atk-s0505a:774_0: Manussā tassa bhagavato ekaṃyeva dhātugharaṃ katvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ yojanaṃ ubbedhena parikkhepena ca.
atk-s0505a:774_5: ekaṃ seṭṭhipamukhā jānapadā rattasuvaṇṇamayā ekagghanā suvaṇṇarasapaṭibhāgā ca nānāratanamayā iṭṭhakā ahesuṃ ekekā satasahassagghanikā.
atk-s0505a:774_6: Te haritālamanosilāhi mattikākiccaṃ surabhitelena udakakiccañca katvā taṃ cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:775_0: Evaṃ patiṭṭhite cetiye dve kulaputtā sahāyakā nikkhamitvā sammukhasāvakānaṃ therānaṃ santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:775_10: Tattha pabbajitena kulaputtena ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike pañca vassāni vasitvā,
atk-s0505a:775_12: pātimokkhaṃ dve tīṇi bhāṇavārasuttantāni ca paguṇaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:775_14: kule vā gaṇe vā nirālayena araññaṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0505a:775_17: Attano thāmena pana ekaṃ vā nikāyaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā dve vā pañca vā nikāye pariyattito ca atthato ca suvisadaṃ sāsanaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:775_19: Atha te kulaputtā “dvinnaṃ dhurānaṃ vāsadhurameva seṭṭha”nti vatvā “mayaṃ panamhā daharā,
atk-s0505a:775_22: Te pakatiyāva paññavanto nacirasseva sakale buddhavacane pakataññano vinaye ca ativiya vinicchayakusalā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:776_0: Tadā dve bhikkhū gāmakāvāse viharanti dhammavādī ca adhammavādī ca.
atk-s0505a:776_8: Tato adhammavādī “sace imaṃ vatthuṃ vinayadharā vinicchinissanti,
atk-s0505a:776_9: addhā me sāsane patiṭṭhā na bhavissatī”ti ñatvā attano pakkhaṃ kātukāmo tāvadeva parikkhāre ādāya te
atk-s0505a:776_10: dve there upasaṅkamitvā samaṇaparikkhāre datvā tesaṃ nissayena viharitumāraddho.
atk-s0505a:776_11: Sabbañca nesaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ karonto sakkaccaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ pūretukāmo viya akāsi.
atk-s0505a:776_12: Tato ekadivasaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vanditvā tehi vissajjiyamānopi aṭṭhāsiyeva.
atk-s0505a:776_13: Therā “kiñci vattabbamatthī”ti taṃ pucchiṃsu. So “āma, bhante,
atk-s0505a:776_14: ekena me bhikkhunā saha ajjhācāraṃ paṭicca vivādo atthi.
atk-s0505a:776_15: So yadi taṃ vatthuṃ idhāgantvā āroceti,
atk-s0505a:776_17: Therā “osaṭaṃ vatthuṃ yathāvinicchayaṃ na vinicchinituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:776_23: So tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā puna taṃ āvāsaṃ gantvā “sabbaṃ vinayadharānaṃ santike niṭṭhita”nti taṃ dhammavādiṃ
atk-s0505a:776_25: Dhammavādī “nissaṅko ayaṃ jāto”ti tāvadeva nikkhamitvā therānaṃ parivāraṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “nanu, āvuso,
atk-s0505a:776_27: anosarāpetvā eva vā aññamaññaṃ accayaṃ desāpetvā sāmaggī kātabbā.
atk-s0505a:776_28: Ime pana therā neva vatthuṃ vinicchiniṃsu,
atk-s0505a:776_33: Tato adhammavādī okāsaṃ labhitvā “tvaṃ pubbe ‘vinayadharā jānissantī’ti bhaṇasi.
atk-s0505a:776_34: Idāni tesaṃ vinayadharānaṃ ārocehi taṃ vatthu”nti dhammavādiṃ pīḷetvā “ajjatagge parājito tvaṃ,
atk-s0505a:776_35: mā taṃ āvāsaṃ āgacchī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a:776_36: Tato dhammavādī there upasaṅkamitvā “tumhe sāsanaṃ anapekkhitvā ‘amhe upaṭṭhesi paritosesī’ti puggalameva apekkhittha,
atk-s0505a:776_38: ajjatagge dāni tumhākaṃ vinicchayaṃ vinicchinituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0505a:776_39: ajja parinibbuto kassapo bhagavā”ti mahāsaddena kanditvā “naṭṭhaṃ satthu sāsana”nti paridevamāno pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a:777_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū saṃviggamānasā “mayaṃ puggalamanurakkhantā sāsanaratanaṃ sobbhe pakkhipimhā”ti kukkuccaṃ uppādesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:777_1: Te teneva kukkuccena upahatāsayattā kālaṃ katvā sagge nibbattitumasakkontā ekācariyo himavati hemavate pabbate nibbatti hemavato yakkhoti nāmena.
atk-s0505a:777_3: Tepi nesaṃ parivārā bhikkhū tesaṃyeva anuvattitvā sagge nibbattitumasakkontā tesaṃ parivārā yakkhāva hutvā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:777_4: Tesaṃ pana paccayadāyakā gahaṭṭhā devaloke nibbatiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:778_1: māse māse aṭṭha divasāni dhammavinicchayatthaṃ himavati manosilātale nāgavatimaṇḍape devatānaṃ sannipāto hoti,
atk-s0505a:778_3: Atha sātāgirahemavatā tasmiṃ samāgame aññamaññaṃ disvā sañjāniṃsu – “tvaṃ, samma,
atk-s0505a:778_5: tvaṃ kuhi”nti attano attano uppattiṭṭhānañca pucchitvā vippaṭisārino ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:778_7: pubbe vīsati vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ katvā ekaṃ pāpasahāyaṃ nissāya yakkhayoniyaṃ uppannā,
atk-s0505a:778_11: kiñci acchariyaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā mamāpi āroceyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0505a:778_14: kiñci acchariyaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā mamāpi āroceyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0505a:778_15: Evaṃ tesu dvīsu sahāyesu aññamaññaṃ katikaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:778_16: tameva uppattiṃ avivajjetvā vasamānesu ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ vītivattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:779_0: Athamhākaṃ bodhisatto dīpaṅkarapādamūle katapaṇidhāno yāva vessantarajātakaṃ,
atk-s0505a:779_4: dhammapadanidāne vuttanayena devatāhi āyācito pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā,
atk-s0505a:779_6: dvattiṃsāya pubbanimittesu vattamānesu idha paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi dasasahassilokadhātuṃ kampetvā.
atk-s0505a:779_7: Tāni disvāpi ime rājayakkhā “iminā kāraṇena nibbattānī”ti na jāniṃsu.
atk-s0505a:779_10: Dhammacakkappavattane pana pañcavaggiye āmantetvā bhagavati tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ varadhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0505a:779_11: pavattente mahābhūmicālaṃ pubbanimittaṃ pāṭihāriyāni ca etesaṃ eko sātāgiroyeva paṭhamaṃ addasa.
atk-s0505a:779_12: Nibbattikāraṇañca tesaṃ ñatvā sapariso bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma dhammadesanaṃ assosi,
atk-s0505a:779_13: na ca kiñci visesaṃ adhigacchi. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:779_14: So hi dhammaṃ suṇanto hemavataṃ anussaritvā “āgato nu kho me sahāyako,
atk-s0505a:779_15: no”ti parisaṃ oloketvā taṃ apassanto “vañcito me sahāyo,
atk-s0505a:779_16: yo evaṃ vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ na suṇātī”ti vikkhittacitto ahosi.
atk-s0505a:779_17: Bhagavā ca atthaṅgatepi ca sūriye desanaṃ na niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:780_0: Atha sātāgiro “sahāyaṃ gahetvā tena sahāgamma dhammadesanaṃ sossāmī”ti hatthiyānaassayānagaruḷayānādīni
atk-s0505a:780_1: māpetvā pañcahi yakkhasatehi parivuto himavantābhimukho pāyāsi,
atk-s0505a:780_9: tasmā himavati taṃ acchariyapātubhāvaṃ disvā “yato ahaṃ jāto,
atk-s0505a:780_10: na kadāci ayaṃ pabbato evaṃ abhirāmo bhūtapubbo,
atk-s0505a:780_11: handa dāni mama sahāyaṃ gahetvā āgamma tena saha imaṃ pupphasiriṃ anubhavissāmī”ti tatheva majjhimadesābhimukho āgacchati.
atk-s0505a:780_12: Te ubhopi rājagahassa upari samāgantvā aññamaññassa āgamanakāraṇaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:780_15: nāyaṃ pabbato evaṃ akālakusumitehi rukkhehi abhirāmo bhūtapubbo,
atk-s0505a:780_16: tasmā etaṃ pupphasiriṃ tayā saddhiṃ anubhavissāmīti āgatomhī”ti.
atk-s0505a:780_28: taṃ bhagavato santikaṃ ānetukāmo imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:780_29: Keci pana gotamake cetiye viharante bhagavati ayamevamāhāti bhaṇanti “ajja pannaraso”ti.
atk-s0505a:781_1: Tattha ajjāti ayaṃ rattindivo pakkhagaṇanato pannaraso,
atk-s0505a:781_3: Tīsu vā uposathesu ajja pannaraso uposatho,
atk-s0505a:781_6: Yasmā vā pātimokkhuddesaaṭṭhaṅgaupavāsapaññattidivasādīsu sambahulesu atthesu uposathasaddo vattati.
atk-s0505a:781_9: “Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato kho visākhe uposatho upavuttho”tiādīsu pāṇātipātā veramaṇiādikesu aṭṭhaṅgesu.
atk-s0505a:781_14: Tasmā avasesatthaṃ paṭikkhipitvā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamadivasaṃyeva niyāmento āha –
atk-s0505a:781_16: Pāṭipado dutiyoti evaṃ gaṇiyamāne ajja pannaraso divasoti attho.
atk-s0505a:782_3: Tañhi rattiṃ devānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuto sannipatitānaṃ sarīravatthābharaṇavimānappabhāhi abbhādiupakkilesavirahitāya
atk-s0505a:783_0: Evaṃ rattiguṇavaṇṇanāpadesenāpi sahāyassa cittappasādaṃ janento buddhuppādaṃ kathetvā āha “anomanāmaṃ satthāraṃ,
atk-s0505a:783_2: Tattha anomehi alāmakehi sabbākāraparipūrehi guṇehi nāmaṃ assāti anomanāmo.
atk-s0505a:783_4: bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā nayena buddhoti anomehi guṇehi nāmaṃ,
atk-s0505a:783_6: bhaggadosoti bhagavā”tiādinā nayena ca anomehi guṇehi nāmaṃ.
atk-s0505a:783_11: yathā satthavāho satte kantāraṃ tāretī”tiādinā niddese vuttanayenāpi satthā.
atk-s0505a:783_14: Passāmāti tena attānaṃ saha saṅgahetvā paccuppannavacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:784_1: Evaṃ vutte hemavato “ayaṃ sātāgiro ‘anomanāmaṃ satthāra’nti bhaṇanto tassa sabbaññutaṃ pakāseti,
atk-s0505a:784_6: tena taṃ evaṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā tādilakkhaṇaṃ pucchanto āha –
atk-s0505a:785_6: Pucchā eva vā ayaṃ “so te satthā sabbabhūtesu tādī,
atk-s0505a:785_13: tassa te satthuno kacci tādilakkhaṇappattassa sato sabbabhūtesu mano supaṇihito,
atk-s0505a:785_16: So vā te satthā kacci sabbabhūtesu samacittena tādī, udāhu no,
atk-s0505a:785_17: ye ca kho iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu ārammaṇesu rāgadosavasena saṅkappā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0505a:786_1: Tato sātāgiro bhagavato sabbaññubhāve byavasitattā sabbe sabbaññuguṇe anujānanto āha “mano cassa supaṇihito”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:786_7: bhagavato idāni sabbākārasampannattā sabbaññubhāve ṭhitassa mano supaṇihito acalo bhaveyya.
atk-s0505a:786_8: Yassa tiracchānabhūtassāpi sarāgādikāle chaddantanāgakule uppannassa savisena sallena viddhassa acalo ahosi,
atk-s0505a:786_10: aññadatthu tasseva attano dante chetvā adāsi;
atk-s0505a:786_11: tathā mahākapibhūtassa mahatiyā silāya sīse pahaṭassāpi tasseva ca maggaṃ dassesi;
atk-s0505a:786_12: tathā vidhurapaṇḍitabhūtassa pādesu gahetvā saṭṭhiyojane kāḷapabbatapapāte pakkhittassāpi aññadatthu tasseva yakkhassatthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0505a:787_0: Sabbabhūtesu tādinoti sabbasattesu tādilakkhaṇappattasseva sato mano supaṇihito,
atk-s0505a:787_1: na yāva paccayaṃ na labhatīti attho.
atk-s0505a:787_2: Tattha bhagavato tādilakkhaṇaṃ pañcadhā veditabbaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:789_1: Lābhādayo ca tassa mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthāritanayena veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:789_4: udāhu no”ti imasmimpi vikappe sabbabhūtesu samacittatāya tādī amhākaṃ satthāti attho.
atk-s0505a:789_5: Ayañhi bhagavā sukhūpasaṃhārakāmatāya dukkhāpanayanakāmatāya ca sabbasattesu samacitto,
atk-s0505a:790_2: yaṃ kiñci iṭṭhaṃ vā aniṭṭhaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:790_3: sabbappakārehi tattha ye rāgadosavasena saṅkappā uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0505a:790_4: tyāssa anuttarena maggena rāgādīnaṃ pahīnattā vasīkatā,
atk-s0505a:790_6: So hi bhagavā anāvilasaṅkappo suvimuttacitto suvimuttapaññoti.
atk-s0505a:790_10: Saṅkappavasībhāvena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe tassa manasikārābhāvato kilesappahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:790_17: tāya cassa sabbaññubhāvo vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:791_1: Evaṃ hemavato pubbe manodvāravaseneva tādibhāvaṃ pucchitvā tañca paṭijānantamimaṃ sutvā daḷhīkammatthaṃ idāni dvārattayavasenāpi,
atk-s0505a:791_2: pubbe vā saṅkhepena kāyavacīmanodvārasuddhiṃ pucchitvā tañca paṭijānantamimaṃ sutvā daḷhīkammatthameva vitthārenāpi pucchanto āha “kacci adinna”nti.
atk-s0505a:791_4: Ārā pamādamhāti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittavossaggato dūrībhāvena abrahmacariyaviratiṃ pucchati.
atk-s0505a:791_7: Jhānaṃ na riñcatīti iminā pana tassāyeva tividhāya kāyaduccaritaviratiyā balavabhāvaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0505a:792_1: Atha sātāgiro yasmā bhagavā na kevalaṃ etarahi,
atk-s0505a:792_3: tassā tassāyeva ca viratiyā ānubhāvena taṃ taṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ paṭilabhi,
atk-s0505a:792_4: sadevako cassa loko “adinnādānā paṭivirato samaṇo gotamo”tiādinā nayena vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0505a:792_5: Tasmā vissaṭṭhāya vācāya sīhanādaṃ nadanto āha “na so adinnaṃ ādiyatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:792_7: Imissāpi gāthāya tatiyapāde “pamādamhā pamadamhā”ti dvidhā pāṭho.
atk-s0505a:792_8: Catutthapāde ca jhānaṃ na riñcatīti jhānaṃ rittakaṃ suññakaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0505a:793_1: Evaṃ kāyadvāre suddhiṃ sutvā idāni vacīdvāre suddhiṃ pucchanto āha –
atk-s0505a:793_6: khīṇo byappatho assāti khīṇabyappatho. Taṃ na-
atk-s0505a:793_12: Tādisavacano kacci na soti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:793_18: Tañhi sattānaṃ aññamaññato bhedanena vināsaṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:794_1: Atha sātāgiro yasmā bhagavā na kevalaṃ etarahi,
atk-s0505a:794_3: tassā tassāyeva ca viratiyā ānubhāvena taṃ taṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ paṭilabhi,
atk-s0505a:794_4: sadevako cassa loko “musāvādā paṭivirato samaṇo gotamo”ti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0505a:794_5: Tasmā vissaṭṭhāya vācāya sīhanādaṃ nadanto āha,
atk-s0505a:794_12: Bhagavā yasmā tāya mantāya paricchinditvā atthameva bhāsati atthato anapetavacanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:795_1: Evaṃ vacīdvārasuddhimpi sutvā idāni manodvārasuddhiṃ pucchanto āha “kacci na rajjati kāmesū”ti.
atk-s0505a:795_3: Tesu kilesakāmena na rajjatīti pucchanto anabhijjhālutaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0505a:795_4: Anāvilanti pucchanto byāpādena āvilabhāvaṃ sandhāya abyāpādataṃ pucchati.
atk-s0505a:795_5: Mohaṃ atikkantoti pucchanto yena mohena mūḷho micchādiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0505a:795_7: Dhammesu cakkhumāti pucchanto sabbadhammesu appaṭihatassa ñāṇacakkhuno,
atk-s0505a:795_8: pañcacakkhuvisayesu vā dhammesu pañcannampi cakkhūnaṃ vasena sabbaññutaṃ pucchati “dvārattayapārisuddhiyāpi sabbaññū na hotī”ti cintetvā.
atk-s0505a:796_1: Atha sātāgiro yasmā bhagavā appatvāva arahattaṃ anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ pahīnattā neva kāmesu rajjati,
atk-s0505a:796_3: sotāpattimaggeneva ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayassa saccapaṭicchādakamohassa pahīnattā mohaṃ atikkanto,
atk-s0505a:796_4: sāmañca saccāni abhisambujjhitvā buddhoti vimokkhantikaṃ nāmaṃ yathāvuttāni ca cakkhūni paṭilabhi,
atk-s0505a:796_5: tasmā tassa manodvārasuddhiṃ sabbaññutañca ugghosento āha “na so rajjati kāmesū”ti.
atk-s0505a:797_1: Evaṃ hemavato bhagavato dvārattayapārisuddhiṃ sabbaññutañca sutvā haṭṭho udaggo atītajātiyaṃ bāhusaccavisadāya
atk-s0505a:797_2: paññāya asajjamānavacanappatho hutvā acchariyabbhutarūpe sabbaññuguṇe sotukāmo āha “kacci vijjāya sampanno”ti.
atk-s0505a:797_3: Tattha vijjāya sampannoti iminā dassanasampattiṃ pucchati,
atk-s0505a:797_7: Āsavā khīṇāti iminā etāya dassanagamanasampattiyā pattabbāya āsavakkhayasaññitāya paṭhamanibbānadhātuyā pattiṃ pucchati,
atk-s0505a:798_1: Tato yā esā “so anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsa”ntiādinā nayena bhayabheravādīsu tividhā,
atk-s0505a:798_3: āneñjappatte ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharatī”tiādinā nayena ambaṭṭhādīsu aṭṭhavidhā vijjā vuttā,
atk-s0505a:798_4: tāya yasmā sabbāyapi sabbākārasampannāya bhagavā upeto.
atk-s0505a:798_11: catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hotī”ti evaṃ uddisitvā “kathañca, mahānāma,
atk-s0505a:798_12: ariyasāvako sīlasampanno hotī”tiādinā nayena sekhasutte niddiṭṭhaṃ pannarasappabhedaṃ caraṇaṃ.
atk-s0505a:798_13: Tañca yasmā sabbūpakkilesappahānena bhagavato ativiya saṃsuddhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:798_15: tepi yasmā sabbe saparivārā savāsanā bhagavato khīṇā.
atk-s0505a:798_16: Yasmā ca imāya vijjācaraṇasampadāya khīṇāsavo hutvā tadā bhagavā “natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti paccavekkhitvā ṭhito,
atk-s0505a:798_17: tasmā sātāgiro bhagavato sabbaññubhāve byavasāyena samussāhitahadayo sabbepi guṇe anujānanto āha “vijjāya ceva sampanno”ti.
atk-s0505a:799_1: Tato hemavato “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”ti bhagavati nikkaṅkho hutvā ākāse ṭhitoyeva bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsanto
atk-s0505a:799_5: “mano cassa supaṇihito”ti ettha vuttatādibhāvena puṇṇaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:799_7: “na so rajjati kāmesū”ti ettha vuttamanokammunā ca puṇṇaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:799_8: “musā ca so na bhaṇatī”ti ettha vuttabyappathena ca vacīkammunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:799_9: Evaṃ sampannacittañca anuttarāya vijjācaraṇasampadāya sampannattā vijjācaraṇasampannañca imehi guṇehi
atk-s0505a:799_10: “mano cassa supaṇihito”tiādinā nayena dhammato naṃ pasaṃsasi,
atk-s0505a:799_11: sabhāvato tacchato bhūtato eva naṃ pasaṃsasi,
atk-s0505a:800_2: suṭṭhu tayā ñātañca anumoditañcā”ti adhippāyena tameva saṃrādhento āha –
atk-s0505a:800_5: Evañca pana vatvā puna bhagavato dassane taṃ abhitthavayamāno āha “sampannaṃ…pe…
atk-s0505a:801_1: Atha hemavato attano abhirucitaguṇehi purimajātibāhusaccabalena bhagavantaṃ abhitthunanto sātāgiraṃ āha –
atk-s0505a:801_7: na purato nimmaṃsā pacchato susumārakucchi viya uddhumātā.
atk-s0505a:801_8: Kisā ca buddhā honti dīgharassasamavaṭṭitayuttaṭṭhānesu tathārūpāya aṅgapaccaṅgasampattiyā,
atk-s0505a:802_3: ‘Appāhāro samaṇo gotamo appāhāratāya ca vaṇṇavādī’ti iti ce maṃ, udāyi,
atk-s0505a:802_8: mama sāvakā kosakāhārāpi aḍḍhakosakāhārāpi beluvāhārāpi aḍḍhabeluvāhārāpi,
atk-s0505a:802_9: na maṃ te iminā dhammena sakkareyyuṃ…pe…
atk-s0505a:803_0: Āhāre chandarāgābhāvena alolupā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhārenti moneyyasampattiyā munino.
atk-s0505a:804_1: Evañca vatvā puna tassa bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sotukāmatāya “sīhaṃvekacara”nti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:804_3: sīhaṃvāti durāsadaṭṭhena khamanaṭṭhena nibbhayaṭṭhena ca kesarasīhasadisaṃ.
atk-s0505a:804_6: ekissā lokadhātuyā dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ anuppattitopi ekacaraṃ.
atk-s0505a:804_7: Khaggavisāṇasutte vuttanayenāpi cettha taṃ taṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0505a:804_9: Atha vā āguṃ na karotītipi nāgo.
atk-s0505a:804_12: Kāmesu anapekkhinanti dvīsupi kāmesu chandarāgābhāvena anapekkhinaṃ.
atk-s0505a:804_14: maccupāsappamocananti taṃ evarūpaṃ mahesiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tebhūmakavaṭṭassa maccupāsassa pamocanaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ pucchāma.
atk-s0505a:804_15: Yena vā upāyena dukkhasamudayasaṅkhātā maccupāsā pamuccati,
atk-s0505a:804_17: Imaṃ gāthaṃ hemavato sātāgirañca sātāgiraparisañca attano parisañca sandhāya āha.
atk-s0505a:805_0: Tena kho pana samayena āsāḷhīnakkhattaṃ ghositaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0505a:805_1: Atha samantato alaṅkatapaṭiyatte devanagare siriṃ paccanubhontī viya rājagahe kāḷī nāma kuraragharikā
