atk-s0505a:805_2: upāsikā pāsādamāruyha sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā gabbhaparissamaṃ vinodentī savātappadese utuggahaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:805_3: ṭhitā tesaṃ yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ taṃ buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānato assosi.
atk-s0505a:805_4: Sutvā ca “evaṃ vividhaguṇasamannāgatā buddhā”ti buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā tāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā tattheva ṭhitā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:805_8: yadidaṃ kāḷī upāsikā kuraragharikā”ti etadagge ṭhapitā.
atk-s0505a:806_1: Tepi yakkhasenāpatayo sahassayakkhaparivārā majjhimayāmasamaye isipatanaṃ patvā,
atk-s0505a:806_3: imāya gāthāya bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā okāsamakārayiṃsu “akkhātāraṃ pavattāra”nti.
atk-s0505a:806_5: ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmake dhamme “idaṃ kho pana,
atk-s0505a:806_7: dukkhaṃ ariyasacca”ntiādinā nayena saccānaṃ vavatthānakathāya akkhātāraṃ,
atk-s0505a:806_8: “‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyya’nti me bhikkhave”tiādinā nayena tesu kiccañāṇakatañāṇappavattanena pavattāraṃ.
atk-s0505a:806_15: vibhaṅgena tehi tehi pakārehi vacanato pavattāraṃ.
atk-s0505a:806_18: Saṅkhepato vā tīhi parivaṭṭehi saccānaṃ kathanena akkhātāraṃ,
atk-s0505a:806_21: taṃ dhammaṃ pavattetīti dhammacakka”nti evamādinā paṭisambhidānayena vitthāritassa dhammacakkassa pavattanato pavattāraṃ.
atk-s0505a:807_6: So hi bhagavā sabbadhamme abhijānanto gatoti abhiññāpāragū,
atk-s0505a:807_16: Evaṃ bhagavantaṃ atitthavantā “mayaṃ pucchāma gotama”nti okāsamakārayiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:808_1: Atha nesaṃ yakkhānaṃ tejena ca paññāya ca aggo hemavato yathādhippetaṃ pucchitabbaṃ pucchanto “kismiṃ loko”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:808_3: kismiṃ uppanne loko samuppanno hotīti ayañhettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:808_5: Kismiṃ kubbati santhavanti ahanti vā mamanti vā taṇhādiṭṭhisanthavaṃ kismiṃ kubbati,
atk-s0505a:808_8: kiṃ upādāya lokoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti ayañhettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:808_10: Kismiṃ sati kena kāraṇena loko vihaññati pīḷīyati bādhīyatīti ayañhettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:809_1: Atha bhagavā yasmā chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu uppannesu sattaloko ca dhanadhaññādivasena saṅkhāraloko ca uppanno hoti,
atk-s0505a:809_2: yasmā cettha sattaloko tesveva chasu duvidhampi santhavaṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:809_3: Cakkhāyatanaṃ vā hi “ahaṃ mama”nti gaṇhāti avasesesu vā aññataraṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:809_6: Yasmā ca etāniyeva cha upādāya duvidhopi lokoti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0505a:809_7: yasmā ca tesveva chasu sati sattaloko dukkhapātubhāvena vihaññati. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:810_8: cakkhusmiṃ sati cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkha”ntiādi.
atk-s0505a:811_0: Tathā tesu ādhārabhūtesu paṭihato saṅkhāraloko vihaññati. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:814_0: Tathā tehiyeva kāraṇabhūtehi duvidhopi loko vihaññati. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:816_0: “Cakkhu, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ, rūpā ādittā. Kena ādittaṃ? Rāgagginā”ti evamādi.
atk-s0505a:817_0: Tasmā chaajjhattikabāhirāyatanavasena taṃ pucchaṃ vissajjento āha “chasu loko samuppanno”ti.
atk-s0505a:818_1: Atha so yakkho attanā vaṭṭavasena puṭṭhapañhaṃ bhagavatā dvādasāyatanavasena saṅkhipitvā vissajjitaṃ
atk-s0505a:818_2: na suṭṭhu upalakkhetvā tañca atthaṃ tappaṭipakkhañca ñātukāmo saṅkhepeneva vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ pucchanto āha
atk-s0505a:818_6: Yattha loko vihaññatīti “chasu loko vihaññatī”ti evaṃ bhagavatā yattha chabbidhe upādāne loko vihaññatīti vutto,
atk-s0505a:818_9: Samudayasaccaṃ pana tassa kāraṇabhāvena gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0505a:818_10: Niyyānaṃ pucchitoti imāya pana upaḍḍhagāthāya maggasaccaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:818_17: Dukkhā pamuccatīti “upādāna”nti vuttā vaṭṭadukkhā pamokkhaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0505a:818_19: nirodhasaccaṃ pana tassa visayabhāvena gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0505a:819_1: Evaṃ yakkhena sarūpena dassetvā ca adassetvā ca catusaccavasena pañhaṃ puṭṭho bhagavā teneva nayena vissajjento āha “pañca kāmaguṇā”ti.
atk-s0505a:819_2: Tattha pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātagocaraggahaṇena taggocarāni pañcāyatanāni gahitāneva honti.
atk-s0505a:819_5: Ettha ajjhattikesu chaṭṭhassa manāyatanassa gahaṇena tassa visayabhūtaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0505a:819_6: Evaṃ “katamaṃ taṃ upādāna”nti imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento punapi dvādasāyatanānaṃ vaseneva dukkhasaccaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0505a:819_7: Manogahaṇena vā sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ gahitattā tāsu purimapañcaviññāṇadhātuggahaṇena tāsaṃ vatthūni pañca cakkhādīni āyatanāni,
atk-s0505a:819_8: manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātuggahaṇena tāsaṃ vatthugocarabhedaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ gahitamevāti evampi dvādasāyatanavasena dukkhasaccaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0505a:820_0: Ettha chandaṃ virājetvāti ettha dvādasāyatanabhede dukkhasacce tānevāyatanāni khandhato dhātuto nāmarūpatoti tathā tathā vavatthapetvā,
atk-s0505a:820_2: vipassanto arahattamaggapariyosānāya vipassanāya taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ chandaṃ sabbaso virājetvā vinetvā viddhaṃsetvāti attho.
atk-s0505a:820_3: Evaṃ dukkhā pamuccatīti iminā pakārena etasmā vaṭṭadukkhā pamuccatīti.
atk-s0505a:820_5: kathaṃ dukkhā pamuccatī”ti ayaṃ pañho vissajjito hoti,
atk-s0505a:820_6: maggasaccañca pakāsitaṃ samudayanirodhasaccāni panettha purimanayeneva saṅgahitattā pakāsitāneva hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0505a:820_13: “Dukkhā pamuccatī”ti dukkhapamokkhena nirodhasaccanti evamettha cattāri saccāni pakāsitāni hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0505a:821_1: Evaṃ catusaccagabbhāya gāthāya lakkhaṇato niyyānaṃ pakāsetvā puna tadeva sakena niruttābhilāpena nigamento āha “etaṃ lokassa niyyāna”nti.
atk-s0505a:821_5: Etaṃ vo ahamakkhāmīti sacepi maṃ sahassakkhattuṃ puccheyyātha,
atk-s0505a:821_6: etaṃ vo ahamakkhāmi, na aññaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:821_9: Atha vā etena niyyānena ekadvattikkhatuṃ niggatānampi etaṃ vo ahamakkhāmi,
atk-s0505a:821_11: Yasmā evaṃ dukkhā pamuccati asesanissesāti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:821_12: Desanāpariyosāne dvepi yakkhasenāpatayo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu saddhiṃ yakkhasahassena.
atk-s0505a:822_1: Atha hemavato pakatiyāpi dhammagaru idāni ariyabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāya suṭṭhutaraṃ atitto bhagavato vicitrapaṭibhānāya
atk-s0505a:822_2: desanāya bhagavantaṃ sekkhāsekkhabhūmiṃ pucchanto “ko sūdha taratī”ti gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:822_3: Tattha ko sūdha tarati oghanti iminā caturoghaṃ ko taratīti sekkhabhūmiṃ pucchati avisesena.
atk-s0505a:822_4: Yasmā aṇṇavanti na vitthatamattaṃ nāpi gambhīramattaṃ apica pana yaṃ vitthatatarañca gambhīratarañca,
atk-s0505a:822_8: heṭṭhā patiṭṭhābhāvena upari ālambanābhāvena ca gambhīro,
atk-s0505a:822_10: tasmiñca appatiṭṭhe anālambe gambhīre aṇṇave ko na sīdatī”ti asekkhabhūmiṃ pucchati.
atk-s0505a:823_1: Atha bhagavā yo bhikkhu jīvitahetupi vītikkamaṃ akaronto sabbadā sīlasampanno lokiyalokuttarāya ca paññāya paññavā,
atk-s0505a:823_5: Yasmā so catutthena maggena imaṃ suduttaraṃ oghaṃ anavasesaṃ tarati,
atk-s0505a:823_6: tasmā sekkhabhūmiṃ vissajjento “sabbadā sīlasampanno”ti imaṃ tisikkhāgabbhaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:823_9: ajjhattacintitāpaññāhi adhipaññāsikkhāti tisso sikkhā saupakārā sānisaṃsā ca vuttā.
atk-s0505a:823_10: Upakāro hi sikkhānaṃ lokiyapaññā sati ca,
atk-s0505a:824_1: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya sekkhabhūmiṃ dassetvā idāni asekkhabhūmiṃ dassento dutiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:824_2: Tassattho virato kāmasaññāyāti yā kāci kāmasaññā,
atk-s0505a:824_7: Catūhipi maggehi dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ atītattā sabbasaṃyojanātigo,
atk-s0505a:824_9: tatratatrābhinandinītaṇhāsaṅkhātāya nandiyā tiṇṇañca bhavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā nandībhavaparikkhīṇo so tādiso
atk-s0505a:824_10: khīṇāsavo bhikkhu gambhīre saṃsāraṇṇave na sīdati nandīparikkhayena saupādisesaṃ,
atk-s0505a:824_11: bhavaparikkhayena ca anupādisesaṃ nibbānathalaṃ samāpajja paramassāsappattiyāti.
atk-s0505a:825_1: Atha hemavato sahāyañca yakkhaparisañca oloketvā pītisomanassajāto “gambhīrapañña”nti evamādīhi gāthāhi
atk-s0505a:825_2: bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā sabbāvatiyā parisāya sahāyena ca saddhiṃ abhivādetvā,
atk-s0505a:826_3: Vuttañhi tattha “gambhīresu khandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti gambhīrapaññā”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:826_4: Nipuṇatthadassinti nipuṇehi khattiyapaṇḍitādīhi abhisaṅkhatānaṃ pañhānaṃ atthadassiṃ atthānaṃ vā yāni
atk-s0505a:826_5: nipuṇāni kāraṇāni duppaṭivijjhāni aññehi tesaṃ dassanena nipuṇatthadassiṃ.
atk-s0505a:826_7: Duvidhe kāme tividhe ce bhave alagganena kāmabhave asattaṃ.
atk-s0505a:826_9: Dibbe pathe kamamānanti aṭṭhasamāpattibhede dibbe pathe samāpajjanavasena caṅkamantaṃ.
atk-s0505a:826_10: Tattha kiñcāpi na tāya velāya bhagavā dibbe pathe kamati,
atk-s0505a:826_11: apica kho pubbe kamanaṃ upādāya kamanasattisabbhāvena tattha laddhavasībhāvatāya evaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0505a:826_12: Atha vā ye te visuddhidevā arahanto,
atk-s0505a:827_1: Dutiyagāthāya aparena pariyāyena thuti āraddhāti katvā puna nipuṇatthadassiggahaṇaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0505a:827_4: Kāmālaye asattanti yvāyaṃkāmesu taṇhādiṭṭhivasena duvidho ālayo,
atk-s0505a:827_8: Sumedhanti tassa sabbaññubhāvassa maggabhūtāya pāramīpaññāsaṅkhātāya medhāya samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0505a:827_11: Kamamānanti paññāya ajjhogāhamānaṃ maggalakkhaṇaṃ ñatvā desanato,
atk-s0505a:828_5: Suppabhātaṃ suhuṭṭhitanti ajja amhākaṃ suṭṭhu pabhātaṃ sobhanaṃ vā pabhātaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0505a:828_6: Ajja ca no sundaraṃ uṭṭhitaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0505a:828_10: yasmā sambuddhaṃ addasāmāti attano lābhasampattiṃ ārabbha pāmojjaṃ pavedeti.
atk-s0505a:830_5: svākkhāto vata bhagavato dhammo”tiādinā nayena buddhasubodhitañca dhammasudhammatañca.
atk-s0505a:830_7: suppaṭipattiñca abhitthavitvā abhitthavitvā namassamānā dhammaghosakā hutvā vicarissāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:834_5: Āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavaneti ettha pana kā āḷavī,
atk-s0505a:834_6: kasmā ca bhagavā tassa yakkhassa bhavane viharatīti? Vuccate –
atk-s0505a:834_9: Āḷavīnagarassa hi samīpe viharantopi “āḷaviyaṃ viharatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:834_10: Tassa ca nagarassa samīpe avidūre gāvutamatte taṃ bhavanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:835_0: Yasmā pana āḷavako rājā vividhanāṭakūpabhogaṃ chaḍḍetvā corapaṭibāhanatthaṃ paṭirājanisedhanatthaṃ byāyāmakaraṇatthañca
atk-s0505a:835_1: sattame sattame divase migavaṃ gacchanto ekadivasaṃ balakāyena saddhiṃ katikaṃ akāsi –
atk-s0505a:835_5: javasampanno rājā dhanuṃ gahetvā pattikova tiyojanaṃ taṃ migaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0505a:835_7: Atha parikkhīṇajavaṃ taṃ migaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0505a:835_10: anatthikopi maṃsena “nāsakkhi migaṃ gahetu”nti apavādamocanatthaṃ kājenādāya āgacchanto nagarassāvidūre
atk-s0505a:835_11: bahalapattapalāsaṃ mahānigrodhaṃ disvā parissamavinodanatthaṃ tassa mūlamupagato.
atk-s0505a:835_12: Tasmiñca nigrodhe āḷavako yakkho mahārājasantikā varaṃ labhitvā majjhanhikasamaye tassa rukkhassa chāyāya
atk-s0505a:835_15: Atha rājā tena saddhiṃ katikaṃ akāsi –
atk-s0505a:835_17: ahaṃ te divase divase manussañca thālipākañca pesessāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:835_19: ahaṃ pana bhavanaṃ anupagatañca ananuññātañca khādituṃ na labhāmi,
atk-s0505a:835_22: taṃ divasaṃ maṃ gahetvā khādāhī”ti attānaṃ anujānitvā tena mutto nagarābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:836_0: Balakāyo magge khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā ṭhito rājānaṃ disvā – “kiṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0505a:836_1: ayasamattabhayā evaṃ kilantosī”ti vadanto paccuggantvā paṭiggahesi.
atk-s0505a:836_2: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ anārocetvā nagaraṃ gantvā,
atk-s0505a:836_10: aparicchinne pana janapadassa ābādho bhavissati. Hotu, deva,
atk-s0505a:836_14: So kālasseva vuṭṭhāya bandhanāgāraṃ gantvā ye ye vajjhā honti,
atk-s0505a:836_18: Yo paṭhamaṃ nikkhamati taṃ gehaṃ netvā, nhāpetvā,
atk-s0505a:836_21: Taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ paviṭṭhamattaṃyeva yakkho bheravaṃ attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā mūlakandaṃ viya khādati.
atk-s0505a:836_22: Yakkhānubhāvena kira manussānaṃ kesādīni upādāya sakalasarīraṃ navanītapiṇḍo viya hoti.
atk-s0505a:836_23: Yakkhassa bhattaṃ gāhāpettuṃ gatapurisā taṃ disvā bhītā yathāmittaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:836_24: Tato pabhuti “rājā core gahetvā yakkhassa detī”ti manussā corakammato paṭiviratā.
atk-s0505a:836_25: Tato aparena samayena navacorānaṃ abhāvena purāṇacorānañca parikkhayena bandhanāgārāni suññāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:837_8: amhākaṃ pitāmahaṃ pesetī’ti manussā khobhaṃ karissanti,
atk-s0505a:837_9: mā vo etaṃ ruccī”ti nivāresi. “Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0505a:837_11: tathāvidhassa hi ‘mātā me pitā me’ti sineho natthī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:837_14: Nagare dārakamātaro ca dārake gahetvā gabbhiniyo ca palāyitvā parajanapade dārake saṃvaḍḍhetvā ānenti.
atk-s0505a:838_0: Tato ekadivasaṃ sakalanagaraṃ vicinitvā ekampi dārakaṃ alabhitvā rañño ārocesuṃ – “natthi, deva,
atk-s0505a:838_1: nagare dārako ṭhapetvā antepure tava puttaṃ āḷavakakumāra”nti.
atk-s0505a:838_6: tampi datvā mama jīvitaṃ rakkhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:838_7: Tena ca samayena āḷavakakumārassa mātā puttaṃ nhāpetvā, maṇḍetvā,
atk-s0505a:838_11: Rājapurisā rañño āṇāya tattha gantvā vippalapantiyā tassā soḷasannañca itthisahassānaṃ saddhiṃ dhātiyā
atk-s0505a:838_13: Taṃ divasañca bhagavā paccūsasamaye paccuṭṭhāya jetavanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ
atk-s0505a:838_14: samāpajjitvā puna buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento addasa āḷavakassa kumārassa anāgāmiphaluppattiyā upanissayaṃ,
atk-s0505a:838_15: yakkhassa ca sotāpattiphaluppattiyā upanissayaṃ desanāpariyosāne ca caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammacakkhupaṭilābhassāti.
atk-s0505a:838_16: Tasmā vibhātāya rattiyā purebhattakiccaṃ katvā aniṭṭhitapacchābhattakiccova kāḷapakkhauposathadivase
atk-s0505a:838_17: vattamāne oggate sūriye ekakova adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya pādagamaneneva sāvatthito tiṃsa yojanāni gantvā
atk-s0505a:839_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā yasmiṃ nigrodhe āḷavakassa bhavanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:839_4: Yatheva hi yakkhā attano bhavanaṃ passanti,
atk-s0505a:839_7: Tadā āḷavako himavante yakkhasamāgamaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0505a:839_8: Tato āḷavakassa dvārapālo gadrabho nāma yakkho bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0505a:839_10: bhagavā vikāle āgato”ti āha. “Āma, gadrabha, āgatomhi.
atk-s0505a:839_12: vihareyyāmekarattiṃ āḷavakassa bhavane”ti. “Na me, bhante, garu,
atk-s0505a:839_13: apica kho so yakkho kakkhaḷo pharuso,
atk-s0505a:839_15: mā rucci bhagavato idha vāso”ti. “Jānāmi, gadrabha,
atk-s0505a:840_5: pādepi gahetvā parasamudde vā paracakkavāḷe vā khipatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:840_14: pādepi gahetvā parasamudde vā paracakkavāḷe vā khipatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:840_18: apica kho so yakkho attano anārocetvā anujānantaṃ maṃ jīvitā voropeyya, ārocemi, bhante, tassā”ti.
atk-s0505a:840_21: tvameva jānāhī”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā himavantābhimukho pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a:840_23: Bhagavā antobhavanaṃ pavisitvā yattha abhilakkhitesu maṅgaladivasādīsu nisīditvā āḷavako siriṃ anubhoti,
atk-s0505a:840_33: mā aññamaññaṃ issāmacchariyābhibhūtā viharathā”tiādinā nayena tāsaṃ pakiṇṇakadhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0505a:840_37: Gadrabhopi himavantaṃ gantvā āḷavakassa ārocesi – “yagghe, mārisa,
atk-s0505a:841_0: Tadā sātāgirahemavatā bhagavantaṃ jetavaneyeva vanditvā “yakkhasamāgamaṃ gamissāmā”ti saparivārā nānāyānehi ākāsena gacchanti.
atk-s0505a:841_1: Ākāse ca yakkhānaṃ na sabbattha maggo atthi,
atk-s0505a:841_2: ākāsaṭṭhāni vimānāni pariharitvā maggaṭṭhāneneva maggo hoti.
atk-s0505a:841_3: Āḷavakassa pana vimānaṃ bhūmaṭṭhaṃ suguttaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ susaṃvihitadvāraṭṭālakagopuraṃ,
atk-s0505a:841_6: Te taṃ padesamāgamma gantuṃ asamatthā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:841_9: Te “kimida”nti āvajjetvā bhagavantaṃ disvā ākāse khittaleḍḍu viya oruyha vanditvā,
atk-s0505a:841_11: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā “yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchāma bhagavā”ti tīṇi vatthūni pasaṃsantā yakkhasamāgamaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:841_12: Āḷavako te disvā “idha nisīdathā”ti paṭikkamma okāsamadāsi.
atk-s0505a:841_19: Tena vuttaṃ “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane”ti.
atk-s0505a:842_5: ayañhi yasmā assaddhassa saddhākathā dukkathā hoti dussīlādīnaṃ sīlādikathā viya,
atk-s0505a:842_6: tasmā tesaṃ yakkhānaṃ santikā bhagavato pasaṃsaṃ sutvā eva aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya abbhantarakopena
atk-s0505a:842_11: yo tusitabhavane ṭhito pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā”tiādinā nayena yāva dhammacakkappavattanaṃ kathentā
atk-s0505a:842_12: paṭisandhiādinā dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni vatvā “imānipi tvaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0505a:842_15: Āvuso āḷavaka passeyyāsi vā tvaṃ, na vā,
atk-s0505a:842_16: ko tayā attho passatā vā apassatā vā,
atk-s0505a:842_18: yo tvaṃ taṃ upanidhāya calakkakudhamahāusabhasamīpe tadahujātavacchako viya,
atk-s0505a:842_24: Evaṃ vutte kuddho āḷavako uṭṭhahitvā manosilātale vāmapādena ṭhatvā “passatha dāni tumhākaṃ vā satthā mahānubhāvo,
atk-s0505a:842_25: ahaṃ vā”ti dakkhiṇapādena saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ kelāsapabbatakūṭaṃ akkami,
atk-s0505a:842_26: taṃ ayokūṭapahaṭo niddhantaayopiṇḍo viya papaṭikāyo muñci.
atk-s0505a:843_1: yañca puṇṇako yakkhasenāpati dhanañcayakorabyarājānaṃ jūte jinitvā apphoṭetvā “ahaṃ jini”nti ugghosesi,
atk-s0505a:843_2: yañca sakko devānamindo kassapassa bhagavato sāsane parihāyamāne vissakammaṃ devaputtaṃ sunakhaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0505a:843_3: “ahaṃ pāpabhikkhū ca pāpabhikkhuniyo ca upāsake ca upāsikāyo ca sabbeva adhammavādino khādāmī”ti ugghosāpesi,
atk-s0505a:843_4: yañca kusajātake pabhāvatihetu sattahi rājūhi nagare uparuddhe pabhāvatiṃ attanā saha hatthikkhandhaṃ
atk-s0505a:843_5: āropetvā nagarā nikkhamma “ahaṃ sīhassarakusamahārājā”ti mahāpuriso ugghosesi,
atk-s0505a:843_7: Tadā hi sakalajambudīpe dvāre dvāre ṭhatvā ugghositasadisaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0505a:843_8: tiyojanasahassavitthato ca himavāpi saṅkampi yakkhassa ānubhāvena.
atk-s0505a:844_2: Te puratthimādibhedā vātā samuṭṭhahitvā aḍḍhayojanayojanadviyojanatiyojanappamāṇāni pabbatakūṭāni padāletvā
atk-s0505a:844_3: vanagaccharukkhādīni ummūletvā āḷavīnagaraṃ pakkhantā jiṇṇahatthisālādīni cuṇṇentā chadaniṭṭhakā ākāse bhamentā.
atk-s0505a:844_5: Te vātā dasabalaṃ patvā cīvarakaṇṇamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:844_6: Tato mahāvassaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “udakena ajjhottharitvā samaṇaṃ māressāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:844_7: Tassānubhāvena uparūpari satapaṭalasahassapaṭalādibhedā valāhakā uṭṭhahitvā vassiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:844_9: vanarukkhādīnaṃ upari mahogho āgantvā dasabalassa cīvare ussāvabindumattampi temetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0505a:844_11: mahantāni mahantāni pabbatakūṭāni dhūmāyantāni pajjalantāni ākāsenāgantvā dasabalaṃ patvā dibbamālāguḷāni sampajjiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:844_13: ekatodhārāubhatodhārā asisattikhurappādayo dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalaṃ patvā dibbapupphāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:844_15: kiṃsukavaṇṇā aṅgārā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā vikiriṃsu.
atk-s0505a:844_17: accuṇho kukkulo ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle candanacuṇṇaṃ hutvā nipati.
atk-s0505a:844_19: atisukhumā vālukā dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:844_21: taṃ kalalavassaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbagandhaṃ hutvā nipati.
atk-s0505a:844_23: Taṃ caturaṅgasamannāgatandhakārasadisaṃ hutvā dasabalaṃ patvā sūriyappabhāvihatamivandhakāraṃ antaradhāyi.
atk-s0505a:845_1: palāpetuṃ asakkonto nānāvidhapaharaṇahatthāya anekappakārarūpabhūtagaṇasamākulāya caturaṅginiyā senāya
atk-s0505a:845_3: Te bhūtagaṇā anekappakāre vikāre katvā “gaṇhatha hanathā”ti bhagavato upari āgacchantā viya honti,
atk-s0505a:845_6: Evaṃ santepi yathā bodhimaṇḍe māro āgatavelāyameva nivatto,
atk-s0505a:845_8: Evaṃ upaḍḍharattimattaṃ anekappakāravibhiṃsanadassanenapi bhagavantaṃ cāletumasakkonto āḷavako cintesi –
atk-s0505a:846_5: Yadi hi sakko kuddho vajirāvudhaṃ sinerumatthake pahareyya aṭṭhasaṭṭhisahassādhikayojanasatasahassaṃ sineruṃ vinivijjhitvā heṭṭhato gaccheyya.
atk-s0505a:846_6: Vessavaṇassa puthujjanakāle vissajjitagadā bahūnaṃ yakkhasahassānaṃ sīsaṃ pātetvā puna hatthapāsaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0505a:846_7: Yamena kuddhena nayanāvudhena olokitamatte anekāni kumbhaṇḍasahassāni tattakapāle tilā viya vipphurantāni vinassanti.
atk-s0505a:846_8: Āḷavako kuddho sace ākāse dussāvudhaṃ muñceyya,
atk-s0505a:846_11: sabbarukkhatiṇādīni sussitvā dvādasavassantaraṃ na puna ruheyyuṃ.
atk-s0505a:846_16: So evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ dussāvudhaṃ uttarīyakataṃ muñcitvā aggahesi.
atk-s0505a:847_0: Atha āḷavako bhagavato samīpe uparūpari vicaritvā vatthāvudhaṃ muñci.
atk-s0505a:847_1: Taṃ asanivicakkaṃ viya ākāse bheravasaddaṃ karontaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ bhagavantaṃ patvā yakkhassa
atk-s0505a:847_3: Āḷavako taṃ disvā chinnavisāṇo viya usabho,
atk-s0505a:847_15: kasmā mayā ananuññāto mama bhavanaṃ pavisitvā gharasāmiko viya itthāgārassa majjhe nisinnosi,
atk-s0505a:847_16: nanu ayuttametaṃ samaṇassa yadidaṃ adinnapaṭibhogo itthisaṃsaggo ca,
atk-s0505a:847_19: Eke pana “etāni aññāni ca pharusavacanāni vatvā evāyaṃ etadavocā”ti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0505a:848_0: Atha bhagavā “yasmā thaddho paṭithaddhabhāvena vinetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0505a:848_1: so hi paṭithaddhabhāve kariyamāne seyyathāpi caṇḍassa kukkurassa nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyya,
atk-s0505a:848_4: mudunā pana so sakkā vinetu”nti ñatvā “sādhāvuso”ti piyavacanena tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā nikkhami.
atk-s0505a:849_0: Tato āḷavako “suvaco vatāyaṃ samaṇo ekavacaneneva nikkhanto,
atk-s0505a:849_1: evaṃ nāma nikkhametuṃ sukhaṃ samaṇaṃ akāraṇenevāhaṃ sakalarattiṃ yuddhena abbhuyyāsi”nti muducitto hutvā puna cintesi “idānipi na sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-s0505a:849_6: Atha “suvaco”ti mudubhūtacittavavatthānakaraṇatthaṃ punapi piyavacanaṃ vadanto sādhāvusoti bhagavā pāvisi.
atk-s0505a:849_7: Āḷavako punappunaṃ tameva suvacabhāvaṃ vīmaṃsanto dutiyampi tatiyampi “nikkhama pavisā”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:849_10: pakatiyāpi thaddhayakkhassa cittaṃ thaddhataraṃ hutvā dhammakathāya bhājanaṃ na bhaveyya.
atk-s0505a:849_11: Tasmā yathā nāma mātā rodantaṃ puttakaṃ yaṃ so icchati,
atk-s0505a:849_12: taṃ datvā vā katvā vā saññāpeti,
atk-s0505a:849_13: tathā bhagavā kilesarodanena rodantaṃ yakkhaṃ saññāpetuṃ yaṃ so bhaṇati,
atk-s0505a:849_15: Yathā ca dhātī thaññaṃ apivantaṃ dārakaṃ kiñci datvā upalāḷetvā pāyeti,
atk-s0505a:849_16: tathā bhagavā yakkhaṃ lokuttaradhammakhīraṃ pāyetuṃ tassa patthitavacanakaraṇena upalāḷento evamakāsi.
atk-s0505a:849_17: Yathā ca puriso lābumhi catumadhuraṃ pūretukāmo tassabbhantaraṃ sodheti,
atk-s0505a:849_18: evaṃ bhagavā yakkhassa citte lokuttaracatumadhuraṃ pūretukāmo tassa abbhantare kodhamalaṃ sodhetuṃ yāva tatiyaṃ nikkhamanapavesanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0505a:850_3: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ evamevaṃ sakalarattiṃ kilametvā,
atk-s0505a:850_5: pāragaṅgāya khipeyya”nti pāpakaṃ citaṃ uppādetvā catutthavāraṃ āha –
atk-s0505a:850_7: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā “na khvāhaṃ ta”nti āha.
atk-s0505a:850_8: “Evaṃ vutte taduttariṃ karaṇīyaṃ pariyesamāno pañhaṃ pucchitabbaṃ maññissati,
atk-s0505a:850_9: taṃ dhammakathāya mukhaṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “na khvāhaṃ ta”nti āha.
atk-s0505a:851_0: Tato āḷavako yasmā pubbepi ākāsenāgamanavelāyaṃ “kiṃ nu kho,
atk-s0505a:851_3: handa naṃ passāmā”ti evaṃ attano vimānaṃ āgate iddhimante tāpasaparibbājake pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjetumasakkonte cittakkhepādīhi viheṭheti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0505a:851_4: Amanussā hi bhiṃsanakarūpadassanena vā hadayavatthuparimaddanena vāti dvīhākārehi cittakkhepaṃ karonti.
atk-s0505a:851_5: Ayaṃ pana yasmā “iddhimanto bhiṃsanakarūpadassanena na tasantī”ti ñatvā attano iddhippabhāvena sukhumattabhāvaṃ nimminitvā,
atk-s0505a:851_10: pādepi ne gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipati “māssu me puna evarūpā bhavanamāgamiṃsū”ti,
atk-s0505a:851_11: tasmā te pañhe saritvā “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ idāni evaṃ viheṭheyya”nti cintetvā āha “pañhaṃ taṃ samaṇā”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:852_1: Tassa kira mātāpitaro kassapaṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsitvā aṭṭha pañhe savissajjane uggahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:852_4: Tato “ime pañhāpi mā vinassantū”ti suvaṇṇapaṭṭe jātihiṅgulakena likhāpetvā vimāne nikkhipi.
atk-s0505a:852_6: Bhagavā taṃ sutvā yasmā buddhānaṃ pariccattalābhantarāyo vā jīvitantarāyo vā sabbaññutaññāṇabyāmappabhānaṃ paṭighāto vā na sakkā kenaci kātuṃ,
atk-s0505a:852_7: tasmā taṃ loke asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ dassento āha “na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0505a:853_0: Tattha “sadevakavacanena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇa”ntiādinā nayena etesaṃ padānaṃ atthamattadassanena saṅkhepo vutto,
atk-s0505a:853_3: sadevakavacanena hi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbadevesu gahitesupi yesaṃ tattha sannipatite devagaṇe vimati
atk-s0505a:853_4: ahosi “māro mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī paccanīkasāto dhammadessī kururakammanto,
atk-s0505a:853_9: “brahmā mahānubhāvo ekaṅguliyā ekacakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ karoti, dvīhi…pe…
atk-s0505a:853_14: Atha yesaṃ ahosi “puthu samaṇabrāhmaṇā sāsanassa paccatthikā paccāmittā mantādibalasamannāgatā,
atk-s0505a:853_17: Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṭṭhānesu kassaci abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sadevamanussāyāti vacanena sammutideve avasesamanusse
atk-s0505a:853_18: ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavaseneva sesasattalokepi kassaci abhāvaṃ dassesīti evamettha anusandhiyojanākkamo
atk-s0505a:854_0: Evaṃ bhagavā tassa bādhanacittaṃ paṭisedhetvā pañhapucchane ussāhaṃ janento āha “apica tvaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0505a:854_6: te sabbaṃ vissajjessāmī”ti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi asādhāraṇaṃ paccekabuddhaaggasāvakamahāsāvakehi.
atk-s0505a:855_0: “Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasī”ti vā. ;
atk-s0505a:857_0: Katāvakāsā pucchavho, yaṃ kiñci manasicchathā”ti vā. –
atk-s0505a:858_2: yaṃ bhagavā buddhabhūmiṃ patvā evaṃ pavāraṇaṃ pavāreyya,
atk-s0505a:859_0: “Koṇḍañña pañhāni viyākarohi, yācanti taṃ isayo sādhurūpā;
atk-s0505a:860_0: Koṇḍañña eso manujesu dhammo, yaṃ vuddhamāgacchati esa bhāro”ti. –
atk-s0505a:862_0: “Katāvakāsā pucchantu bhonto, yaṃ kiñci pañhaṃ manasābhipatthitaṃ;
atk-s0505a:863_0: Ahañhi taṃ taṃ vo viyākarissaṃ, ñatvā sayaṃ lokamimaṃ parañcā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:864_0: Evaṃ sarabhaṅgakāle sambhavajātake ca sakalajambudīpe tikkhattuṃ vicaritvā pañhānaṃ antakaraṃ adisvā
atk-s0505a:864_1: jātiyā sattavassiko rathikāya paṃsukīḷikaṃ kīḷanto suciratena brāhmaṇena puṭṭho –
atk-s0505a:866_0: Rājā ca kho naṃ jānāti, yadi kāhati vā na vā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:867_1: Evaṃ bhagavatā āḷavakassa sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāritāya atha kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi “kiṃ sūdha vitta”nti.
atk-s0505a:868_10: appetīti vuttaṃ hoti haveti daḷhatthe nipāto.
atk-s0505a:868_20: Evamimāya gāthāya “kiṃ su idha loke purisassa vittaṃ seṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:868_23: kathaṃjīvino jīvitaṃ seṭṭhamāhū”ti ime cattāro pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0505a:869_1: Athassa bhagavā kassapadasabalena vissajjitanayeneva vissajjento imaṃ gāthamāha “saddhīdha vitta”nti.
atk-s0505a:869_2: Tattha yathā hiraññasuvaṇṇādi vittaṃ upabhogaparibhogasukhaṃ āvahati,
atk-s0505a:871_0: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. –
atk-s0505a:872_1: Yasmā panetaṃ saddhāvittaṃ anugāmikaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ sabbasampattihetu,
atk-s0505a:872_3: Saddhoyeva hi dānādīni puññāni katvā vittaṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0505a:872_4: assaddhassa pana vittaṃ yāvadeva anatthāya hoti,
atk-s0505a:873_5: pariyosāne ca mahāpadumādīnaṃ viya nibbānasukhañca āvahatīti.
atk-s0505a:874_0: Saccanti ayaṃ saccasaddo anekesu atthesu dissati.
atk-s0505a:874_12: viratisaccaṃ vā abbhantaraṃ katvā vācāsaccaṃ adhippetaṃ,
atk-s0505a:874_13: yassānubhāvena udakādīni vase vattenti jātijarāmaraṇapāraṃ taranti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:875_0: “Saccena vācenudakampi dhāvati, visampi saccena hananti paṇḍitā;
atk-s0505a:876_0: Saccena devo thanayaṃ pavassati, sacce ṭhitā nibbutiṃ patthayanti.
atk-s0505a:877_0: “Ye kecime atthi rasā pathabyā, saccaṃ tesaṃ sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ;
atk-s0505a:878_0: Sacce ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, taranti jātimaraṇassa pāra”nti. ;
atk-s0505a:879_6: sabbaṃ phalarasaṃ arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo, ye te, brāhmaṇa, rūparasā,
atk-s0505a:879_10: bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassā”tiādinā nayena vācārasūpavajjā avasesabyañjanādayo dhammā “rasā”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0505a:879_11: tesaṃ rasānaṃ saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ saccameva sādutaraṃ,
atk-s0505a:879_19: attharasadhammarasā ca tadadhigamūpāyabhūtaṃ atthañca dhammañca nissāya pavattitoti.
atk-s0505a:880_0: Paññājīvinti ettha pana yvāyaṃ andhekacakkhudvicakkhukesu dvicakkhupuggalo gahaṭṭho vā kammantānuṭṭhānasaraṇagamanadānasaṃvibhāgasīlasamādānauposathakammādigahaṭṭhapaṭipadaṃ,
atk-s0505a:880_1: pabbajito vā avippaṭisārakarasīlasaṅkhātaṃ taduttaricittavisuddhiādibhedaṃ vā pabbajitapaṭipadaṃ paññāya ārādhetvā jīvati,
atk-s0505a:880_3: taṃ vā paññājīviṃ jīvitaṃ seṭṭhamāhūti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0505a:881_1: Evaṃ bhagavatā vissajjite cattāropi pañhe sutvā attamano yakkho avasesepi cattāro pañhe pucchanto “kathaṃ su tarati ogha”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:881_2: Athassa bhagavā purimanayeneva vissajjento “saddhāya taratī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:881_3: Tattha kiñcāpi yo catubbidhaṃ oghaṃ tarati,
atk-s0505a:881_7: evaṃ santepi pana yasmā assaddho oghataraṇaṃ asaddahanto na pakkhandati,
atk-s0505a:881_8: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittavossaggena pamatto tattheva sattavisattatāya saṃsāraṇṇavaṃ na tarati,
atk-s0505a:881_9: kusīto dukkhaṃ viharati vokiṇṇo akusalehi dhammehi,
atk-s0505a:881_11: tasmā tappaṭipakkhaṃ dassentena bhagavatā ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.
atk-s0505a:882_0: Evaṃ vuttāya cetāya yasmā sotāpattiyaṅgapadaṭṭhānaṃ saddhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:882_1: tasmā “saddhāya tarati ogha”nti iminā padena diṭṭhoghataraṇaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ sotāpannañca pakāseti.
atk-s0505a:882_2: Yasmā pana sotāpanno kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya sātaccakiriyāsaṅkhātena appamādena samannāgato dutiyamaggaṃ
atk-s0505a:882_3: ārādhetvā ṭhapetvā sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgamanamattaṃ avasesaṃ sotāpattimaggena atiṇṇaṃ bhavoghavatthuṃ
atk-s0505a:882_5: tasmā “appamādena aṇṇava”nti iminā padena bhavoghataraṇaṃ sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sakadāgāmiñca pakāseti.
atk-s0505a:882_6: Yasmā sakadāgāmī vīriyena tatiyamaggaṃ ārādhetvā sakadāgāmimaggena anatītaṃ kāmoghavatthuṃ;
atk-s0505a:882_8: tasmā “vīriyena dukkhamaccetī”ti iminā padena kāmoghataraṇaṃ anāgāmimaggaṃ anāgāmiñca pakāseti.
atk-s0505a:882_9: Yasmā pana anāgāmī vigatakāmapaṅkatāya parisuddhāya paññāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ catutthamaggapaññaṃ ārādhetvā
atk-s0505a:882_11: tasmā “paññāya parisujjhatī”ti iminā padena avijjoghataraṇaṃ arahattamaggaṃ arahantañca pakāseti.
atk-s0505a:882_12: Imāya ca arahattanikūṭena kathitāya gāthāya pariyosāne yakkho sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:883_1: Idāni tameva “paññāya parisujjhatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ paññāpadaṃ gahetvā attano paṭibhānena lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ
atk-s0505a:883_2: pañhaṃ pucchanto “kathaṃ su labhate pañña”nti imaṃ chappadagāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:883_3: Tattha kathaṃ sūti sabbattheva atthayuttipucchā hoti.
atk-s0505a:883_4: Ayañhi paññādiatthaṃ ñatvā tassa yuttiṃ pucchati “kathaṃ kāya yuttiyā kena kāraṇena paññaṃ labhatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:884_1: Athassa bhagavā catūhi kāraṇehi paññālābhaṃ dassento “saddahāno”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:884_4: aparabhāge ca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedena dhammena arahanto buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā nibbānaṃ pattā,
atk-s0505a:884_5: taṃ saddahāno arahataṃ dhammaṃ nibbānappattiyā lokiyalokuttaraṃ paññaṃ labhati.
atk-s0505a:884_11: tasmā upasaṅkamanato pabhuti yāva dhammassavanena sussūsaṃ labhati.
atk-s0505a:884_13: taṃ dhammaṃ saddahitvāpi ācariyupajjhāye kālena upasaṅkamitvā vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kiñci vattukāmā honti.
atk-s0505a:884_14: Atha adhigatāya sotukāmatāya sotaṃ odahitvā suṇanto labhatīti.
atk-s0505a:884_15: Evaṃ susūsampi ca satiavippavāsena appamatto subhāsitadubbhāsitaññutāya vicakkhaṇo eva labhati, na itaro.
atk-s0505a:885_0: Evaṃ yasmā saddhāya paññālābhasaṃvattanikaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0505a:885_3: vicakkhaṇatāya anūnādhikaṃ aviparītañca gahetvā vitthārikaṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:885_4: Sussūsāya vā ohitasoto paññāpaṭilābhahetuṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti,
atk-s0505a:885_8: tasmāssa bhagavā “kathaṃ su labhate pañña”nti puṭṭho imāni cattāri kāraṇāni dassento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0505a:886_1: Idāni tato pare tayo pañhe vissajjento “patirūpakārī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:886_2: Tattha desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa vā dhanassa patirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ karotīti patirūpakārī.
atk-s0505a:886_5: tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatī”tiādinā nayena kāyikavīriyavasena uṭṭhānasampanno asithilaparakkamo.
atk-s0505a:886_6: Vindate dhananti ekamūsikāya na cirasseva dvesatasahassasaṅkhaṃ cūḷantevāsī viya lokiyadhanañca,
atk-s0505a:886_8: So hi “tīhi iriyāpathehi viharissāmī”ti vattaṃ katvā thinamiddhāgamanavelāya palālacumbaṭakaṃ temetvā,
atk-s0505a:886_11: thinamiddhaṃ paṭibāhento dvādasahi vassehi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0505a:886_13: paramatthasaccenāpi “buddho paccekabuddho ariyasāvako”ti evaṃ kittiṃ pappoti.
atk-s0505a:886_14: Dadanti yaṃkiñci icchitapatthitaṃ dadanto mittāni ganthati,
atk-s0505a:886_17: dānamukhena vā cattāripi saṅgahavatthūni gahitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0505a:887_1: Evaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇena lokiyalokuttaramissakena nayena cattāro pañhe vissajjetvā idāni
atk-s0505a:887_2: “kathaṃ pecca na socatī”ti imaṃ pañcamaṃ pañhaṃ gahaṭṭhavasena vissajjento āha “yassete”ti.
atk-s0505a:887_4: yassa “saddahāno arahata”nti ettha vuttāya sabbakalyāṇadhammuppādikāya saddhāya samannāgatattā saddhassa
atk-s0505a:887_5: gharamesino gharāvāsaṃ pañca vā kāmaguṇe esantassa gavesantassa kāmabhogino gahaṭṭhassa “saccena kittiṃ
atk-s0505a:887_7: “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsapaññānāmena vutto dhammo,
atk-s0505a:887_8: “dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena ca vuttā dhīti,
atk-s0505a:887_9: “dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakāro cāgo cāti ete caturo dhammā santi.
atk-s0505a:887_10: Sa ve pecca na socatīti idhalokā paralokaṃ gantvā sa ve na socatīti.
atk-s0505a:888_1: Evaṃ bhagavā pañcamampi pañhaṃ vissajjetvā taṃ yakkhaṃ codento āha –
atk-s0505a:888_4: Aññepīti aññepi dhamme puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchassu,
atk-s0505a:888_5: aññepi vā pūraṇādayo sabbaññupaṭiññe puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchassu.
atk-s0505a:888_6: Yadi amhehi “saccena kittiṃ pappotī”ti ettha vuttappakārā saccā bhiyyo kittippattikāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0505a:888_7: “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsanapaññāpadesena vuttā damā bhiyyo lokiyalokuttarapaññāpaṭilābhakāraṇaṃ vā.
atk-s0505a:888_8: “Dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakārā cāgā bhiyyo mittaganthanakāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0505a:888_9: “dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha taṃ taṃ atthavasaṃ paṭicca dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena ca vuttāya mahābhārasahanaṭṭhena
atk-s0505a:888_10: ussoḷhībhāvappattāya vīriyasaṅkhātāya khantyā bhiyyo lokiyalokuttaradhanavindanakāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0505a:888_11: “saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo”ti evaṃ vuttehi imeheva catūhi dhammehi bhiyyo asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ pecca
atk-s0505a:888_12: asocanakāraṇaṃ vā idha vijjatīti ayamettha saddhiṃ saṅkhepayojanāya atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0505a:888_13: Vitthārato pana ekamekaṃ padaṃ atthuddhārapaduddhāravaṇṇanānayehi vibhajitvā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:889_1: Evaṃ vutte yakkho yena saṃsayena aññe puccheyya,
atk-s0505a:889_3: puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇeti vatvā yepissa apucchanakāraṇaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0505a:889_8: Yo atthoti ettāvatā “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ dasseti samparāyikoti
atk-s0505a:889_9: iminā “yassete caturo dhammā”ti vuttaṃ pecca sokābhāvakaraṃ samparāyikaṃ.
atk-s0505a:889_11: Ayañhi atthasaddo “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti evamādīsu pāṭhatthe vattati.
atk-s0505a:889_20: taṃ yohaṃ ajja bhagavatā vuttanayena sāmaṃyeva pajānāmi,
atk-s0505a:889_21: so kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇeti evamettha saṅkhepato attho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:890_1: Evaṃ yakkho “pajānāmi yo attho samparāyiko”ti vatvā tassa ñāṇassa bhagavaṃmūlakattaṃ dassento “atthāya vata me buddho”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:890_4: Yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalanti “yassete caturo dhammā”ti ettha vuttacāgena yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:891_1: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya attano hitādhigamaṃ dassetvā idāni parahitāya paṭipattiṃ dīpento āha “so ahaṃ vicarissāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:892_0: Evamimāya gāthāya pariyosānañca rattivibhāyanañca sādhukārasadduṭṭhānañca āḷavakakumārassa yakkhassa bhavanaṃ ānayanañca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0505a:892_1: Rājapurisā sādhukārasaddaṃ sutvā “evarūpo sādhukārasaddo ṭhapetvā buddhe na aññesaṃ abbhuggacchati,
atk-s0505a:892_2: āgato nu kho bhagavā”ti āvajjentā bhagavato sarīrappabhaṃ disvā,
atk-s0505a:892_10: handa naṃ khāda vā bhuñja vā,
atk-s0505a:892_12: So sotāpannattā lajjito visesato ca bhagavato purato evaṃ vuccamāno,
atk-s0505a:892_13: atha taṃ kumāraṃ ubhohi hatthehi paṭiggahetvā bhagavato upanāmesi –
atk-s0505a:892_18: bhagavā imaṃ dārakaṃ imassa hitatthāya sukhatthāyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:894_0: Udaggacitto sumano dadāmi te, paṭiggaha lokahitāya cakkhumā”ti.
atk-s0505a:895_1: paṭiggaṇhanto ca yakkhassa ca kumārassa ca maṅgalakaraṇatthaṃ pādūnagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:895_2: Taṃ yakkho kumāraṃ saraṇaṃ gamento tikkhattuṃ catutthapādena pūreti.
atk-s0505a:899_0: Ayaṃ kumāro saraṇamupeti buddhaṃ…pe… dhammaṃ…pe… saṅgha”nti.
atk-s0505a:900_2: Evaṃ so kumāro rājapurisānaṃ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṃ yakkhassa hatthato bhagavato hatthaṃ,
atk-s0505a:900_3: bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṃ hatthaṃ gatattā nāmato “hatthako āḷavako”ti jāto.
atk-s0505a:900_4: Taṃ ādāya paṭinivatte rājapurise disvā kassakavanakammikādayo “kiṃ yakkho kumāraṃ atidaharattā na icchatī”ti bhītā pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:900_7: Tato “sādhu sādhū”ti sakalaṃ āḷavīnagaraṃ ekakolāhalena yakkhābhimukhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0505a:900_8: Yakkhopi bhagavato bhikkhācārakāle anuppatte pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā upaḍḍhamaggaṃ āgantvā nivatti.
atk-s0505a:901_0: Atha bhagavā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco nagaradvāre aññatarasmiṃ vivitte rukkhamūle paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0505a:901_1: Tato mahājanakāyena saddhiṃ rājā ca nāgarā ca ekato sampiṇḍitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma vanditvā parivāretvā nisinnā “kathaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0505a:901_3: Tesaṃ bhagavā yuddhamādiṃ katvā “evaṃ navavidhavassaṃ vassi,
atk-s0505a:901_8: Tato rājā ca nāgarā ca vessavaṇamahārājassa bhavanasamīpe yakkhassa bhavanaṃ katvā pupphagandhādisakkārūpetaṃ niccaṃ baliṃ pavattesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:901_9: Tañca kumāraṃ viññutaṃ pattaṃ “tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ labhi, gaccha,
atk-s0505a:901_11: So bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca payirupāsamāno na cirasseva anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā pañcasataupāsakaparivāro ahosi.
atk-s0505a:901_14: mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantānaṃ yadidaṃ hatthako āḷavako”ti (a ni. 1.251).
atk-s0505a:905_0: Caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhanti nandasuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:905_3: Idaṃ kira suttaṃ dvīsu ṭhānesu vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:905_7: anuññātāya mātugāmassa pabbajjāya ānandattherassa bhaginī nandā,
atk-s0505a:905_10: Tena ca samayena bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0505a:905_11: Abhirūpanandā abhirūpā eva ahosi dassanīyā pāsādikā,
atk-s0505a:905_13: Janapadakalyāṇī nandāpi rūpena attanā sadisaṃ na passati.
atk-s0505a:905_14: Tā ubhopi rūpamadamattā “bhagavā rūpaṃ vivaṇṇeti, garahati,
atk-s0505a:905_15: anekapariyāyena rūpe ādīnavaṃ dassetī”ti bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchanti,
atk-s0505a:905_17: Evaṃ appasannā kasmā pabbajitāti ce? Agatiyā.
atk-s0505a:905_18: Abhirūpanandāya hi vāreyyadivaseyeva sāmiko sakyakumāro kālamakāsi.
atk-s0505a:905_20: Janapadakalyāṇī nandāpi āyasmante nande arahattaṃ patte nirāsā hutvā “mayhaṃ sāmiko ca mātā ca mahāpajāpati aññe ca ñātakā pabbajitā,
atk-s0505a:905_21: ñātīhi vinā dukkho gharāvāso”ti gharāvāse assādamalabhantī pabbajitā,
atk-s0505a:906_0: Atha bhagavā tāsaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ viditvā mahāpajāpatiṃ āṇāpesi “sabbāpi bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ovādaṃ āgacchantū”ti.
atk-s0505a:906_1: Tā attano vāre sampatte aññaṃ pesenti.
atk-s0505a:906_5: Taṃ bhagavā nimmitarūpena saṃvejetvā “aṭṭhīnaṃ nagaraṃ kata”nti imāya dhammapadagāthāya –
atk-s0505a:911_0: Imāhi therīgāthāhi ca anupubbena arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:911_1: Athekadivasaṃ sāvatthivāsino purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā samādinnuposathā sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni
atk-s0505a:911_2: ādāya dhammassavanatthāya jetavanaṃ gantvā dhammassavanapariyosāne bhagavantaṃ vanditvā nagaraṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0505a:911_4: Tattha manussā ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhagavato vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
atk-s0505a:911_5: Catuppamāṇike hi lokasannivāse sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā appasīdanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0505a:911_8: ghosappamāṇikā anekasatesu jātakesu kittighosaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ karavīkamadhuranigghosaṃ brahmassarañca sutvā,
atk-s0505a:911_12: Janapadakalyāṇī nandā bhikkhunipassayaṃ patvāpi anekapariyāyena bhagavato vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantānaṃ tesaṃ sutvā
atk-s0505a:912_0: Bhagavā paṭikacceva tassāgamanaṃ viditvā kaṇṭakena kaṇṭakaṃ,
atk-s0505a:912_1: āṇiyā ca āṇiṃ nīharitukāmo puriso viya rūpeneva rūpamadaṃ vinetuṃ attano iddhibalena pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikaṃ
atk-s0505a:912_2: atidassanīyaṃ itthiṃ passe ṭhatvā bījamānaṃ abhinimmini.
atk-s0505a:912_6: pādatalā pabhuti yāva kesaggā bhagavato rūpasampattiṃ disvā puna taṃ bhagavato passe ṭhitaṃ nimmatarūpañca
atk-s0505a:912_7: disvā “aho ayaṃ itthī rūpavatī”ti attano rūpamadaṃ jahitvā tassā rūpe abhirattabhāvā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:912_8: Tato bhagavā taṃ itthiṃ vīsativassappamāṇaṃ katvā dassesi.
atk-s0505a:912_11: Atha tassā rūpaparihāniṃ disvā nandāya tasmiṃ rūpe chandarāgo tanuko ahosi.
atk-s0505a:912_15: mahitthivaṇṇanti evaṃ yāva vassasatikaṃ obhaggaṃ daṇḍaparāyaṇaṃ tilakāhatagattaṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:912_16: dassetvā passamānāyeva nandāya tassā maraṇaṃ uddhumātakādibhedaṃ kākādīhi samparivāretvā khajjamānaṃ duggandhaṃ jegucchapaṭikūlabhāvañca dassesi.
atk-s0505a:912_17: Nandāya taṃ kamaṃ disvā “evamevaṃ mamapi aññesampi sabbasādhāraṇo ayaṃ kamo”ti aniccasaññā saṇṭhāsi,
atk-s0505a:912_19: tayo bhavā ādittamiva agāraṃ appaṭisaraṇā hutvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:912_20: Atha bhagavā “kammaṭṭhāne pakkhantaṃ nandāya citta”nti ñatvā tassā sappāyavasena imā gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:915_0: “Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
atk-s0505a:916_0: Dhātuso suññato passa, mā lokaṃ punarāgami;
atk-s0505a:918_1: Athassā bhagavā uparimaggādhigamatthaṃ suññataparivāraṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:919_0: Bhagavati pana rājagahe viharante yā sā cīvarakkhandhake vitthārato vuttasamuṭṭhānāya sālavatiyā gaṇikāya
atk-s0505a:919_1: dhītā jīvakassa kaniṭṭhā sirimā nāma mātu accayena taṃ ṭhānaṃ labhitvā “akkodhena jine kodha”nti imissā
atk-s0505a:919_5: Taṃ ārabbha aññataro niccabhattiko bhikkhu rāgaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0505a:919_6: Āhārakiccampi ca kātuṃ asakkonto nirāhāro nipajjīti dhammapadagāthāvatthumhi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:919_7: Tasmiṃ tathānipanneyeva sirimā kālaṃ katvā yāmabhavane suyāmassa devī ahosi.
atk-s0505a:919_8: Atha tassā sarīrassa aggikiccaṃ nivāretvā āmakasusāne raññā nikkhipāpitaṃ sarīraṃ dassanāya bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto agamāsi,
atk-s0505a:919_11: Tattha manussā bhaṇanti “pubbe sirimāya aṭṭhuttarasahassenāpi dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:919_13: Sirimāpi devakaññā pañcahi rathasatehi parivutā tatrāgamāsi.
atk-s0505a:919_14: Tatrāpi bhagavā sannipatitānaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ suttaṃ tassa bhikkhuno ovādatthaṃ “passa cittakataṃ bimba”nti imañca dhammapadagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:920_1: Tattha caraṃ vāti sakalarūpakāyassa gantabbadisābhimukhenābhinīhārena gacchanto vā.
atk-s0505a:920_2: Yadi vā tiṭṭhanti tasseva ussāpanabhāvena tiṭṭhanto vā.
atk-s0505a:920_3: Nisinno uda vā sayanti tasseva heṭṭhimabhāgasamiñjanauparimabhāgasamussāpanabhāvena nisinno vā,
atk-s0505a:920_5: Samiñjeti pasāretīti tāni tāni pabbāni samiñjeti ca pasāreti ca.
atk-s0505a:921_0: Esā kāyassa iñjanāti sabbāpesā imasseva saviññāṇakassa kāyassa iñjanā calanā phandanā,
atk-s0505a:921_1: natthettha añño koci caranto vā pasārento vā,
atk-s0505a:921_2: apica kho pana “carāmī”ti citte uppajjante taṃsamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu kāyaṃ pharati,
atk-s0505a:921_6: Tathā “tiṭṭhāmī”ti citte uppajjante taṃsamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu kāyaṃ pharati,
atk-s0505a:921_10: Tathā “nisīdāmī”ti citte uppajjante taṃsamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu kāyaṃ pharati,
atk-s0505a:921_14: Tathā “sayāmī”ti citte uppajjante taṃsamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu kāyaṃ pharati,
atk-s0505a:922_0: Evaṃ cāyamāyasmā yo koci itthannāmo caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:922_1: nisinno uda vā sayaṃ yametaṃ tattha tattha iriyāpathe tesaṃ tesaṃ pabbānaṃ samiñjanappasāraṇavasena samiñjeti pasāretīti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:922_2: Tampi yasmā samiñjanappasāraṇacitte uppajjamāne yathāvutteneva nayena hoti,
atk-s0505a:922_5: suññamidaṃ kenaci carantena vā pasārentena vā sattena vā puggalena vā.
atk-s0505a:926_0: Evametāya gāthāya bhagavā yasmā ekasmiṃ iriyāpathe ciraviniyogena kāyapīḷanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:926_3: tathā caraṇakāle ṭhānādīnamabhāvato sabbametaṃ caraṇādibhedaṃ “esā kāyassa iñjanā”ti bhaṇanto santatipaṭicchannaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0505a:926_4: Tāya tāya sāmaggiyā pavattāya “esā kāyassa iñjanā”ti ca attapaṭikkhepena bhaṇanto attasaññāghanapaṭicchannaṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0505a:927_1: Evaṃ lakkhaṇattayadīpanena suññatakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā puna saviññāṇakāviññāṇakaasubhadassanatthaṃ “aṭṭhinahārusaṃyutto”ti ārabhi.
atk-s0505a:927_4: svāyaṃ kāyo visuddhimagge dvattiṃsākāravaṇṇanāyaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedabhedena abyāpāranayena
atk-s0505a:927_5: ca pakāsitehi saṭṭhādhikehi tīhi aṭṭhisatehi navahi nhārusatehi ca saṃyuttattā aṭṭhinahārusaṃyutto.
atk-s0505a:927_6: Tattheva pakāsitena aggapādaṅgulitacādinā tacena ca navapesisatappabhedena ca maṃsena avalittattā tacamaṃsāvalepano
atk-s0505a:927_9: yadi esa yā sā majjhimassa purisassa sakalasarīrato saṃkaḍḍhitā badaraṭṭhippamāṇā bhaveyya,
atk-s0505a:927_10: tāya makkhikāpattasukhumacchaviyā nīlādiraṅgajātena gehabhitti viya paṭicchanno na bhaveyya,
atk-s0505a:927_11: ayaṃ pana evaṃ sukhumāyapi chaviyā kāyo paṭicchanno paññācakkhuvirahitehi bālaputhujjanehi yathābhūtaṃ na dissati.
atk-s0505a:927_12: Chavirāgarañjito hissa paramajegucchapaṭikūladhammasaṅkhāto tacopi tacapaliveṭhitaṃ yaṃ taṃ pabhedato –
atk-s0505a:930_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ navamaṃsasatampi, maṃsāvalittā ye te –
atk-s0505a:933_1: nhārusamuṭṭhitāni paṭipāṭiyā avaṭṭhitāni pūtīni duggandhāni tīṇi saṭṭhādhikāni aṭṭhisatānipi yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0505a:933_2: na dissanti yato anādiyitvā taṃ makkhikāpattasukhumacchaviṃ.
atk-s0505a:933_3: Yāni panassa chavirāgarattena tacena paliveṭhitattā sabbalokassa apākaṭāni nānappakārāni abbhantarakuṇapāni
atk-s0505a:933_5: tānipi paññācakkhunā paṭivijjhitvā evaṃ passitabbo “antapūro udarapūro…pe…
atk-s0505a:934_9: tasmā yakanapeḷassa pūro vatthino pūroti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:934_11: Sabbāneva cetāni antādīni vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedabhedena abyāpāranayena ca visuddhimagge vuttanayavaseneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0505a:935_1: Evaṃ bhagavā “na kiñcettha ekampi gayhūpagaṃ muttāmaṇisadisaṃ atthi,
atk-s0505a:935_2: aññadatthu asuciparipūrovāyaṃ kāyo”ti abbhantarakuṇapaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva abbhantarakuṇapaṃ bahinikkhamanakuṇapena
atk-s0505a:935_3: pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento pubbe vuttañca saṅgaṇhitvā “athassa navahi sotehī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:936_1: aparenāpi pariyāyena asucibhāvaṃ passāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:936_6: na aññaṃ kiñci agarucandanādigandhajātaṃ vā maṇimuttādiratanajātaṃ vā.
atk-s0505a:936_7: Sabbadāti tañca kho sabbadā rattimpi divāpi pubbaṇhepi sāyanhepi tiṭṭhatopi gacchatopīti.
atk-s0505a:936_10: Etassa hi dvīhi akkhicchiddehi apanītatacamaṃsasadiso akkhigūthako,
atk-s0505a:936_21: Taṃ panetaṃ vaṇṇādito visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:936_23: saddena semhañca aññañca evarūpaṃ udariyalohitādiasuciṃ vamatīti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:936_24: Evaṃ sattahi dvārehi asucivamanaṃ dassetvā kālaññū puggalaññū parisaññū ca bhagavā taduttari dve dvārāni
atk-s0505a:936_25: visesavacanena anāmasitvā aparena pariyāyena sabbasmāpi kāyā asucisavanaṃ dassento āha “kāyamhā sedajallikā”ti.
atk-s0505a:936_26: Tattha sedajallikāti sedo ca loṇapaṭalamalabhedā jallikā ca,
atk-s0505a:937_1: Evaṃ bhagavā yathā nāma bhatte paccamāne taṇḍulamalañca udakamalañca pheṇena saddhiṃ uṭṭhahitvā ukkhalimukhaṃ makkhetvā bahi gaḷati,
atk-s0505a:937_2: tathā asitapītādibhede āhāre kammajena agginā paccamāne yaṃ asitapītādimalaṃ uṭṭhahitvā “akkhimhā akkhigūthako”tiādinā
atk-s0505a:937_3: bhedena nikkhamantaṃ akkhiādīni makkhetvā bahi gaḷati,
atk-s0505a:937_4: tassāpi vasena imassa kāyassa asucibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni yaṃ loke uttamaṅgasammataṃ sīsaṃ ativisiṭṭhabhāvato
atk-s0505a:937_6: tassāpi nissāratāya asucitāya cassa asucibhāvaṃ dassento “athassa susiraṃ sīsa”nti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:938_2: Tañca panetaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:938_3: Subhato naṃ maññati bāloti tamenaṃ evaṃ nānāvidhakuṇapabharitampi kāyaṃ duccintitacintī bālo subhato maññati,
atk-s0505a:938_4: subhaṃ suciṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpanti tīhipi taṇhādiṭṭhimānamaññanāhi maññati. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:938_5: Yasmā avijjāya purakkhato catusaccapaṭicchādakena mohena purakkhato, codito,
atk-s0505a:938_8: evaṃ abhinivisa evaṃ maññāhī”ti gāhitoti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:939_1: Evaṃ bhagavā saviññāṇakavasena asubhaṃ dassetvā idāni aviññāṇakavasena dassetuṃ,
atk-s0505a:939_2: yasmā vā cakkavattiraññopi kāyo yathāvuttakuṇapabharitoyeva hoti,
atk-s0505a:939_3: tasmā sabbappakārenapi sampattibhave asubhaṃ dassetvā idāni vipattibhave dassetuṃ “yadā ca so mato setī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:940_1: svāyamevaṃvidho kāyo yadā āyuusmāviññāṇāpagamena mato vātabharitabhastā viya uddhumātako vaṇṇaparibhedena
atk-s0505a:940_2: vinīlako susānasmiṃ niratthaṃva kaliṅgaraṃ chaḍḍitattā apaviddho seti,
atk-s0505a:940_3: atha “na dānissa puna uṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti ekaṃsatoyeva anapekkhā honti ñātayo.
atk-s0505a:940_9: Tadubhayena ca rūpamadappahāne vaṇṇapokkharataṃ paṭicca mānappahāne ca niyojeti.
atk-s0505a:940_12: Tadubhayenapi “mama”nti gāhassa subhasaññāya ca pahāne niyojeti.
atk-s0505a:941_1: Evamimāya gāthāya aparibhinnāviññāṇakavasena asubhaṃ dassetvā idāni paribhinnavasenāpi dassetuṃ “khādanti na”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:941_2: Tattha ye caññeti ye ca aññepi kākakulalādayo kuṇapabhakkhā pāṇino santi,
atk-s0505a:942_2: “aṭṭhinahārusaṃyutto”tiādinā saviññāṇakāsubhavasena “yadā ca so mato setī”tiādinā aviññāṇakāsubhavasena
atk-s0505a:942_3: kāyaṃ dassetvā evaṃ niccasukhattabhāvasuññe ekantaasubhe cāpi kāyasmiṃ “subhato naṃ maññati bālo,
atk-s0505a:942_4: avijjāya purakkhato”ti iminā bālassa vuttiṃ pakāsetvā avijjāmukhena ca vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni tattha paṇḍitassa
atk-s0505a:942_5: vuttiṃ pariññāmukhena ca vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ “sutvāna buddhavacana”nti ārabhi.
atk-s0505a:943_3: Paññāṇavāti paññāṇaṃ vuccati vipassanā aniccādippakāresu pavattattā,
atk-s0505a:943_6: So kho naṃ parijānātīti so imaṃ kāyaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānāti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0505a:943_7: Yathā nāma kusalo vāṇijo idañcidañcāti bhaṇḍaṃ oloketvā “ettakena gahite ettako nāma udayo bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0505a:943_8: tulayitvā tathā katvā puna saudayaṃ mūlaṃ gaṇhanto taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍeti,
atk-s0505a:943_9: evamevaṃ “aṭṭhinhāruādayo ime kesalomādayo cā”ti ñāṇacakkhunā olokento ñātapariññāya parijānāti,
atk-s0505a:943_10: “aniccā ete dhammā dukkhā anattā”ti tulayanto tīraṇapariññāya parijānāti,
atk-s0505a:943_11: evaṃ tīrayitvā ariyamaggaṃ pāpuṇanto tattha chandarāgappahānena pahānapariññāya parijānāti.
atk-s0505a:943_14: arahattamaggena tato chandarāgaṃ apakaḍḍhitvā taṃ pajahanto pahānapariññāya parijānāti.
atk-s0505a:944_3: “Paññāṇavā”tiādinā eva ca etasmiṃ atthe siddhe yasmā buddhavacanaṃ sutvā tassa paññāṇavattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:944_4: yasmā ca sabbajanassa pākaṭopāyaṃ kāyo asutvā buddhavacanaṃ na sakkā parijānituṃ,
atk-s0505a:944_5: tasmā tassa ñāṇahetuṃ ito bāhirānaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asamatthatañca dassetuṃ “sutvāna buddhavacana”nti āha.
atk-s0505a:944_6: Nandābhikkhuniṃ tañca vipallatthacittaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha desanāpavattito aggaparisato tappaṭipattippattānaṃ bhikkhubhāvadassanato ca “bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:945_1: Idāni “yathābhūtañhi passatī”ti ettha yathā passanto yathābhūtaṃ passati,
atk-s0505a:945_2: taṃ dassetuṃ āha “yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ,
atk-s0505a:945_5: yathā idaṃ saviññāṇakāsubhaṃ āyuusmāviññāṇānaṃ anapagamā carati, tiṭṭhati, nisīdati, sayati;
atk-s0505a:945_6: tathā etaṃ etarahi susāne sayitaṃ aviññāṇakampi pubbe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anapagamā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:945_7: Yathā ca etaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā na carati,
atk-s0505a:945_11: tathā idaṃ saviññāṇakampi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā bhavissati.
atk-s0505a:945_12: Yathā ca idaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ etarahi na susāne mataṃ seti,
atk-s0505a:945_14: tathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīrampi pubbe ahosi.
atk-s0505a:945_15: Yathā panetaṃ etarahi aviññāṇakāsubhaṃ mataṃ susāne seti,
atk-s0505a:946_0: Tattha yathā idaṃ tathā etanti attanā matassa sarīrassa samānabhāvaṃ karonto bāhire dosaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0505a:946_1: Yathā etaṃ tathā idanti matasarīrena attano samānabhāvaṃ karonto ajjhattike rāgaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0505a:946_5: yasmā evaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu anupubbena arahattamaggaṃ patvā sabbaṃ chandarāgaṃ virājetuṃ samattho hoti,
atk-s0505a:947_1: Evaṃ sekkhabhūmiṃ dassetvā idāni asekkhabhūmiṃ dassento āha “chandarāgaviratto so”ti.
atk-s0505a:947_3: so bhikkhu arahattamaggañāṇena paññāṇavā maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0505a:947_5: maraṇābhāvena paṇītaṭṭhena vā amataṃ sabbasaṅkhāravūpasamanato santiṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātavānābhāvato nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:947_6: cavanābhāvato accutanti saṃvaṇṇitaṃ padamajjhagāti ca vuccati.
atk-s0505a:947_7: Atha vā so bhikkhu arahattamaggañāṇena paññāṇavā maggānantaraphale ṭhito chandarāgaviratto nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a:948_1: Evaṃ saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavasena asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ saha nipphattiyā kathetvā puna saṅkhepadesanāya evaṃ
atk-s0505a:948_2: mahato ānisaṃsassa antarāyakaraṃ pamādavihāraṃ garahanto “dvipādakoya”nti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:948_5: yasmā vā aññe asucibhūtāpi kāyā loṇambilādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā manussānaṃ bhojanepi upanīyanti,
atk-s0505a:949_1: Duggandho parihīratīti duggandho samāno pupphagandhādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā parihīrati.
atk-s0505a:949_3: Vissavanto tato tatoti pupphagandhādīhi paṭicchādetuṃ ghaṭentānampi taṃ vāyāmaṃ nipphalaṃ katvā navahi dvārehi kheḷasiṅghāṇikādīni,
atk-s0505a:949_6: etādisena kāyena yo puriso vā itthī vā koci bālo maññe uṇṇametave taṇhādiṭṭhimānamaññanāhi “aha”nti vā
atk-s0505a:949_7: “mama”nti vā “nicco”ti vātiādinā nayena yo uṇṇamituṃ maññeyya,
atk-s0505a:949_8: paraṃ vā jātiādīhi avajāneyya attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne ṭhapento,
atk-s0505a:949_9: kimaññatra adassanā ṭhapetvā ariyamaggena ariyasaccadassanābhāvaṃ kimaññaṃ tassa evaṃ uṇṇamāvajānanakāraṇaṃ siyāti.
atk-s0505a:950_3: yā maṃyeva ārabbha evaṃ vividhadhammadesanāpavattakassa bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ nāgamāsi”nti.
atk-s0505a:950_4: Evaṃ saṃviggā ca tameva dhammadesanaṃ samannāharitvā teneva kammaṭṭhānena katipayadivasabbhantare arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:950_5: Dutiyaṭṭhānepi kira desanāpariyosāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi,
atk-s0505a:954_4: apicettha ādito tāva catunnaṃ gāthānaṃ ayamuppatti –
atk-s0505a:954_5: bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante gāmakāvāse aññatarā duggatitthī matapatikā puttaṃ bhikkhūsu pabbājetvā attanāpi bhikkhunīsu pabbaji.
atk-s0505a:954_6: Te ubhopi sāvatthiyaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā abhiṇhaṃ aññamaññassa dassanakāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:954_9: Evaṃ sāyampi pātopi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ saṃvibhajamānā,
atk-s0505a:954_16: rāgena otiṇṇacittānaṃ pabbajitasaññā ca mātuputtasaññā ca antaradhāyi.
atk-s0505a:954_22: moghapuriso maññati na mātā putte sārajjati,
atk-s0505a:954_25: aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmī”tiādinā avasesasuttenapi bhikkhū saṃvejetvā “tasmātiha,
atk-s0505a:957_1: “santhavāto bhayaṃ jāta”nti imā attupanāyikā catasso gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:958_0: Tattha santhavo taṇhādiṭṭhimittabhedena tividhoti pubbe vutto.
atk-s0505a:958_5: yathā idaṃ tassa moghapurisassa santhavāto bhayaṃ jāta”nti.
atk-s0505a:958_14: Na kevalañca tassa santhavāto bhayaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0505a:958_15: apica kho pana yadetaṃ kilesānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhena sāsavārammaṇaṃ “niketa”nti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:958_16: idānissa bhinnasaṃvarattā atikkantamariyādattā suṭṭhutaraṃ tato niketā jāyate rajo,
atk-s0505a:958_20: yathā idaṃ tassa moghapurisassa santhavāto bhayaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0505a:958_21: yathā ca sabbaputhujjanānaṃ niketā jāyate rajoti evampetaṃ padadvayaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:959_0: Sabbathā pana iminā purimaddhena bhagavā puthujjanadassanaṃ garahitvā attano dassanaṃ pasaṃsanto “aniketa”nti pacchimaddhamāha.
atk-s0505a:959_4: Etaṃ ve munidassananti etaṃ aniketamasanthavaṃ buddhamuninā diṭṭhanti attho.
atk-s0505a:959_6: Tena ca yaṃ nāma niketasanthavavasena mātāputtesu vippaṭipajjamānesu aniketamasanthavaṃ,
atk-s0505a:959_7: etaṃ muninā diṭṭhaṃ aho abbhutanti ayamadhippāyo siddho hoti.
atk-s0505a:960_1: Dutiyagāthāya yo jātamucchijjāti yo kismiñcideva vatthusmiṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ nibbattaṃ kilesaṃ yathā uppannākusalappahānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:960_2: tathā vāyamanto tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ puna anibbattanavasena ucchinditvā yo anāgatopi kileso tathārūpappaccayasamodhāne
atk-s0505a:960_9: yena paccayena so nibbatteyya taṃ nānuppaveseyya na samodhāneyya.
atk-s0505a:960_10: Evaṃ sambhāravekallakaraṇena taṃ na ropayeyya jāyantaṃ.
atk-s0505a:960_11: Atha vā yasmā maggabhāvanāya atītāpi kilesā ucchijjanti āyatiṃ vipākābhāvena vattamānāpi na ropīyanti tadabhāvena,
atk-s0505a:960_13: tasmā yo ariyamaggabhāvanāya jātamucchijja na ropayeyya jāyantaṃ,
atk-s0505a:960_16: so ca addakkhi santipadaṃ mahesīti evampettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:960_21: Carantanti sabbākāraparipūrāya lokatthacariyāya avasesacariyāhi ca carantaṃ.
atk-s0505a:960_23: Soti yo jātamucchijja aropane ananuppavesane ca samatthatāya “na ropayeyya jāyantamassa nānuppavecche”ti vutto buddhamuni.
atk-s0505a:960_27: accantasantīsu seṭṭhaṃ evaṃ anupasante loke accantasantiṃ addasa mahesīti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:961_6: Pamāya bījanti yaṃ tesaṃ vatthūnaṃ bījaṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:961_9: Sinehamassa nānuppaveccheti yena taṇhādiṭṭhisinehena sinehitaṃ taṃ bījaṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhivasena taṃ yathāvuttaṃ vatthusassaṃ viruheyya,
atk-s0505a:961_12: Sa ve muni jātikhayantadassīti so evarūpo buddhamuni nibbānasacchikiriyāya jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca antabhūtassa
atk-s0505a:961_13: nibbānassa diṭṭhattā jātikkhayantadassī takkaṃ pahāya na upeti saṅkhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:961_14: Imāya catusaccabhāvanāya navappabhedampi akusalavitakkaṃ pahāya saupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ patvā lokatthacariyaṃ
atk-s0505a:961_15: karonto anupubbena carimaviññāṇakkhayā anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā “devo vā manusso vā”ti na upeti saṅkhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:961_16: Aparinibbuto eva vā yathā kāmavitakkādino vitakkassa appahīnattā “ayaṃ puggalo ratto”ti vā “duṭṭho”ti vā saṅkhaṃ upeti,
atk-s0505a:961_17: evaṃ takkaṃ pahāya na upeti saṅkhanti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0505a:962_6: Anikāmayaṃ aññatarampi tesanti evaṃ diṭṭhādīnavattā tesaṃ nivesanānaṃ ekampi apatthento so evarūpo buddhamuni
atk-s0505a:962_9: na yathā eke avītagedhā eva samānā “agiddhamhā”ti paṭijānanti, evaṃ.
atk-s0505a:962_10: Nāyūhatīti tassa tassa nivesanassa nibbattakaṃ kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na karoti.
atk-s0505a:962_13: yasmā evarūpo sabbanivesanānaṃ pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gato hotīti attho.
atk-s0505a:963_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya puthujjanadassanaṃ garahitvā attano dassanaṃ pasaṃsanto dutiyagāthāya yehi kilesehi puthujjano anupasanto hoti,
atk-s0505a:963_1: tesaṃ abhāvena attano santipadādhigamaṃ pasaṃsanto tatiyagāthāya yesu vatthūsu puthujjano takkaṃ appahāya tathā tathā saṅkhaṃ upeti,
atk-s0505a:963_2: tesu catusaccabhāvanāya takkaṃ pahāya attano saṅkhānupagamanaṃ pasaṃsanto catutthagāthāya āyatimpi yāni
atk-s0505a:963_4: tesu taṇhābhāvena attano anāyūhanaṃ pasaṃsanto catūhi gāthāhi arahattanikūṭeneva ekaṭṭhuppattikaṃ desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:964_2: Mahāpuriso mahābhinikkhamanaṃ katvā anupubbena sabbaññutaṃ patvā dhammacakkappavattanatthāya bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0505a:964_3: gacchanto bodhimaṇḍassa ca gayāya ca antare upakenājīvakena samāgacchi.
atk-s0505a:964_9: Anukkamena ca vaṅkahārajanapade aññataraṃ māgavikagāmaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0505a:964_12: ayaṃ loke arahā”ti gharaṃ netvā maṃsarasena parivisitvā bhuttāviñca naṃ saputtadāro vanditvā “idheva, bhante, vasatha,
atk-s0505a:965_0: Māgaviko gimhakāle udakasampanne sītale padese carituṃ dūraṃ apakkantesu migesu tattha gacchanto “amhākaṃ
atk-s0505a:965_1: arahantaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahassū”ti chāvaṃ nāma dhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā agamāsi saddhiṃ puttabhātukehi.
atk-s0505a:965_2: Sā cassa dhītā dassanīyā hoti koṭṭhāsasampannā.
atk-s0505a:965_3: Dutiyadivase upako gharaṃ āgato taṃ dārikaṃ sabbaṃ upacāraṃ katvā,
atk-s0505a:965_5: rāgena abhibhūto bhuñjitumpi asakkonto bhājanena bhattaṃ ādāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0505a:965_9: Sattame divase māgaviko āgantvā dhītaraṃ upakassa pavattiṃ pucchi. Sā –
atk-s0505a:965_11: Māgaviko “āgataveseneva naṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāmī”ti taṅkhaṇaññeva gantvā – “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0505a:965_21: kiñci sippaṃ ajānantena sakkā gharāvāsaṃ adhiṭṭhātu”nti? So āha –
atk-s0505a:965_31: ahaṃ anantajinassa santikaṃ gacchāmī”ti majjhimadesābhimukho pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a:966_0: Bhagavā ca tena samayena sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavanamahāvihāre.
atk-s0505a:966_1: Atha kho bhagavā paṭikacceva bhikkhū āṇāpesi – “yo,
atk-s0505a:966_5: Upakopi kho anupubbeneva sāvatthiṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhatvā “imasmiṃ vihāre mama sahāyo anantajino nāma atthi,
atk-s0505a:966_10: Bhikkhū tassa pubbappavattiṃ sutvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ –
atk-s0505a:966_12: Bhagavā taṃ kathāsamuṭṭhānaṃ viditvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena buddhāsane nisīditvā bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0505a:966_21: na sakkā tattha dosaṃ daṭṭhuṃ. Tena,
atk-s0505a:966_23: dhammadesanūpanissayena upako etarahi anāgāmī jāto”ti vatvā attano desanāmalābhāvadīpikaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:967_1: sāsavesu sabbakhandhāyatanadhātūsu chandarāgappahānena tehi anabhibhūtattā sayañca te dhamme sabbe abhibhuyya pavattattā sabbābhibhuṃ.
atk-s0505a:967_2: Tesañca aññesañca sabbadhammānaṃ sabbākārena viditattā sabbaviduṃ.
atk-s0505a:967_4: Yesaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhilepānaṃ vasena sāsavakhandhādibhedesu sabbadhammesu upalimpati,
atk-s0505a:967_5: tesaṃ lepānaṃ abhāvā tesu sabbesu dhammesu anupalittaṃ.
atk-s0505a:967_6: Tesu ca sabbadhammesu chandarāgābhāvena sabbe te dhamme jahitvā ṭhitattā sabbañjahaṃ.
atk-s0505a:967_7: Upadhivivekaninnena cittena taṇhakkhaye nibbāne visesena muttattā taṇhakkhaye vimuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:967_9: Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantīti tampi paṇḍitā sattā muniṃ vedayanti jānanti.
atk-s0505a:967_14: “upako tadā tathāgataṃ disvāpi ‘ayaṃ buddhamunī’ti na saddahī”ti evaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ,
atk-s0505a:967_16: dhīrā pana taṃ muniṃ vedayantī”ti dassento imaṃ gāthamabhāsīti.
atk-s0505a:968_3: Tattha “gāme vā yadi vāraññe”ti imissā gāthāya vuttanayeneva revatattherassa ādito pabhuti pabbajjā,
atk-s0505a:968_7: Paccāgate pana bhagavati yo so mahallakabhikkhu upāhanaṃ sammussitvā paṭinivatto khadirarukkhe ālaggitaṃ
atk-s0505a:968_8: disvā sāvatthiṃ anuppatto visākhāya upāsikāya “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0505a:968_9: revatattherassa vasanokāso ramaṇīyo”ti bhikkhū pucchamānāya yehi bhikkhūhi pasaṃsito,
atk-s0505a:968_14: So visākhāya āgantukabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā pacchābhattaṃ maṇḍalamāḷe sannipatite bhikkhū ujjhāpento āha – “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0505a:968_16: Bhagavā taṃ ñatvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena parisamajjhaṃ patvā,
atk-s0505a:968_22: ārabbha kathā uppannā ‘evaṃ navakammiko kadā samaṇadhammaṃ karissatī”’ti. “Na,
atk-s0505a:968_25: arahā revato khīṇāsavo”ti vatvā taṃ ārabbha tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:969_1: dubbalakarakilesappahānasādhakena vikubbanaadhiṭṭhānappabhedena vā paññābalena samannāgatattā paññābalaṃ,
atk-s0505a:969_4: upacārappanābhedena jhānena jhāne vā ratattā jhānarataṃ,
atk-s0505a:969_7: pañcacetokhilacatuāsavābhāvena akhilaṃ anāsavaṃ taṃ vāpi dhīrā muniṃ vedayanti.
atk-s0505a:969_8: Tampi evaṃ paññādiguṇasaṃyuttaṃ saṅgādidosavisaṃyuttaṃ paṇḍitā sattā muniṃ vā vedayanti.
atk-s0505a:969_10: so “navakammiko”ti vā “kadā samaṇadhammaṃ karissatī”ti vā kathaṃ vattabbo.
atk-s0505a:969_11: So hi paññābalena taṃ vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0505a:969_14: na idāni samaṇadhammaṃ karissatīti revatattheraṃ vibhāveti.
atk-s0505a:970_2: Bodhimaṇḍato pabhuti yathākkamaṃ kapilavatthuṃ anuppatte bhagavati pitāputtasamāgame vattamāne bhagavā sammodamānena raññā suddhodanena “tumhe, bhante,
atk-s0505a:970_3: gahaṭṭhakāle gandhakaraṇḍake vāsitāni kāsikādīni dussāni nivāsetvā idāni kathaṃ chinnakāni paṃsukūlāni
atk-s0505a:971_0: “Yaṃ tvaṃ tāta vade mayhaṃ, paṭṭuṇṇaṃ dukūlakāsikaṃ;
atk-s0505a:972_0: Paṃsukūlaṃ tato seyyaṃ, etaṃ me abhipatthita”nti. –
atk-s0505a:973_0: Ādīni vatvā lokadhammehi attano avikampabhāvaṃ dassento rañño dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ sattapadagāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:974_5: Akkosanagarahanādibhedāya nindāya vaṇṇanathomanādibhedāya pasaṃsāya cāti imāsu nindāpasaṃsāsu paṭighānunayavasena avedhamānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:974_6: Nindāpasaṃsāmukhena cettha aṭṭhapi lokadhammā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:974_7: Sīhaṃva bherisaddādīsu saddesu aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu pakativikārānupagamena asantasantaṃ,
atk-s0505a:974_9: Vātaṃva suttamayādibhede jālamhi catūhi maggehi taṇhādiṭṭhijāle asajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:974_11: Padumaṃva toyena loke jātampi yesaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhilepānaṃ vasena sattā lokena lippanti,
atk-s0505a:974_13: nibbānagāmimaggaṃ uppādetvā tena maggena netāramaññesaṃ devamanussānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:974_14: Attano pana aññena kenaci maggaṃ dassetvā anetabbattā anaññaneyyaṃ taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti buddhamuniṃ vedayantīti attānaṃ vibhāveti.
atk-s0505a:975_3: abhinīhāraguṇapāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavane abhinibbattiguṇaṃ tattha nivāsaguṇaṃ mahāvilokanaguṇaṃ gabbhavokkantiṃ
atk-s0505a:975_4: gabbhavāsaṃ gabbhanikkhamanaṃ padavītihāraṃ disāvilokanaṃ brahmagajjanaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ mahāpadhānaṃ
atk-s0505a:975_5: abhisambodhiṃ dhammacakkappavattanaṃ catubbidhaṃ maggañāṇaṃ phalañāṇaṃ aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:975_14: sattasattatividhañāṇavatthu evamiccādiguṇasatasahasse nissāya pavattaṃ mahālābhasakkāraṃ asahamānehi
atk-s0505a:975_15: titthiyehi uyyojitāya ciñcamāṇavikāya “ekaṃ dhammaṃ atītassā”ti imissā gāthāya vatthumhi vuttanayena
atk-s0505a:975_16: catuparisamajjhe bhagavato ayase uppādite tappaccayā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “evarūpepi nāma ayase
atk-s0505a:975_17: uppanne na bhagavato cittassa aññathattaṃ atthī”ti.
atk-s0505a:975_18: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena parisamajjhaṃ patvā,
atk-s0505a:975_28: aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu tādino hontī”ti vatvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:976_1: yathā nāma ogahaṇe manussānaṃ nhānatitthe aṅgaghaṃsanatthāya caturasse vā aṭṭhaṃse vā thambhe nikhāte uccakulīnāpi nīcakulīnāpi aṅgaṃ ghaṃsanti,
atk-s0505a:976_2: na tena thambhassa unnati vā onati vā hoti.
atk-s0505a:976_3: Evamevaṃ yo ogahaṇe thambhorivābhijāyati yasmiṃ pare vācāpariyantaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0505a:976_5: Yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ pare titthiyā vā aññe vā vaṇṇavasena uparimaṃ vā avaṇṇavasena heṭṭhimaṃ vā vācāpariyantaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0505a:976_6: tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ anunayaṃ vā paṭighaṃ vā anāpajjamāno tādibhāvena yo ogahaṇe thambhoriva bhavatīti.
atk-s0505a:976_7: Taṃ vītarāgaṃ susamāhitindriyanti taṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe rāgābhāvena vītarāgaṃ,
atk-s0505a:976_12: Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti buddhamuniṃ vedayanti,
atk-s0505a:976_13: tassa kathaṃ cittassa aññathattaṃ bhavissatīti attānaṃ vibhāveti.
atk-s0505a:977_2: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññatarā seṭṭhidhītā pāsādā oruyha heṭṭhāpāsāde tantavāyasālaṃ gantvā tasaraṃ vaṭṭente
atk-s0505a:977_4: “aho vata sabbe sattā kāyavacīmanovaṅkaṃ pahāya tasaraṃ viya ujucittā bhaveyyu”nti.
atk-s0505a:977_5: Sā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvāpi punappunaṃ tadeva nimittaṃ āvajjentī nisīdi.
atk-s0505a:977_6: Evaṃ paṭipannāya cassā na cirasseva aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0505a:977_8: Athassā tayopi bhavā ādittā viya upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:977_9: Taṃ tathā vipassamānaṃ ñatvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ muñci.
atk-s0505a:977_10: Sā taṃ disvā “kiṃ ida”nti āvajjentī bhagavantaṃ passe nisinnamiva disvā uṭṭhāya pañjalikā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:977_11: Athassā bhagavā sappāyaṃ viditvā dhammadesanāvasena imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:978_1: yo ve ekaggacittatāya akuppavimuttitāya ca vuḍḍhihānīnaṃ abhāvato vikkhīṇajātisaṃsārattā bhavantarūpagamanābhāvato ca ṭhitatto,
atk-s0505a:978_4: pāpakāni kammāni gūthagataṃ viya muttagataṃ viya ca jigucchati,
atk-s0505a:978_6: Yogavibhāgena hi upayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ saddasatthe sijjhati.
atk-s0505a:978_7: Vīmaṃsamāno visamaṃ samañcāti kāyavisamādivisamaṃ kāyasamādisamañca pahānabhāvanākiccasādhanena maggapaññāya vīmaṃsamāno upaparikkhamāno.
atk-s0505a:978_8: Taṃ vāpi khīṇāsavaṃ dhīrā muniṃ vedayantīti.
atk-s0505a:978_10: Yathāvuttanayena maggapaññāya vīmaṃsamāno visamaṃ samañca yo ve ṭhitatto hoti,
atk-s0505a:978_11: so evaṃ tasaraṃva uju hutvā kiñci vītikkamaṃ anāpajjanto jigucchati kammehi pāpakehi.
atk-s0505a:978_13: Yato īdiso hotīti khīṇāsavamuniṃ dassento arahattanikūṭena gāthaṃ desesi.
atk-s0505a:978_15: Ettha ca vikappe vā samuccaye vā vāsaddo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0505a:979_2: Bhagavati kira āḷaviyaṃ viharante āḷavīnagare aññataro tantavāyo sattavassikaṃ dhītaraṃ āṇāpesi – “amma,
atk-s0505a:979_7: So sālaṃ gantvā tantaṃ vinento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:979_8: Taṃ divasañca bhagavā mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento tassā dārikāya sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0505a:979_9: desanāpariyosāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānañca dhammābhisamayaṃ disvā pageva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā
atk-s0505a:979_14: Bhagavā yena maggena sā dārikā pitusantikaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0505a:979_23: Sā dārikā taṃ padesaṃ pattā mahājanaparivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi.
atk-s0505a:980_2: ayaṃ dārikā attano gharā āgatāpi bhagavatā pucchiyamānā ‘na jānāmī’ti āha,
atk-s0505a:980_3: tantavāyasālaṃ gacchantī cāpi pucchiyamānā ‘na jānāmī’ti āha,
atk-s0505a:980_7: Bhagavā manussānaṃ tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātukāmo taṃ pucchi –
atk-s0505a:980_9: kiṃ tayā vutta”nti? Sā āha – “na maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0505a:980_21: Tato maṃ bhagavā maraṇaṃ sandhāya pucchi –
atk-s0505a:980_26: Tato maṃ bhagavā maraṇakālaṃ sandhāya pucchi “jānāsī”ti,
atk-s0505a:980_27: ahañca na jānāmi “kadā marissāmi kiṃ ajja vā udāhu sve vā”ti,
atk-s0505a:980_29: Bhagavā tāya vissajjitaṃ pañhaṃ “sādhu sādhū”ti anumodi.
atk-s0505a:980_30: Mahājanakāyopi “yāva paṇḍitā ayaṃ dārikā”ti sādhukārasahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0505a:980_31: Atha bhagavā dārikāya sappāyaṃ viditvā dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0505a:984_0: Sā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pitu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:984_1: Pitā taṃ disvā “cirenāgatā”ti kuddho vegena tante vemaṃ pakkhipi.
atk-s0505a:984_6: apica kho imaṃ vemaṃ vegasā nikkhamitvā imissā kucchiṃ bhindi.
atk-s0505a:984_7: Jīvati nu kho nanu kho”ti vīmaṃsanto mataṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0505a:984_11: So daṇḍabhayena palāyanto bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanokāsaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0505a:984_12: Te ca bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0505a:984_14: So taṃ uggahetvā vāyamanto na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0505a:984_16: Atha mahāpavāraṇāya sabbeva bhagavato santikaṃ agamaṃsu –
atk-s0505a:984_18: Bhagavā pavāretvā vutthavasso bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gāmanigamādīsu cārikaṃ caramāno anupubbena āḷaviṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:984_19: Tattha manussā bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā dānādīni karontā taṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “dhītaraṃ māretvā idāni kaṃ māretuṃ āgatosī”tiādīni vatvā uppaṇḍesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:984_20: Bhikkhū taṃ sutvā upaṭṭhānavelāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā – “na,
atk-s0505a:984_23: sā attano kammena matā”ti vatvā tassa bhikkhuno manussehi dubbijānaṃ khīṇāsavamunibhāvaṃ pakāsento bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:985_1: yo tīsupi kammadvāresu sīlasaṃyamena saṃyatatto kāyena vā vācāya vā cetasā vā hiṃsādikaṃ na karoti pāpaṃ,
atk-s0505a:985_2: tañca kho pana daharo vā daharavaye ṭhito,
atk-s0505a:985_4: eteneva nayena thero vā pacchimavaye ṭhitoti kadācipi na karoti.
atk-s0505a:985_6: yasmā anuttarāya viratiyā sabbapāpehi uparatacittoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:986_0: Idāni muni arosaneyyo na so roseti kañcīti etesaṃ padānaṃ ayaṃ yojanā ca adhippāyo ca –
atk-s0505a:986_1: so khīṇāsavamuni arosaneyyo “dhītumārako”ti vā “pesakāro”ti vā evamādinā nayena kāyena vā vācāya vā rosetuṃ,
atk-s0505a:986_7: tumhādiso vā māretī”tiādīni vatvā kañci na roseti,
atk-s0505a:986_13: namo karohi nāgassā”ti vuttanayena namassitabboyeva hoti.
atk-s0505a:986_14: Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantīti ettha pana tampi dhīrāva muniṃ vedayantīti evaṃ padavibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:986_16: taṃ “ayaṃ arosaneyyo”ti ete bālamanussā ajānitvā rosenti.
atk-s0505a:987_2: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcaggadāyako nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0505a:987_8: sīsāni āharāpetvā yāgupāyāsaputhukādīni paṭiyādetvā “aggassa dātā medhāvī,
atk-s0505a:987_9: aggaṃ so adhigacchatī”ti evaṃdiṭṭhiko hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0505a:987_11: Nipphannesu pana sassesu lāyitesu madditesu ca varadhaññāni gahetvā tatheva dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0505a:987_13: Puna tehi dhaññehi koṭṭhāgārāni pūrāpetvā paṭhamakoṭṭhāgāravivaraṇe paṭhamanīhaṭāni dhaññāni gahetvā tatheva dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0505a:987_16: tato aggaṃ anuppattapabbajitānaṃ adatvā antamaso dārakānampi na kiñci deti,
atk-s0505a:987_18: Puna attano bhojanakāle paṭhamūpanītaṃ bhojanaṃ purebhattakāle saṅghassa,
atk-s0505a:987_20: tadabhāve antamaso sunakhānampi adatvā na bhuñjati,
atk-s0505a:988_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā paccūsasamaye buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento tassa brāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇiyā ca sotāpattimaggaupanissayaṃ
atk-s0505a:988_1: disvā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā atippageva gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0505a:988_3: “ajja bhagavā ekakova gāmaṃ pavisitukāmo”ti ñatvā bhikkhācāravelāya gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:988_4: Bhagavāpi brāhmaṇassa bhojanavelāyaṃ nikkhamitvā sāvatthiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0505a:988_7: tathā hi bhagavā ekakova paviṭṭho”ti ñatvā na bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu nimantanatthāya.
atk-s0505a:988_8: Bhagavāpi anupubbena brāhmaṇassa gharadvāraṃ sampatvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:988_9: Tena ca samayena brāhmaṇo bhojanaṃ gahetvā nisinno hoti,
atk-s0505a:988_13: tato me puna pacitabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti cintetvā appasādañca maccherañca uppādetvā yathā brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ na passati,
atk-s0505a:988_16: Taṃ brāhmaṇo suvaṇṇobhāsaṃ disvā “kimeta”nti ullokento addasa bhagavantaṃ dvāre ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0505a:988_17: Brāhmaṇīpi “diṭṭhonena bhagavā”ti tāvadeva tālavaṇṭaṃ nikkhipitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandi,
atk-s0505a:990_0: Asatā ca na socati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0505a:991_7: me taṃ bhojanaṃ attano patte patiṭṭhāpethā”ti.
atk-s0505a:991_9: Katabhattakicco ca brāhmaṇassa sappāyaṃ viditvā imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:992_2: addhāvasesāya kumbhiyā āgantvā tato gahitattā majjhato,
atk-s0505a:992_3: ekadvikaṭacchumattāvasesāya kumbhiyā āgantvā tato gahitattā sesato vā piṇḍaṃ labhetha.
atk-s0505a:992_5: So hi udakadantapoṇaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ pareneva dattaṃ upajīvati,
atk-s0505a:992_7: Nālaṃ thutuṃ nopi nipaccavādīti aggato laddhā attānaṃ vā dāyakaṃ vā thometumpi nārahati pahīnānunayattā.
atk-s0505a:992_8: Sesato laddhā “kiṃ etaṃ iminā dinna”ntiādinā nayena dāyakaṃ nipātetvā appiyavacanāni vattāpi na hoti pahīnapaṭighattā.
atk-s0505a:992_9: Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantīti tampi pahīnānunayapaṭighaṃ dhīrāva muniṃ vedayantīti brāhmaṇassa arahattanikūṭena gāthaṃ desesi.
atk-s0505a:993_2: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññataro seṭṭhiputto utuvasena tīsu pāsādesu sabbasampattīhi paricārayamāno daharova pabbajitukāmo hutvā,
atk-s0505a:993_4: khaggavisāṇasutte “kāmā hi citrā”ti imissā gāthāya aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva tikkhattuṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0505a:993_5: ca uppabbajitvā ca catutthavāre arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0505a:993_13: abhabbo so dāni vibbhamitu”nti tassa khīṇāsavamunibhāvaṃ āvikaronto imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:994_3: pubbe vuttappakārāsu vā cariyāsu yāya kāyaci cariyāya carantaṃ,
atk-s0505a:994_4: pubbe viya methunadhamme cittaṃ akatvā anuttarāya viratiyā virataṃ methunasmā.
atk-s0505a:994_6: kīdisaṃ muniṃ carantaṃ virataṃ methunasmāti ce?
atk-s0505a:994_8: yo bhadrepi yobbane vattamāne kvaci itthirūpe yathā pure,
atk-s0505a:994_10: Atha vā kvaci attano vā parassa vā yobbane “yuvā tāvamhi,
atk-s0505a:994_11: ayaṃ vā yuvāti paṭisevāmi tāva kāme”ti evaṃ yo rāgena na upanibajjhatīti ayampettha attho.
atk-s0505a:994_15: evaṃ madappamādā viratattā eva ca vippamuttaṃ sabbakilesabandhanehi.
atk-s0505a:994_16: Yathā vā eko lokikāyapi viratiyā virato hoti, na evaṃ,
atk-s0505a:994_19: Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantīti tampi dhīrā eva muniṃ vedayanti,
atk-s0505a:995_6: Bhagavāpi tattha nimantito pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā bhuñjitvā nikkhamanto nandassa hatthe pattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0505a:995_10: So bhagavato gāravena “handa bhagavā patta”nti vattuṃ asakkonto vihārameva gato.
atk-s0505a:995_16: So pana janapadakalyāṇiyā vacanaṃ punappunaṃ saranto ukkaṇṭhi.
atk-s0505a:996_0: Tato naṃ bhagavā attano ānubhāvena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā vejayantapāsādadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:996_1: Bhagavato āgamanaṃ viditvā sakko accharāgaṇaparivuto pāsādā orohi.
atk-s0505a:996_2: Tā sabbāpi kassapassa bhagavato sāvakānaṃ pādamakkhanatelaṃ datvā kakuṭapādiniyo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:996_6: imāni pañca accharāsatāni kakuṭapādānī”ti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:996_7: Mātugāmassa nāma nimittānubyañjanaṃ gahetabbanti sakalepi buddhavacane etaṃ natthi.
atk-s0505a:996_8: Atha ca panettha bhagavā upāyakusalatāya āturassa dose uggiletvā nīharitukāmo vejjo subhojanaṃ viya nandassa
atk-s0505a:996_9: rāgaṃ uggiletvā nīharitukāmo nimittānubyañjanaggahaṇaṃ anuññāsi yathā taṃ anuttaro purisadammasārathi.
atk-s0505a:996_10: Tato bhagavā accharāhetu nandassa brahmacariye abhiratiṃ disvā bhikkhū āṇāpesi –
atk-s0505a:996_12: So tehi codiyamāno lajjito yoniso manasi karonto paṭipajjitvā na cirasseva arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:996_13: Tassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0505a:996_18: idāni nando evaṃ codetabbo”ti tassa khīṇāsavamunibhāvaṃ dīpento tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:997_1: dukkhasaccavavatthānakaraṇena khandhādilokaṃ aññāya jānitvā vavatthapetvā nirodhasaccasacchikiriyāya paramatthadassiṃ,
atk-s0505a:997_3: pahīnasamudayattā rūpamadādivegasahanena cakkhādiāyatanasamuddañca atitariya atitaritvā atikkamitvā maggabhāvanāya,
atk-s0505a:997_7: samudayappahāneneva taṃ oghaṃ samuddañca atitariya atitiṇṇoghattā idāni tumhehi evaṃ vuccamānepi vikāramanāpajjanatāya
atk-s0505a:997_8: tādimpi evampettha attho ca adhippāyo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:997_9: Taṃ chinnaganthaṃ asitaṃ anāsavanti idaṃ panassa thutivacanameva,
atk-s0505a:997_10: imāya catusaccabhāvanāya catunnaṃ ganthānaṃ chinnattā chinnaganthaṃ,
atk-s0505a:997_11: diṭṭhiyā taṇhāya vā katthaci anissitattā asitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:997_12: catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:997_13: Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayantīti tampi dhīrāva khīṇāsavamuniṃ vedayanti tumhe pana avedayamānā evaṃ bhaṇathāti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:998_2: Aññataro bhikkhu kosalaraṭṭhe paccantagāmaṃ nissāya araññe viharati.
atk-s0505a:998_3: Tasmiñca gāme migaluddako tassa bhikkhuno vasanokāsaṃ gantvā mige bandhati.
atk-s0505a:998_4: So araññaṃ pavisanto theraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantampi passati,
atk-s0505a:998_14: Atha bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ caramāno taṃ janapadaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:998_15: Bhikkhū gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:998_16: Bhagavā luddakena saddhiṃ samānajīvikābhāvasādhakaṃ tassa bhikkhuno khīṇāsavamunibhāvaṃ dīpento tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:999_8: dūre vihāro ca vutti ca nesanti dūravihāravuttino.
atk-s0505a:999_16: so luddako tena kammena puttadāraṃ poseti.
atk-s0505a:999_18: puttadāresu taṇhādiṭṭhimamattavirahito sucivatattā sundaravatattā ca subbato so khīṇāsavabhikkhu.
atk-s0505a:999_20: so luddako gihī parapāṇarodhāya tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ jīvitindriyupacchedāya kāyavācācittehi asaṃyato.
atk-s0505a:999_22: itaro pana khīṇāsavamuni kāyavācācittehi niccaṃ yato saṃyato pāṇino rakkhati.
atk-s0505a:999_23: Evaṃ sante te kathaṃ samānajīvikā bhavissantīti?
atk-s0505a:1000_2: Bhagavati kapilavatthusmiṃ viharante sākiyānaṃ kathā udapādi –
atk-s0505a:1000_3: “paṭhamakasotāpanno pacchā sotāpattiṃ pattassa dhammena vuḍḍhataro hoti,
atk-s0505a:1000_4: tasmā pacchā sotāpannena bhikkhunā paṭhamasotāpannassa gihino abhivādanādīni kattabbānī”ti taṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0505a:1000_5: aññataro piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu sutvā bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0505a:1000_10: tena tadahupabbajitassāpi sāmaṇerassa abhivādanādīni kattabbānevā”ti vatvā puna pacchā sotāpannassāpi
atk-s0505a:1000_11: bhikkhuno paṭhamasotāpannagahaṭṭhato atimahantaṃ visesaṃ dassento bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1001_1: yvāyaṃ matthake jātāya sikhāya sabbhāvena sikhī,
atk-s0505a:1001_2: maṇidaṇḍasadisāya gīvāya nīlagīvoti ca mayūravihaṅgamo vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1001_4: tassa haṃsassa javena soḷasimpi kalaṃ na upeti.
atk-s0505a:1001_8: evaṃ gihī paṭhamasotāpannopi kiñcāpi maggadassanena dassanīyo hoti.
atk-s0505a:1001_9: Atha kho so pacchā sotāpannassāpi maggadassanena tulyadassanīyabhāvassāpi bhikkhuno javena nānukaroti.
atk-s0505a:1001_12: Gihino hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ dandhaṃ hoti puttadārādijaṭāya jaṭitattā,
