atk-s0505a:1471_6: lokuttarasukhaṃ vā upanidhāya aṇubhūtato attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisukhato aṇuṃ appakatopi appakaṃ kāmasukhaṃ disvāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:1471_15: Bhāgaso miteti aṅgaṇadvārapāsādakūṭāgārādivasena koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā mitāni.
atk-s0505a:1471_17: Tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ aṇuto aṇusaññitaṃ kāmasukhañca rañño byākārañca alaṅkatanāriyo ca vuttappakāre rathe
atk-s0505a:1471_18: ca nivesane nivese ca disvā dukkhesuyeva etesu vatthūsu “sukha”nti pavattattā pubbe pavattanekkhammasaññāvipallāsasaṅkhātā
atk-s0505a:1472_1: Te evaṃ viparītasaññā hutvā gomaṇḍalaparibyūḷhaṃ…pe… brāhmaṇā.
atk-s0505a:1472_6: Abhijjhāyiṃsūti “aho vatidaṃ amhākaṃ assā”ti taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhipatthayamānā jhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1473_1: Evaṃ abhijjhāyantā ca “ete manussā sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassū āmuttamaṇiābharaṇā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi paricārenti,
atk-s0505a:1473_2: mayaṃ pana evaṃ tehi namassiyamānāpi sedamalakiliṭṭhagattā parūḷhakacchanakhalomā bhogarahitā paramakāruññataṃ pattā viharāma.
atk-s0505a:1473_7: Ete ca gonakādīhi attharaṇehi atthatāsu varaseyyāsu sayanti,
atk-s0505a:1473_11: Kathaṃ nu kho mayampi etehi sadisā bhaveyyāmā”ti cintetvā “dhanaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1473_12: na sakkā dhanarahitehi ayaṃ sampatti pāpuṇitu”nti ca avadhāretvā vede bhinditvā dhammayutte purāṇamante
atk-s0505a:1473_13: nāsetvā adhammayutte kūṭamante ganthetvā dhanatthikā okkākarājānamupasaṅkamma sotthivacanādīni payuñjitvā “amhākaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0505a:1473_15: taṃ mayaṃ ācariyamuṭṭhitāya na kassaci bhaṇimhā,
atk-s0505a:1473_16: taṃ mahārājā sotumarahatī”ti ca vatvā assamedhādiyaññaṃ vaṇṇayiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1473_20: evañhi te yajato sattakulaparivaṭṭā sagge uppajjissantī”ti avocuṃ.
atk-s0505a:1473_21: Tena nesaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ dassento āha bhagavā “te tattha mante…pe…
atk-s0505a:1474_11: Atha vā vittanti vittikāraṇabhūtameva ābharaṇādi upakaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1474_15: Te brāhmaṇā mante ganthetvā tadā okkākaṃ upāgamuṃ. Kinti?
atk-s0505a:1475_1: Evaṃ kāraṇaṃ vatvā saññāpentehi tato ca rājā…pe…
atk-s0505a:1475_6: dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1475_8: catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1475_10: divase divase sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato
atk-s0505a:1475_11: pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1475_13: Ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1475_15: navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā ca purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa
atk-s0505a:1476_3: So hi rājā “dīgharattaṃ lūkhāhārena kilantā pañca gorase paribhuñjantū”ti nesaṃ sapuṅgavāni goyūthāneva adāsi,
atk-s0505a:1476_4: tathā “dīgharattaṃ thaṇḍilasāyitāya thūlasāṭakanivāsanena ekaseyyāya pādacārena rukkhamūlādivāsena ca
atk-s0505a:1476_5: kilantā gonakādiatthatavarasayanādīsu sukhaṃ anubhontū”ti nesaṃ mahagghāni sayanādīni ca adāsi.
atk-s0505a:1477_1: Evaṃ tassa rañño santikā te ca tattha…pe…
atk-s0505a:1477_4: Tassa rañño santikā te brāhmaṇā tesu yāgesu dhanaṃ labhitvā dīgharattaṃ divase divase evameva ghāsacchādanaṃ
atk-s0505a:1477_6: Tato tesaṃ icchāvatiṇṇānaṃ khīrādipañcagorasassādavasena rasataṇhāya otiṇṇacittānaṃ “khīrādīnipi tāva gunnaṃ sādūni,
atk-s0505a:1477_7: addhā imāsaṃ maṃsaṃ sādutaraṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ maṃsaṃ paṭicca bhiyyo taṇhā pavaḍḍhatha.
atk-s0505a:1477_12: Atha punapi vedaṃ bhinditvā tadanurūpe te tattha mante ganthetvā te brāhmaṇā tannimittaṃ kūṭamante ganthetvā okkākarājānaṃ puna upāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1478_1: mantesu etadāgataṃ yathā āpo hatthadhovanādisabbakiccesu pāṇīnaṃ upayogaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0505a:1478_5: Yathā cāyaṃ mahāpathavī gamanaṭṭhānādisabbakiccesu kahāpaṇasaṅkhātaṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇarajatādibhedaṃ dhanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1478_8: evaṃ gāvo manussānaṃ sabbakiccesu upayogagamanatthāya uppannā.
atk-s0505a:1478_9: Tasmā etā hanitvā nānappakārake yāge yajassu bahu te vittaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1479_1: Evaṃ purimanayeneva tato ca rājā…pe… aghātayi,
atk-s0505a:1479_2: yaṃ tato pubbe kañci sattaṃ na pādā…pe… ghātayi.
atk-s0505a:1479_3: Tadā kira brāhmaṇā yaññāvāṭaṃ gāvīnaṃ pūretvā maṅgalausabhaṃ bandhitvā rañño mūlaṃ netvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0505a:1479_5: evaṃ te brahmalokassa maggo visuddho bhavissatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1479_6: Rājā katamaṅgalakicco khaggaṃ gahetvā puṅgavena saha anekasatasahassā gāvo māresi.
atk-s0505a:1479_9: Tadupādāya kira gāvo pārute disvā ubbijjanti.
atk-s0505a:1480_1: Tato devāti evaṃ tasmiṃ rājini gāviyo ghātetumāraddhe atha tadanantarameva taṃ goghātakaṃ disvā ete cātumahārājikādayo devā ca,
atk-s0505a:1480_4: pabbatapādanivāsino dānavayakkhasaññitā asurarakkhasā ca “adhammo adhammo”ti evaṃ vācaṃ nicchārentā “dhi manussā,
atk-s0505a:1480_6: Evaṃ bhūmito pabhuti so saddo muhuttena yāva brahmalokā agamāsi,
atk-s0505a:1480_10: yasmā gāvimhi satthaṃ nipatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1481_3: ye hi te tayo rogā pure āsuṃ,
atk-s0505a:1481_5: kiñci kiñcideva patthanataṇhā ca khudā ca paripākajarā cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1482_1: Idāni bhagavā taṃ pasusamārambhaṃ nindanto āha “eso adhammo”ti.
atk-s0505a:1482_2: Tassattho eso pasusamārambhasaṅkhāto kāyadaṇḍādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ daṇḍānaṃ aññataradaṇḍabhūto dhammato apetattā adhammo okkanto ahu,
atk-s0505a:1482_4: so ca kho tato pabhuti pavattattā purāṇo,
atk-s0505a:1482_5: yassa okkamanato pabhuti kenaci pādādinā ahiṃsanato adūsikāyo gāvo haññanti.
atk-s0505a:1482_6: Yā ghātentā dhammā dhaṃsanti cavanti parihāyanti yājakā yaññayājino janāti.
atk-s0505a:1483_1: Evameso aṇudhammoti evaṃ eso lāmakadhammo hīnadhammo,
atk-s0505a:1483_3: Yasmā vā ettha dānadhammopi appako atthi,
atk-s0505a:1483_5: Porāṇoti tāva cirakālato pabhuti pavattattā porāṇo.
atk-s0505a:1483_11: gāvo vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khādantī”ti evamādīni vatvāti ayamettha anussavo.
atk-s0505a:1484_1: Evaṃ dhamme viyāpanneti evaṃ porāṇe brāhmaṇadhamme naṭṭhe.
atk-s0505a:1484_4: Vibhinnā suddavessikāti pubbe samaggā viharantā suddā ca vessā ca te vibhinnā.
atk-s0505a:1484_5: Puthū vibhinnā khattiyāti khattiyāpi bahū aññamaññaṃ bhinnā.
atk-s0505a:1484_6: Patiṃ bhariyāvamaññathāti bhariyā ca gharāvāsatthaṃ issariyabale ṭhapitā puttabalādīhi upetā hutvā patiṃ avamaññatha,
atk-s0505a:1485_1: Evaṃ aññamaññaṃ vibhinnā samānā khattiyā brahmabandhū ca…pe…
atk-s0505a:1485_3: Khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca ye caññe vessasuddā yathā saṅkaraṃ nāpajjanti,
atk-s0505a:1485_4: evaṃ attano attano gottena rakkhitattā gottarakkhitā.
atk-s0505a:1485_7: ahaṃ brāhmaṇo”ti etaṃ sabbampi nāsetvā pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātānaṃ kāmānaṃ vasaṃ anvaguṃ āsattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1485_8: kāmahetu na kiñci akattabbaṃ nākaṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1486_0: Evamettha bhagavā “isayo pubbakā”tiādīhi navahi gāthāhi porāṇānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvā “yo nesaṃ paramo”ti gāthāya brahmasamaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1486_4: tassa vippaṭipattiyā devādīnaṃ pakkandanādidīpanatthañca dassetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1486_9: Ayaṃ pana doṇasutte vuttappakāro brāhmaṇacaṇḍālo brāhmaṇadhammavipattiyāpi akāraṇaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:1490_4: Idaṃ suttaṃ āyasmantaṃ sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1490_6: vitthāro pana dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ uppattito pabhuti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1490_8: anuppanne kira bhagavati dve aggasāvakā ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā devaloke nibbattā.
atk-s0505a:1490_9: Tesaṃ paṭhamo cavitvā rājagahassa avidūre upatissagāmo nāma brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogagāmo atthi,
atk-s0505a:1490_10: tattha saṭṭhiadhikapañcakoṭisatadhanavibhavassa gāmasāmino brāhmaṇassa rūpasārī nāma brāhmaṇī,
atk-s0505a:1490_12: Dutiyo tassevāvidūre kolitagāmo nāma brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogagāmo atthi.
atk-s0505a:1490_13: Tattha tathārūpavibhavasseva gāmasāmino brāhmaṇassa moggallānī nāma brāhmaṇī,
atk-s0505a:1490_14: tassā kucchiyaṃ taṃ divasameva paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0505a:1490_15: Evaṃ tesaṃ ekadivasameva paṭisandhiggahaṇañca gabbhavuṭṭhānañca ahosi.
atk-s0505a:1490_16: Ekadivaseyeva ca nesaṃ ekassa upatissagāme jātattā upatisso,
atk-s0505a:1491_0: Te sahapaṃsuṃ kīḷantā sahāyakā anupubbena vuḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1491_2: Te uyyānaṃ vā nadītitthaṃ vā gacchantā saparivārāyeva gacchanti.
atk-s0505a:1491_5: Tadā ca rājagahe kālānukālaṃ giraggasamajjo nāma hoti.
atk-s0505a:1491_6: Sāyanhasamaye nagaravemajjhe yattha sakalaaṅgamagadhavāsino abhiññātā khattiyakumārādayo sannipatitvā
atk-s0505a:1491_8: Atha te sahāyakā tena parivārena saddhiṃ tattha gantvā paññattāsanesu nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1491_9: Tato upatisso samajjavibhūtiṃ passanto mahājanakāyaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā “ettako janakāyo vassasataṃ appatvāva marissatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0505a:1491_10: Tassa maraṇaṃ āgantvā nalāṭante patiṭṭhitaṃ viya ahosi,
atk-s0505a:1491_12: Tesaṃ anekappakāresu naṭesu naccantesu dassanamattepi cittaṃ na nami,
atk-s0505a:1492_0: Atha vuṭṭhite samajje pakkantāya parisāya sakaparivārena pakkantesu tesu sahāyesu kolito upatissaṃ pucchi – “kiṃ, samma,
atk-s0505a:1492_2: So tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā tampi tatheva paṭipucchi.
atk-s0505a:1492_3: Sopi tassa attano pavattiṃ ārocetvā “ehi, samma,
atk-s0505a:1492_6: Tato dvepi janā taṃ sampattiṃ chaḍḍetvā punadeva rājagahamanuppattā.
atk-s0505a:1492_7: Tena ca samayena rājagahe sañcayo nāma paribbājako paṭivasati.
atk-s0505a:1492_8: Te tassa santike pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ pabbajitvā katipāheneva tayo vede sabbañca paribbājakasamayaṃ uggahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:1492_9: Te tesaṃ satthānaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ upaparikkhantā pariyosānaṃ adisvā ācariyaṃ pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0505a:1492_11: pariyosānaṃ pana na dissati ‘idaṃ nāma imehi satthehi pāpuṇeyyāti,
atk-s0505a:1492_18: Evaṃ te tena anuññātā amataṃ gavesamānā āhiṇḍantā jambudīpe pākaṭā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:1492_19: Tehi khattiyapaṇḍitādayo pañhaṃ puṭṭhā uttaruttariṃ na sampāyanti.
atk-s0505a:1492_21: na kho mayaṃ jānāmā”ti bhaṇantā natthi,
atk-s0505a:1493_0: Evaṃ tesu amatapariyesanaṃ caramānesu amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahamanuppatto.
atk-s0505a:1493_1: Te ca paribbājakā sakalajambudīpaṃ caritvā tiṭṭhatu amataṃ,
atk-s0505a:1493_2: antamaso pariyosānapañhavissajjanamattampi alabhantā punadeva rājagahaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1493_3: Atha kho āyasmā assaji pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvāti yāva tesaṃ pabbajjā,
atk-s0505a:1493_4: tāva sabbaṃ pabbajjākkhandhake āgatanayeneva vitthārato daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1494_0: Evaṃ pabbajitesu tesu dvīsu sahāyakesu āyasmā sāriputto aḍḍhamāsena sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1494_1: So yadā assajittherena saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasati,
atk-s0505a:1494_2: tadā bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā anantaraṃ therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati “pubbācariyo me ayamāyasmā,
atk-s0505a:1494_3: etamahaṃ nissāya bhagavato sāsanaṃ aññāsi”nti gāravena.
atk-s0505a:1494_4: Yadā pana assajittherena saddhiṃ ekavihāre na vasati,
atk-s0505a:1494_6: taṃ disaṃ oloketvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassati.
atk-s0505a:1494_7: Taṃ disvā keci bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ –
atk-s0505a:1494_10: Atha bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinnaṃyeva attānaṃ dassento bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0505a:1494_19: taṃ attano ācariyaṃ vandati namassati sammāneti,
atk-s0505a:1494_22: sāriputto”ti vatvā tattha sannipatitānaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1495_0: Tattha yasmā hi dhammaṃ puriso vijaññāti yato puggalā piṭakattayappabhedaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ vā,
atk-s0505a:1495_1: pariyattiṃ sutvā adhigantabbaṃ navalokuttarappabhedaṃ paṭivedhadhammaṃ vā puriso vijaññā jāneyya vedeyya.
atk-s0505a:1495_4: Indaṃva naṃ devatā pūjayeyyāti yathā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ dvīsu devalokesu devatā pūjenti,
atk-s0505a:1495_5: evaṃ so puggalo taṃ puggalaṃ kālasseva vuṭṭhāya upāhanaomuñcanādiṃ sabbaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ karonto pūjeyya sakkareyya garukareyya.
atk-s0505a:1495_9: so ācariyo evaṃ pūjito tasmiṃ antevāsimhi pasannacitto pariyattipaṭivedhavasena bahussuto desanāvaseneva pariyattidhammañca,
atk-s0505a:1495_10: desanaṃ sutvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā adhigantabbaṃ paṭivedhadhammañca pātukaroti deseti,
atk-s0505a:1496_1: Tadaṭṭhikatvāna nisamma dhīroti evaṃ pasannena ācariyena pātukataṃ dhammaṃ aṭṭhikatvāna suṇitvā upadhāraṇasamatthatāya dhīro puriso.
atk-s0505a:1496_2: Dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjamānoti lokuttaradhammassa anulomattā anudhammabhūtaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno.
atk-s0505a:1496_3: Viññū vibhāvī nipuṇo ca hotīti viññutāsaṅkhātāya paññāya adhigamena viññū,
atk-s0505a:1496_4: vibhāvetvā paresampi pākaṭaṃ katvā ñāpanasamatthatāya vibhāvī,
atk-s0505a:1496_6: Yo tādisaṃ bhajati appamattoti yo tādisaṃ pubbe vuttappakāraṃ bahussutaṃ appamatto tappasādanaparo hutvā bhajati.
atk-s0505a:1497_1: Evaṃ paṇḍitācariyasevanaṃ pasaṃsitvā idāni bālācariyasevanaṃ nindanto “khuddañca bāla”nti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1497_7: Adhippāyato pana yo bahucīvarādilābhī ācariyo antevāsikānaṃ cīvarādīni na sakkoti dātuṃ,
atk-s0505a:1497_9: Etehi khuddatādidhammehi samannāgatattā taṃ khuddaṃ bālaṃ anāgatatthaṃ usūyakaṃ ācariyaṃ upasevamāno
atk-s0505a:1497_11: Tasmā idha sāsane kiñci appamattakampi pariyattidhammaṃ paṭivedhadhammaṃ vā avibhāvayitvā ca avijānitvā ca yassa dhammesu kaṅkhā,
atk-s0505a:1497_12: taṃ ataritvā maraṇaṃ upetīti evamassa attho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1498_10: Kiṃ soti ettha “so vuyhamāno”ti iminā ca sokārena tassa narassa niddiṭṭhattā nipātamatto sokāro.
atk-s0505a:1498_11: Kiṃ sūti vuttaṃ hoti yathā “na bhavissāmi nāma so,
atk-s0505a:1499_0: Adhippāyato pana yathā yo kocideva naro vuttappakāraṃ nadiṃ otaritvā tāya nadiyā vuyhamāno anusotagāmī
atk-s0505a:1499_1: sotameva anugacchanto pare pāratthike kiṃ sakkhati pāraṃ netuṃ.
atk-s0505a:1499_3: Tatheva duvidhampi dhammaṃ attano paññāya avibhāvayitvā bahussutānañca santike atthaṃ anisāmetvā sayaṃ
atk-s0505a:1499_4: avibhāvitattā ajānanto anisāmitattā ca avitiṇṇakaṅkho pare kiṃ sakkhati nijjhāpetuṃ pekkhāpetunti evamettha
atk-s0505a:1500_1: Evaṃ bālasevanāya bālassa paraṃ nijjhāpetuṃ asamatthatāya pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ upamaṃ vatvā idāni “yo tādisaṃ
atk-s0505a:1500_2: bhajati appamatto”ti ettha vuttassa paṇḍitassa pare nijjhāpetuṃ samatthatāya pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ “yathāpi
atk-s0505a:1500_7: Tatrūpayaññūti tassā nāvāya āharaṇapaṭiharaṇādiupāyajānanena maggapaṭipādanena upāyaññū.
atk-s0505a:1500_14: Sotāvadhānūpanisūpapanneti sotaodahanena ca maggaphalānaṃ upanissayena ca upapanne.
atk-s0505a:1500_16: Adhippāyayojanāpi sakkā purimanayeneva jānitunti na vitthāritā.
atk-s0505a:1501_1: Evaṃ paṇḍitassa pare nijjhāpetuṃ samatthabhāvapākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ upamaṃ vatvā tassā paṇḍitasevanāya niyojento “tasmā have”ti imaṃ avasānagāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1501_7: paññāsampattiyā ca medhāvinaṃ vuttappakārasutadvayena ca bahussutaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1501_8: Tādisañhi bhajamāno tena bhāsitassa dhammassa aññāya atthaṃ evaṃ ñatvā ca yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno
atk-s0505a:1501_9: tāya paṭipattiyā paṭivedhavasena viññātadhammo so maggaphalanibbānappabhedaṃ lokuttarasukhaṃ labhetha
atk-s0505a:1505_3: Āyasmato sāriputtassa gihisahāyako eko therasseva pituno vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa sahāyassa brāhmaṇassa putto
atk-s0505a:1505_4: saṭṭhikoṭiadhikaṃ pañcasatakoṭidhanaṃ pariccajitvā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa santike pabbajitvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0505a:1505_8: Tato thero “buddhaveneyyo eso”ti ñatvā taṃ ādāya bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha puggalaṃ aniyametvā “kiṃsīlo”ti pucchi.
atk-s0505a:1505_13: Kāni kammāni brūhayanti kāni kāyakammādīni vaḍḍhento.
atk-s0505a:1505_14: Naro sammā niviṭṭhassāti abhirato naro sāsane sammā patiṭṭhito bhaveyya.
atk-s0505a:1505_15: Uttamatthañca pāpuṇeti sabbatthānaṃ uttamaṃ arahattañca pāpuṇeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1506_2: kasmā ādikammikaputhujjanapañhaṃ pucchatī”ti āvajjento “saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbhā”ti ñatvā pucchāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0505a:1506_3: cārittasīlaṃ avibhajitvāva tassa sappāyavasena dhammaṃ desento “vuḍḍhāpacāyī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:1507_4: Jātiyā hi daharopi bahussuto bhikkhu appassutamahallakabhikkhūnamantare bāhusaccapaññāya vuḍḍhattā paññāvuḍḍho.
atk-s0505a:1507_5: Tassa hi santike mahallakabhikkhūpi buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
atk-s0505a:1507_7: Tathā daharopi bhikkhu adhigamasampanno guṇavuḍḍho nāma.
atk-s0505a:1507_8: Tassa hi ovāde patiṭṭhāya mahallakāpi vipassanāgabbhaṃ gahetvā arahattaphalaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0505a:1507_9: Tathā daharopi rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto brāhmaṇo vā sesajanassa vandanārahato jātivuḍḍho nāma.
atk-s0505a:1507_11: Tattha yasmā paññāya sāriputtattherassa sadiso natthi ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1507_14: tasmā tassa bhikkhuno vayena samānopi so imehi tīhi kāraṇehi vuḍḍho.
atk-s0505a:1507_15: Imasmiṃ panatthe paññāguṇehi eva vuḍḍhabhāvaṃ sandhāya bhagavā āha –
atk-s0505a:1507_18: tesameva vuḍḍhānaṃ lābhādīsu usūyavigamena anusūyako ca siyāti ayamādipādassa attho.
atk-s0505a:1508_0: Kālaññū cassāti ettha pana rāge uppanne tassa vinodanatthāya garūnaṃ dassanaṃ gacchantopi kālaññū, dose… mohe…
atk-s0505a:1508_1: kosajje uppanne tassa vinodanatthāya garūnaṃ dassanaṃ gacchantopi kālaññū,
atk-s0505a:1508_2: yato evaṃ kālaññū ca assa garūnaṃ dassanāya.
atk-s0505a:1508_6: dullabho vā ayaṃ īdisāya kathāya savanakkhaṇoti jānanto.
atk-s0505a:1508_7: Suṇeyya sakkaccāti taṃ kathaṃ sakkaccaṃ suṇeyya.
atk-s0505a:1508_9: aññānipi buddhaguṇādipaṭisaṃyuttāni subhāsitāni sakkaccameva suṇeyyāti attho.
atk-s0505a:1509_1: “Kālaññū cassa garūnaṃ dassanāyā”ti ettha vuttanayañca attano uppannarāgādivinodanakālaṃ ñatvāpi garūnaṃ
atk-s0505a:1509_2: santikaṃ gacchanto kālena gacche garūnaṃ sakāsaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1509_4: yattha katthaci ṭhitamācariyaṃ disvā paripucchanatthāya upasaṅkameyya,
atk-s0505a:1509_5: sakasenāsane pana attano āsane nisinnaṃ vūpasantadarathaṃ sallakkhetvā kammaṭṭhānādividhipucchanatthaṃ upasaṅkameyyāti attho.
atk-s0505a:1509_6: Evaṃ upasaṅkamantopi ca thambhaṃ niraṃkatvā nivātavutti thaddhabhāvakaraṃ mānaṃ vināsetvā nīcavutti pādapuñchanacoḷakachinnavisāṇusabhauddhatadāṭhasappasadiso
atk-s0505a:1509_8: Atha tena garunā vuttaṃ atthaṃ dhammaṃ…pe…
atk-s0505a:1509_14: Anussare ceva samācare cāti atthaṃ kathitokāse anussareyya,
atk-s0505a:1509_16: anussaraṇamatteneva ca atussanto taṃ sabbampi samācare samācareyya samādāya vatteyya.
atk-s0505a:1509_17: Tāsaṃ kathānaṃ attani pavattane ussukkaṃ kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0505a:1510_1: Tato parañca dhammārāmo dhammarato dhamme ṭhito dhammavinicchayaññū bhaveyya.
atk-s0505a:1510_8: Dhammavinicchayaṃ jānāti “idaṃ udayañāṇaṃ idaṃ vayañāṇa”nti dhammavinicchayaññū,
atk-s0505a:1510_10: Atha yāyaṃ rājakathāditiracchānakathā taruṇavipassakassa bahiddhārūpādīsu abhinandanuppādanena taṃ samathavipassanādhammaṃ sandūseti,
atk-s0505a:1510_13: aññadatthu āvāsagocarādisappāyāni sevanto tacchehi nīyetha subhāsitehi.
atk-s0505a:1511_1: Idāni “dhammasandosavāda”nti ettha atisaṅkhepena vuttaṃ samathavipassanāyuttassa bhikkhuno upakkilesaṃ
atk-s0505a:1511_2: pākaṭaṃ karonto tadaññenapi upakkilesena saddhiṃ “hassaṃ jappa”nti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1511_4: Vipassakena hi bhikkhunā hasanīyasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ sitamattameva kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1511_15: adhimattataṇhālakkhaṇā mucchāti ime ca dosā sukhakāmena aṅgārakāsu viya,
atk-s0505a:1511_18: Hitvā ca ārogyamadādivigamā vītamadena cittavikkhepābhāvā ṭhitattena caritabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1511_19: Evaṃ paṭipanno hi sabbupakkilesaparisuddhāya bhāvanāya na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0505a:1512_1: Idāni yvāyaṃ “hassaṃ jappa”ntiādinā nayena upakkileso vutto,
atk-s0505a:1512_2: tena samannāgato bhikkhu yasmā sāhaso hoti avīmaṃsakārī,
atk-s0505a:1512_4: pamatto ca hoti kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asātaccakārī,
atk-s0505a:1512_5: tathārūpassa ca “suṇeyya sakkacca subhāsitānī”tiādinā nayena vutto ovādo niratthako,
atk-s0505a:1512_6: tasmā imassa saṃkilesassa puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya sutādivuddhipaṭipakkhabhāvaṃ dassento “viññātasārānī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1513_9: tesu viññātesu dhammesu yo samādhi cittassāvikkhepo tathattāya paṭipatti,
atk-s0505a:1513_11: Na hi vijānanamatteneva koci attho sijjhati.
atk-s0505a:1513_12: Yo panāyaṃ naro rāgādivasena vattanato sāhaso,
atk-s0505a:1513_15: Tena tassa atthavijānanābhāvato sā subhāsitavijānanapaññā ca,
atk-s0505a:1513_16: tathattāya paṭipattiyā abhāvato sutañca na vaḍḍhatīti.
atk-s0505a:1514_1: Evaṃ pamattānaṃ sattānaṃ paññāparihāniṃ sutaparihāniñca dassetvā idāni appamattānaṃ tadubhayasārādhigamaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0505a:1514_5: Ekopi hi buddho samathavipassanādhammaṃ adesetvā parinibbuto nāma natthi.
atk-s0505a:1514_6: Tasmā etasmiṃ dhamme ca ye ariyappavedite ratā niratā appamattā sātaccānuyogino,
atk-s0505a:1514_7: anuttarā te vacasā manasā kammunā ca,
atk-s0505a:1514_8: te catubbidhena vacīsucaritena tividhena manosucaritena tividhena kāyasucaritena ca samannāgatattā vacasā manasā kammunā ca anuttarā,
atk-s0505a:1514_10: Ettāvatā saddhiṃ pubbabhāgasīlena ariyamaggasampayuttaṃ sīlaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0505a:1514_14: te na kevalaṃ vācādīhi anuttarā honti,
atk-s0505a:1514_15: apica kho pana santisoracce samādhimhi ca saṇṭhitā hutvā sutassa paññāya ca sāramajjhagū adhigatā icceva veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1515_2: santisoraccasamādhīhi paññākkhandhasamādhikkhandheti tīhipi imehi khandhehi aparabhāgapaṭipadañca dassetvā
atk-s0505a:1515_3: sutapaññāsārena akuppavimuttiṃ dassento arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ samāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1515_4: Desanāpariyosāne ca so bhikkhu sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā puna na cirasseva aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsīti.
atk-s0505a:1519_3: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto rattiṃ jetavanavihāre vasitvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0505a:1519_4: sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pācīnadvārena nagarā nikkhamitvā migāramātupāsādaṃ agamāsi divāvihāratthāya.
atk-s0505a:1519_5: Āciṇṇaṃ kiretaṃ bhagavato rattiṃ jetavanavihāre vasitvā migāramātupāsāde divāvihārūpagamanaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1519_6: rattiñca migāramātupāsāde vasitvā jetavane divāvihārūpagamanaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:1519_8: Migāramātupāsādassa ca heṭṭhā pañca kūṭāgāragabbhasatāni honti,
atk-s0505a:1519_11: tadā bhikkhū bhagavato gāravena uparipāsādaṃ nāruhanti.
atk-s0505a:1519_12: Taṃ divasaṃ pana bhagavā uparipāsāde kūṭāgāragabbhaṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0505a:1519_13: tena heṭṭhāpāsāde pañcapi gabbhasatāni pañcasatā bhikkhū pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1519_14: Te ca sabbeva navā honti adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ uddhatā unnaḷā pākatindriyā.
atk-s0505a:1519_15: Te pavisitvā divāseyyaṃ supitvā sāyaṃ uṭṭhāya mahātale sannipatitvā “ajja bhattagge tuyhaṃ kiṃ ahosi,
atk-s0505a:1519_19: tattha evarūpo ca evarūpo ca bhojanavidhi ahosī”ti nānappakāraṃ āmisakathaṃ kathentā uccāsaddamahāsaddā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:1520_0: Bhagavā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “ime mayā saddhiṃ vasantāpi evaṃ pamattā,
atk-s0505a:1520_2: Tāvadeva āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato cittaṃ ñatvā iddhiyā āgamma pādamūle vandamānoyeva ahosi.
atk-s0505a:1520_7: “Evaṃ bhante”ti kho so āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā tāvadeva āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0505a:1520_8: karīsabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ nāvaṃ viya mahāvāto pādaṅguṭṭhakena kampesi saddhiṃ patiṭṭhitapathavippadesena.
atk-s0505a:1520_9: Atha te bhikkhū bhītā vissaraṃ karontā sakasakacīvarāni chaḍḍetvā catūhi dvārehi nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1520_10: Bhagavā tesaṃ attānaṃ dassento aññena dvārena gandhakuṭiṃ pavisanto viya ahosi,
atk-s0505a:1520_21: muṭṭhassatīnaṃ asampajānānaṃ pamādavihārīnaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ moggallānena kampito”ti vatvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1521_0: Tattha uṭṭhahathāti āsanā uṭṭhahatha ghaṭatha vāyamatha,
atk-s0505a:1521_3: Ko attho supitena voti ko tumhākaṃ anupādāparinibbānatthāya pabbajitānaṃ supitena attho.
atk-s0505a:1521_4: Na hi sakkā supantena koci attho pāpuṇituṃ.
atk-s0505a:1521_6: sallaviddhāna ruppatanti yatra ca nāma appakepi sarīrappadese uṭṭhitena cakkhurogādinā rogena āturānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1521_9: tattha tumhākaṃ sakalacittasarīrasantānaṃ bhañjitvā uppannehi nānappakārakilesarogehi āturānañhi kā niddā
atk-s0505a:1521_10: rāgasallādīhi ca pañcahi sallehi antohadayaṃ pavisiya viddhattā sallaviddhānaṃ ruppataṃ.
atk-s0505a:1522_1: Evaṃ vatvā puna bhagavā bhiyyosomattāya te bhikkhū ussāhento saṃvejento ca āha –
atk-s0505a:1522_13: ito pubbe pana vo dīgharattaṃ suttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1522_19: tasmā tassā niddāya antakiriyatthaṃ uṭṭhahatha nisīdatha daḷhaṃ sikkhatha santiyā.
atk-s0505a:1523_12: mā tumhe “pamattā ete”ti evaṃ ñatvā maccurājapariyāyanāmo māro vasānuge amohayittha,
atk-s0505a:1523_14: evaṃ vasānuge karonto mā amohayitthāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1524_1: Yato tassa vasaṃ anupagacchantā yāya devā manussā ca…pe…
atk-s0505a:1524_3: yāya devā ca manussā ca atthikā rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbatthikā,
atk-s0505a:1524_4: taṃ rūpādiṃ sitā nissitā allīnā hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0505a:1524_5: taratha samatikkamatha etaṃ nānappakāresu visayesu visaṭavitthiṇṇavisālattā visattikaṃ bhavabhogataṇhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1524_10: te khaṇātītā hi socanti nirayamhi samappitā,
atk-s0505a:1524_11: nirassādaṭṭhena nirayasaññite catubbidhepi apāye patiṭṭhitā “akataṃ vata no kalyāṇa”ntiādinā nayena socanti.
atk-s0505a:1525_1: Evaṃ bhagavā te bhikkhū ussāhetvā saṃvejetvā ca idāni tesaṃ taṃ pamādavihāraṃ vigarahitvā sabbeva te
atk-s0505a:1525_8: Na hi kadāci pamādo nāma arajo atthi.
atk-s0505a:1525_10: Mā tumhe “daharā tāva mayaṃ pacchā jānissāmā”ti vissāsamāpajjittha.
atk-s0505a:1525_12: majjhimakālepi therakālepi pamādānupatitattā mahārajo saṅkārakūṭo eva hoti,
atk-s0505a:1525_13: yathā ghare ekadvedivasiko rajo rajo eva,
atk-s0505a:1525_14: vaḍḍhamāno pana gaṇavassiko saṅkārakūṭo eva hoti.
atk-s0505a:1525_15: Evaṃ santepi pana paṭhamavaye buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā itaravayesu samaṇadhammaṃ karonto,
atk-s0505a:1525_16: paṭhamavaye vā pariyāpuṇitvā majjhimavaye suṇitvā pacchimavaye samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi bhikkhu pamādavihārī
atk-s0505a:1525_18: Yo pana sabbavayesu pamādavihārī divāseyyaṃ āmisakathañca anuyutto,
atk-s0505a:1525_21: itaravayesu pamādānupatito mahāpamādo ca mahārajo evāti.
atk-s0505a:1526_0: Evaṃ tesaṃ pamādavihāraṃ vigarahitvā appamāde niyojento āha –
atk-s0505a:1526_5: tasmā satiavippavāsasaṅkhātena appamādena āsavānaṃ khayañāṇasaṅkhātāya ca vijjāya paṇḍito kulaputto uddhare
atk-s0505a:1526_6: attano hadayanissitaṃ rāgādipañcavidhaṃ sallanti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ samāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1526_7: Desanāpariyosāne saṃvegamāpajjitvā tameva dhammadesanaṃ manasi karitvā paccavekkhamānā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā
atk-s0505a:1530_3: Bhagavā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā bodhimaṇḍato anupubbena kapilavatthuṃ gantvā tattha rāhulakumārena
atk-s0505a:1530_4: “dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dehī”ti dāyajjaṃ yācito sāriputtattheraṃ āṇāpesi –
atk-s0505a:1530_7: Evaṃ pabbajitaṃ pana rāhulakumāraṃ vuḍḍhippattaṃ sāriputtattherova upasampādesi,
atk-s0505a:1530_10: so jātigottakulavaṇṇapokkharatādīni nissāya mānaṃ vā madaṃ vā mā akāsī”ti daharakālato pabhuti yāva na ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0505a:1530_12: Tasmā cetaṃ suttapariyosānepi vuttaṃ “itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ imāhi gāthāhi abhiṇhaṃ ovadatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1530_13: Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho “kacci tvaṃ, rāhula,
atk-s0505a:1530_14: abhiṇhaṃ saṃvāsahetu jātiādīnaṃ aññatarena vatthunā na paribhavasi paṇḍitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1530_15: ñāṇapadīpassa dhammadesanāpadīpassa ca dhāraṇato ukkādhāro manussānaṃ kacci apacito tayā,
atk-s0505a:1530_16: kacci niccaṃ pūjito tayā”ti āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ sandhāya bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a:1531_1: Evaṃ vutte āyasmā rāhulo “nāhaṃ bhagavā nīcapuriso viya saṃvāsahetu mānaṃ vā madaṃ vā karomī”ti dīpento imaṃ paṭigāthamāha “nāhaṃ abhiṇhasaṃvāsā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1532_1: Tato naṃ bhagavā uttariṃ ovadanto pañca kāmaguṇetiādikā avasesagāthāyo āha.
atk-s0505a:1532_2: Tattha yasmā pañca kāmaguṇā sattānaṃ piyarūpā piyajātikā ativiya sattehi icchitā patthitā,
atk-s0505a:1532_4: te cāyasmā rāhulo hitvā saddhāya gharā nikkhanto,
atk-s0505a:1532_12: saddhāya gharā nikkhammā”ti samuttejetvā imassa nekkhammassa patirūpāya paṭipattiyā niyojento āha –
atk-s0505a:1533_0: Tattha siyā “nanu cāyasmā dāyajjaṃ patthento balakkārena pabbājito,
atk-s0505a:1533_4: Ayañhi āyasmā dīgharattaṃ nekkhammādhimutto padumuttarasammāsambuddhassa puttaṃ uparevataṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ
atk-s0505a:1533_5: disvā saṅkho nāma nāgarājā hutvā satta divase dānaṃ datvā tathābhāvaṃ patthetvā tato pabhuti patthanāsampanno
atk-s0505a:1533_6: abhinīhārasampanno satasahassakappe pāramiyo pūretvā antimabhavaṃ upapanno.
atk-s0505a:1533_11: Atha vā dīgharattaṃ saddhāyeva gharā nikkhamma idāni dukkhassantakaro bhavāti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:1534_1: Idānissa ādito pabhuti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyāya paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ “mitte bhajassu kalyāṇe”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:1534_3: te bhajanto himavantaṃ nissāya mahāsālā mūlādīhi viya sīlādīhi vaḍḍhati. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:1534_6: vivittaṃ appanigghosanti yañca sayanāsanaṃ pantaṃ dūraṃ vivittaṃ appākiṇṇaṃ appanigghosaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1534_11: Tattha paṭiggahaṇamattaññunā deyyadhammepi appe dāyakepi appaṃ dātukāme appameva gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1534_12: deyyadhamme appe dāyake pana bahuṃ dātukāmepi appameva gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1534_13: deyyadhamme pana bahutare dāyakepi appaṃ dātukāme appameva gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1534_14: deyyadhammepi bahutare dāyakepi bahuṃ dātukāme attano balaṃ jānitvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1534_15: Apica mattāyeva vaṇṇitā bhagavatāti paribhogamattaññunā puttamaṃsaṃ viya akkhabbhañjanamiva ca yoniso manasi karitvā bhojanaṃ paribhuñjitabbanti.
atk-s0505a:1535_1: Evamimāya gāthāya brahmacariyassa upakārabhūtāya kalyāṇamittasevanāya niyojetvā senāsanabhojanamukhena
atk-s0505a:1535_2: ca paccayaparibhogapārisuddhisīle samādapetvā idāni yasmā cīvarādīsu taṇhāya micchāājīvo hoti,
atk-s0505a:1535_3: tasmā taṃ paṭisedhetvā ājīvapārisuddhisīle samādapento “cīvare piṇḍapāte cā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1535_5: Etesūti etesu catūsu cīvarādīsu bhikkhūnaṃ taṇhuppādavatthūsu.
atk-s0505a:1535_6: Taṇhaṃ mākāsīti “hirikopīnapaṭicchādanādiatthameva te cattāro paccayā niccāturānaṃ purisānaṃ paṭikārabhūtā
atk-s0505a:1535_7: jajjaragharassevimassa atidubbalassa kāyassa upatthambhabhūtā”tiādinā nayena ādīnavaṃ passanto taṇhaṃ
atk-s0505a:1535_12: Etesu hi taṇhaṃ karonto taṇhāya ākaḍḍhiyamāno punapi imaṃ lokaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0505a:1535_14: evaṃ sante na puna imaṃ lokaṃ āgamissasīti.
atk-s0505a:1536_0: Evaṃ vutte āyasmā rāhulo “cīvare taṇhaṃ mākāsīti maṃ bhagavā āhā”ti cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttāni dve dhutaṅgāni samādiyi paṃsukūlikaṅgañca,
atk-s0505a:1536_2: “Piṇḍapāte taṇhaṃ mākāsīti maṃ bhagavā āhā”ti piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttāni pañca dhutaṅgāni samādiyi –
atk-s0505a:1536_8: “Senāsane taṇhaṃ mākāsīti maṃ bhagavā āhā”ti senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttāni cha dhutaṅgāni samādiyi –
atk-s0505a:1536_15: “Gilānappaccaye taṇhaṃ mākāsīti maṃ bhagavā āhā”ti sabbappaccayesu yathālābhaṃ yathābalaṃ yathāsāruppanti tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho ahosi,
atk-s0505a:1536_16: yathā taṃ subbaco kulaputto padakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaninti.
atk-s0505a:1537_1: Evaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīle samādapetvā idāni avasesasīle samathavipassanāsu ca samādapetuṃ “saṃvuto pātimokkhasmi”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:1537_2: Tattha saṃvuto pātimokkhasminti ettha bhavassūti pāṭhaseso.
atk-s0505a:1537_8: Lakkhaṇato pana chaṭṭhampi vuttaṃyeva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1537_9: Sati kāyagatā tyatthūti evaṃ catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhitassa tuyhaṃ catudhātuvavatthānacatubbidhasampajaññānāpānassatiāhārepaṭikūlasaññābhāvanādibhedā
atk-s0505a:1537_12: Nibbidābahulo bhavāti saṃsāravaṭṭe ukkaṇṭhanabahulo sabbaloke anabhiratasaññī hohīti attho.
atk-s0505a:1538_1: Ettāvatā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ upacārabhūmiṃ dassetvā idāni appanābhūmiṃ dassento “nimittaṃ parivajjehī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:1538_6: Asubhāya cittaṃ bhāvehīti yathā saviññāṇake aviññāṇake vā kāye asubhabhāvanā sampajjati,
atk-s0505a:1539_2: Tattha animittañca bhāvehīti evaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyena samādhinā samāhitacitto vipassanaṃ bhāvehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1539_3: Vipassanā hi “aniccānupassanāñāṇaṃ niccanimittato vimuccatīti animitto vimokkho”tiādinā nayena rāganimittādīnaṃ vā aggahaṇena animittavohāraṃ labhati. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:1540_1: sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
atk-s0505a:1540_3: iminā vihārena viharato nimittānusāri viññāṇaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1541_0: Mānānusayamujjahāti imāya animittabhāvanāya aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā “aniccasaññino, meghiya,
atk-s0505a:1541_2: anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti evamādinā anukkamena mānānusayaṃ ujjaha pajaha pariccajāhīti attho.
atk-s0505a:1541_4: upasanto carissasīti athevaṃ ariyamaggena mānassa abhisamayā khayā vayā pahānā paṭinissaggā upasanto
atk-s0505a:1541_5: nibbuto sītibhūto sabbadarathapariḷāhavirahito yāva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāsi,
atk-s0505a:1541_6: tāva suññatānimittāppaṇihitānaṃ aññataraññatarena phalasamāpattivihārena carissasi viharissasīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1542_0: Tato paraṃ “itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā”tiādi saṅgītikārakānaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1542_1: Tattha itthaṃ sudanti itthaṃ su idaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1542_4: Evaṃ ovadiyamāno cāyasmā rāhulo paripākagatesu vimuttiparipācaniyesu dhammesu cūḷarāhulovādasuttapariyosāne
atk-s0505a:1546_5: yato tāni aññāni ca tathāvidhāni chaḍḍetvā avuttanayameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0505a:1546_7: Anuppanne hi bhagavati aggāḷavagotamakādīni anekāni cetiyāni ahesuṃ yakkhanāgādīnaṃ bhavanāni.
atk-s0505a:1546_8: Tāni uppanne bhagavati manussā vināsetvā vihāre akaṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1546_10: Tato aggāḷavacetiyasaṅkhāte vihāre viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1546_14: so kira paribbājakassa putto paribbājikāya kucchimhi jāto aññataraṃ vijjaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0505a:1546_15: yassānubhāvena chavasīsaṃ ākoṭetvā sattānaṃ gatiṃ jānāti.
atk-s0505a:1546_16: Manussāpi sudaṃ attano ñātīnaṃ kālakatānaṃ susānato sīsāni ānetvā taṃ tesaṃ gatiṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0505a:1546_19: Te tena vimhitā tassa bahuṃ dhanaṃ denti.
atk-s0505a:1547_0: So satasahassakappaṃ pūritapāramī abhinīhārasampanno pañcahi purisasahassehi parivuto gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu vicaranto sāvatthiṃ anuppatto.
atk-s0505a:1547_1: Tena ca samayena bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0505a:1547_2: sāvatthivāsino purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sunivatthā supārutā pupphagandhādīni gahetvā dhammassavanatthāya jetavanaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0505a:1547_3: So te disvā “mahājanakāyo kuhiṃ gacchatī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0505a:1547_8: Sopi tehi saddhiṃ saparivāro gantvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammoditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0505a:1547_11: yāya sattānaṃ chavasīsāni ākoṭetvā gatiṃ pavedesī”ti? “Evaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1547_14: Bhagavā niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ āharāpetvā dassesi,
atk-s0505a:1547_15: so nakhena ākoṭetvā “niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ bho gotamā”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:1549_0: Vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ, nibbānaṃ arahato gatī”ti. ;
atk-s0505a:1550_7: taṃ katvā imaṃ vijjaṃ dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:1550_8: Tadā ca bhagavato nigrodhakappatthero samīpe hoti,
atk-s0505a:1550_16: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭibhānavantānaṃ yadidaṃ vaṅgīso”ti.
atk-s0505a:1551_0: Evaṃ samudāgatassa āyasmato vaṅgīsassa upajjhāyo vajjāvajjādiupanijjhāyanena evaṃ laddhavohāro nigrodhakappo nāma thero.
atk-s0505a:1551_2: nigrodhamūle pana arahattaṃ adhigatattā “nigrodhakappo”ti bhagavatā vutto.
atk-s0505a:1551_5: Aggāḷave cetiye aciraparinibbuto hotīti tasmiṃ cetiye aciraparinibbuto hoti.
atk-s0505a:1551_6: Rahogatassa paṭisallīnassāti gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭhattā rahogatassa kāyena,
atk-s0505a:1551_7: paṭisallīnassa cittena tehi tehi visayehi paṭinivattitvā sallīnassa.
atk-s0505a:1551_8: Evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādīti iminā ākārena vitakko uppajji.
atk-s0505a:1551_11: Ayañhi tassa parinibbānakāle na sammukhā ahosi,
atk-s0505a:1552_0: Tathā hi piṇḍolabhāradvājo pacchābhattaṃ divāvihāratthāya udenassa uyyānameva gacchati pubbe rājā hutvā tattha paricāresīti iminā pubbaparicayena,
atk-s0505a:1552_1: gavampatitthero tāvatiṃsabhavane suññaṃ devavimānaṃ gacchati devaputto hutvā tattha paricāresīti iminā pubbaparicayena.
atk-s0505a:1552_2: Pilindavaccho bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati abbokiṇṇāni pañca jātisatāni brāhmaṇo hutvā tathā abhāsīti iminā pubbaparicayena.
atk-s0505a:1552_3: Tasmā asammukhattā diṭṭhāsevanattā cassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “parinibbuto nu kho me upajjhāyo,
atk-s0505a:1552_6: Ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvāti ettha pana puna saṇṭhāpanena evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1552_7: Ekaṃsanti ca vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1552_8: Yato yathā vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:1553_9: Yasassīti lābhaparivārasampanno abhinibbutattoti guttacitto apariḍayhamānacitto vā.
atk-s0505a:1554_1: Tayā katanti nigrodhamūle nisinnattā “nigrodhakappo”ti vadatā tayā katanti yathā attanā upalakkheti,
atk-s0505a:1554_3: Bhagavā pana na nisinnattā eva taṃ tathā ālapi,
atk-s0505a:1555_2: Mayampi sabbeti niravasesaparisaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā attānaṃ dassento bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a:1555_4: Samavaṭṭhitāti sammā avaṭṭhitā ābhogaṃ katvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0505a:1556_1: Chindeva no vicikicchanti akusalavicikicchāya nibbicikiccho so,
atk-s0505a:1556_6: brūvanto ca taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ parinibbutaṃ vedaya bhūripañña majjheva no bhāsa,
atk-s0505a:1556_7: parinibbutaṃ ñatvā mahāpaññaṃ bhagavā majjheva amhākaṃ sabbesaṃ bhāsa,
atk-s0505a:1556_9: Sakkova devāna sahassanettoti idaṃ pana thutivacanameva.
atk-s0505a:1556_11: yathā sakko sahassanetto devānaṃ majjhe tehi sakkaccaṃ sampaṭicchitavacano bhāsati,
atk-s0505a:1556_12: evaṃ amhākaṃ majjhe amhehi sampaṭicchitavacano bhāsāti.
atk-s0505a:1557_1: Ye kecīti imampi gāthaṃ bhagavantaṃ thunantoyeva vattukāmataṃ janetuṃ bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a:1557_2: Tassattho ye keci abhijjhādayo ganthā tesaṃ appahāne mohavicikicchānaṃ pahānābhāvato “mohamaggā”ti ca
atk-s0505a:1557_4: Sabbe te tathāgataṃ patvā tathāgatassa desanābalena viddhaṃsitā na bhavanti nassanti.
atk-s0505a:1557_7: yasmā tathāgato sabbaganthavidhamanapaññācakkhujananato narānaṃ paramaṃ cakkhunti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1558_1: No ce hi jātūti imampi gāthaṃ thunantoyeva vattukāmataṃ janentova bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a:1558_6: yadi bhagavā yathā puratthimādibhedo vāto abbhaghanaṃ vihanati,
atk-s0505a:1558_8: Tathā yathā abbhaghanena nivuto loko tamova hoti ekandhakāro,
atk-s0505a:1558_10: Yepi ime dāni jotimanto khāyanti sāriputtādayo,
atk-s0505a:1559_1: Dhīrā cāti imampi gāthaṃ purimanayeneva bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a:1559_2: Tassattho dhīrā ca paṇḍitā purisā pajjotakarā bhavanti,

atk-s0505a:1600_0: “Atha kho catunnaṃ suddhāvāsakāyikānaṃ devatānaṃ etadahosi – ‘ayaṃ, kho,
atk-s0505a:1600_1: bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ mahāvane mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi.
atk-s0505a:1600_2: Dasahi ca lokadhātūhi devatā yebhuyyena sannipatitā honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya bhikkhusaṅghañca.
atk-s0505a:1600_4: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike paccekaṃ gāthaṃ bhāseyyāmā”’ti.
atk-s0505a:1601_1: Evaṃ gantvā ca tattha eko brahmā puratthimacakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṃ labhitvā tattha ṭhito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:1604_0: Imañcassa gāthaṃ bhāsamānassa pacchimacakkavāḷapabbate ṭhito saddaṃ assosi.
atk-s0505a:1605_0: Dutiyo pacchimacakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṃ labhitvā tattha ṭhito taṃ gāthaṃ sutvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:1608_0: Tatiyo dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṃ labhitvā tattha ṭhito taṃ gāthaṃ sutvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0505a:1610_0: Catuttho uttaracakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṃ labhitvā tattha ṭhito taṃ gāthaṃ sutvā imaṃ gāthamabhāsi –
atk-s0505a:1613_0: Tassapi taṃ saddaṃ dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamuddhani ṭhito assosi.
atk-s0505a:1613_1: Evaṃ tadā ime cattāro brahmāno parisaṃ thometvā ṭhitā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0505a:1614_0: Atha bhagavā devaparisaṃ oloketvā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi – “yepi te,
atk-s0505a:1614_3: tesampi bhagavantānaṃ etapparamāyeva devatā sannipatitā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:1614_7: tesampi bhagavantānaṃ etapparamāyeva devatā sannipatitā bhavissanti seyyathāpi mayhaṃ etarahī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1614_8: Tato taṃ devaparisaṃ bhabbābhabbavasena dvidhā vibhaji “ettakā bhabbā,
atk-s0505a:1614_10: Tattha “abhabbaparisā buddhasatepi dhammaṃ desente na bujjhati,
atk-s0505a:1614_11: bhabbaparisā sakkā bodhetu”nti ñatvā puna bhabbapuggale cariyavasena chadhā vibhaji “ettakā rāgacaritā,
atk-s0505a:1614_14: Evaṃ cariyavasena pariggahetvā “assā parisāya kīdisā dhammadesanā sappāyā”ti dhammakathaṃ vicinitvā puna taṃ parisaṃ manasākāsi –
atk-s0505a:1614_19: Tato “pucchāvasena jāneyyā”ti ñatvā “pañhaṃ pucchituṃ samattho atthi,
atk-s0505a:1614_20: natthī”ti puna sakalaparisaṃ āvajjetvā “natthi kocī”ti ñatvā “sace ahameva pucchitvā ahameva vissajjeyyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1614_22: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ nimmitabuddhaṃ māpeyyanti pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya manomayiddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā nimmitabuddhaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0505a:1614_23: Sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī lakkhaṇasampanno pattacīvaradharo ālokitavilokitādisampanno hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānacittena saha pāturahosi.
atk-s0505a:1614_24: So pācīnalokadhātuto āgantvā bhagavato samasame āsane nisinno evaṃ āgantvā yāni bhagavatā imamhi samāgame cariyavasena cha suttāni kathitāni.
atk-s0505a:1614_26: purābhedasuttaṃ kalahavivādasuttaṃ cūḷabyūhaṃ mahābyūhaṃ tuvaṭakaṃ idameva sammāparibbājanīyanti.
atk-s0505a:1614_27: Tesu rāgacaritadevatānaṃ sappāyavasena kathetabbassa imassa suttassa pavattanatthaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto “pucchāmi muniṃ pahūtapañña”nti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1615_5: Nikkhamma gharā panujja kāmeti vatthukāme panuditvā gharāvāsā nikkhamma.
atk-s0505a:1615_6: Kathaṃ bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyyāti so bhikkhu kathaṃ loke sammā paribbajeyya vihareyya anupalitto lokena hutvā,
atk-s0505a:1616_1: Atha bhagavā yasmā āsavakkhayaṃ appatvā loke sammā paribbajanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0505a:1616_2: tasmā tasmiṃ rāgacaritādivasena pariggahite sabbapuggalasamūhe taṃ taṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ samānadosānaṃ devatāgaṇānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1616_3: āciṇṇadosappahānatthaṃ “yassa maṅgalā”ti ārabhitvā arahattanikūṭeneva khīṇāsavapaṭipadaṃ pakāsento pannarasa
atk-s0505a:1617_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva maṅgalāti maṅgalasutte vuttānaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1617_2: Uppātāti “ukkāpātadisāḍāhādayo evaṃ vipākā hontī”ti evaṃ pavattā uppātābhinivesā.
atk-s0505a:1617_3: Supināti “pubbaṇhasamaye supinaṃ disvā idaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a:1617_5: vāmapassena sayatā diṭṭhe idaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a:1617_7: supinante candaṃ disvā idaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a:1617_8: sūriyādayo disvā ida”nti evaṃ pavattā supinābhinivesā.
atk-s0505a:1617_9: Lakkhaṇāti daṇḍalakkhaṇavatthalakkhaṇādipāṭhaṃ paṭhitvā “iminā idaṃ nāma hotī”ti evaṃ pavattā lakkhaṇābhinivesā.
atk-s0505a:1617_11: So maṅgaladosavippahīnoti aṭṭhatiṃsa mahāmaṅgalāni ṭhapetvā avasesā maṅgaladosā nāma.
atk-s0505a:1617_14: Atha vā maṅgalānañca uppātādidosānañca pahīnattā maṅgaladosavippahīno hoti,
atk-s0505a:1617_15: na maṅgalādīhi suddhiṃ pacceti ariyamaggassa adhigatattā.
atk-s0505a:1617_17: so khīṇāsavo sammā loke paribbajeyya anupalitto lokenāti.
atk-s0505a:1618_2: dibbesu kāmesu cāpi bhikkhūti mānusesu ca dibbesu ca kāmaguṇesu anāgāmimaggena anuppattidhammataṃ nento rāgaṃ vinayetha.
atk-s0505a:1618_3: Atikkamma bhavaṃ samecca dhammanti evaṃ rāgaṃ vinetvā tato paraṃ arahattamaggena sabbappakārato pariññābhisamayādayo
atk-s0505a:1618_4: sādhento catusaccabhedampi samecca dhammaṃ imāya paṭipadāya tividhampi atikkamma bhavaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1618_5: Sammā soti sopi bhikkhu sammā loke paribbajeyya.
atk-s0505a:1619_2: Sesaṃ vuttanayameva sabbagāthāsu ca “sopi bhikkhu sammā loke paribbajeyyā”ti yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1619_3: Ito parañhi yojanampi avatvā avuttanayameva vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0505a:1620_1: Catutthagāthāya sattasaṅkhāravasena duvidhaṃ piyañca appiyañca veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1620_3: Anupādāyāti catūhi upādānehi kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā.
atk-s0505a:1620_4: Anissito kuhiñcīti aṭṭhasatabhedena taṇhānissayena dvāsaṭṭhibhedena diṭṭhinissayena ca kuhiñci rūpādidhamme bhave vā anissito.
atk-s0505a:1620_5: Saṃyojaniyehi vippamuttoti sabbepi tebhūmakadhammā dasavidhasaṃyojanassa visayattā saṃyojaniyā,
atk-s0505a:1620_6: tehi sabbappakārato maggabhāvanāya pariññātattā ca vippamuttoti attho.
atk-s0505a:1620_12: tatiyena tesaṃ pahīnattā saṃyojaniyehi vippamokkhoti veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1621_3: Anaññaneyyoti aniccādīnaṃ sudiṭṭhattā “idaṃ seyyo”ti kenaci anetabbo.
atk-s0505a:1621_6: ādānesu catutthamaggena sabbaso chandarāgaṃ vinetvā so vinītachandarāgo,
atk-s0505a:1621_9: Tato tesu duvidhenapi nissayena anissito aññena vā kenaci “idaṃ seyyo”ti anetabbo khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyya.
atk-s0505a:1622_1: Chaṭṭhagāthāya aviruddhoti etesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ duccaritānaṃ pahīnattā sucaritehi saddhiṃ aviruddho.
atk-s0505a:1623_2: Na sandhiyethāti na upanayhetha na kuppeyya.
atk-s0505a:1623_3: Laddhā parabhojanaṃ na majjeti parehi dinnaṃ saddhādeyyaṃ labhitvā “ahaṃ ñāto yasassī lābhī”ti na majjeyya.
atk-s0505a:1624_6: Virato chedanabandhanā cāti evametesaṃ kammakilesānaṃ pahīnattā parasattachedanabandhanā ca viratoti.
atk-s0505a:1625_1: Navamagāthāya sāruppaṃ attano viditvāti attano bhikkhubhāvassa patirūpaṃ anesanādiṃ pahāya sammāesanādiājīvasuddhiṃ
atk-s0505a:1626_1: Dasamagāthāya so nirāso anāsisānoti yassa ariyamaggena vināsitattā anusayā ca na santi,
atk-s0505a:1626_4: Tato āsāya abhāvena kañci rūpādidhammaṃ nāsīsati.
atk-s0505a:1627_5: Dantoti sabbadvāravisevanaṃ hitvā ariyena damathena dantabhūmiṃ patto.
atk-s0505a:1628_1: Dvādasamagāthāya saddhoti buddhādiguṇesu parappaccayavirahitattā sabbākārasampannena aveccappasādena samannāgato,
atk-s0505a:1628_2: na parassa saddhāya paṭipattiyaṃ gamanabhāvena. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:1628_3: “na khvāhaṃ ettha bhante bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1628_5: Niyāmadassīti saṃsārakantāramūḷhe loke amatapuragāmino sammattaniyāmabhūtassa maggassa dassāvī,
atk-s0505a:1628_7: Vaggagatesu na vaggasārīti vaggagatā nāma dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatikā aññamaññaṃ paṭilomattā,
atk-s0505a:1628_8: evaṃ vaggāhi diṭṭhīhi gatesu sattesu na vaggasārī –
atk-s0505a:1628_10: idaṃ tatheva bhavissatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhivasena agamanato.
atk-s0505a:1629_4: Na hissa sakkā te dhammā yathā ñātā kenaci aññathā kātuṃ,
atk-s0505a:1629_6: Pāragūti pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ gato,
atk-s0505a:1630_1: Cuddasamagāthāya atītesūti pavattiṃ patvā atikkantesu pañcakkhandhesu.
atk-s0505a:1630_3: Kappātītoti “ahaṃ mama”nti kappanaṃ sabbampi vā taṇhādiṭṭhikappaṃ atīto.
atk-s0505a:1630_8: Arahā hi yvāyaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārasaṅkhāto atīto addhā,
atk-s0505a:1630_11: taṃ sabbampi atikkamma kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā paramasuddhippattapañño hutvā ṭhito.
atk-s0505a:1630_15: Kappātītattā aticca suddhipaññattā ca āyatiṃ na kiñci āyatanaṃ upeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:1631_1: Pannarasamagāthāya aññāya padanti ye te “saccānaṃ caturo padā”ti vuttā,
atk-s0505a:1631_3: Samecca dhammanti tato paraṃ catūhi ariyamaggehi catusaccadhammaṃ samecca.
atk-s0505a:1631_4: Vivaṭaṃ disvāna pahānamāsavānanti atha paccavekkhaṇañāṇena āsavakkhayasaññitaṃ nibbānaṃ vivaṭaṃ pākaṭamanāvaṭaṃ disvā.
atk-s0505a:1631_5: Sabbupadhīnaṃ parikkhayāti sabbesaṃ khandhakāmaguṇakilesābhisaṅkhārabhedānaṃ upadhīnaṃ parikkhīṇattā
atk-s0505a:1631_6: katthaci asajjamāno bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyya vihareyya,
atk-s0505a:1632_1: Tato so nimmito dhammadesanaṃ thomento “addhā hi bhagavā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1632_2: Tattha yo so evaṃ vihārīti yo so maṅgalādīni samūhanitvā sabbamaṅgaladosappahānavihārī,
atk-s0505a:1632_3: yopi so dibbamānusakesu kāmesu rāgaṃ vineyya bhavātikkamma dhammābhisamayavihārīti evaṃ tāya tāya gāthāya niddiṭṭhabhikkhuṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0505a:1632_6: addhā hi bhagavā tatheva etaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ “yassa maṅgalā samūhatā”tiādīni vatvā tassā tassā gāthāya pariyosāne “sammā so loke paribbajeyyā”ti avaca.
atk-s0505a:1632_10: sabbāni ca dasapi saṃyojanāni caturo ca yoge vītivatto hoti.
atk-s0505a:1632_12: natthi me ettha vicikicchāti iti desanāthomanagāthampi vatvā arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1637_2: Tiṭṭhamāne kira bhagavati lokanāthe dhammiko nāma upāsako ahosi nāmena ca paṭipattiyā ca.
atk-s0505a:1637_3: So kira saraṇasampanno sīlasampanno bahussuto piṭakattayadharo anāgāmī abhiññālābhī ākāsacārī ahosi.
atk-s0505a:1637_6: Tassekadivasaṃ uposathikassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa majjhimayāmāvasānasamaye evaṃ parivitakko udapādi –
atk-s0505a:1637_8: So pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0505a:1638_1: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva kathaṃkaroti kathaṃ karonto kathaṃ paṭipajjanto.
atk-s0505a:1638_2: Sādhu hotīti sundaro anavajjo atthasādhano hoti.
atk-s0505a:1638_8: etesu duvidhesu sāvakesu kathaṃkaro sāvako sādhu hotīti.
atk-s0505a:1639_1: Idāni evaṃ puṭṭhassa bhagavato byākaraṇasamatthataṃ dīpento “tuvañhī”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:1639_5: Parāyaṇanti gatito paraṃ ayanaṃ gativippamokkhaṃ parinibbānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1639_6: na catthi tulyoti tayā sadiso natthi.
atk-s0505a:1639_8: pakāsesi satte anukampamānoti tvaṃ bhagavā yadatthi ñeyyaṃ nāma,
atk-s0505a:1639_9: taṃ anavasesaṃ avecca paṭivijjhitvā satte anukampamāno sabbaṃ ñāṇañca dhammañca pakāsesi.
atk-s0505a:1639_12: na te atthi ācariyamuṭṭhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1640_1: Idāni yesaṃ tadā bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0505a:1640_2: te devaputte kittetvā bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsanto “āgañchī te santike”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:1640_3: Tattha nāgarājā erāvaṇo nāmāti ayaṃ kira erāvaṇo nāma devaputto kāmarūpī dibbe vimāne vasati.
atk-s0505a:1640_5: tadā diyaḍḍhasatayojanaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminitvā tettiṃsa kumbhe māpetvā erāvaṇo nāma hatthī hoti.
atk-s0505a:1640_6: Tassa ekekasmiṃ kumbhe dve dve dantā honti,
atk-s0505a:1640_11: ekekasmiṃ patte satta satta accharāyo naccanti padumaccharāyotveva vissutā sakkassa nāṭakitthiyo,
atk-s0505a:1640_12: yā ca vimānavatthusmimpi “bhamanti kaññā padumesu sikkhitā”ti āgatā.
atk-s0505a:1640_13: Tesaṃ pana tettisaṃkumbhānaṃ majjhe sudassanakumbho nāma tiṃsayojanamatto hoti,
atk-s0505a:1640_14: tattha yojanappamāṇo maṇipallaṅko tiyojanubbedhe pupphamaṇḍape attharīyati.
atk-s0505a:1640_15: Tattha sakko devānamindo accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbasampattiṃ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0505a:1640_16: Sakke pana devānaminde uyyānakīḷāto paṭinivatte puna taṃ rūpaṃ saṃharitvāna devaputtova hoti.
atk-s0505a:1640_19: Jinoti sutvāti “vijitapāpadhammo esa bhagavā”ti evaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0505a:1640_20: Sopi tayā mantayitvāti tayā saddhiṃ mantayitvā,
atk-s0505a:1640_24: Sādhūti sutvāna patītarūpoti taṃ pañhaṃ sutvā “sādhu bhante”ti abhinanditvā tuṭṭharūpo gatoti attho.
atk-s0505a:1641_1: Rājāpi taṃ vessavaṇo kuveroti ettha so yakkho rañjanaṭṭhena rājā,
atk-s0505a:1641_4: So kira kuvero nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālo hutvā dānādīni puññāni katvā visāṇāya rājadhāniyā adhipati hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0505a:1644_1: kasmā pana dūratare tāvatiṃsabhavane vasanto erāvaṇo paṭhamaṃ āgato,
atk-s0505a:1644_6: vessavaṇo kira tadā anekasahassapavāḷapallaṅkaṃ dvādasayojanaṃ nārivāhanaṃ abhiruyha pavāḷakuntaṃ uccāretvā
atk-s0505a:1644_7: dasasahassakoṭiyakkhehi parivuto “bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni pariharitvā maggena
atk-s0505a:1644_8: maggaṃ āgacchanto veḷukaṇḍakanagare nandamātāya upāsikāya nivesanassa uparibhāgaṃ sampatto.
atk-s0505a:1644_14: Sā tamhi samaye sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā utuggahaṇatthāya māluteritokāse ṭhatvā aṭṭhakapārāyanavagge parimaṇḍalehi
atk-s0505a:1644_16: Vessavaṇo tattheva yānāni ṭhapetvā yāva upāsikā “idamavoca bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye
atk-s0505a:1644_18: tāva sabbaṃ sutvā vaggapariyosāne suvaṇṇamurajasadisaṃ mahantaṃ gīvaṃ paggahetvā “sādhu sādhu bhaginī”ti sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0505a:1644_23: Taṃ so dhammato sahodarabhāvaṃ sandhāya upāsikaṃ bhaginivādena samudācarati.
atk-s0505a:1644_26: yassa dāni kālaṃ maññasī”ti vutto “ahaṃ bhagini tayi pasanno pasannākāraṃ karomī”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:1644_28: mama khette nipphannaṃ sāliṃ kammakarā āharituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0505a:1644_32: Tato pabhuti koṭṭhāgāraṃ ūnaṃ nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0505a:1644_37: Iminā kāraṇena āsannatarepi cātumahārājikabhavane vasanto vessavaṇo pacchā āgato.
atk-s0505a:1644_38: Erāvaṇassa pana na kiñci antarā karaṇīyaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0505a:1645_0: Ayaṃ pana upāsako kiñcāpi anāgāmī pakatiyāva ekabhattiko,
atk-s0505a:1645_1: tathāpi tadā uposathadivasoti katvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya sāyanhasamayaṃ sunivattho supāruto pañcasataupāsakaparivuto
atk-s0505a:1645_2: jetavanaṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā attano gharaṃ āgamma tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ saraṇasīlauposathānisaṃsādibhedaṃ
atk-s0505a:1645_4: Tesañca tasseva ghare muṭṭhihatthappamāṇapādakāni pañca kappiyamañcasatāni pāṭekkovarakesu paññattāni honti.
atk-s0505a:1645_5: Te attano attano ovarakaṃ pavisitvā samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1645_7: Tena ca samayena sāvatthinagare sattapaññāsa kulasatasahassāni vasanti,
atk-s0505a:1645_9: Tena paṭhamayāme hatthiassamanussabherisaddādīhi sāvatthinagaraṃ mahāsamuddo viya ekasaddaṃ hoti.

atk-s0505a:1645_13: etarahi katamena vihārena viharatī”ti āvajjento dibbena cakkhunā erāvaṇavessavaṇe disvā dibbāya sotadhātuyā

atk-s0505a:1645_16: Tasmā so ekanagare vasantopi sabbapacchā āgato,
atk-s0505a:1646_1: Idāni ito bahiddhā lokasammatehi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi ukkaṭṭhabhāvena bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsanto “ye kecime”ti gāthādvayamāha.

atk-s0505a:1648_1: Evaṃ nānappakārehi bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsitvā idāni dhammeneva taṃ pasaṃsitvā dhammakathaṃ yācanto “ayañhi dhammo”ti gāthādvayamāha.

atk-s0505a:1648_8: Taṃ no vadāti taṃ dhammaṃ amhākaṃ vada.
atk-s0505a:1648_11: Sabbepime bhikkhavoti taṅkhaṇaṃ nisinnāni kira pañca bhikkhusatāni honti,
atk-s0505a:1648_13: Upāsakā cāpīti attano parivāre aññe ca dasseti.
atk-s0505a:1649_1: Atha bhagavā anagāriyapaṭipadaṃ tāva dassetuṃ bhikkhū āmantetvā “suṇātha me bhikkhavo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:1649_2: Tattha dhammaṃ dhutaṃ tañca carātha sabbeti kilese dhunātīti dhuto,
atk-s0505a:1649_4: tañca mayā sāvitaṃ sabbe caratha paṭipajjatha,
atk-s0505a:1650_1: No ve vikāleti evaṃ pabbajitānulomikaṃ iriyāpathaṃ sevamāno ca divāmajjhanhikavītikkamaṃ upādāya vikāle na careyya bhikkhu,
atk-s0505a:1650_2: yuttakāle eva pana gāmaṃ piṇḍāya careyya.
atk-s0505a:1650_5: akālacāriṃ puggalaṃ rāgasaṅgādayo aneke saṅgā sajanti parissajanti upaguhanti allīyanti.
atk-s0505a:1650_9: Tena kira samayena vikālabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ appaññattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:1650_10: tasmā dhammadesanāvasenevettha puthujjanānaṃ ādīnavaṃ dassento imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1650_11: Ariyā pana saha maggapaṭilābhā eva tato paṭiviratā honti,
atk-s0505a:1651_1: Evaṃ vikālacariyaṃ paṭisedhetvā “kāle carantenapi evaṃ caritabba”nti dassento āha “rūpā ca saddā cā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1651_3: ye te rūpādayo nānappakārakaṃ madaṃ janentā satte sammadayanti,
atk-s0505a:1651_4: tesu piṇḍapātapārisuddhisuttādīsu vuttanayena chandaṃ vinodetvā yuttakāleneva pātarāsaṃ paviseyyāti.
atk-s0505a:1651_8: so padesopi taṃ yogena “pātarāso”ti idha vutto.
atk-s0505a:1651_10: taṃ okāsaṃ gaccheyyāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1657_1: sā hi tato tato samodhānetvā sampiṇḍitaṭṭhena “piṇḍo”ti vuccati.

atk-s0505a:1657_5: Na mano bahiddhā nicchārayeti bahiddhā rūpādīsu rāgavasena cittaṃ na nīhare.
atk-s0505a:1663_1: So yogāvacaro kiñcideva sotukāmatāya upagatena sāvakena vā kenaci aññatitthiyagahaṭṭhādinā vā idheva pabbajitena bhikkhunā vā saddhiṃ sacepi sallape,
atk-s0505a:1663_2: atha yvāyaṃ maggaphalādipaṭisaṃyutto dasakathāvatthubhedo vā atappakaṭṭhena paṇīto dhammo.
atk-s0505a:1663_4: aññaṃ pana pisuṇavacanaṃ vā parūpavādaṃ vā appamattakampi na udāhareyyāti.
atk-s0505a:1664_1: Idāni tasmiṃ parūpavāde dosaṃ dassento āha “vādañhi eke”ti.
atk-s0505a:1664_3: idhekacce moghapurisā parūpavādasañhitaṃ nānappakāraṃ viggāhikakathābhedaṃ vādaṃ paṭiseniyanti virujjhanti,
atk-s0505a:1664_4: yujjhitukāmā hutvā senāya paṭimukhaṃ gacchantā viya honti,
atk-s0505a:1664_8: yasmā te tādisake puggale tato tato vacanapathato samuṭṭhāya vivādasaṅgā sajanti allīyanti.
atk-s0505a:1664_11: yasmā te paṭiseniyantā cittaṃ tattha gamenti,
atk-s0505a:1665_1: Evaṃ parittapaññānaṃ pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni mahāpaññānaṃ pavattiṃ dassento āha “piṇḍaṃ vihāraṃ…pe…
atk-s0505a:1665_4: sayanāsanena mañcapīṭhanti tīhipi padehi senāsanameva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1665_7: Sutvāna dhammaṃ sugatena desitanti sabbāsavasaṃvarādīsu “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati sītassa
atk-s0505a:1665_8: paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0505a:1665_9: Saṅkhāya seve varapaññasāvakoti etaṃ idha piṇḍanti vuttaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ,

atk-s0505a:1665_13: sevituṃ sakkuṇeyya varapaññassa tathāgatassa sāvako sekkho vā puthujjano vā,
atk-s0505a:1666_1: Evaṃ khīṇāsavapaṭipattiṃ dassento arahattanikūṭena anagāriyapaṭipadaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā idāni agāriyapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ “gahaṭṭhavattaṃ pana vo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:1666_5: yo mayā ito pubbe kevalo abyāmisso sakalo paripuṇṇo bhikkhudhammo kathito.
atk-s0505a:1666_6: Esa khettavatthuādipariggahehi sapariggahena na labbhā phassetuṃ na sakkā adhigantunti.
atk-s0505a:1667_1: Evaṃ tassa bhikkhudhammaṃ paṭisedhetvā gahaṭṭhadhammameva dassento āha “pāṇaṃ na hane”ti.
atk-s0505a:1667_4: Tatiyapādo cettha khaggavisāṇasutte catutthapāde thāvaratasabhedo mettasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ sabbappakārato vaṇṇito.
atk-s0505a:1667_7: tasathāvaresu sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ na hane na ghātayeyya nānujaññāti.
atk-s0505a:1667_8: “Nidhāya daṇḍa”nti ito vā paraṃ “vatteyyā”ti pāṭhaseso āharitabbo.
atk-s0505a:1668_1: Evaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā idāni dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ dassento āha “tato adinna”nti.
atk-s0505a:1668_2: Tattha kiñcīti appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā.
atk-s0505a:1668_6: Sabbaṃ adinnaṃ parivajjayeyyāti evañhi paṭipajjamāno sabbaṃ adinnaṃ parivajjeyya,
atk-s0505a:1669_1: Evaṃ dutiyasikkhāpadampi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ dassetvā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato pabhuti tatiyaṃ dassento āha “abrahmacariya”nti.
atk-s0505a:1671_1: Evaṃ catutthasikkhāpadampi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ dassetvā pañcamaṃ dassento āha “majjañca pāna”nti.
atk-s0505a:1671_2: Tattha majjañca pānanti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1671_8: Iti naṃ viditvāti iti naṃ majjapānaṃ ñatvā.
atk-s0505a:1672_1: Evaṃ pañcamasikkhāpadampi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ dassetvā idāni purimasikkhāpadānampi majjapānameva saṃkilesakarañca
atk-s0505a:1672_2: bhedakarañca dassetvā daḷhataraṃ tato veramaṇiyaṃ niyojento āha “madā hi pāpāni karontī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1672_6: Ummādanaṃ mohananti paraloke ummādanaṃ ihaloke mohanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1673_1: Ettāvatā agāriyasāvakassa niccasīlaṃ dassetvā idāni uposathaṅgāni dassento “pāṇaṃ na hane”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:1673_4: Rattiṃ na bhuñjeyya vikālabhojananti rattimpi na bhuñjeyya,
atk-s0505a:1673_6: Na ca gandhanti ettha gandhaggahaṇena vilepanacuṇṇādīnipi gahitānevāti veditabbāni.
atk-s0505a:1674_1: Evaṃ uposathaṅgāni dassetvā idāni uposathakālaṃ dassento āha “tato ca pakkhassā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1674_3: Pakkhassupavassuposathanti evaṃ parapadena yojetabbaṃ “pakkhassa cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhaminti ete tayo divase upavassa uposathaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1674_5: Pāṭihāriyapakkhañcāti ettha pana vassūpanāyikāya purimabhāge āsāḷhamāso,
atk-s0505a:1674_9: Pakkhuposathadivasānaṃ purimapacchimadivasavasena pakkhe pakkhe terasīpāṭipadasattamīnavamīsaṅkhātā cattāro cattāro divasāti apare.
atk-s0505a:1674_13: Evametaṃ pāṭihāriyapakkhañca pasannamānaso susamattarūpaṃ suparipuṇṇarūpaṃ ekampi divasaṃ apariccajanto
atk-s0505a:1675_1: Evaṃ uposathakālaṃ dassetvā idāni tesu kālesu etaṃ uposathaṃ upavassa yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1676_1: Evaṃ upavutthuposathassa kiccaṃ vatvā idāni yāvajīvikaṃ garuvattaṃ ājīvapārisuddhiñca kathetvā tāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0505a:1676_9: surāvaṇijjāti imā pañca adhammavaṇijjā vajjetvā avasesā dhammikavaṇijjā.
atk-s0505a:1676_10: Vaṇijjāmukhena cettha kasigorakkhādi aparopi dhammiko vohāro saṅgahito.
atk-s0505a:1676_14: tato laddhena ca dhammato anapetattā dhammena bhogena mātāpitaro bhareyya.
atk-s0505a:1676_15: Atha so gihī evaṃ appamatto ādito pabhuti vuttaṃ imaṃ vattaṃ vattayanto kāyassa bhedā ye te attano ābhāya
atk-s0505a:1676_16: andhakāraṃ vidhametvā ālokakaraṇena sayampabhāti laddhanāmā cha kāmāvacaradevā,
atk-s0505a:1676_17: te sayampabhe nāma deve upeti bhajati allīyati,

atk-s0505a:1683_3: Bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante āyasmato ānandassa parivitakko udapādi –
atk-s0505a:1683_5: taṃ bhikkhū ca upāsakā ca jānanti.
atk-s0505a:1683_8: So jetavanavihāre āsane nisīditvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavato pabbajjaṃ kittento imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1684_0: Tattha yasmā pabbajjaṃ kittentena yathā pabbaji,
atk-s0505a:1684_3: taṃ kittentena yathā vīmaṃsamāno pabbajjaṃ rocesi,
atk-s0505a:1684_6: Cakkhumāti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā cakkhusampannoti attho.
atk-s0505a:1685_2: Tattha sambādhoti puttadārādisampīḷanena kilesasampīḷanena ca kusalakiriyāya okāsarahito.
atk-s0505a:1685_6: Iti disvāna pabbajīti iti gharāvāsapabbajjāsu byādhijarāmaraṇehi suṭṭhutaraṃ codiyamānahadayo ādīnavamānisaṃsañca vīmaṃsitvā,
atk-s0505a:1685_9: tāvadeva ca dvaṅgulamattasaṇṭhitasamaṇasāruppakesamassu hutvā ghaṭikārena brahmunā upanīte aṭṭha parikkhāre
atk-s0505a:1685_10: gahetvā “evaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ pārupitabba”nti kenaci ananusiṭṭho anekajātisahassapavattitena attano pabbajjāciṇṇeneva
atk-s0505a:1685_12: Ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ekaṃ cīvaraṃ khandhe karitvā mattikāpattaṃ aṃse ālaggetvā pabbajitavesaṃ adhiṭṭhāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.

atk-s0505a:1687_1: Evaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ sodhetvā anomānadītīrato tiṃsayojanappamāṇaṃ sattāhena agamā rājagahaṃ buddho.
atk-s0505a:1687_4: tathāpi buddhassa pubbacariyāti katvā evaṃ vattuṃ labbhati –
atk-s0505a:1687_7: Magadhānanti magadhānaṃ janapadassa nagaranti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1687_9: Tañhi paṇḍavagijjhakūṭavebhāraisigilivepullanāmakānaṃ pañcannaṃ girīnaṃ majjhe vajo viya ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1687_11: Piṇḍāya abhihāresīti bhikkhatthāya tasmiṃ nagare cari.

atk-s0505a:1687_19: Ākiṇṇavaralakkhaṇoti sarīre ākiritvā viya ṭhapitavaralakkhaṇo vipulavaralakkhaṇo vā.
