atk-s0505a:1688_5: Rājāpi “kammantaṃ saṃvidahissāmī”ti sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā balakāyaṃ passanto taṃ piṇḍāya abhihārentaṃ mahāsattaṃ addasa.
atk-s0505a:1688_9: Imamatthaṃ abhāsathāti imaṃ atthaṃ amaccānaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1689_1: Idāni taṃ tesaṃ amaccānaṃ bhāsitamatthaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0505a:1689_3: Tattha imanti so rājā bodhisattaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0505a:1690_1: Nīcakulāmivāti nīcakulā iva pabbajito na hotīti attho.
atk-s0505a:1690_3: Kuhiṃ bhikkhu gamissatīti ayaṃ bhikkhu kuhiṃ gamissati,
atk-s0505a:1690_4: ajja kattha vasissatīti jānituṃ rājadūtā sīghaṃ gacchantu.
atk-s0505a:1690_5: Dassanakāmā hi mayaṃ assāti iminā adhippāyena āha.
atk-s0505a:1691_1: Khippaṃ pattaṃ apūresīti sampajānattā patissatattā ca adhikaṃ agaṇhanto “alaṃ ettāvatā”ti ajjhāsayapūraṇena khippaṃ pattaṃ apūresi.
atk-s0505a:1691_2: Munīti monatthāya paṭipannattā appattamunibhāvopi muniicceva vutto,
atk-s0505a:1691_6: So kira manusse pucchi “imasmiṃ nagare pabbajitā kattha vasantī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1691_8: Tasmā tameva paṇḍavaṃ abhihāresi “ettha vāso bhavissatī”ti evaṃ cintetvā.
atk-s0505a:1692_1: Byagghusabhova sīhova girigabbhareti giriguhāyaṃ byaggho viya usabho viya sīho viya ca nisinnoti attho.
atk-s0505a:1692_2: Ete hi tayo seṭṭhā vigatabhayabheravā girigabbhare nisīdanti,
atk-s0505a:1692_5: Sayānabhūmiṃ yāyitvāti yāvatikā bhūmi hatthiassādinā yānena sakkā gantuṃ,
atk-s0505a:1692_15: Daharo cāsīti sati ca daharatte susu bālako viya khāyasīti.
atk-s0505a:1693_2: Dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassūti ettha “ahaṃ te aṅgamagadhesu yāvicchasi,
atk-s0505a:1693_4: Taṃ tvaṃ sobhayanto anīkaggaṃ nāgasaṅghapurakkhato bhuñjassū”ti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1693_6: jātiṃ akkhāhi pucchito”ti evaṃ kira vutto mahāpuriso cintesi –
atk-s0505a:1693_8: cātumahārājikādayopi maṃ attano attano rajjena nimanteyyuṃ,
atk-s0505a:1693_9: gehe ṭhito eva vā cakkavattirajjaṃ kāreyyaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1693_12: taṃ jānāpemī”’ti bāhaṃ uccāretvā attano āgatadisābhāgaṃ niddisanto “ujuṃ janapado rājā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:1693_13: Tattha himavantassa passatoti bhaṇanto sassasampattivekallābhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0505a:1693_14: Himavantañhi nissāya pāsāṇavivarasambhavā mahāsālāpi pañcahi vuddhīhi vaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0505a:1693_16: Dhanavīriyena sampannoti bhaṇanto sattahi ratanehi avekallattaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1693_20: Yassa pana ādikālato pabhuti anvayavasena so eva janapado nivāso,
atk-s0505a:1694_1: Ettāvatā attano bhogasampattiṃ dīpetvā “ādiccā nāma gottena,
atk-s0505a:1694_2: sākiyā nāma jātiyā”ti iminā jātisampattiñca ācikkhitvā yaṃ vuttaṃ raññā “dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassū”ti,
atk-s0505a:1694_7: na īdisaṃ dhanavīriyasampannaṃ dvāsītisahassavīrapurisasamākulaṃ kulaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajeyyanti ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:1695_1: Evaṃ rañño vacanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tato paraṃ attano pabbajjāhetuṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0505a:1695_6: Sesamettha ito purimagāthāsu ca yaṃ yaṃ na vicāritaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1695_7: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthattā eva na vicāritanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1695_8: Evaṃ attano pabbajjāhetuṃ vatvā padhānatthāya gantukāmo rājānaṃ āmantento āha –
atk-s0505a:1695_13: tasmā taṃ paramatthanekkhammaṃ nibbānāmataṃ sabbadhammānaṃ aggaṭṭhena padhānaṃ patthento padhānatthāya gamissāmi,
atk-s0505a:1695_16: Evaṃ vutte kira rājā bodhisattaṃ āha –
atk-s0505a:1695_18: sutaṃ ‘suddhodanarañño kira putto siddhatthakumāro cattāri pubbanimittāni disvā pabbajitvā buddho bhavissatī’ti, sohaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0505a:1695_19: tumhākaṃ adhimuttiṃ disvā evaṃpasanno ‘addhā buddhattaṃ pāpuṇissathā’ti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0505a:1695_20: buddhattaṃ patvā paṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ okkameyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1699_4: ettha me rañjatī mano”ti āyasmā ānando pabbajjāsuttaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:1699_8: Atha gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā buddhāsane nisinno “taṃ maṃ padhānapahitatta”nti ārabhitvā imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1700_0: Tattha taṃ manti dvīhipi vacanehi attānameva niddisati.
atk-s0505a:1700_9: Yogakkhemassa pattiyāti catūhi yogehi khemassa nibbānassa adhigamatthaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1701_2: So hi attano visayā nikkhamitukāme devamanusse na muñcati,
atk-s0505a:1701_10: na ca sakkā jīvite sāpekkhena amataṃ adhigantu”nti.
atk-s0505a:1701_14: na hotīti ajānanto atighoraṃ tapaṃ karoti,
atk-s0505a:1701_15: kadāci mama visayaṃ atikkameyyā”ti bhīto “idañcidañca vatvā vāressāmī”ti āgato.
atk-s0505a:1702_1: Evañca pana vatvā athassa maraṇasantikabhāvaṃ sāvento āha –
atk-s0505a:1702_5: sahassaṃ bhāgānaṃ assāti sahassabhāgo. Ko so?
atk-s0505a:1702_10: tato pana te eko eva bhāgo jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1702_12: Evaṃ maraṇassa santikabhāvaṃ sāvetvā atha naṃ jīvite samussāhento āha “jīva bho jīvitaṃ seyyo”ti.
atk-s0505a:1703_1: Atha attanā sammatāni puññāni dassento āha –
atk-s0505a:1703_3: Tattha brahmacariyanti kālena kālaṃ methunaviratiṃ sandhāyāha,
atk-s0505a:1704_1: Duggo maggoti imaṃ pana aḍḍhagāthaṃ padhānavicchandaṃ janento āha.
atk-s0505a:1704_4: santikamaraṇena tādisenāpi pāpuṇituṃ asakkuṇeyyato durabhisambhavoti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1704_5: Ito paraṃ imā gāthā bhaṇaṃ māro,
atk-s0505a:1704_6: aṭṭhā buddhassa santiketi ayamupaḍḍhagāthā saṅgītikārehi vuttā.
atk-s0505a:1704_8: Bhagavatā eva pana paraṃ viya attānaṃ niddisantena sabbamettha evaṃjātikaṃ vuttanti ayamamhākaṃ khanti.
atk-s0505a:1705_1: Chaṭṭhagāthāya yenatthenāti ettha paresaṃ antarāyakaraṇena attano atthena tvaṃ, pāpima,
atk-s0505a:1706_1: “Jīvaṃ puññāni kāhasī”ti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ paṭikkhipanto “aṇumattopī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1706_2: Tattha puññenāti vaṭṭagāmiṃ mārena vuttaṃ puññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a:1707_1: Idāni “ekaṃso tava jīvita”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ ārabbha māraṃ santajjento “atthi saddhā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1707_7: mayhaṃ pana anuttare santivarapade okappanasaddhā atthi,
atk-s0505a:1707_10: so tvaṃ evaṃ maṃ pahitattaṃ uttamajjhāsayaṃ kiṃ jīvamanupucchasi,
atk-s0505a:1707_12: Paññā ca mamāti ettha ca saddena sati samādhi ca.
atk-s0505a:1707_13: Evaṃ sante yehi pañcahi indriyehi samannāgatā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0505a:1707_14: tesu ekenāpi avirahitaṃ evaṃ maṃ pahitattaṃ kiṃ jīvamanupucchasi? Nanu –
atk-s0505a:1708_1: Evaṃ māraṃ santajjetvā attano dehacittappavattiṃ dassento “nadīnamapī”pi gāthāttayamāha.
atk-s0505a:1708_4: yvāyaṃ mama sarīre appāṇakajjhānavīriyavegasamuṭṭhito vāto vattati,
atk-s0505a:1708_5: loke gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ nadīnampi sotāni ayaṃ visosaye,
atk-s0505a:1708_6: kiñca me evaṃ pahitattassa catunāḷimattaṃ lohitaṃ na upasoseyya.
atk-s0505a:1708_8: apica kho pana tamhi lohite sussamānamhi baddhābaddhabhedaṃ sarīrānugataṃ pittaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1708_12: tassa me evaṃ anupubbena maṃsesu khīyamānesu bhiyyo cittaṃ pasīdati,
atk-s0505a:1708_14: So tvaṃ īdisaṃ cittamajānanto sarīramattameva disvā bhaṇasi “kiso tvamasi dubbaṇṇo,
atk-s0505a:1708_17: apica kho pana bhiyyo sati ca paññā ca samādhi mama tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0505a:1708_18: aṇumattopi pamādo vā sammoho vā cittavikkhepo vā natthi,
atk-s0505a:1708_19: tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ viharato ye keci samaṇabrāhmaṇā atītaṃ vā addhānaṃ anāgataṃ vā etarahi vā opakkamikā vedanā vedayanti,
atk-s0505a:1708_26: evaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇesu ekakāmampi nāpekkhake cittaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1708_27: “Aho vatāhaṃ subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sukhaseyyaṃ sayeyya”nti īdisenākārena mama cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, passa,
atk-s0505a:1709_1: Evaṃ attano suddhataṃ dassetvā “nivāressāmi ta”nti āgatassa mārassa manorathabhañjanatthaṃ mārasenaṃ
atk-s0505a:1709_2: kittetvā tāya aparājitabhāvaṃ dassento “kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādikā cha gāthāyo āha.
atk-s0505a:1710_0: Tattha yasmā āditova agāriyabhūte satte vatthukāmesu kilesakāmā mohayanti,
atk-s0505a:1710_1: te abhibhuyya anagāriyabhāvaṃ upagatānaṃ pantesu vā senāsanesu aññataraññataresu vā adhikusalesu dhammesu arati uppajjati.
atk-s0505a:1710_7: Tato visesamanadhigacchantānaṃ durabhisambhavesu araññavanapatthesu senāsanesu viharataṃ utrāsasaññitā bhīru jāyati,
atk-s0505a:1710_8: tesaṃ ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitānaṃ dīgharattaṃ vivekarasamanassādayamānānaṃ viharataṃ “na siyā nu kho esa maggo”ti paṭipattiyaṃ vicikicchā uppajjati,
atk-s0505a:1710_9: taṃ vinodetvā viharataṃ appamattakena visesādhigamena mānamakkhathambhā jāyanti,
atk-s0505a:1710_10: tepi vinodetvā viharataṃ tato adhikataraṃ visesādhigamaṃ nissāya lābhasakkārasilokā uppajjanti,
atk-s0505a:1710_11: lābhādimucchitā dhammapatirūpakāni pakāsentā micchāyasaṃ adhigantvā tattha ṭhitā jātiādīhi attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti,
atk-s0505a:1711_1: Evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ senaṃ uddisitvā yasmā sā kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā kaṇhassa namucino upakārāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0505a:1711_2: tasmā naṃ tava senāti niddisanto āha –
atk-s0505a:1711_8: jetvā ca labhate sukhanti evaṃ tava senaṃ asūro kāye ca jīvite ca sāpekkho puriso na jināti,
atk-s0505a:1711_12: tasmā sukhaṃ patthayamāno ahampi esa muñjaṃ parihareti.
atk-s0505a:1711_13: Saṅgāmāvacarā anivattino purisā attano anivattanakabhāvaviññāpanatthaṃ sīse vā dhaje vā āvudhe vā muñjatiṇaṃ bandhanti,
atk-s0505a:1711_15: Tava senāya parājitassa dhiratthu mama jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1711_20: tasmā jīvitā tayā sammāpaṭipannānaṃ antarāyakarena saddhiṃ saṅgāme mataṃ mama seyyoti attho.
atk-s0505a:1712_3: ettha kāmādikāya attukkaṃsanaparavambhanapariyosānāya tava senāya pagāḷhā nimuggā anupaviṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na dissanti,
atk-s0505a:1712_6: Ete evaṃ pagāḷhā samānā sacepi kadāci ummujjitvā nimujjanapuriso viya “sāhu saddhā”tiādinā nayena ummujjanti,
atk-s0505a:1712_7: tathāpi tāya senāya ajjhotthaṭattā tañca maggaṃ na jānanti khemaṃ nibbānagāmīnaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1712_9: Imaṃ pana gāthaṃ sutvā māro puna kiñci avatvā eva pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a:1713_1: Pakkante pana tasmiṃ mahāsatto tāya dukkarakārikāya kiñcipi visesaṃ anadhigacchanto anukkamena “siyā
atk-s0505a:1713_2: nu kho añño maggo bodhāyā”tiādīni cintetvā oḷārikāhāraṃ āhāretvā,
atk-s0505a:1713_6: tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattento divasaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye mahābodhimaṇḍābhimukho gantvā
atk-s0505a:1713_7: sotthiyena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo bodhimūle vikiritvā dasasahassalokadhātudevatāhi katasakkārabahumāno –
atk-s0505a:1714_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
atk-s0505a:1716_0: Caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā “na dāni buddhattaṃ apāpuṇitvā pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā aparājitapallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0505a:1716_1: Taṃ ñatvā māro pāpimā “ajja siddhattho paṭiññaṃ katvā nisinno,
atk-s0505a:1716_2: ajjeva dānissa sā paṭiññā paṭibāhitabbā”ti bodhimaṇḍato yāva cakkavāḷamāyataṃ dvādasayojanavitthāraṃ
atk-s0505a:1716_3: uddhaṃ navayojanamuggataṃ mārasenaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatappamāṇaṃ girimekhalaṃ hatthirājānaṃ
atk-s0505a:1716_4: āruyha bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā nānāvudhāni gahetvā “gaṇhatha, hanatha,
atk-s0505a:1716_5: paharathā”ti bhaṇanto āḷavakasutte vuttappakārā vuṭṭhiyo māpesi,
atk-s0505a:1716_6: tā mahāpurisaṃ patvā tattha vuttappakārā eva sampajjiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1716_7: Tato vajiraṅkusena hatthiṃ kumbhe paharitvā mahāpurisassa samīpaṃ netvā “uṭṭhehi,
atk-s0505a:1716_10: Mahāpuriso “na uṭṭhahāmi mārā”ti vatvā taṃ dhajiniṃ samantā vilokento imā gāthāyo abhāsi “samantā dhajini”nti.
atk-s0505a:1717_7: maṃ etasmā ṭhānā aparājitapallaṅkā māro mā cālesīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1718_1: Idāni “etaṃ te mārasenaṃ bhinditvā tato paraṃ vijitasaṅgāmo sampattadhammarājābhiseko idaṃ karissāmī”ti dassento āha “vasīkaritvā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1718_2: Tattha vasīkaritvā saṅkappanti maggabhāvanāya sabbaṃ micchāsaṅkappaṃ pahāya sammāsaṅkappasseva pavattanena vasīkaritvā saṅkappaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1718_3: Satiñca sūpatiṭṭhitanti kāyādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu attano satiñca suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ karitvā evaṃ vasīkatasaṅkappo
atk-s0505a:1718_4: suppatiṭṭhitassati raṭṭhā raṭṭhaṃ vicarissāmi devamanussabhede puthū sāvake vinayanto.
atk-s0505a:1719_1: Atha māro imā gāthāyo sutvā āha –
atk-s0505a:1719_2: “evarūpaṃ pakkhaṃ disvā na bhāyasi bhikkhū”ti? “Āma, māra,
atk-s0505a:1719_8: apica ekasmiṃyeva bhave vessantaro hutvā yaṃ dānamadāsiṃ,
atk-s0505a:1719_9: tassānubhāvena sattakkhattuṃ chahi pakārehi sañjātakampā ayaṃ mahāpathavīyeva sakkhī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1719_10: Evaṃ vutte udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi bheravasaddaṃ muñcamānā,
atk-s0505a:1719_11: yaṃ sutvā māro asanihato viya bhīto dhajaṃ paṇāmetvā palāyi saddhiṃ parisāya.
atk-s0505a:1719_12: Atha mahāpuriso tīhi yāmehi tisso vijjā sacchikatvā aruṇuggamane “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe…
atk-s0505a:1719_16: Sacassa kiñci kāyena vā vācāya vā khalitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0505a:1719_17: viheṭhessāmi na”nti pubbe bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ chabbassāni anubandhitvā buddhattaṃ pattaṃ ekaṃ vassaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0505a:1719_18: Tato bhagavato kiñci khalitaṃ apassanto “satta vassānī”ti imā nibbejanīyagāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1721_1: satta vassāni bhagavantaṃ otārāpekkho anubandhiṃ katthaci avijahanto padāpadaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1721_3: Sohaṃ yathā nāma medavaṇṇaṃ pāsāṇaṃ medasaññī vāyaso ekasmiṃ passe mukhatuṇḍakena vijjhitvā assādaṃ avindamāno “appeva nāma ettha mudu vindema,
atk-s0505a:1721_4: api ito assādanā siyā”ti samantā tatheva vijjhanto anupariyāyitvā katthaci assādaṃ aladdhā “pāsāṇovāya”nti nibbijja pakkameyya,
atk-s0505a:1721_5: evamevāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kāyakammādīsu attano parittapaññāmukhatuṇḍakena vijjhanto samantā anupariyagā
atk-s0505a:1721_8: te dāni mayaṃ assādaṃ alabhamānā kākova selamāsajja nibbijjāpema gotamaṃ āsajja tato gotamā nibbijja apemāti.
atk-s0505a:1721_9: Evaṃ vadato kira mārassa satta vassāni nipphalaparissamaṃ nissāya balavasoko udapādi.
atk-s0505a:1721_10: Tenassa visīdamānaṅgapaccaṅgassa beluvapaṇḍu nāma vīṇā kacchato patitā.
atk-s0505a:1721_11: Yā sakiṃ kusalehi vāditā cattāro māse madhurassaraṃ muñcati,
atk-s0505a:1725_0: Saṅgītikārakā āhaṃsūti eke, amhākaṃ panetaṃ nakkhamatīti.
atk-s0505a:1729_3: so attano subhāsitasamudācārappakāsanena sattānaṃ dubbhāsitasamudācāraṃ paṭisedhento imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1729_15: Na hi bhagavā ayutte dese kāle vā dhammaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0505a:1730_2: Tena nesaṃ hīnādhikajanasevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatadīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:1730_3: “Bhikkhavo”ti iminā ca karuṇāvipphārasommahadayanayananipātapubbaṅgamena vacanena te attano mukhābhimukhe
atk-s0505a:1730_4: karitvā teneva kathetukamyatādīpakena vacanena tesaṃ sotukamyataṃ janeti,
atk-s0505a:1730_5: teneva ca sambodhanatthena vacanena sādhukasavanamanasikārepi te niyojeti.
atk-s0505a:1730_7: Aparesupi devamanussesu vijjamānesu kasmā bhikkhū eva āmantesīti ce?
atk-s0505a:1730_12: seṭṭhā anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthu cariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā ca.
atk-s0505a:1730_15: Tena bhagavā sabbaparisasādhāraṇaṃ dhammaṃ desento bhikkhū eva āmantesi.
atk-s0505a:1730_16: Apica bhājanaṃ te imāya kathāya yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattisabbhāvatotipi te eva āmantesi.
atk-s0505a:1730_19: te evaṃ bhagavantaṃ ālapantā bhagavato paccassosunti.
atk-s0505a:1731_0: Catūhi aṅgehīti catūhi kāraṇehi avayavehi vā.
atk-s0505a:1731_10: Yā pana “vācāya ce kataṃ kamma”nti evaṃ viññatti ca,
atk-s0505a:1731_12: ayaṃ vuccati sammāvācā”ti evaṃ virati ca,
atk-s0505a:1731_15: āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkatā nirayasaṃvattanikā hotī”ti evaṃ cetanā ca vācāti āgacchati,
atk-s0505a:1732_5: Subhāsitaṃyeva bhāsatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya catūsu vācaṅgesu aññataraṅganiddesavacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1732_12: Aṅgaparidīpanatthaṃ pana abhāsitabbaṃ pubbe avatvā bhāsitabbamevāha.
atk-s0505a:1733_0: Ettha ca “subhāsitaṃyeva bhāsati no dubbhāsita”nti iminā pisuṇadosarahitaṃ samaggakaraṇavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1733_1: “dhammaṃyeva bhāsati no adhamma”nti iminā samphadosarahitaṃ dhammato anapetaṃ mantāvacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1733_3: Imehi khotiādinā pana tāni aṅgāni paccakkhato dassento taṃ vācaṃ nigameti.
atk-s0505a:1733_6: catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hotī”ti bhaṇanto yadaññe paṭiññādīhi avayavehi nāmādīhi padehi
atk-s0505a:1733_7: liṅgavacanavibhattikālakārakādīhi sampattīhi ca samannāgataṃ vācaṃ “subhāsita”nti maññanti,
atk-s0505a:1733_9: Avayavādisampannāpi hi pesuññādisamannāgatā vācā dubbhāsitāva hoti attano paresañca anatthāvahattā.
atk-s0505a:1733_10: Imehi pana catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannā vā hoti,
atk-s0505a:1733_12: Sīhaḷadīpe maggapasse sassaṃ rakkhantiyā sīhaḷaceṭikāya sīhaḷakeneva jātijarāmaraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ gītaṃ
atk-s0505a:1733_13: gāyantiyā sutvā maggaṃ gacchantā saṭṭhimattā vipassakabhikkhū cettha arahattaṃ pattā nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1733_14: Tathā tisso nāma āraddhavipassako bhikkhu padumasarasamīpena gacchanto padumasare padumāni bhañjitvā bhañjitvā –
atk-s0505a:1736_0: Imaṃ gītaṃ gāyantiyā ceṭikāya sutvā arahattaṃ patto,
atk-s0505a:1736_1: buddhantare ca aññataro puriso sattahi puttehi saddhiṃ vanā āgamma aññatarāya itthiyā musalena taṇḍule koṭṭentiyā –
atk-s0505a:1741_0: Imaṃ gītikaṃ sutvā saha puttehi paccekabodhiṃ patto,
atk-s0505a:1741_1: aññe ca īdisehi upāyehi ariyabhūmiṃ pattā nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1741_3: yaṃ bhagavatā āsayānusayakusalena “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena vuttā gāthāyo sutvā pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1741_4: aññe ca khandhāyatanādipaṭisaṃyuttā kathā sutvā aneke devamanussāti.
atk-s0505a:1741_5: Evaṃ imehi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā,
atk-s0505a:1741_8: Subhāsitattā eva ca anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṃ atthatthikānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ atthapaṭisaraṇānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1742_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ subhāsitalakkhaṇaṃ bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0505a:1742_2: athāparaṃ etadavoca satthāti idañca lakkhaṇaṃ vatvā atha aññampi etaṃ avoca satthā.
atk-s0505a:1742_3: Idāni vattabbagāthaṃ dassetvā sabbametaṃ saṅgītikārakā āhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1742_6: pacchā āgataparisaṃ assavanasussavanaādhāraṇadaḷhīkaraṇādīni vā sandhāya tadatthadīpakameva ca.
atk-s0505a:1742_7: Pubbe kenaci kāraṇena parihāpitassa atthassa dīpanena atthavisesadīpakañca “purisassa hi jātassa,
atk-s0505a:1743_3: Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthanti idaṃ pana pubbe niddiṭṭhakkamaṃ upādāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1743_4: Gāthāpariyosāne pana vaṅgīsatthero bhagavato subhāsite pasīdi.
atk-s0505a:1744_3: Tattha paṭibhāti manti mama bhāgo pakāsati.
atk-s0505a:1745_2: Na vihiṃseyyāti aññamaññaṃ bhindanto na bādheyya.
atk-s0505a:1745_3: Sā ve vācāti sā vācā ekaṃseneva subhāsitā.
atk-s0505a:1746_1: Paṭinanditāti haṭṭhena hadayena paṭimukhaṃ gantvā nanditā sampiyāyitā.
atk-s0505a:1746_3: paresaṃ bhāsate piyanti yaṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto paresaṃ pāpāni appiyāni paṭikkūlāni pharusavacanāni anādāya
atk-s0505a:1747_4: Esa dhammo sanantanoti yāyaṃ saccavācā nāma,
atk-s0505a:1747_11: Tattha sacce patiṭṭhitattā eva attano ca paresañca atthe patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0505a:1747_12: Atthe patiṭṭhitattā eva ca dhamme patiṭṭhitā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1747_16: yaṃ paresaṃ atthato anapetattā atthaṃ anuparodhaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1747_17: Satipi ca anuparodhakaratte dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1747_18: yaṃ dhammikameva atthaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1748_6: Atha vā yaṃ buddho nibbānappattiyā dukkhassantakiriyāyāti dvinnaṃ nibbānadhātūnamatthāya khemamaggappakāsanato khemaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0505a:1748_7: sā ve vācānamuttamāti sā vācā sabbavācānaṃ seṭṭhāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1748_8: Imāya gāthāya mantāvacanena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti ayamettha apubbapadavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0505a:1752_2: Bhagavā pacchābhattakiccāvasāne buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento sundarikabhāradvājabrāhmaṇaṃ arahattassa
atk-s0505a:1752_3: upanissayasampannaṃ disvā “tattha mayi gate kathā pavattissati,
atk-s0505a:1752_4: tato kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā esa brāhmaṇo pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti ca ñatvā tattha gantvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1753_0: Tattha evaṃ me sutantiādi saṅgītikārakānaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1753_8: Tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhisaddena “kosalā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1753_10: Keci pana “yasmā pubbe mahāpanādaṃ rājakumāraṃ nānānāṭakādīni disvā sitamattampi akarontaṃ sutvā rājā āṇāpesi ‘yo mama puttaṃ hasāpeti,
atk-s0505a:1753_13: Te ca manussā atirekasattavassāni nānākīḷikādayo dassentāpi taṃ nāsakkhiṃsu hasāpetuṃ.
atk-s0505a:1753_16: Atha te manussā attano attano vasanokāsābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1753_17: Te paṭipathe mittasuhajjādayo disvā paṭisanthāramakaṃsu ‘kacci bho kusalaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1753_19: Tasmā taṃ ‘kusala’nti saddaṃ upādāya so padeso ‘kosalo’ti vuccatī”ti vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0505a:1753_20: Sundarikāya nadiyā tīreti sundarikāti evaṃnāmikāya nadiyā tīre.
atk-s0505a:1754_0: Tena kho panāti yena samayena bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vinetukāmo gantvā tassā nadiyā tīre sasīsaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0505a:1754_2: Sundarikabhāradvājoti so brāhmaṇo tassā nadiyā tīre vasati aggiñca juhati,
atk-s0505a:1754_7: Ko nu kho imaṃ habyasesaṃ bhuñjeyyāti so kira brāhmaṇo aggimhi juhitvā avasesaṃ pāyāsaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0505a:1754_10: Taṃ yadi brahmuno mukhato jātassa brāhmaṇasseva dadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1754_11: evaṃ me pitarā saha puttopi santappito bhaveyya,
atk-s0505a:1755_3: kiṃ nārāyanasaṅkhātabalopi hutvā nāsakkhi himapātaṃ sītavātañca paṭibāhitunti?
atk-s0505a:1755_5: Na hi buddhā sabbaso kāyapaṭijagganaṃ karonti eva,
atk-s0505a:1755_8: athassa kathānusārena dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti kathāpavattanatthaṃ evamakāsi.
atk-s0505a:1755_10: tenupasaṅkamīti so kira bhagavantaṃ disvā brāhmaṇo “ayaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā sabbarattiṃ padhānamanuyutto,
atk-s0505a:1755_11: imassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā imaṃ habyasesaṃ dassāmī”ti brāhmaṇasaññī hutvā eva upasaṅkami.
atk-s0505a:1755_13: muṇḍako ayaṃ bhavanti sīse vivaritamatteva kesantaṃ disvā “muṇḍo”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:1755_14: Tato suṭṭhutaraṃ olokento parittampi sikhaṃ adisvā hīḷento “muṇḍako”ti āha.
atk-s0505a:1755_17: tamhā padesā muṇḍāpīti kenaci kāraṇena muṇḍitasīsāpi honti.
atk-s0505a:1756_1: Na brāhmaṇo nomhīti ettha nakāro paṭisedhe,
atk-s0505a:1756_6: Udakoci nomhīti aññopi suddo vā caṇḍālo vā koci na homīti evaṃ ekaṃseneva jātivādasamudācāraṃ paṭikkhipati. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:1756_7: Mahāsamuddaṃ pattā viya hi nadiyo pabbajjūpagatā kulaputtā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni.
atk-s0505a:1756_9: Evaṃ jātivādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā yathābhūtamattānaṃ āvikaronto āha –
atk-s0505a:1756_13: Bhagavā hi tīhi pariññāhi pañcakkhandhe pariññāsi,
atk-s0505a:1756_14: tesu ca pariññātesu gottaṃ pariññātameva hoti.
atk-s0505a:1756_15: Rāgādikiñcanānaṃ pana abhāvena so akiñcano mantā jānitvā ñāṇānuparivattīhi kāyakammādīhi carati. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:1757_1: Evaṃ attānaṃ āvikatvā idāni “evaṃ oḷārikaṃ liṅgampi disvā pucchitabbāpucchitabbaṃ na jānāsī”ti brāhmaṇassa upārambhaṃ āropento āha –
atk-s0505a:1757_4: Ettha ca chinnasaṅghaṭitaṭṭhena tīṇipi cīvarāni “saṅghāṭī”ti adhippetāni,
atk-s0505a:1757_14: Alippamāno idha māṇavehīti upakaraṇasinehassa pahīnattā manussehi alitto asaṃsaṭṭho ekantavivitto.
atk-s0505a:1757_15: Akallaṃ maṃ brāhmaṇāti yvāhaṃ evaṃ saṅghāṭivāsī…pe…
atk-s0505a:1757_18: pākatikāni nāmagottāni atītaṃ pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ appatirūpaṃ gottapañhaṃ pucchasīti.
atk-s0505a:1758_0: Evaṃ vutte upārambhaṃ mocento brāhmaṇo āha –
atk-s0505a:1758_4: Tattha brāhmaṇo noti brāhmaṇo nūti attho.
atk-s0505a:1758_7: Amhākañhi brāhmaṇasamaye brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇehi saha samāgantvā “brāhmaṇo nu bhavaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1758_8: bhāradvājo nu bhava”nti evaṃ jātimpi gottampi pucchanti evāti.
atk-s0505a:1759_1: Evaṃ vutte bhagavā brāhmaṇassa cittamudubhāvakaraṇatthaṃ mantesu attano pakataññutaṃ pakāsento āha –
atk-s0505a:1759_7: tasmā bhavantaṃ sāvittiṃ pucchāmi tipadaṃ catuvīsatakkharaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1759_9: Ettha ca bhagavā paramatthavedānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ ādibhūtaṃ paramatthabrāhmaṇehi sabbabuddhehi pakāsitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1759_12: saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti imaṃ ariyasāvittiṃ sandhāya pucchati.
atk-s0505a:1759_15: ariyassa vinaye sāvittīti vuccatī”ti tassa asārakattaṃ dassetvā idheva patiṭṭhāpeyya.
atk-s0505a:1759_16: Brāhmaṇo pana “sāvittiṃ pucchāmi tipadaṃ catuvīsatakkhara”nti idaṃ attano samayasiddhaṃ sāvittilakkhaṇabyañjanakaṃ
atk-s0505a:1759_17: brahmassarena nicchāritavacanaṃ sutvāva “addhāyaṃ samaṇo brāhmaṇasamaye niṭṭhaṃ gato,
atk-s0505a:1759_19: sādhurūpo mantapāragū brāhmaṇova eso”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā “handa naṃ yaññavidhiṃ dakkhiṇeyyavidhiñca pucchāmī”ti tamatthaṃ pucchanto “kiṃnissitā…pe…
atk-s0505a:1759_22: kiṃnissitā kimadhippāyā kiṃ patthentā isayo ca khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca aññe ca manujā devatānaṃ atthāya yaññaṃ akappayiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1759_25: Puthūti bahū annapānadānādinā bhedena anekappakāre puthū vā isayo manujā khattiyā brāhmaṇā ca kiṃnissitā yaññamakappayiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1759_26: Kathaṃ nesaṃ taṃ kammaṃ samijjhatīti iminādhippāyena pucchati.
atk-s0505a:1760_1: Athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ byākaronto “yadantagū vedagū yaññakāle.
atk-s0505a:1760_2: Yassāhutiṃ labhe tassijjheti brūmī”ti idaṃ sesapadadvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:1760_7: yo vaṭṭadukkhassa tīhi pariññāhi antagatattā antagū,
atk-s0505a:1760_8: catūhi ca maggañāṇavedehi kilese vijjhitvā gatattā vedagū,
atk-s0505a:1760_9: so yassa isimanujakhattiyabrāhmaṇānaṃ aññatarassa yaññakāle yasmiṃ kismiñci āhāre paccupaṭṭhite antamaso vanapaṇṇamūlaphalādimhipi āhutiṃ labhe,
atk-s0505a:1761_1: Atha brāhmaṇo taṃ bhagavato paramatthayogagambhīraṃ atimadhuragiranibbikārasarasampannaṃ desanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0505a:1761_2: sarīrasampattisūcitañcassa sabbaguṇasampattiṃ sambhāvayamāno pītisomanassajāto “addhā hi tassā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1761_7: ayaṃ ajja deyyadhammo ijjhissati samijjhissati mahapphalo bhavissati yaṃ tādisaṃ vedagumaddasāma,
atk-s0505a:1761_9: Tvaññeva hi so vedagū, na añño.
atk-s0505a:1761_10: Ito pubbe pana tumhādisānaṃ vedagūnaṃ antagūnañca adassanena amhādisānaṃ yaññe paṭiyattaṃ añño jano bhuñjati pūraḷāsaṃ carukañca pūvañcāti.
atk-s0505a:1762_1: Tato bhagavā attani pasannaṃ vacanapaṭiggahaṇasajjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ viditvā yathāssa suṭṭhu pākaṭā honti,
atk-s0505a:1762_2: evaṃ nānappakārehi dakkhiṇeyye pakāsetukāmo “tasmātiha tva”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1762_7: Idāni ito pubbaṃ atthenaatthikapadaṃ parapadena sambandhitabbaṃ –
atk-s0505a:1762_8: atthena atthiko tassa atthatthikabhāvassa anurūpaṃ kilesaggivūpasamena santaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1762_11: anekavidhaāsābhāvena nirāsaṃ appevidha ekaṃsena idha ṭhitova idha vā sāsane abhivinde lacchasi adhigacchissasi
atk-s0505a:1762_16: atthena atthiko samāno upasaṅkamma puccha santaṃ vidhūmaṃ anīghaṃ nirāsanti attānaṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0505a:1762_17: Evaṃ pucchanto appevidha abhivinde sumedhaṃ khīṇāsavadakkhiṇeyyanti evampettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1763_1: Atha brāhmaṇo yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno bhagavantaṃ āha –
atk-s0505a:1763_4: Tattha yañño yāgo dānanti atthato ekaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1763_9: Anusāsanto ca uttāneneva nayena yattha hutaṃ ijjhate brūhi metanti evamettha atthayojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1764_4: Ohitasotassa cassa anusāsanatthaṃ tāva “mā jātiṃ pucchī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1764_5: Tattha mā jātiṃ pucchīti yadi hutasamiddhiṃ dānamahapphalataṃ paccāsīsasi,
atk-s0505a:1764_8: Caraṇañca pucchāti apica kho sīlādiguṇabhedaṃ caraṇaṃ puccha.
atk-s0505a:1765_4: na ca so sālādikaṭṭhā jāto eva aggikiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0505a:1765_6: apica kho attano acciādiguṇasampannattā eva karoti.
atk-s0505a:1765_7: Evaṃ na brāhmaṇakulādīsu jāto eva dakkhiṇeyyo hoti,
atk-s0505a:1765_9: apica kho nīcākulīnopi uccākulīnopi khīṇāsavamuni dhitimā hirīnisedho ājāniyo hoti,
atk-s0505a:1765_10: imāya dhitihiripamukhāya guṇasampattiyā jātimā uttamadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
atk-s0505a:1765_13: Vuttañcetaṃ “hiriyā hi santo na karonti pāpa”nti.
atk-s0505a:1770_0: Esa saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana assalāyanasuttānusārena veditabbo.
atk-s0505a:1771_1: Evametaṃ bhagavā cātuvaṇṇisuddhiyā anusāsitvā idāni yattha hutaṃ ijjhate,
atk-s0505a:1771_8: Vedantagūti vedehi vā kilesānaṃ antaṃ gato,
atk-s0505a:1771_11: Kālena tamhi habyaṃ paveccheti attano deyyadhammaṭṭhitakālaṃ tassa sammukhībhāvakālañca upalakkhetvā
atk-s0505a:1771_12: tena kālena tādise dakkhiṇeyye deyyadhammaṃ paveccheyya,
atk-s0505a:1772_4: Candova rāhuggahaṇā pamuttāti yathā cando rāhuggahaṇā,
atk-s0505a:1772_5: evaṃ kilesaggahaṇā pamuttā ye atīva bhāsanti ceva tapanti ca.
atk-s0505a:1773_1: Yo kāme hitvāti ito pabhuti attānaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0505a:1773_5: tañca yo vedi attano paññābalena aññāsi.
atk-s0505a:1773_6: Udakarahado vāti ye ime anotattadaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho
atk-s0505a:1773_7: sīhappapātadahoti himavati satta mahārahadā aggisūriyasantāpehi asamphuṭṭhattā niccaṃ sītalā,
atk-s0505a:1774_7: Tathā hi te heṭṭhimaparicchedena catūhi asaṅkhyeyyehi kappasatasahassena ca pāramiyo pūrenti,
atk-s0505a:1774_31: Assattho vā bodhirukkho hoti nigrodhādīnaṃ vā aññataro.
atk-s0505a:1774_34: Tattha byāmappabhā vā asītippabhā vā sabbesaṃ samānā,
atk-s0505a:1774_42: Imā aṭṭha vemattatā ṭhapetvā avasesesu paṭivedhenādhigantabbesu guṇesu,
atk-s0505a:1774_43: pahātabbesu vā dosesu natthi nesaṃ viseso,
atk-s0505a:1775_3: Sakalajambudīpaṃ pūretvā pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ saṅghaṭṭetvā nisinnā paccekabuddhāpi hi guṇehi ekassa sammāsambuddhassa kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ,
atk-s0505a:1775_8: Lokiyamanussānañhi paññaṃ upanidhāya aṭṭhamakassa paññā adhikā,
atk-s0505a:1775_10: Evaṃ yāva arahato paññaṃ upanidhāya paccekabuddhassa paññā adhikā,
atk-s0505a:1775_11: paccekabuddhassa paññaṃ pana upanidhāya tathāgatassa paññā adhikāti na vattabbā,
atk-s0505a:1775_15: Idha vā huraṃ vāti idhaloke vā paraloke vā.
atk-s0505a:1775_17: samo samehi visamehi dūre tathāgato hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:1775_18: Yasmā anantapañño anupalitto idha vā huraṃ vā,
atk-s0505a:1776_1: Yamhi na māyāti ayaṃ pana gāthā aññā ca īdisā māyādidosayuttesu brāhmaṇesu dakkhiṇeyyasaññāpahānatthaṃ vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1777_2: Tena hi mano tīsu bhavesu nivisati,
atk-s0505a:1777_4: Tattheva vā nivisati taṃ hitvā gantuṃ asamatthatāya.
atk-s0505a:1777_9: Anupādiyānoti tesaṃ nivesanapariggahānaṃ abhāvā kañci dhammaṃ anupādiyamāno.
atk-s0505a:1779_7: Ubhayehi pana ubhayaṃ yojetabbaṃ sabbadhīti sabbesu khandhāyatanādīsu.
atk-s0505a:1780_2: Dukkhaṃ pariññāyāti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā.
atk-s0505a:1783_5: Anunāsikalopo cettha “vivekajaṃ pītisukha”ntiādīsu viya na kato.
atk-s0505a:1783_9: Rāgopi hi duggatīnaṃ pathattā “rāgapatho”ti vuccati kammapatho viya.
atk-s0505a:1783_10: Suddho nidoso vimalo akācoti parisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya suddho.
atk-s0505a:1784_1: Attano attānaṃ nānupassatīti ñāṇasampayuttena cittena vipassanto attano khandhesu aññaṃ attānaṃ nāma na passati,
atk-s0505a:1784_3: Yā cāyaṃ “attanāva attānaṃ sañjānāmī”ti tassa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati,
atk-s0505a:1784_9: taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya pañcannaṃ cetokhilānañca aṭṭhaṭṭhānāya kaṅkhāya ca abhāvā anejo akhilo akaṅkho.
atk-s0505a:1785_17: ito parañca pahātabbamadhigantabbaṃ vā natthi. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:1786_1: Evaṃ vutte brāhmaṇo bhiyyosomattāya bhagavati pasanno pasannākāraṃ karonto āha “hutañca mayha”nti.
atk-s0505a:1786_3: yamahaṃ ito pubbe brahmānaṃ ārabbha aggimhi ajuhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1786_4: taṃ me hutaṃ saccaṃ vā hoti,
atk-s0505a:1786_6: Ajja pana idaṃ hutañca mayhaṃ hutamatthu saccaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1786_9: yasmā idheva ṭhito bhavantarūpaṃ vedaguṃ alatthaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1786_13: paṭiggahetvā ca bhuñjatu me bhagavā pūraḷāsanti taṃ habyasesaṃ upanāmento āha.
atk-s0505a:1787_3: kampi caññaṃ sandhāya ‘kevalinaṃ mahesiṃ khīṇāsavaṃ kukkuccavūpasantaṃ annena pānena upaṭṭhahassū’ti
atk-s0505a:1787_4: bhaṇatī”ti evaṃ gāthāya atthaṃ asallakkhetvā taṃ ñātukāmo āha “sādhāhaṃ bhagavā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1787_9: Yanti yaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ yaññakāle pariyesamāno upaṭṭhaheyyanti pāṭhaseso.
atk-s0505a:1787_13: Sādhāhaṃ bhagavā tava ovādaṃ āgamma tathā vijaññaṃ ārocehi me taṃ kevalinanti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:1788_1: Athassa bhagavā pākaṭena nayena tathārūpaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ dassento “sārambhā yassā”ti gāthāttayamāha.
atk-s0505a:1788_2: Tattha sīmantānaṃ vinetāranti sīmāti mariyādā sādhujanavutti,
atk-s0505a:1788_3: tassā antā pariyosānā aparabhāgāti katvā sīmantā vuccanti kilesā,
atk-s0505a:1788_5: Sīmantāti buddhaveneyyā sekkhā ca puthujjanā ca,
atk-s0505a:1788_7: Jātimaraṇakovidanti “evaṃ jāti evaṃ maraṇa”nti ettha kusalaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1788_10: Bhakuṭiṃ vinayitvānāti yaṃ ekacce dubbuddhino yācakaṃ disvā bhakuṭiṃ karonti,
atk-s0505a:1789_1: Atha brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ thomayamāno “buddho bhava”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1789_3: tato tato āgamma vā yajitabbametthātipi āyāgo,
atk-s0505a:1789_5: Sesamettha ito purimagāthāsu ca yaṃ na vaṇṇitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1789_6: taṃ sakkā avaṇṇitampi jānitunti uttānatthattāyeva na vaṇṇitaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1793_3: Ayañhi māgho māṇavo dāyako ahosi dānapati.
atk-s0505a:1793_6: udāhu noti samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ etamatthaṃ pucchissāmi,
atk-s0505a:1793_10: Tayidaṃ saṅgītikārānaṃ brāhmaṇassa bhagavatoti tiṇṇampi vacanaṃ samodhānetvā “māghasutta”nti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1794_4: Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:1794_9: So ca gijjhā tassa kūṭesu vasiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1795_1: avocāti ettha māghoti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1795_5: So hi vīsavassasatikopi pubbāciṇṇavasena “piṅgiyo māṇavo” tveva saṅkhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:1796_2: pasavāmīti ettha dāyako dānapatīti dāyako ceva dānapati ca.
atk-s0505a:1796_3: Yo hi aññassa santakaṃ tenāṇatto deti,
atk-s0505a:1796_5: tasmiṃ pana dāne issariyābhāvato na dānapati.
atk-s0505a:1796_6: Ayaṃ pana attano santakaṃyeva deti. Tenāha – “ahañhi,
atk-s0505a:1796_10: aññatra pana antarantarā maccherena abhibhuyyamāno dāyako anabhibhūto dānapatītiādināpi nayena vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0505a:1796_11: Vadaññūti yācakānaṃ vacanaṃ jānāmi vuttamatteyeva “ayamidamarahati ayamida”nti purisavisesāvadhāraṇena bahūpakārabhāvagahaṇena vā.
atk-s0505a:1796_13: Yo hi yācake disvāva bhakuṭiṃ katvā pharusavacanādīni bhaṇati,
atk-s0505a:1796_19: yācamānānañca nesaṃ parehi anuggahakāmehi dinnā bhogā dhammaladdhā nāma dhammādhigatā ca honti,
atk-s0505a:1796_20: so ca tathā pariyesitvā labhi. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:1797_1: Ekaṃseneva hi sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakehi pasatthaṃ dānaṃ antamaso tiracchānagatānampi dīyamānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1797_4: Tasmā bhagavāpi ekaṃseneva taṃ pasaṃsanto āha –
atk-s0505a:1797_8: Evaṃ bhagavatā “bahuṃ so puññaṃ pasavatī”ti vuttepi dakkhiṇeyyato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ sotukāmo brāhmaṇo uttari bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:1797_10: “atha kho māgho māṇavo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1798_5: yo yācayogo dānapati gahaṭṭho puññatthiko hutvā paresaṃ annapānaṃ dadaṃ yajati,
atk-s0505a:1798_8: tassa evarūpassa yajamānassa hutaṃ kathaṃ sujjheyyāti?
atk-s0505a:1799_1: Ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādīti tādiso yācayogo dakkhiṇeyyehi ārādhaye sampādaye sodhaye,
atk-s0505a:1799_4: Imināssa “kathaṃ hutaṃ yajamānassa sujjhe” iccetaṃ byākataṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1800_1: Akkhāhi me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyyeti ettha yo yācayogo dadaṃ paresaṃ yajati,
atk-s0505a:1800_2: tassa me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyye akkhāhīti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1801_1: Athassa bhagavā nānappakārehi nayehi dakkhiṇeyye pakāsento “ye ve asattā”tiādikā gāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1802_5: Imissā pana gāthāya dutiyagāthā bhāvanānubhāvappakāsananayena vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1802_8: bhikkhuno viharato kiñcāpi na evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya ‘aho vata me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucceyyā’ti,
atk-s0505a:1802_9: atha khvāssa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī”ti idaṃ cettha suttaṃ sādhakaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1803_9: Idha vā huraṃ vāti idaṃ pana “kuhiñci loke”ti imassa vitthāravacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1804_5: Idha vippahāyāti idhaloke vattamāne khandhe vihāya,
atk-s0505a:1804_6: tato paraṃ yesaṃ gamanaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1804_7: Ito paraṃ “ye kāme hitvā agahā caranti,
atk-s0505a:1804_8: susaññatattā tasaraṃva ujju”nti imampi gāthaṃ keci paṭhanti.
atk-s0505a:1805_4: Attadīpāti attano guṇe eva attano dīpaṃ katvā vicarantā khīṇāsavā vuccanti.
atk-s0505a:1805_7: ye ettha khandhāyatanādisantāne yathā idaṃ khandhāyatanādi tathā jānanti,
atk-s0505a:1805_9: Ayamantimā natthi punabbhavoti ayaṃ no antimā jāti,
atk-s0505a:1805_10: idāni natthi punabbhavoti evañca ye jānantīti.
atk-s0505a:1806_1: Yo vedagūti idāni attānaṃ sandhāya bhagavā imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1806_4: Saraṇaṃ bahūnanti bahūnaṃ devamanussānaṃ bhayavihiṃsanena saraṇabhūto.
atk-s0505a:1807_1: Evaṃ dakkhiṇeyye sutvā attamano brāhmaṇo āha –
atk-s0505a:1807_3: Tattha tvañhettha jānāsi yathā tathā idanti tvañhi ettha loke idaṃ sabbampi ñeyyaṃ yathā tathā jānāsi yāthāvato jānāsi,
atk-s0505a:1807_4: yādisaṃ taṃ tādisameva jānāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1807_5: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammoti tathā hi te esā dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā,
atk-s0505a:1808_1: Evaṃ so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsitvā dakkhiṇeyyasampadāya yaññasampadaṃ ñatvā dāyakasampadāyapi taṃ
atk-s0505a:1808_2: chaḷaṅgaparipūraṃ yaññasampadaṃ sotukāmo “yo yācayogo”ti uttaripañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:1811_0: Datvā attamano hoti, esā yaññassa sampadā”ti. –
atk-s0505a:1812_6: Ayañhi ārammaṇaṃ yajamānassa yañño ettha patiṭṭhāya jahāti dosaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1812_7: ayañhi sattesu mettāpubbaṅgamena sammādiṭṭhipadīpavihatamohandhakārena cittena yajamānassa deyyadhammasaṅkhāto yañño ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0505a:1812_8: so ettha yaññe ārammaṇavasena pavattiyā patiṭṭhāya deyyadhammapaccayaṃ lobhaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1812_10: tadubhayanidānaṃ mohanti evaṃ tividhampi jahāti dosaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1812_12: sattesu ca pavineyya dosaṃ tappahāneneva pahīnapañcanīvaraṇo anukkamena upacārappanābhedaṃ aparimāṇasattapharaṇena
atk-s0505a:1812_13: ekasatte vā anavasesapharaṇena appamāṇaṃ mettaṃ cittaṃ bhāvento puna bhāvanāvepullatthaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1812_14: rattindivaṃ satataṃ sabbairiyāpathesu appamatto hutvā tameva mettajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ sabbā disā pharate appamaññanti.
atk-s0505a:1813_1: Atha brāhmaṇo taṃ mettaṃ “brahmalokamaggo aya”nti ajānanto kevalaṃ attano visayātītaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0505a:1813_2: suṭṭhutaraṃ sañjātasabbaññusambhāvano bhagavati attanā brahmalokādhimuttattā brahmalokūpapattimeva ca
atk-s0505a:1813_3: suddhiṃ muttiñca maññamāno brahmalokamaggaṃ pucchanto “ko sujjhatī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1813_4: Tatra ca brahmalokagāmiṃ puññaṃ karontaṃ sandhāyāha –
atk-s0505a:1813_8: Sakkhi brahmajjadiṭṭhoti brahmā ajja sakkhi diṭṭho.
atk-s0505a:1813_9: Saccanti bhagavato brahmasamattaṃ ārabbha accādarena sapathaṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:1814_0: Tattha yasmā yo bhikkhu mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tameva pādakaṃ katvā vipassanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0505a:1814_3: Yo pana mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppādetvā “santā esā samāpattī”tiādinā nayena taṃ assādeti,
atk-s0505a:1814_5: Aparihīnajjhāno ca teneva jhānena brahmalokaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0505a:1814_6: tasmā bhagavā yo sujjhati muccati ca,
atk-s0505a:1814_7: tassa brahmalokagamanaṃ ananujānanto anāmasitvāva taṃ puggalaṃ yo bajjhati.
atk-s0505a:1814_8: Tassa tena jhānena brahmalokagamanaṃ dassento brāhmaṇassa sappāyena nayena “yo yajatī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:1815_3: Ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādīti tañca so tādiso tividhasampattisādhako puggalo tividhaṃ yaññasampadaṃ dakkhiṇeyyehi khīṇāsavehi sādheyya sampādeyya.
atk-s0505a:1815_5: Evaṃ yajitvā sammā yācayogoti evaṃ mettajjhānapadaṭṭhānabhāvena chaḷaṅgasamannāgataṃ yaññaṃ sammā yajitvā
atk-s0505a:1815_6: so yācayogo tena chaḷaṅgayaññūpanissayena mettajjhānena upapajjati brahmalokanti brūmīti brāhmaṇaṃ samussāhento
atk-s0505a:1819_3: Atthavaṇṇanākkamepi cassa pubbasadisaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1819_6: Veḷuvane kalandakanivāpeti veḷuvananti tassa uyyānassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1819_7: Taṃ kira veḷūhi ca parikkhittaṃ ahosi aṭṭhārasahatthena ca pākārena,
atk-s0505a:1819_13: Pubbe kira aññataro rājā tattha uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ āgato surāmadena matto divāseyyaṃ supi.
atk-s0505a:1819_14: Parijanopissa “sutto rājā”ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito ca pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a:1819_15: Atha surāgandhena aññatarasmā susirarukkhā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho āgacchati.
atk-s0505a:1819_16: Taṃ disvā rukkhadevatā “rañño jīvitaṃ dassāmī”ti kāḷakavesena āgantvā kaṇṇamūle saddamakāsi.
atk-s0505a:1819_19: So taṃ disvā “imāya mama kāḷakāya jīvitaṃ dinna”nti kāḷakānaṃ tattha nivāpaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0505a:1819_21: Tasmā taṃ tato pabhuti “kalandakanivāpo”ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0505a:1820_2: Purāṇasālohitāya devatāyāti na mātā na pitā,
atk-s0505a:1820_3: apica kho panassa mātā viya pitā viya ca hitajjhāsayattā so devaputto “purāṇasālohitā devatā”ti vutto.
atk-s0505a:1820_4: Parinibbute kira kassape bhagavati patiṭṭhite suvaṇṇacetiye tayo kulaputtā sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike
atk-s0505a:1820_5: pabbajitvā cariyānurūpāni kammaṭṭhānāni gahetvā paccantajanapadaṃ gantvā araññāyatane samaṇadhammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0505a:1820_6: antarantarā ca cetiyavandanatthāya dhammassavanatthāya ca nagaraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0505a:1820_7: Aparena ca samayena tāvatakampi araññe vippavāsaṃ arocayamānā tattheva appamattā vihariṃsu,
atk-s0505a:1820_8: evaṃ viharantāpi na ca kiñci visesaṃ adhigamiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:1820_11: jīvite sāpekkhena ca na sakkā lokuttaradhammo adhigantuṃ,
atk-s0505a:1820_13: handa mayaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ abhiruyha kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā samaṇadhammaṃ karomā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1821_0: Atha nesaṃ mahāthero upanissayasampannattā tadaheva chaḷabhiññāparivāraṃ arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1821_1: So iddhiyā himavantaṃ gantvā anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakurūsu piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco puna
atk-s0505a:1821_2: aññampi padesaṃ gantvā pattaṃ pūretvā anotattaudakañca nāgalatādantapoṇañca gahetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ āgantvā āha –
atk-s0505a:1821_11: mā dāni tumhe puna amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgamitthā”ti.
atk-s0505a:1821_12: So kenaci pariyāyena te sampaṭicchāpetuṃ asakkonto pakkāmi.
atk-s0505a:1822_0: Tato tesaṃ eko dvīhatīhaccayena pañcābhiñño anāgāmī ahosi.
atk-s0505a:1822_3: So taṃ paṭikkhipitvā vāyamanto pabbataṃ āruhanadivasato sattame divase kiñci visesaṃ anadhigantvāva kālakato devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0505a:1822_6: Devaputto chasu kāmāvacaradevalokesu anulomapaṭilomena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle
atk-s0505a:1822_7: devalokā cavitvā aññatarissā paribbājikāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0505a:1822_9: taṃ mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ dhītā samayantaraṃ jānātū”ti ekassa paribbājakassa niyyātesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:1822_10: Tasseko antevāsiko paribbājako tāya saddhiṃ vippaṭipajji.
atk-s0505a:1822_13: Sā aññattha gacchantī antarāmagge sabhāyaṃ vijāyi,
atk-s0505a:1822_15: Sopi sabhiyo vaḍḍhitvā paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā nānāsatthāni uggahetvā mahāvādī hutvā vādakkhittatāya
atk-s0505a:1822_16: sakalajambudīpe vicaranto attano sadisaṃ vādiṃ adisvā nagaradvāre assamaṃ kārāpetvā khattiyakumārādayo
atk-s0505a:1823_0: Atha bhagavā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ āgantvā veḷuvane viharati kalandakanivāpe.
atk-s0505a:1823_2: Atha so suddhāvāsabrahmā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “imāhaṃ visesaṃ kassānubhāvena patto”ti āvajjento kassapassa
atk-s0505a:1823_3: bhagavato sāsane samaṇadhammakiriyaṃ te ca sahāye anussaritvā “tesu eko parinibbuto,
atk-s0505a:1823_4: eko idāni katthā”ti āvajjento “devalokā cavitvā jambudīpe uppanno buddhuppādampi na jānātī”ti ñatvā “handa
atk-s0505a:1823_5: naṃ buddhupasevanāya niyojemī”ti vīsati pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā rattibhāge tassa assamamāgamma ākāse ṭhatvā “sabhiya,
atk-s0505a:1823_7: So niddāyamāno tikkhattuṃ taṃ saddaṃ sutvā nikkhamma obhāsaṃ disvā pañjaliko aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0505a:1823_11: Yo ca te samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime pañhe puṭṭho byākaroti,
atk-s0505a:1823_13: Imaṃ devaputtaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “purāṇasālohitāya devatāya pañhā uddiṭṭhā hontī”ti.
atk-s0505a:1824_0: Evaṃ vutte ca ne sabhiyo ekavacaneneva padapaṭipāṭiyā uggahesi.
atk-s0505a:1824_1: Atha so brahmā jānantopi tassa buddhuppādaṃ nācikkhi.
atk-s0505a:1824_3: Ito bahiddhā ca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ tucchabhāva”nti iminā panādhippāyena evamāha –
atk-s0505a:1824_6: Theragāthāsu pana catukkanipāte sabhiyattherāpadānaṃ vaṇṇentā bhaṇanti “sā cassa mātā attano vippaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0505a:1824_7: cintetvā taṃ jigucchamānā jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmaloke uppannā,
atk-s0505a:1825_1: Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti pabbajjūpagamanena lokasammutiyā ca samaṇā ceva brāhmaṇā ca.
atk-s0505a:1825_9: Titthakarāti tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantehi otaritabbānaṃ ogāhitabbānaṃ diṭṭhititthānaṃ kattāro.
atk-s0505a:1825_10: Sādhusammatā bahujanassāti “sādhavo ete santo sappurisā”ti evaṃ bahujanassa sammatā.
atk-s0505a:1826_7: Palāyitvā pana naggesu pabbajitvā “kassapo aha”nti gottaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0505a:1826_20: Appicchavasena udake jīvasaññāya ca nhānamukhadhovanādi paṭikkhitto,
atk-s0505a:1827_1: Gahaṭṭhabhāvo hi pabbajjaṃ upanidhāya sīlādiguṇahīnato hīnakāmasukhapaṭisevanato vā “hīno”ti vuccati.
atk-s0505a:1827_5: Iti kirassa sabbaññupaṭiññānampi pabbajitānaṃ tucchakattaṃ disvā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:1827_6: Uppannaparivitakkavaseneva ca āgantvā punappunaṃ vīmaṃsamānassa atha kho sabhiyassa paribbājakassa etadahosi –
atk-s0505a:1827_7: “ayampi kho samaṇo”ti ca “yepi kho te bhonto”ti ca “samaṇo kho daharoti na uññātabbo”ti cāti evamādi.
atk-s0505a:1827_11: “nibbānaratanaṃ jānāma maya”nti evaṃ sakāya paṭiññāya lokenāpi sammatā,
atk-s0505a:1827_15: na nīcaṃ katvā jānitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1827_17: “kimesa ñassatī”ti evaṃ na gahetabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1828_1: Kaṅkhī vecikicchīti sabhiyo bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodamāno evaṃ bhagavato rūpasampattidamūpasamasūcitaṃ
atk-s0505a:1828_4: Tattha “labheyyaṃ nu kho imesaṃ byākaraṇa”nti evaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇakaṅkhāya kaṅkhī.
atk-s0505a:1828_5: “Ko nu kho imassimassa ca pañhassa attho”ti evaṃ vicikicchāya vecikicchī.
atk-s0505a:1828_6: Dubbalavicikicchāya vā tesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthe kaṅkhanato kaṅkhī,
atk-s0505a:1828_11: Bhavantova evaṃ bhavāhīti dassento āha “pañhe me puṭṭho…pe…
atk-s0505a:1828_15: Anupubbanti pañhapaṭipāṭiyā anudhammanti atthānurūpaṃ pāḷiṃ āropento.
atk-s0505a:1829_1: Dūratoti so kira ito cito cāhiṇḍanto sattayojanasatamaggato āgato. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:1829_3: kassapassa bhagavato vā sāsanato āgatattā “dūrato āgatosī”ti naṃ āha.
atk-s0505a:1830_1: Puccha manti imāya panassa gāthāya sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāreti.
atk-s0505a:1831_3: Idaṃ pana padaṃ na sabbapāṭhesu atthi.
atk-s0505a:1832_8: Evaṃ sabhiyo ekekāya gāthāya cattāro cattāro katvā pañcahi gāthāhi vīsati pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0505a:1832_9: Bhagavā panassa ekamekaṃ pañhaṃ ekamekāya gāthāya katvā arahattanikūṭeneva vīsatiyā gāthāhi byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1833_3: tasmā assa “kiṃ pattinamāhu bhikkhuna”nti imaṃ pañhaṃ byākaronto “pajjenā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:1833_5: yo attanā bhāvitena maggena parinibbānagato kilesaparinibbānaṃ patto,
atk-s0505a:1833_6: parinibbānagatattā eva ca vitiṇṇakaṅkho vipattisampattihānibuddhiucchedasassataapuññapuññabhedaṃ vibhavañca bhavañca vippahāya,
atk-s0505a:1833_7: maggavāsaṃ vusitavā khīṇapunabbhavoti ca etesaṃ thutivacanānaṃ araho,
atk-s0505a:1834_1: Yasmā pana vippaṭipattito suṭṭhu uparatabhāvena nānappakārakilesavūpasamena ca sorato hoti,
atk-s0505a:1834_2: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “sabbattha upekkhako”tiādinā nayena dutiyapañhabyākaraṇamāha.
atk-s0505a:1834_4: yo sabbattha rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti,
atk-s0505a:1834_5: na dummano”ti evaṃ pavattāya chaḷaṅgupekkhāya upekkhako,
atk-s0505a:1834_7: na so hiṃsati neva hiṃsati kañci tasathāvarādibhedaṃ sattaṃ sabbaloke sabbasmimpi loke,
atk-s0505a:1834_11: Yassa cime rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritasaṅkhātā sattussadā keci oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā na santi,
atk-s0505a:1834_12: so imāya upekkhāvihāritāya sativepullatāya ahiṃsakatāya ca vippaṭipattito suṭṭhu uparatabhāvena iminā oghādinānappakārakilesavūpasamena ca soratoti.
atk-s0505a:1835_1: Yasmā ca bhāvitindriyo nibbhayo nibbikāro danto hoti,
atk-s0505a:1835_2: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “yassindriyānī”ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1835_4: yassa cakkhādīni chaḷindriyāni gocarabhāvanāya aniccāditilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vāsanābhāvanāya satisampajaññagandhaṃ gāhāpetvā ca bhāvitāni,
atk-s0505a:1835_5: tāni ca kho yathā ajjhattaṃ gocarabhāvanāya,
atk-s0505a:1835_6: evaṃ pana bahiddhā ca sabbaloketi yattha yattha indriyānaṃ vekallatā vekallatāya vā sambhavo,
atk-s0505a:1835_7: tattha tattha nābhijjhādivasena bhāvitānīti evaṃ nibbijjha ñatvā paṭivijjhitvā imaṃ parañca lokaṃ sakasantatikkhandhalokaṃ
atk-s0505a:1836_0: “Maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, nikanti natthi jīvite”; ;
atk-s0505a:1839_0: Bhāvito sa dantoti evaṃ bhāvitindriyo so dantoti.
atk-s0505a:1840_1: Yasmā pana buddho nāma buddhisampanno kilesaniddā vibuddho ca,
atk-s0505a:1840_2: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “kappānī”ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1840_4: Tā hi tathā tathā vikappanato “kappānī”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0505a:1843_2: Ettāvatā khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtesu kammakilesesu khandhesu cāti evaṃ tīsupi vaṭṭesu vipassanaṃ āha.
atk-s0505a:1843_3: Dubhayaṃ cutūpapātanti sattānaṃ cutiṃ upapātanti imañca ubhayaṃ viceyya ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0505a:1843_5: Vigatarajamanaṅgaṇaṃ visuddhanti rāgādirajānaṃ vigamā aṅgaṇānaṃ abhāvā malānañca vigamā vigatarajamanaṅgaṇaṃ visuddhaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1843_7: Tamāhu buddhanti taṃ imāya lokuttaravipassanāya cutūpapātañāṇabhedāya buddhiyā sampannattā imāya ca vigatarajāditāya
atk-s0505a:1843_8: kilesaniddā vibuddhattā tāya paṭipadāya jātikkhayaṃ pattaṃ buddhamāhu.
atk-s0505a:1844_0: Atha vā kappāni viceyya kevalānīti “anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe amutrāsi”ntiādinā nayena vicinitvāti attho.
atk-s0505a:1844_2: Saṃsāraṃ dubhayaṃ cutūpapātanti sattānaṃ cutiṃ upapātanti imañca ubhayaṃ saṃsāraṃ “ime vata bhonto sattā”tiādinā nayena vicinitvāti attho.
atk-s0505a:1844_5: Āsavakkhayañāṇena hi vigatarajāditā ca nibbānappatti ca hotīti.
atk-s0505a:1844_6: Tamāhu buddhanti evaṃ vijjattayabhedabuddhisampannaṃ taṃ buddhamāhūti.
atk-s0505a:1845_1: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā dutiyagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā brahmabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0505a:1845_3: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “bāhitvā”ti gāthāya paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1845_13: Evaṃ thutiraho sa brahmā so brāhmaṇoti.
atk-s0505a:1846_4: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento tato aparāhi tīhi gāthāhi tayo pañhe byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1846_5: Tattha samitāvīti ariyamaggena kilese sametvā ṭhito.
atk-s0505a:1846_6: Samaṇo pavuccate tathattāti tathārūpo samaṇo pavuccatīti.
atk-s0505a:1846_8: sesaṃ tasmiṃ samaṇe sabhiyassa bahumānajananatthaṃ thutivacanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:1846_10: so puññapāpānaṃ apaṭisandhikaraṇena pahāya puññapāpaṃ rajānaṃ vigamena virajo,
atk-s0505a:1846_11: aniccādivasena ñatvā imaṃ parañca lokaṃ jātimaraṇaṃ upātivatto tādi ca hoti.
atk-s0505a:1847_2: nhātakoti ettha pana yo ajjhattabahiddhāsaṅkhāte sabbasmimpi āyatanaloke ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena
atk-s0505a:1847_3: uppattirahāni sabbapāpakāni maggañāṇena ninhāya dhovitvā tāya ninhātapāpakatāya taṇhādiṭṭhikappehi kappiyesu
atk-s0505a:1848_1: Catutthagāthāyapi āguṃ na karoti kiñci loketi yo loke appamattakampi pāpasaṅkhātaṃ āguṃ na karoti,
atk-s0505a:1848_5: Yo hi maggena pahīnaāguttā āguṃ na karoti,
atk-s0505a:1848_6: so kāmayogādike sabbayoge dasasaññojanabhedāni ca sabbabandhanāni visajja jahitvā sabbattha khandhādīsu kenaci saṅgena na sajjati,
atk-s0505a:1849_1: Evaṃ dutiyagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā tatiyagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā “khettānī”ti āyatanāni vuccanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0505a:1849_5: viceyya vā aniccādibhāvena vicinitvā upaparikkhitvā kevalāni anavasesāni,
atk-s0505a:1849_6: visesato pana saṅgahetubhūtaṃ dibbaṃ mānusakañca brahmakhettaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1849_10: Yato yadetaṃ sabbesaṃ khettānaṃ mūlabandhanaṃ avijjābhavataṇhādi,
atk-s0505a:1849_12: Evametesaṃ khettānaṃ vijitattā vicinitattā vā khettajino nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a:1849_16: taṇhā sneho”ti vacanato kammāni khettānīti vadanti.
atk-s0505a:1849_17: Dibbaṃ mānusakañca brahmakhettanti ettha ca devūpagaṃ kammaṃ dibbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1850_1: Yasmā pana sakaṭṭhena kosasadisattā “kosānī”ti kammāni vuccanti,
atk-s0505a:1850_3: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “kosānī”ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1850_5: lokiyalokuttaravipassanāya visayato kiccato ca aniccādibhāvena kusalākusalakammasaṅkhātāni kosāni viceyya kevalāni,
atk-s0505a:1850_6: visesato pana saṅgahetubhūtaṃ aṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalacetanābhedaṃ dibbaṃ mānusakañca navamahaggatakusalacetanābhedañca brahmakosaṃ viceyya.
atk-s0505a:1850_7: Tato imāya maggabhāvanāya avijjābhavataṇhādibhedā sabbakosānaṃ mūlabandhanā pamutto,
atk-s0505a:1850_10: Atha vā sattānaṃ dhammānañca nivāsaṭṭhena asikosasadisattā “kosānī”ti tayo bhavā dvādasāyatanāni ca veditabbāni.
atk-s0505a:1851_1: Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ paṇḍatīti imināva “paṇḍito”ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:1851_2: apica kho pana paṇḍarāni ito upagato pavicayapaññāya allīnotipi “paṇḍito”ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:1851_3: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “dubhayānī”ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1851_5: ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā cāti evaṃ ubhayāni aniccādibhāvena viceyya.
atk-s0505a:1851_7: Tāni hi pakatiparisuddhattā ruḷhiyā ca evaṃ vuccanti,
atk-s0505a:1851_8: tāni viceyya imāya paṭipattiyā niddhantamalattā suddhipañño paṇḍitoti pavuccati tathattā,
atk-s0505a:1851_9: yasmā tāni paṇḍarāni paññāya ito hoti,
atk-s0505a:1851_11: So hi pāpapuññasaṅkhātaṃ kaṇhasukkaṃ upātivatto tādī ca hoti,
atk-s0505a:1852_5: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “asatañcā”ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1852_8: taṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhāti imasmiṃ sabbaloke pavicayañāṇena asatañca satañca ñatvā dhammaṃ tassa ñātattā
atk-s0505a:1852_9: eva rāgādibhedato sattavidhaṃ saṅgaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhibhedato duvidhaṃ jālañca aticca atikkamitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0505a:1852_10: So tena monasaṅkhātena pavicayañāṇena samannāgatattā muni.
atk-s0505a:1852_12: So hi khīṇāsavamunittā devamanussānaṃ pūjāraho hoti,
atk-s0505a:1853_1: Evaṃ tatiyagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā catutthagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā yo catūhi maggañāṇavedehi kilesakkhayaṃ karonto gato,
atk-s0505a:1853_5: Tattha chandarāgappahānena tameva sabbaṃ vedamaticca yā vedapaccayā vā aññathā vā uppajjanti vedanā,
atk-s0505a:1853_7: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “idaṃ pattina”nti avatvā “vedānī”ti gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1853_8: Yasmā vā yo pavicayapaññāya vedāni viceyya,
atk-s0505a:1853_10: so satthasaññitāni vedāni gato ñāto atikkanto ca hoti.
atk-s0505a:1853_12: sopi vedanāsaññitāni vedāni gato atikkanto ca hoti.
atk-s0505a:1853_14: tasmā tampi atthaṃ dassento “idaṃ pattina”nti avatvā imāya gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1854_2: so ca anuvicca papañcanāmarūpaṃ ajjhattaṃ attano santāne taṇhāmānadiṭṭhibhedaṃ papañcaṃ tappaccayā nāmarūpañca
atk-s0505a:1854_6: parasantāne ca imassa nāmarūparogassa mūlaṃ avijjābhavataṇhādiṃ,
atk-s0505a:1854_7: tameva vā papañcaṃ anuvicca tāya bhāvanāya sabbesaṃ rogānaṃ mūlabandhanā,
atk-s0505a:1854_10: tasmā eva vā papañcā pamutto hoti,
atk-s0505a:1854_11: tasmā taṃ dassento “anuviccā”ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1855_1: “Kathañca vīriyavā”ti ettha pana yasmā yo ariyamaggena sabbapāpakehi virato,
atk-s0505a:1855_2: tathā viratattā ca āyatiṃ apaṭisandhitāya nirayadukkhaṃ aticca ṭhito vīriyavāso vīriyaniketo,
atk-s0505a:1855_4: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “virato”ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1855_5: Padhānavā dhīro tādīti imāni panassa thutivacanāni.
atk-s0505a:1856_1: “Ājāniyo kinti nāma hotī”ti ettha pana yasmā pahīnasabbavaṅkadoso kāraṇākāraṇaññū asso vā hatthī vā “ājāniyo hotī”ti loke vuccati,
atk-s0505a:1856_2: na ca tassa sabbaso te dosā pahīnā eva,
atk-s0505a:1856_4: tasmā so “ājāniyo”ti paramatthato vattabbataṃ arahatīti dassento “yassā”ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1856_6: ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā cāti evaṃ ajjhattabahiddhāsaññojanasaṅkhātāni yassa assu lunāni bandhanāni paññāsatthena chinnāni padālitāni.
atk-s0505a:1856_7: Saṅgamūlanti yāni tesu tesu vatthūsu saṅgassa sajjanāya anatikkamanāya mūlaṃ honti,
atk-s0505a:1856_8: atha vā yassa assu lunāni rāgādīni bandhanāni yāni ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca saṅgamūlāni honti,
atk-s0505a:1856_9: so sabbasmā saṅgānaṃ mūlabhūtā sabbasaṅgānaṃ vā mūlabhūtā bandhanā pamutto “ājāniyo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:1857_1: Evaṃ catutthagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā pañcamagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā yaṃ chandajjhenamattena akkharacintakā sottiyaṃ vaṇṇayanti,
atk-s0505a:1857_3: Ariyo pana bāhusaccena nissutapāpatāya ca paramatthasottiyo hoti,
atk-s0505a:1857_4: tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento “idaṃ pattina”nti avatvā “sutvā”ti gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1857_6: yo imasmiṃ loke sutamayapaññākiccavasena sutvā kātabbakiccavasena vā sutvā vipassanūpagaṃ sabbadhammaṃ
atk-s0505a:1857_8: imāya paṭipadāya kilese kilesaṭṭhāniye ca dhamme abhibhavitvā abhibhūti saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0505a:1857_9: taṃ sutvā sabbadhammaṃ abhiññāya loke sāvajjānavajjaṃ yadatthi kiñci,
atk-s0505a:1857_11: Yasmā ca yo akathaṃkathī kilesabandhanehi vimutto,
atk-s0505a:1857_12: rāgādīhi īghehi anīgho ca hoti sabbadhi sabbesu dhammesu khandhāyatanādīsu,
atk-s0505a:1857_13: tasmā taṃ akathaṃkathiṃ vimuttaṃ anīghaṃ sabbadhi nissutapāpakattāpi “sottiyo”ti āhūti.
atk-s0505a:1858_1: Yasmā pana hitakāmena janena araṇīyato ariyo hoti,
atk-s0505a:1858_3: Tasmā yehi guṇehi so araṇīyo hoti,
atk-s0505a:1858_6: cattāri āsavāni dve ca ālayāni paññāsatthena chetvā vidvā viññū vibhāvī catumaggañāṇī so punabbhavavasena na upeti gabbhaseyyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:1858_9: Kāmaguṇasaṅkhātañca paṅkaṃ panujja panuditvā taṇhādiṭṭhikappānaṃ aññatarampi kappaṃ na eti,
atk-s0505a:1858_11: Yasmā vā pāpakehi ārakattā ariyo hoti anaye ca anirīyanā,
atk-s0505a:1858_12: tasmā tampi atthaṃ dassento imāya gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1858_17: na ca tesu irīyati tasmā ārakāssa honti pāpakā dhammāti imināpatthena.
atk-s0505a:1858_18: Anaye na irīyatīti imināpatthena tamāhu ariyoti ca evampettha yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:1858_19: “Vidvā so na upeti gabbhaseyya”nti idaṃ pana imasmiṃ atthavikappe thutivacanameva hoti.
atk-s0505a:1859_1: “Kathaṃ caraṇavā”ti ettha pana yasmā caraṇehi pattabbaṃ patto “caraṇavā”ti vattabbataṃ arahati,
atk-s0505a:1859_2: tasmā taṃ dassento “yo idhā”ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:1859_3: Tattha yo idhāti yo imasmiṃ sāsane.
atk-s0505a:1859_7: Yo caraṇanimittaṃ caraṇahetu caraṇapaccayā pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:1859_8: Caraṇavā soti so imāya caraṇehi pattabbapattiyā caraṇavā hotīti.
atk-s0505a:1859_14: niccaṃ nibbānaninnacittatāya sabbattha ca khandhādīsu na sajjati.
atk-s0505a:1860_1: Yasmā pana kammādīnaṃ paribbājanena paribbājako nāma hoti,
