atk-s0505a:2055_0: Tadā ca turū nāma bhikkhu kokālikassa upajjhāyo anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā suddhāvāsesu nibbatto hoti.
atk-s0505a:2055_1: Sopi samāpattiyā vuṭṭhito taṃ dhikkāraṃ sutvā āgamma kokālikaṃ ovadi sāriputtamoggallānesu cittappasādajananatthaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2055_2: So tassāpi vacanaṃ aggahetvā aññadatthu tameva aparādhetvā kālaṃ katvā padumaniraye uppajji. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:2056_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampatīti ko ayaṃ brahmā,
atk-s0505a:2056_2: Ayaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma bhikkhu anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāsesu uppanno,
atk-s0505a:2056_4: So pana “ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā padumanirayaṃ kittessāmi,
atk-s0505a:2056_7: bhagavā ācikkhanto ariyūpavāde ādīnavaṃ pakāsessatī”ti iminā kāraṇena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca.
atk-s0505a:2057_0: Tattha vīsatikhārikoti māgadhakena patthena cattāro patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho hoti,
atk-s0505a:2057_7: Abbudo nirayoti abbudo nāma koci paccekanirayo natthi,
atk-s0505a:2057_8: avīcimhiyeva abbudagaṇanāya paccanokāso pana “abbudo nirayo”ti vutto.
atk-s0505a:2058_1: yatheva hi sataṃ satasahassāni koṭi hoti,
atk-s0505a:2058_2: evaṃ sataṃ satasahassakoṭiyo pakoṭi nāma hoti,
atk-s0505a:2058_9: Keci pana “tattha tattha paridevanānattenapi kammakaraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānī”ti vadanti,
atk-s0505a:2059_1: Pāṭhavasena vuttavīsatigāthāsu hi ettha “sataṃ sahassāna”nti ayamekā eva gāthā vuttatthadīpikā,
atk-s0505a:2059_3: avasāne gāthādvayameva pana mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vinicchitapāṭhe natthi.
atk-s0505a:2061_2: Taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyoti yo uttamaṭṭhena pasaṃsāraho puggalo,
atk-s0505a:2061_3: taṃ vā so pāpicchatādīni āropetvā garahati.
atk-s0505a:2062_3: Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanāti sabbena attano dhanenapi attanāpi saddhiṃ.
atk-s0505a:2062_7: Tassāyaṃ manopadoso eva mahattaro kalīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2063_3: yaṃ kālaṃ ariyagarahī vācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya pāpakaṃ nirayaṃ upeti,
atk-s0505a:2064_2: yo sugatesu manaṃ padūsaye”ti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “abhūtavādī”ti ādimāha.
atk-s0505a:2064_5: Pecca samā bhavantīti ito paṭigantvā nirayūpapattiyā samā bhavanti.
atk-s0505a:2066_1: Evaṃ sugatesu manopadosassa mahattarakalibhāvaṃ sādhetvā idāni vāritavatthugāthā nāma cuddasa gāthā āha.
atk-s0505a:2066_2: Imā kira kokālikaṃ mīyamānameva ovadantenāyasmatā mahāmoggallānena vuttā,
atk-s0505a:2066_4: Tāsaṃ iminā suttena saddhiṃ ekasaṅgahatthaṃ ayamuddeso “yo lobhaguṇe anuyutto”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:2066_5: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva “guṇo”ti niddiṭṭhattā anekakkhattuṃ pavattattā vā lobhoyeva lobhaguṇo,
atk-s0505a:2066_13: tumhādiso anuyuttalobhataṇhāya lobhaguṇe anuyutto assaddho kadariyo avadaññū maccharī pesuṇiyaṃ anuyutto,
atk-s0505a:2066_14: so vacasā paribhāsati aññaṃ abhāsaneyyampi puggalaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2070_6: nirayapālā pañcavidhabandhanaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ karontī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2070_8: evaṃ upento ca tattheva ādittāya lohapathaviyā nipajjāpetvā nirayapālehi pañcasu ṭhānesu ākoṭiyamānaṃ tattaṃ khilasaṅkhātaṃ tiṇhadhāramayasūlamupeti,
atk-s0505a:2070_9: yaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā vuttaṃ “tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī”tiādi.
atk-s0505a:2070_10: Tato parā upaḍḍhagāthā anekāni vassasahassāni tattha paccitvā pakkāvasesānubhavanatthaṃ anupubbena khārodakanadītīraṃ
atk-s0505a:2070_11: gatassa yaṃ taṃ “tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ mukhe pakkhipanti,
atk-s0505a:2071_1: Tato parāsu gāthāsu na hi vaggūti “gaṇhatha,
atk-s0505a:2071_2: paharathā”tiādīni vadantā nirayapālā madhuravācaṃ na vadanti.
atk-s0505a:2071_6: Na tāṇamupentīti tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hutvā na upagacchanti,
atk-s0505a:2071_7: gaṇhantā hanantā eva upentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2071_8: Aṅgāre santhate sayantīti aṅgārapabbataṃ āropitā samānā anekāni vassasahassāni santhate aṅgāre senti.
atk-s0505a:2071_9: Ginisampajjalitanti samantato jalitaṃ sabbadisāsu ca sampajjalitaṃ aggiṃ.
atk-s0505a:2071_12: naṃ yojanasate ṭhatvā passataṃ akkhīni bhijjanti.
atk-s0505a:2072_1: Jālena ca onahiyānāti ayojālena paliveṭhetvā migaluddakā migaṃ viya hananti.
atk-s0505a:2072_3: Andhaṃva timisamāyantīti andhakaraṇena andhameva bahalandhakārattā “timisa”nti saññitaṃ dhūmaroruvaṃ nāma narakaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0505a:2072_4: Tatra kira nesaṃ kharadhūmaṃ ghāyitvā akkhīni bhijjanti,
atk-s0505a:2072_6: Taṃ vitatañhi yathā mahikāyoti tañca andhatimisaṃ mahikāyo viya vitataṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0505a:2073_1: Atha lohamayanti ayaṃ pana lohakumbhī pathavipariyantikā catunahutādhikāni dveyojanasatasahassāni gambhīrā samatittikā tatralohapūrā hoti.
atk-s0505a:2073_2: Paccanti hi tāsu cirarattanti tāsu kumbhīsu dīgharattaṃ paccanti.
atk-s0505a:2073_5: sakimpi uddhaṃ sakimpi adho gacchamānā pheṇuddehakaṃ paccantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2074_6: tattha yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ allīyati apassayatīti attho.
atk-s0505a:2075_3: tattha patitassa sūcimukhapāṇā chaviādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ khādanti.
atk-s0505a:2075_4: Gantuṃ na hi tīramapatthīti apagantuṃ na hi tīraṃ atthi.
atk-s0505a:2075_8: Sabbasamā hi samantakapallāti yasmā tassā kumbhiyā uparibhāgepi nikujjitattā sabbattha samā samantato kaṭāhā,
atk-s0505a:2075_9: tasmā apagantuṃ tīraṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2076_2: Tañhi dūrato ramaṇīyaṃ ambavanaṃ viya dissati,
atk-s0505a:2076_4: tato nesaṃ vāteritāni pattāni patitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni chindanti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:2076_6: Taṃ pavisanti tato suṭṭhu chinnagattā hontīti.
atk-s0505a:2076_7: Jivhaṃ baḷisena gahetvā ārajayārajayā vihanantīti tattha asipattavane vegena dhāvitvā patitānaṃ musāvādīnaṃ
atk-s0505a:2076_8: nerayikānaṃ nirayapālā jivhaṃ baḷisena nikkaḍḍhitvā yathā manussā allacammaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pattharitvā khilehi ākoṭenti,
atk-s0505a:2076_9: evaṃ ākoṭetvā pharasūhi phāletvā phāletvā ekamekaṃ koṭiṃ chindetvā vihananti,
atk-s0505a:2077_2: Sā kira gaṅgā viya udakabharitā dissati.
atk-s0505a:2077_6: Tassā kira nadiyā uddhamadho ubhayatīresu ca tiṇhadhārā khurā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitā viya tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0505a:2077_8: Taṃ tiṇhadhārakhuradhāraṃ udakāsāya upenti allīyantīti attho.
atk-s0505a:2077_9: Evaṃ upentā ca pāpakammena coditā tattha mandā papatanti bālāti attho.
atk-s0505a:2078_1: Sāmā sabalāti etaṃ parato “soṇā”ti iminā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2078_2: Sāmavaṇṇā kammāsavaṇṇā ca soṇā khādantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2078_10: Tattha vuttānipi pana kānici idha na vuttāni,
atk-s0505a:2078_11: tāni etesaṃ purimapacchimabhāgattā vuttāneva hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0505a:2079_1: Idāni sabbamevetaṃ narakavuttiṃ dassetvā ovadanto “kicchā vatāya”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2079_3: kicchā vata ayaṃ idha narake nānappakārakammakaraṇabhedā vutti,
atk-s0505a:2079_5: Tasmā idha jīvitasese jīvitasantatiyā vijjamānāya idha loke ṭhitoyeva samāno saraṇagamanādikusaladhammānuṭṭhānena kiccakaro naro siyā bhaveyya.
atk-s0505a:2079_7: na pamajje muhuttampi na pamādamāpajjeyyāti ayamettha samuccayavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0505a:2079_8: Yasmā pana vuttāvasesāni padāni pubbe vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyāneva,
atk-s0505a:2083_3: Padumuttarassa kira bhagavato sāvakaṃ moneyyapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ disvā tathattaṃ abhikaṅkhamāno tato
atk-s0505a:2083_4: pabhuti kappasatasahassaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā asitassa isino bhāgineyyo nālako nāma tāpaso bhagavantaṃ dhammacakkappavattitadivasato
atk-s0505a:2083_5: sattame divase “aññātameta”ntiādīhi dvīhi gāthāhi moneyyapaṭipadaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:2083_6: Tassa bhagavā “moneyyaṃ te upaññissa”ntiādinā nayena taṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:2083_7: Parinibbute pana bhagavati saṅgītiṃ karontenāyasmatā mahākassapena āyasmā ānando tameva moneyyapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0505a:2083_8: puṭṭho yena yadā ca samādapito nālako bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:2083_9: Taṃ sabbaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetukāmo “ānandajāte”tiādikā vīsati vatthugāthāyo vatvā abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:2084_5: Devānañhi kapparukkhanibbattāni vasanāni rajaṃ vā malaṃ vā na gaṇhanti.
atk-s0505a:2084_6: Dussaṃ gahetvāti idha dussasadisattā “dussa”nti laddhavohāraṃ dibbavatthaṃ ukkhipitvā.
atk-s0505a:2085_1: ayaṃ kira suddhodanassa pitu sīhahanurañño purohito suddhodanassapi anabhisittakāle sippācariyo hutvā abhisittakāle purohitoyeva ahosi.
atk-s0505a:2085_2: Tassa sāyaṃ pātaṃ rājupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatassa rājā daharakāle viya nipaccakāraṃ akatvā añjalikammamattameva karoti.
atk-s0505a:2085_5: Rājā tassa nicchayaṃ ñatvā “tena hi, ācariya,
atk-s0505a:2085_7: yathā te ahaṃ abhiṇhaṃ passeyya”nti yāci.
atk-s0505a:2085_8: So “evaṃ hotū”ti paṭissuṇitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā raññā upaṭṭhahiyamāno uyyāneyeva vasanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ
atk-s0505a:2085_9: katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññāyo ca nibbattesi.
atk-s0505a:2085_10: So tato pabhuti rājakule bhattakiccaṃ katvā himavantacātumahārājikabhavanādīnaṃ aññataraṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0505a:2085_11: Athekadivasaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā ratanavimānaṃ pavisitvā dibbaratanapallaṅke nisinno samādhisukhaṃ
atk-s0505a:2085_12: anubhavitvā sāyanhasamayaṃ vuṭṭhāya vimānadvāre ṭhatvā ito cito ca vilokento saṭṭhiyojanāya mahāvīthiyā
atk-s0505a:2085_13: celukkhepaṃ katvā bodhisattaguṇapasaṃsitāni thutivacanāni vatvā kīḷante sakkappamukhe deve addasa.
atk-s0505a:2087_2: Padattho pana paṭhamagāthāya tāva saṅgamoti saṅgāmo.
atk-s0505a:2088_1: sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmavāsī tettiṃsamanussaseṭṭho magho nāma māṇavo hutvā satta vattapadāni
atk-s0505a:2088_4: sakkāraṃ nesaṃ karissāmā”ti vatvā dibbapadumāni upanāmesuṃ,
atk-s0505a:2088_6: Sakko upaḍḍharajjena asantuṭṭho sakaparisaṃ saññāpetvā ekadivasaṃ surāmadamatte te pāde gahetvā sinerupabbatapāde khipi.
atk-s0505a:2088_7: Tesaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasasahassayojanaṃ asurabhavanaṃ nibbatti pāricchattakapaṭicchannabhūtāya citrapāṭaliyā upasobhitaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2088_8: Tato te satiṃ paṭilabhitvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ apassantā “aho re naṭṭhā mayaṃ pānamadadosena,
atk-s0505a:2088_13: Tato pabhuti “asurā”icceva uppannasamaññā hutvā “handa dāni devehi saddhiṃ saṅgāmemā”ti sineruṃ parito ārohiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:2088_14: Tato sakko asure yuddhena abbhuggantvā punapi samudde pakkhipitvā catūsu dvāresu attanā sadisaṃ indapaṭimaṃ māpetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0505a:2088_15: Tato asurā “appamatto vatāyaṃ sakko niccaṃ rakkhanto tiṭṭhatī”ti cintetvā punadeva nagaraṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:2088_16: Tato devā attano jayaṃ ghosentā mahāvīthiyaṃ celukkhepaṃ karontā nakkhattaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:2088_17: Atha asito atītānāgate cattālīsakappe anussarituṃ samatthatāya “kiṃ nu kho imehi pubbepi evaṃ kīḷitapubba”nti
atk-s0505a:2088_18: āvajjento taṃ devāsurasaṅgāme devavijayaṃ disvā āha –
atk-s0505a:2092_0: Tasmimpi kāle etādiso lomahaṃsano pamodo na āsi.
atk-s0505a:2092_1: Kimabbhutaṃ daṭṭhu marū pamoditāti ajja pana kiṃ abbhutaṃ disvā evaṃ devā pamuditāti.
atk-s0505a:2093_5: Pucchāmi vohanti attanā āvajjetvā ñātuṃ samatthopi tesaṃ vacanaṃ sotukāmatāya pucchati.
atk-s0505a:2094_1: Athassa tamatthaṃ ārocentehi devehi vuttāya tatiyagāthāya bodhisattoti bujjhanakasatto,
atk-s0505a:2094_2: sammāsambodhiṃ gantuṃ araho satto ratanavaroti vararatanabhūto.
atk-s0505a:2094_3: Tenamha tuṭṭhāti tena kāraṇena mayaṃ tuṭṭhā.
atk-s0505a:2094_4: So hi buddhattaṃ patvā tathā dhammaṃ desessati,
atk-s0505a:2094_5: yathā mayañca aññe ca devagaṇā sekkhāsekkhabhūmiṃ pāpuṇissāma.
atk-s0505a:2094_6: Manussāpissa dhammaṃ sutvā ye na sakkhissanti parinibbātuṃ,
atk-s0505a:2094_7: te dānādīni katvā devaloke paripūressantīti ayaṃ kira nesaṃ adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:2094_8: Tattha “tuṭṭhā kalyarūpā”ti kiñcāpi idaṃ padadvayaṃ atthato abhinnaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2094_10: kiṃ devasaṅgho atiriva kalyarūpo”ti imassa pañhadvayassa vissajjanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2095_1: Idāni yena adhippāyena bodhisatte jāte tuṭṭhā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0505a:2095_2: taṃ āvikarontehi vuttāya catutthagāthāya sattaggahaṇena devamanussaggahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2095_4: Evaṃ dvīhi padehi pañcasupi gatīsu seṭṭhabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0505a:2095_8: Devamanussesu pana ye attahitāya paṭipannādayo cattāro puggalā,
atk-s0505a:2096_1: Pañcamagāthāya taṃ saddanti taṃ devehi vuttavacanasaddaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2097_7: Asitavhayassāti asitanāmassa dutiyena nāmena kaṇhadevilassa isino.
atk-s0505a:2098_6: Alattha pītinti disvā punapi pītiṃ labhi.
atk-s0505a:2099_1: Tato paraṃ bodhisattassa devehi sadā payujjamānasakkāradīpanatthaṃ vuttaaṭṭhamagāthāya anekasākhanti anekasalākaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2100_2: Kaṇhasirivhayoti kaṇhasaddena ca sirisaddena ca avhayamāno.
atk-s0505a:2100_11: Purimaṃ vā dassanapītilābhāpekkhaṃ gāthāvasāne “vipulamalattha pīti”nti vacanato,
atk-s0505a:2100_15: Disvāti satasahassagghanake gandhārarattakambale suvaṇṇanikkhaṃ viya kumāraṃ “chattaṃ marū”ti ettha vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0505a:2100_17: Keci pana “idaṃ mānusakaṃ chattaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0505a:2100_20: Evaṃ santepi na tassa vacanena kocipi atisayo atthi,
atk-s0505a:2100_24: Athassa pādā parivattitvā isissa matthake patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0505a:2100_25: So tampi acchariyaṃ disvā udaggacitto sumano paṭiggahesi.
atk-s0505a:2101_5: So kira attano abhimukhāgatesu mahāsattassa pādatalesu cakkāni disvā tadanusārena sesalakkhaṇāni jigīsanto
atk-s0505a:2101_6: sabbaṃ lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “addhāyaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā evamāha.
atk-s0505a:2102_2: Akalyarūpo gaḷayati assukānīti taṃ attano arūpūpapattiṃ anussaritvā “na dānāhaṃ assa dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ
atk-s0505a:2102_3: lacchāmī”ti atuṭṭharūpo balavasokābhibhavena domanassajāto hutvā assūni pāteti gaḷayati.
atk-s0505a:2102_10: Evaṃ santepi domanassuppattiyevassa ayuttā samāpattilābhena vikkhambhitattāti ce? Na,
atk-s0505a:2102_12: Maggabhāvanāya samucchinnā hi kilesā na uppajjanti,
atk-s0505a:2102_14: Uppanne kilese parihīnajjhānattā kutassa arūpagamananti ce?
atk-s0505a:2102_16: Samāpattilābhino hi uppanne kilese balavavītikkamaṃ anāpajjantā vūpasantamatteyeva kilesavege puna taṃ visesaṃ appakasirenevādhigacchanti,
atk-s0505a:2102_19: No ce kumāre bhavissati antarāyoti na bhavissati nu kho imasmiṃ kumāre antarāyo.
atk-s0505a:2103_1: Dvādasāyaṃ na orakāyanti ayaṃ orako paritto na hoti.
atk-s0505a:2106_4: Evaṃ niggato ca so bhāgineyyaṃ sayanti sakaṃ bhāgineyyaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2106_6: Samādapesīti attano appāyukabhāvaṃ ñatvā kaniṭṭhabhaginiyā ca puttassa nālakassa māṇavakassa upacitapuññataṃ
atk-s0505a:2106_7: attano balena ñatvā “vuḍḍhippatto pamādampi āpajjeyyā”ti naṃ anukampamāno bhaginiyā gharaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ
atk-s0505a:2106_10: “Ānetha na”nti āṇāpetvā taṅkhaṇaṃyeva tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbājetvā samādapesi ovadi anusāsi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0505a:2107_3: dhammaṃ vā aggaṃ saha paṭipadāya nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2108_2: tasmiṃ samaye kilesavikkhambhane samādhilābhe ca sati vikkhambhitakilesena samāhitacittena cāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:2108_3: Anāgate paramavisuddhadassināti “ayaṃ nālako anāgate kāle bhagavato santike paramavisuddhaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0505a:2108_4: passissatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhattā so isi iminā pariyāyena “anāgate paramavisuddhadassī”ti vutto.
atk-s0505a:2108_10: So kira tato pabhuti udake na nimujji “udakaṃ pavisitvā sotindriyaṃ vināseyya,
atk-s0505a:2109_1: Aṭṭhārasāyaṃ sutvāna ghosanti so nālako evaṃ parivasanto anupubbena bhagavatā sambodhiṃ patvā bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0505a:2109_3: sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā uppanno”tiādinā nayena jinavaracakkavattane pavattaghosaṃ attano atthakāmāhi devatāhi āgantvā ārocitaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0505a:2109_4: Gantvāna disvā isinisabhanti sattāhaṃ devatāhi moneyyakolāhale kayiramāne sattame divase isipatanaṃ gantvā “nālako āgamissati,
atk-s0505a:2109_5: tassa dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti iminā ca abhisandhinā varabuddhāsane nisinnaṃ disvā nisabhasadisaṃ isinisabhaṃ bhagavantaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2109_9: Samāgate asitāvhayassa sāsaneti asitassa isino ovādakāle anuppatte. Tena hi –
atk-s0505a:2109_11: tadā gantvā samayaṃ paripucchamāno carassu tasmiṃ bhagavati brahmacariya”nti anusiṭṭho,
atk-s0505a:2111_4: Yaṃ asito “sambodhiyaggaṃ phusissatāyaṃ kumāro”ti ñatvā “buddhoti ghosaṃ yada parato suṇosi,
atk-s0505a:2111_6: tadetaṃ mayā asitassa vacanaṃ ajja bhagavantaṃ sakkhiṃ disvā “yathātathamevā”ti aññātanti.
atk-s0505a:2111_8: Sabbadhammāna pāragunti hemavatasutte vuttanayena chahi ākārehi.
atk-s0505a:2112_3: Bhikkhācariyaṃ jigīsatoti ariyehi āciṇṇaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ bhikkhācariyaṃ pariyesamānassa.
atk-s0505a:2113_1: Athassa evaṃ puṭṭho bhagavā “moneyyaṃ te upaññissa”ntiādinā nayena moneyyapaṭipadaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0505a:2113_4: Dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavanti kātuñca dukkhaṃ kayiramānañca sambhavituṃ sahituṃ dukkhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2113_7: yadi naṃ kātuṃ vā abhisambhotuṃ vā sukhaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0505a:2113_8: evaṃ pana dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ puthujjanakālato pabhuti kiliṭṭhacittaṃ anuppādetvā paṭipajjitabbato.
atk-s0505a:2113_9: Tathā hi naṃ ekassa buddhassa ekova sāvako karoti ca sambhoti cāti.
atk-s0505a:2114_0: Evaṃ bhagavā moneyyassa dukkarabhāvaṃ durabhisambhavatañca dassento nālakassa ussāhaṃ janetvā tamassa vattukāmo āha “handa te naṃ pavakkhāmi,
atk-s0505a:2114_3: Te naṃ pavakkhāmīti tuyhaṃ taṃ moneyyaṃ pavakkhāmi.
atk-s0505a:2114_5: Daḷho bhavāti durabhisambhavasahanasamatthāya asithilaparakkamatāya thiro hoti.
atk-s0505a:2114_8: tasmāhaṃ ekantabyavasitova hutvā evaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavampi samānaṃ tuyhaṃ taṃ moneyyaṃ pavakkhāmi,
atk-s0505a:2115_1: Evaṃ paramasallekhaṃ moneyyavattaṃ vattukāmo nālakaṃ santhambhane daḷhībhāve ca niyojetvā paṭhamaṃ tāva
atk-s0505a:2116_5: raññāpi vandito samāno “maṃ vandatī”ti uddhaccaṃ nāpajjeyya.
atk-s0505a:2117_3: araññasaññite dāyepi iṭṭhāniṭṭhavasena uccāvacā nānappakārā ārammaṇā niccharanti,
atk-s0505a:2117_6: Yathā vā ḍayhamāne vane aggisikhā nānappakāratāya uccāvacā niccharanti,
atk-s0505a:2117_11: evaṃ sīhabyagghamanussāmanussavividhavihaṅgavirutapupphaphalapallavādibhedavasena nānappakāratāya dāye uccāvacā ārammaṇā niccharanti bhiṃsanakāpi,
atk-s0505a:2117_17: Evaṃ niccharantesu ca uccāvacesu ārammaṇesu yā kāci uyyānavanacārikaṃ gatā samānā pakatiyā vā vanacāriniyo
atk-s0505a:2117_18: kaṭṭhahārikādayo rahogataṃ disvā hasitalapitaruditadunnivatthādīhi nāriyo muniṃ palobhenti,
atk-s0505a:2118_1: Evamassa bhagavā gāme ca araññe ca paṭipattividhiṃ dassetvā idāni sīlasaṃvaraṃ dassento “virato methunā dhammā”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:2118_2: Tattha hitvā kāme paropareti methunadhammato avasesepi sundare ca asundare ca pañca kāmaguṇe hitvā.
atk-s0505a:2118_3: Tappahānena hi methunavirati susampannā hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:2118_7: na ghātaye”ti ettha vuttāya pāṇātipātāveramaṇiyā sampattidassanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-s0505a:2118_11: sabbepi sataṇhanittaṇhatāya tasathāvare pāṇe jīvitukāmatāya amaritukāmatāya sukhakāmatāya dukkhapaṭikūlatāya
atk-s0505a:2118_12: ca “yathā ahaṃ tathā ete”ti attasamānatāya tesu virodhaṃ vinento teneva pakārena “yathā ete tathā aha”nti
atk-s0505a:2118_13: paresaṃ samānatāya ca attani anurodhaṃ vinento evaṃ ubhayathāpi anurodhavirodhavippahīno hutvā maraṇapaṭikūlatāya
atk-s0505a:2118_14: attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā pāṇesu ye keci tase vā thāvare vā pāṇe na haneyya sāhatthikādīhi payogehi,
atk-s0505a:2119_1: Evamassa methunaviratipāṇātipātaviratimukhena saṅkhepato pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vatvā “hitvā kāme”tiādīhi
atk-s0505a:2119_2: indriyasaṃvarañca dassetvā idāni ājīvapārisuddhiṃ dassento “hitvā icchañcā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:2119_4: yāyaṃ taṇhā ekaṃ laddhā dutiyaṃ icchati,
atk-s0505a:2119_6: satasahassaṃ laddhā taduttarimpi icchatīti evaṃ appaṭiladdhavisayaṃ icchanato “icchā”ti vuccati,
atk-s0505a:2119_8: Taṃ hitvā icchañca lobhañca yattha satto puthujjano,
atk-s0505a:2119_9: yasmiṃ cīvarādipaccaye tehi icchālobhehi puthujjano satto laggo paṭibaddho tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0505a:2119_10: tattha taṃ ubhayampi hitvā paccayatthaṃ ājīvapārisuddhiṃ avirodhento ñāṇacakkhunā cakkhumā hutvā imaṃ moneyyapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjeyya.
atk-s0505a:2119_12: duppūraṇaṭṭhena narakasaññitaṃ micchājīvahetubhūtaṃ imaṃ paccayataṇhaṃ tareyya,
atk-s0505a:2119_13: imāya vā paṭipadāya tareyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2120_1: Evaṃ paccayataṇhāpahānamukhena ājīvapārisuddhiṃ dassetvā idāni bhojane mattaññutāmukhena paccayaparibhogasīlaṃ tadanusārena ca yāva arahattappatti,
atk-s0505a:2120_4: dhammena samena laddhesu itarītaracīvarādīsu paccayesu āhāraṃ tāva āhārento –
atk-s0505a:2123_3: Ūnūdaro hontopi ca mitāhāro assa bhojane mattaññū,
atk-s0505a:2123_4: “neva davāyā”tiādinā paccavekkhaṇena guṇato dosato ca paricchinnāhāro.
atk-s0505a:2123_5: Evaṃ mitāhāro samānopi paccayadhutaṅgapariyattiadhigamavasena catubbidhāya appicchatāya appiccho assa.
atk-s0505a:2123_6: Ekaṃsena hi moneyyapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannena bhikkhunā evaṃ appicchena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2123_7: Tattha ekekasmiṃ paccaye tīhi santosehi santussanā paccayappicchatā.
atk-s0505a:2123_8: Dhutaṅgadharasseva sato “dhutavāti maṃ pare jānantū”ti anicchanatā dhutaṅgappicchatā.
atk-s0505a:2123_9: Bahussutasseva sato “bahussutoti maṃ pare jānantū”ti anicchanatā pariyattiappicchatā majjhantikattherassa viya.
atk-s0505a:2123_10: Adhigamasampannasseva sato “adhigato ayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammanti maṃ pare jānantū”ti anicchanatā adhigamappicchatā.
atk-s0505a:2123_13: Evaṃ appicchopi ca arahattamaggena taṇhāloluppaṃ hitvā alolupo assa.
atk-s0505a:2123_14: Evaṃ alolupo hi sadā icchāya nicchāto aniccho hoti nibbuto,
atk-s0505a:2123_15: yāya icchāya chātā honti sattā khuppipāsāturā viya atittā,
atk-s0505a:2123_16: tāya icchāya aniccho hoti anicchattā ca nicchāto hoti anāturo paramatittippatto.
atk-s0505a:2123_17: Evaṃ nicchātattā nibbuto hoti vūpasantasabbakilesapariḷāhoti evamettha uppaṭipāṭiyā yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0505a:2124_2: tāvapaṭipadaṃ kathetvā idāni taṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannassa bhikkhuno arahattappattiniṭṭhaṃ dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ
atk-s0505a:2124_4: Tattha sa piṇḍacāraṃ caritvāti so bhikkhu bhikkhaṃ caritvā bhattakiccaṃ vā katvā.
atk-s0505a:2124_5: Vanantamabhihārayeti apapañcito gihipapañcena vanaṃ eva gaccheyya.
atk-s0505a:2124_6: Upaṭṭhito rukkhamūlasminti rukkhamūle ṭhito vā hutvā.
atk-s0505a:2124_10: Ettha ca “piṇḍacāraṃ caritvā”ti iminā piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2124_11: Yasmā pana ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko sapadānacārī ekāsaniko pattapiṇḍiko khalupacchābhattiko ca hotiyeva,
atk-s0505a:2124_17: Yathākkamaṃ pana etesaṃ anulomattā abbhokāsikayathāsanthatikasosānikaṅgāni vuttāniyeva hontīti evametāya
atk-s0505a:2125_1: Sa jhānapasuto dhīroti so anuppannassa jhānassa uppādanena uppannassa āvajjanasamāpajjanādhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇehi ca jhānesu pasuto anuyutto.
atk-s0505a:2125_3: Vanante ramito siyāti vane abhirato siyā,
atk-s0505a:2125_7: apica kho tasmiṃyeva rukkhamūle sotāpattimaggādisampayuttena lokuttarajjhānenāpi attānaṃ atīva tosento jhāyetha.
atk-s0505a:2125_8: Paramassāsappattiyā hi lokuttarajjhāneneva cittaṃ atīva tussati,
atk-s0505a:2125_11: Evamimāya gāthāya jhānapasutatāya vanantasenāsanābhiratiṃ arahattañca kathesi.
atk-s0505a:2126_1: Idāni yasmā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nālakatthero vanantamabhihāretvā nirāhāropi paṭipadāpūraṇe atīva ussukko ahosi,
atk-s0505a:2126_2: nirāhārena ca samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0505a:2126_6: Tasmā tassa bhagavā aparāparesupi divasesu piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2126_7: kilesā pana na uppādetabbāti dassanatthaṃ arahattappattiniṭṭhaṃyeva bhikkhācāravattaṃ kathento “tato ratyā vivasāne”tiādikā cha gāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:2126_13: tāva vivekamanubrūhetvā gatapaccāgatavatte vuttanayena kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karonto gāmaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-s0505a:2126_16: “deti nu kho na deti nu kho sundaraṃ nu kho deti asundaraṃ nu kho detī”ti evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ bhojanañca paṭipadāpūrako bhikkhu nābhinandeyya,
atk-s0505a:2126_18: Yadi pana balakkārena pattaṃ gahetvā pūretvā denti,
atk-s0505a:2126_21: tadupādāya pana taṃ gāmaṃ na pavisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2126_22: Abhihārañca gāmatoti sace gāmaṃ paviṭṭhassa pātisatehipi bhattaṃ abhiharanti,
atk-s0505a:2127_2: kulesu sahasā careti so ca monatthāya paṭipannako muni gāmaṃ gato samāno kulesu sahasā na care,
atk-s0505a:2127_3: sahasokitādiananulomikaṃ gihisaṃsaggaṃ na āpajjeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2127_5: na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇeti chinnakatho viya hutvā obhāsaparikathānimittaviññattipayuttaṃ ghāsesanavācaṃ na bhaṇeyya.
atk-s0505a:2127_9: avasesapaccayatthāya pana agilāno neva kiñci bhaṇeyyāti.
atk-s0505a:2128_1: Alatthaṃ yadidanti imissā pana gāthāya ayamattho –
atk-s0505a:2128_2: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho appamattakepi kismiñci laddhe “alatthaṃ yaṃ idaṃ sādhū”ti cintetvā aladdhe “nālatthaṃ
atk-s0505a:2128_3: kusala”nti tampi “sundara”nti cintetvā ubhayeneva lābhālābhena so tādī nibbikāro hutvā rukkhaṃvupanivattati,
atk-s0505a:2128_4: yathāpi puriso phalagavesī rukkhaṃ upagamma phalaṃ laddhāpi aladdhāpi ananunīto appaṭihato majjhattoyeva hutvā gacchati,
atk-s0505a:2128_5: evaṃ kulaṃ upagamma lābhaṃ laddhāpi aladdhāpi majjhattova hutvā gacchatīti.
atk-s0505a:2129_2: evaṃ bhikkhācāravattasampanno hutvāpi tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvā paṭipadaṃ ārodheyya.
atk-s0505a:2129_6: sā cāyaṃ maggapaṭipadā uttamanihīnabhedato uccāvacā buddhasamaṇena pakāsitā.
atk-s0505a:2129_13: Tāya cetāya uccāya avacāya vā paṭipadāya na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yanti.
atk-s0505a:2129_15: ekamaggena dvikkhattuṃ nibbānaṃ na yantīti attho. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:2129_19: Nayidaṃ ekaguṇaṃ mutanti tañca idaṃ pāraṃ ekakkhattuṃyeva phusanārahampi na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0505a:2130_1: Idāni paṭipadānisaṃsaṃ dassento “yassa ca visatā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2130_3: yassa ca evaṃ paṭipannassa bhikkhuno tāya paṭipadāya pahīnattā aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritabhāvena visatattā visatā taṇhā natthi,
atk-s0505a:2130_4: tassa kilesasotacchedena chinnasotassa kusalākusalappahānena kiccākiccappahīnassa rāgajo vā dosajo vā appamattakopi pariḷāho na vijjatīti.
atk-s0505a:2131_1: Idāni yasmā imā gāthāyo sutvā nālakattherassa cittaṃ udapādi –
atk-s0505a:2131_4: tasmāssa bhagavā “dukkarameva moneyya”nti dassento puna “moneyyaṃ te upaññissa”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:2131_10: Moneyyaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu khuradhāraṃ upamaṃ katvā paccayesu vatteyya.
atk-s0505a:2131_13: evaṃ dhammena laddhe paccaye paribhuñjanto cittaṃ kilesuppattito rakkheyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2131_14: Paccayā hi parisuddhena ñāyena laddhuñca anavajjaparibhogena paribhuñjituñca na sukhena sakkāti bhagavā paccayanissitameva bahuso bhaṇati.
atk-s0505a:2131_16: udare saññato siyāti jivhāya tāluṃ uppīḷetvāpi rasataṇhaṃ vinodento kiliṭṭhena maggena uppannapaccaye asevanto udare saṃyato siyā.
atk-s0505a:2132_1: Alīnacitto ca siyāti niccaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya aṭṭhitakāritāya akusītacitto ca bhaveyya.
atk-s0505a:2132_2: Na cāpi bahu cintayeti ñātijanapadāmaravitakkavasena ca bahuṃ na cinteyya.
atk-s0505a:2132_4: brahmacariyaparāyaṇoti nikkileso ca hutvā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi kismiñci bhave anissito sikkhāttayasakalasāsanabrahmacariyaparāyaṇo eva bhaveyya.
atk-s0505a:2133_3: Yato sabbairiyāpathesu ekībhāvassa sikkheyyāti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2133_11: Ekattaṃ monamakkhātanti evamidaṃ kāyacittavivekavasena “ekattaṃ mona”nti akkhātaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2133_12: Eko ce abhiramissasīti idaṃ pana uttaragāthāpekkhaṃ padaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2134_1: Imaṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvento sabbadisāsu kittiyā pākaṭo bhavissasīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2134_2: Sutvā dhīrānantiādīnaṃ pana catunnaṃ padānaṃ ayamattho –
atk-s0505a:2134_3: yena ca kittighosena bhāhisi dasadisā taṃ dhīrānaṃ jhāyīnaṃ kāmacāginaṃ nighosaṃ sutvā atha tvaṃ tena
atk-s0505a:2134_4: uddhaccaṃ anāpajjitvā bhiyyo hiriñca saddhañca kareyyāsi,
atk-s0505a:2134_5: tena ghosena harāyamāno “niyyānikapaṭipadā aya”nti saddhaṃ uppādetvā uttari paṭipattimeva brūheyyāsi.
atk-s0505a:2134_6: Māmakoti evañhi sante mama sāvako hotīti.
atk-s0505a:2135_1: Taṃ nadīhīti yaṃ taṃ mayā “hiriñca saddhañca bhiyyo kubbethā”ti vadatā “uddhaccaṃ na kātabba”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2135_8: Kusobbhā hi sobbhapadarādibhedā sabbāpi kunnadiyo saṇantā saddaṃ karontā uddhatā hutvā yanti,
atk-s0505a:2135_11: māmako pana hiriñca saddhañca uppādetvā nīcacittova hoti.
atk-s0505a:2136_7: atha kasmā buddhasamaṇo evaṃ dhammadesanābyāvaṭo hutvā bahuṃ bhāsatīti iminā sambandhena “yaṃ samaṇo”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2136_9: yaṃ buddhasamaṇo bahuṃ bhāsati upetaṃ atthasañhitaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2136_12: apica kho jānaṃ so dhammaṃ deseti divasampi desento nippapañcova hutvā.
atk-s0505a:2136_14: Evaṃ desento ca “idamassa hitaṃ idamassa hita”nti nānappakārato jānaṃ so bahu bhāsati,
atk-s0505a:2136_17: evaṃ tāva sabbaññutaññāṇena samannāgato buddhasamaṇo jānaṃ so dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0505a:2136_19: Tena desitaṃ pana dhammaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyeneva ñāṇena yo ca jānaṃ saṃyatatto,
atk-s0505a:2136_24: taṃ dhammaṃ jānanto saṃyatatto guttacitto hutvā yaṃ bhāsitaṃ sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0505a:2136_26: So evaṃvidho monatthaṃ paṭipannako muni moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ monaṃ arahati.
atk-s0505a:2136_28: apica kho pana sa muni arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ monaṃ ajjhagā icceva veditabboti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:2137_0: Taṃ sutvā nālakatthero tīsu ṭhānesu appiccho ahosi dassane savane pucchāyāti.
atk-s0505a:2137_1: So hi desanāpariyosāne pasannacitto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā vanaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0505a:2137_2: puna “aho vatāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ passeyya”nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi.
atk-s0505a:2137_4: Tathā “aho vatāhaṃ puna dhammadesanaṃ suṇeyya”nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi.

atk-s0505a:2146_7: Visesatthadīpikā vāti avipassake vipassake ca dassetvā tesaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭadassanato,

atk-s0505a:2191_3: Bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante aññataro brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyā jetavanassa ca antare aciravatīnadītīre “yavaṃ vapissāmī”ti khettaṃ kasati.
