atk-s0505a:2551_1: Athakocarahīti atha idāni ko añño atārīti.
atk-s0505a:2551_4: parattabhāvasakattabhāvādīni parāni ca orāni cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2551_7: Atāri soti so evarūpo arahā jātijaraṃ atāri.
atk-s0505a:2552_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2552_1: Desanāpariyosāne ayampi brāhmaṇo arahatte patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ antevāsisahassena,
atk-s0505a:2556_2: Tattha maññāmi taṃ vedaguṃ bhāvitattanti “ayaṃ vedagū”ti ca “bhāvitatto”ti ca evaṃ taṃ maññāmi.
atk-s0505a:2557_4: Pavakkhāmi yathā pajānanti yathā pajānanto ācikkhati,
atk-s0505a:2557_6: Upadhinidānā pabhavanti dukkhāti taṇhādiupadhinidānā jātiādidukkhavisesā pabhavanti.
atk-s0505a:2559_2: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammoti yathā yathā sattā jānanti,
atk-s0505a:2559_3: tathā tathā paññāpanavasena vidito esa dhammoti.
atk-s0505a:2560_1: Kittayissāmi te dhammanti nibbānadhammaṃ nibbānagāminipaṭipadādhammañca te desayissāmi.
atk-s0505a:2560_5: Yaṃ viditvāti yaṃ dhammaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena sammasanto viditvā.
atk-s0505a:2560_6: Tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmīti taṃ vuttapakāradhammajotakaṃ tava vacanaṃ ahaṃ patthayāmi.
atk-s0505a:2561_1: Uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjheti ettha uddhanti anāgataddhā vuccati,
atk-s0505a:2561_5: panujja viññāṇanti etesu uddhādīsu taṇhañca diṭṭhinivesanañca abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇañca panudehi,
atk-s0505a:2561_7: evaṃ sante duvidhepi bhave na tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0505a:2561_8: Evaṃ tāva panujjasaddassa panudehīti imasmiṃ atthavikappe sambandho,
atk-s0505a:2561_9: panuditvāti etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe bhave na tiṭṭheti ayameva sambandho.
atk-s0505a:2561_10: Etāni nandinivesanaviññāṇāni panuditvā duvidhepi bhave na tiṭṭheyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2563_4: Taṃ taṃ namassāmīti tasmā taṃ namassāmi.
atk-s0505a:2564_1: Idāni taṃ bhagavā “addhā hi bhagavā pahāsi dukkha”nti evaṃ tena brāhmaṇena viditopi attānaṃ anupanetvāva
atk-s0505a:2564_7: kāmesu ca bhavesu ca asattattā kāmabhave asatto”ti jaññā jāneyyāsi.
atk-s0505a:2564_8: Addhā hi so imaṃ oghaṃ atāri,
atk-s0505a:2566_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2566_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2570_3: Sikkhe nibbānamattanoti attano rāgādīnaṃ nibbānatthāya adhisīlādīni sikkheyya.
atk-s0505a:2571_1: Evaṃ vutte attamano dhotako bhagavantaṃ abhitthavamāno kathaṃkathāpamokkhaṃ yācanto “passāmaha”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2571_2: Tattha passāmahaṃ devamanussaloketi passāmi ahaṃ devamanussaloke.
atk-s0505a:2571_3: Taṃ taṃ namassāmīti taṃ evarūpaṃ namassāmi.
atk-s0505a:2572_1: Athassa bhagavā attādhīnameva kathaṃkathāpamokkhaṃ oghataraṇamukhena dassento “nāha”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2572_2: Tattha nāhaṃ sahissāmīti ahaṃ na sahissāmi na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0505a:2573_1: Evaṃ vutte attamanataro dhotako bhagavantaṃ abhitthavamāno anusāsaniṃ yācanto “anusāsa brahme”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2573_9: Ito parā dve gāthā mettagusutte vuttanayā eva.
atk-s0505a:2573_12: Tatiyagāthāyapi pubbaḍḍhaṃ tattha vutanayameva aparaḍḍhe saṅgoti sajjanaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2574_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2574_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2578_3: Anissitoti puggalaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā anissito.
atk-s0505a:2578_6: Yaṃ nissitoti yaṃ puggalaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā nissito.
atk-s0505a:2579_1: Idāni yasmā so brāhmaṇo ākiñcaññāyatanalābhī tañca santampi nissayaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0505a:2579_2: tenassa bhagavā tañca nissayaṃ uttari ca niyyānapathaṃ dassento “ākiñcañña”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2579_3: Tattha pekkhamānoti taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ sato samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhahitvā ca aniccādivasena passamāno.
atk-s0505a:2579_4: Natthīti nissāyāti taṃ “natthi kiñcī”ti pavattasamāpattiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
atk-s0505a:2579_5: Tarassu oghanti tato pabhuti pavattāya vipassanāya yathānurūpaṃ catubbidhampi oghaṃ tarassu.
atk-s0505a:2579_7: Taṇhakkhayaṃ nattamahābhipassāti rattindivaṃ nibbānaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā passa.
atk-s0505a:2580_1: Idāni “kāme pahāyā”ti sutvā vikkhambhanavasena attanā pahīne kāme sampassamāno “sabbesū”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2580_2: Tattha hitvā maññanti aññaṃ tato heṭṭhā chabbidhampi samāpattiṃ hitvā.
atk-s0505a:2580_3: Saññāvimokkhe parameti sattasu saññāvimokkhesu uttame ākiñcaññāyatane.
atk-s0505a:2580_4: Tiṭṭhe nu so tattha anānuyāyīti so puggalo tattha ākiñcaññāyatanabrahmaloke avigacchamāno tiṭṭheyya nūti pucchati.
atk-s0505a:2580_5: Athassa bhagavā saṭṭhikappasahassamattaṃyeva ṭhānaṃ anujānanto tatiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2581_1: Evaṃ tassa tattha ṭhānaṃ sutvā idānissa sassatucchedabhāvaṃ pucchanto “tiṭṭhe ce”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2581_6: pūganti vā etassa bahūnīti attho vattabbo.
atk-s0505a:2581_9: Tattheva so sīti siyā vimuttoti so puggalo tatthevākiñcaññāyatane nānādukkhehi vimutto sītibhāvappatto bhaveyya,
atk-s0505a:2581_11: Cavetha viññāṇaṃ tathāvidhassāti udāhu tathāvidhassa viññāṇaṃ anupādāya parinibbāyeyyāti ucchedaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0505a:2581_12: paṭisandhiggahaṇatthaṃ vāpi bhaveyyāti paṭisandhimpi tassa pucchati.
atk-s0505a:2582_1: Athassa bhagavā ucchedasassataṃ anupagamma tattha uppannassa ariyasāvakassa anupādāya parinibbānaṃ dassento “accī yathā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2582_3: Na upeti saṅkhanti “asukaṃ nāma disaṃ gato”ti vohāraṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0505a:2582_4: Evaṃ munī nāmakāyā vimuttoti evaṃ tattha uppanno sekkhamuni pakatiyā pubbeva rūpakāyā vimutto tattha
atk-s0505a:2582_5: catutthamaggaṃ nibbattetvā dhammakāyassa pariññātattā puna nāmakāyāpi vimutto ubhatobhāgavimutto khīṇāsavo
atk-s0505a:2582_7: na upeti saṅkhaṃ “khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā”ti evamādikaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2583_1: Idāni “atthaṃ paletī”ti sutvā tassa yoniso atthaṃ asallakkhento “atthaṅgato so”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2583_4: udāhu ve sassatiyā sassatabhāvena arogo avipariṇāmadhammo soti evaṃ taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi.
atk-s0505a:2583_6: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammoti.
atk-s0505a:2584_1: Athassa bhagavā tathā avattabbataṃ dassento “atthaṅgatassā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2584_4: Yena naṃ vajjunti yena rāgādinā naṃ vadeyyuṃ.
atk-s0505a:2585_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imaṃ suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2585_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2589_3: loke khattiyādayo janā ājīvakanigaṇṭhādike sandhāya “santi munayo”ti vadanti,
atk-s0505a:2589_4: tayidaṃ kathaṃsūti kiṃ nu kho te samāpattiñāṇādinā ñāṇena uppannattā ñāṇūpapannaṃ no muniṃ vadanti,
atk-s0505a:2589_6: udāhu ve nānappakārakena lūkhajīvitasaṅkhātena jīvitenūpapannanti athassa bhagavā tadubhayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā muniṃ dassento “na diṭṭhiyā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2590_1: Idāni “diṭṭhādīhi suddhī”ti vadantānaṃ vāde kaṅkhāpahānatthaṃ “ye kecime”ti pucchati.
atk-s0505a:2590_3: Tattha yatā carantāti tattha sakāya diṭṭhiyā guttā viharantā.
atk-s0505a:2590_4: Athassa tathā suddhiabhāvaṃ dīpento bhagavā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2591_3: Athassa bhagavā oghatiṇṇamukhena jātijarātiṇṇe dassento tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2591_8: Taṇhaṃ pariññāyāti tīhi pariññāhi taṇhaṃ parijānitvā.
atk-s0505a:2592_1: desanāpariyosāne pana nando bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandamāno “etābhinandāmī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2592_2: Idhāpi ca pubbe vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2596_2: Tattha ye me pubbe viyākaṃsūti ye bāvariādayo pubbe mayhaṃ sakaṃ laddhiṃ viyākaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:2596_4: Sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhananti sabbaṃ taṃ kāmavitakkādivaḍḍhanaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2596_6: Athassa bhagavā taṃ dhammaṃ ācikkhanto “idhā”ti gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:2596_7: Tattha etadaññāya ye satāti etaṃ nibbānapadamaccutaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena vipassantā
atk-s0505a:2597_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2597_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2601_2: Tattha vimokkho tassa kīdisoti tassa kīdiso vimokkho icchitabboti pucchati.
atk-s0505a:2601_3: Idāni tassa aññavimokkhābhāvaṃ dassento bhagavā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2601_4: Tattha vimokkho tassa nāparoti tassa añño vimokkho natthi.
atk-s0505a:2602_1: Evaṃ “taṇhakkhayo eva vimokkho”ti vuttepi tamatthaṃ asallakkhento “nirāsaso so uda āsasāno”ti puna pucchati.
atk-s0505a:2602_2: Tattha uda paññakappīti udāhu samāpattiñāṇādinā ñāṇena taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā kappayati.
atk-s0505a:2602_3: Athassa bhagavā taṃ ācikkhanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2602_4: Tattha kāmabhaveti kāme ca bhave ca.
atk-s0505a:2603_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2603_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2607_2: Tattha majjhe sarasminti purimapacchimakoṭipaññāṇābhāvato majjhabhūte saṃsāreti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2607_4: Yathāyidaṃ nāparaṃ siyāti yathā idaṃ dukkhaṃ puna na bhaveyya.
atk-s0505a:2608_1: Athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ byākaronto tisso gāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:2608_7: Na te mārassa paddhagūti te mārassa paddhacarā paricārakā sissā na honti.
atk-s0505a:2609_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2613_2: Tattha sutvānahaṃ vīramakāmakāminti ahaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā nayena vīraṃ kāmānaṃ akāmanato akāmakāmiṃ buddhaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0505a:2613_9: Tejī tejasāti tejena samannāgato tejasā abhibhuyya.
atk-s0505a:2613_10: Yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ jātijarāya idha vippahānanti yamahaṃ jātijarānaṃ pahānabhūtaṃ dhammaṃ idheva jāneyyaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2614_1: Athassa bhagavā taṃ dhammamācikkhanto tisso gāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:2614_2: Tattha nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khematoti nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ “khema”nti disvā.
atk-s0505a:2614_6: Mā te vijjitthāti mā te ahosi.
atk-s0505a:2614_7: Kiñcananti rāgādikiñcanaṃ vāpi te mā vijjittha.
atk-s0505a:2615_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2615_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2619_6: Ekā eva hi taṇhā thutivasena idha nānappakārato vuttā.
atk-s0505a:2619_9: Sutvāna nāgassa apanamissanti itoti nāgassa tava bhagavā vacanaṃ sutvā ito pāsāṇakacetiyato bahū janā pakkamissantīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0505a:2619_10: Janapadehi saṅgatāti aṅgādīhi janapadehi idha samāgatā.
atk-s0505a:2620_1: Athassa āsayānulomena dhammaṃ desento bhagavā dve gāthāyo abhāsi.
atk-s0505a:2620_4: Yaṃ yañhi lokasmimupādiyantīti etesu uddhādibhedesu yaṃ yaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0505a:2620_5: Teneva māro anveti jantunti teneva upādānapaccayanibbattakammābhisaṅkhāranibbattavasena paṭisandhikkhandhamāro taṃ sattaṃ anugacchati.
atk-s0505a:2621_1: Tasmā pajānanti tasmā etamādīnavaṃ aniccādivasena vā saṅkhāre jānanto.
atk-s0505a:2621_3: pajaṃ imaṃ maccudheyye visattanti ādātabbaṭṭhena ādānesu rūpādīsu satte sabbaloke imaṃ pajaṃ maccudheyye laggaṃ pekkhamāno.
atk-s0505a:2621_4: Ādānasatte vā ādānābhiniviṭṭhe puggale ādānasaṅgahetuñca imaṃ pajaṃ maccudheyye laggaṃ tato vītikkamituṃ
atk-s0505a:2621_5: asamatthaṃ iti pekkhamāno kiñcanaṃ sabbaloke na uppādiyethāti sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
atk-s0505a:2622_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2622_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2626_4: tasmāssa paṭiladdhajjhānavasena nānappakārato aññāvimokkhaṃ dassento gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:2626_5: Tattha pahānaṃ kāmacchandānanti yamidaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattentassa kāmacchandappahānaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2627_2: Dhammatakkapurejavanti iminā tasmiṃ catutthajjhānavimokkhe ṭhatvā jhānaṅgāni vipassitvā adhigataṃ arahattavimokkhaṃ vadati.
atk-s0505a:2627_3: Arahattavimokkhassa hi maggasampayuttasammāsaṅkappādibhedo dhammatakko purejavo hoti. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:2627_5: Avijjāya pabhedananti etameva ca aññāvimokkhaṃ avijjāpabhedanasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ nissāya jātattā kāraṇopacārena “avijjāya pabhedana”nti pabrūmīti.
atk-s0505a:2628_1: Evaṃ avijjāpabhedanavacanena vuttaṃ nibbānaṃ sutvā “taṃ kissa vippahānena vuccatī”ti pucchanto “kiṃsu saṃyojano”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2628_4: Kissassa vippahānenāti kiṃ nāmakassa assa dhammassa vippahānena.
atk-s0505a:2629_1: Idāni tassa nibbānassa maggaṃ pucchanto “kathaṃ satassā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2629_4: Tattha evaṃ satassāti evaṃ satassa sampajānassa.
atk-s0505a:2630_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2630_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2634_2: Tattha yo atītaṃ ādisatīti yo bhagavā attano ca paresañca “ekampi jāti”ntiādibhedaṃ atītaṃ ādisati.
atk-s0505a:2634_6: Natthi kiñcīti passatoti viññāṇābhāvavipassanena “natthi kiñcī”ti passato,
atk-s0505a:2634_8: Ñāṇaṃ sakkānupucchāmīti sakkāti bhagavantaṃ ālapanto āha.
atk-s0505a:2635_1: Athassa bhagavā tādise puggale attano appaṭihatañāṇataṃ pakāsetvā taṃ ñāṇaṃ byākātuṃ gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0505a:2635_3: abhijānaṃ tathāgatoti abhisaṅkhāravasena catasso paṭisandhivasena sattāti evaṃ sabbā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo abhijānanto tathāgato.
atk-s0505a:2635_4: Tiṭṭhantamenaṃ jānātīti kammābhisaṅkhāravasena tiṭṭhantaṃ etaṃ puggalaṃ jānāti “āyatiṃ ayaṃ evaṃgatiko bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0505a:2636_1: Ākiñcaññasambhavaṃ ñatvāti ākiñcaññāyatanajanakaṃ kammābhisaṅkhāraṃ ñatvā “kinti palibodho aya”nti.
atk-s0505a:2636_2: Nandī saṃyojanaṃ itīti yā ca tattha arūparāgasaṅkhātā nandī,
atk-s0505a:2636_4: Tato tattha vipassatīti tato ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ samāpattiṃ aniccādivasena vipassati.
atk-s0505a:2636_5: Etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathaṃ tassāti etaṃ tassa puggalassa evaṃ vipassato anukkameneva uppannaṃ arahattañāṇaṃ aviparītaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2637_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2637_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2641_3: So hi pubbe ajitasuttassa ca tissametteyyasuttassa ca avasāne dvikkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0505a:2641_4: Bhagavā panassa indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno na byākāsi. Tenāha –
atk-s0505a:2641_7: byākarotīti me sutanti yāvatatiyañca sahadhammikaṃ puṭṭho visuddhidevabhūto isi bhagavā sammāsambuddho byākarotīti evaṃ me sutaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2643_2: sadevakassa lokassa ajjhāsayādhimuttigatiparāyaṇādīni passituṃ samatthanti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:2644_1: Suññato lokaṃ avekkhassūti avasiyapavattasallakkhaṇavasena vā tucchasaṅkhārasamanupassanāvasena vāti dvīhi kāraṇehi suññato lokaṃ passa.
atk-s0505a:2645_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0505a:2645_1: Desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0505a:2649_2: Tattha jiṇṇohamasmi abalo vītavaṇṇoti so kira brāhmaṇo jarābhibhūto vīsavassasatiko jātiyā,
atk-s0505a:2649_3: dubbalo ca “idha padaṃ karissāmī”ti aññattheva karoti,
atk-s0505a:2649_6: Māhaṃ nassaṃ momuho antarāvāti māhaṃ tuyhaṃ dhammaṃ asacchikatvā antarāyeva avidvā hutvā anassiṃ.
atk-s0505a:2649_7: Jātijarāya idha vippahānanti idheva tava pādamūle pāsāṇake vā cetiya jātijarāya vippahānaṃ nibbānadhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ,
atk-s0505a:2650_1: Idāni yasmā piṅgiyo kāye sāpekkhatāya “jiṇṇohamasmī”ti gāthamāha tenassa bhagavā kāye sinehappahānatthaṃ “disvāna rūpesu vihaññamāne”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0505a:2650_4: Ruppanti rūpesūti cakkhurogādīhi ca rūpahetuyeva janā ruppanti bādhīyanti.
atk-s0505a:2651_1: Evaṃ bhagavatā yāva arahattaṃ tāva kathitaṃ paṭipattiṃ sutvāpi piṅgiyo jarādubbalatāya visesaṃ anadhigantvāva
atk-s0505a:2651_2: puna “disā catasso”ti imāya gāthāya bhagavantaṃ thomento desanaṃ yācati.
atk-s0505a:2652_3: “evaṃ vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ nāma desanaṃ na labhi mayhaṃ mātulo bāvarī savanāyā”ti.
atk-s0505a:2656_0: Ito paraṃ saṅgītikārā desanaṃ thomentā “idamavoca bhagavā”tiādimāhaṃsu.
atk-s0505a:2656_2: Paricārakasoḷasānanti bāvarissa paricārakena piṅgiyena saha soḷasannaṃ buddhassa vā bhagavato paricārakānaṃ soḷasannanti paricārakasoḷasannaṃ.
atk-s0505a:2656_4: Tattha soḷasaparisā pana purato ca pacchato ca vāmapassato ca dakkhiṇapassato ca cha cha yojanāni nisinnā ujukena dvādasayojanikā ahosi.
atk-s0505a:2656_7: Pārāyananti evaṃ imassa dhammapariyāyassa adhivacanaṃ āropetvā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ nāmāni kittayantā “ajito tissametteyyo…pe…
atk-s0505a:2657_5: Tasmā pārāyananti tassa pārabhūtassa nibbānassa ayananti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2659_2: bhagavatā hi pārāyane desite soḷasasahassā jaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0505a:2662_0: Niṭṭhitāya pana dhammadesanāya tato tato āgatā manussā bhagavato ānubhāvena attano attano gāmanigamādīsveva pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:2662_1: Bhagavāpi sāvatthimeva agamāsi paricārakasoḷasādīhi anekehi bhikkhusahassehi parivuto.
atk-s0505a:2662_6: Atha bhagavatā anuññāto ñāṇagamaneneva godhāvarītīraṃ gantvā pādagamanena assamābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:2662_7: Tamenaṃ bāvarī brāhmaṇo maggaṃ olokento nisinno dūratova khārijaṭādivirahitaṃ bhikkhuvesena āgacchantaṃ disvā “buddho loke uppanno”ti niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0505a:2662_10: pāsāṇake cetiye nisinno amhākaṃ dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0505a:2662_12: Tato bāvarī mahatā sakkārena sapariso taṃ pūjetvā āsanaṃ paññāpesi.
atk-s0505a:2663_1: Yathāddakkhīti yathā sāmaṃ saccābhisambodhena asādhāraṇañāṇena ca addakkhi.
atk-s0505a:2663_7: Kissa hetu musā bhaṇeti yehi kilesehi musā bhaṇeyya,
atk-s0505a:2664_5: Bahupphalaṃ kānanamāvaseyyāti anekaphalādivikatibharitaṃ kānanaṃ āgamma vaseyya.
atk-s0505a:2666_1: Atha naṃ bāvarī āha “kiṃ nu tamhā”ti dve gāthā.
atk-s0505a:2666_2: Tato piṅgiyo bhagavato santikā avippavāsameva dīpento “nāhaṃ tamhā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:2666_3: Passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāvāti taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ cakkhunā viya manasā passāmi.
atk-s0505a:2666_4: Namassamāno vivasemi rattinti namassamānova rattiṃ atināmemi.
atk-s0505a:2666_5: Tena teneva natoti yena disābhāgena buddho,
atk-s0505a:2666_6: tena tenevāhampi nato tanninno tappoṇoti dasseti.
atk-s0505a:2667_2: atha vā dubbalassa dutthāmakassa ca balavīriyahīnassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2667_3: Teneva kāyo na paletīti teneva dubbalathāmakattena kāyo na gacchati,
atk-s0505a:2668_2: Dīpā dīpaṃ upaplavinti satthārādito satthārādiṃ abhigacchiṃ.
atk-s0505a:2668_3: Athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhanti sohaṃ evaṃ duddiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā anvāhiṇḍanto atha pāsāṇake cetiye buddhamaddakkhiṃ.
atk-s0505a:2669_1: Imissā gāthāya avasāne piṅgiyassa ca bāvarissa ca indriyaparipākaṃ viditvā bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ ṭhitoyeva suvaṇṇobhāsaṃ muñci.
atk-s0505a:2669_2: Piṅgiyo bāvarissa buddhaguṇe vaṇṇayanto nisinno eva taṃ obhāsaṃ disvā “kiṃ ida”nti vilokento bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0505a:2669_3: attano purato ṭhitaṃ viya disvā bāvaribrāhmaṇassa “buddho āgato”ti ārocesi,
atk-s0505a:2669_5: Bhagavāpi obhāsaṃ pharitvā brāhmaṇassa attānaṃ dassento ubhinnampi sappāyaṃ viditvā piṅgiyameva ālapamāno “yathā ahū vakkalī”ti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.
atk-s0505a:2670_3: Yathā ca soḷasannaṃ eko bhadrāvudho nāma yathā ca āḷavi gotamo,
atk-s0505a:2670_5: Tato saddhāya adhimuccanto “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā maccudheyyassa
atk-s0505a:2670_6: pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gamissasīti arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0505a:2670_7: Desanāpariyosāne piṅgiyo arahatte bāvarī anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0505a:2670_8: Bāvaribrāhmaṇassa sissā pana pañcasatā sotāpannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0505a:2671_1: Idāni piṅgiyo attano pasādaṃ pavedento “esa bhiyyo”tiādimāha.
atk-s0505a:2671_5: attano ca parassa ca adhidevattakaraṃ sabbaṃ dhammajātaṃ vedīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0505a:2672_4: Addhā gamissāmīti ekaṃseneva taṃ anupādisesaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ gamissāmi.
atk-s0505a:2672_5: Na mettha kaṅkhāti natthi me ettha nibbāne kaṅkhā.
atk-s0505a:2672_6: Evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacittanti piṅgiyo “evameva tvampi pamuñcassu saddha”nti.
atk-s0505a:2672_7: Iminā bhagavato ovādena attani saddhaṃ uppādetvā saddhādhureneva ca vimuñcitvā taṃ saddhādhimuttataṃ pakāsento bhagavantaṃ āha –
atk-s0505a:2675_0: Niṭṭhito ca pañcamo vaggo atthavaṇṇanānayato, nāmena
atk-s0505a:2683_0: Ettha uragavaggādipañcavaggasaṅgahitassa uragasuttādisattatisuttappabhedassa suttanipātassa atthavaṇṇanā katā hoti.
atk-s0505a:2687_0: Vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ, pāpuṇātu ayaṃ jano”ti.
atk-s0505a:2689_4: theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā buddhaghosoti
atk-s0505a:2689_5: garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ paramatthajotikā nāma suttanipāta-
